quotes.quote: Habit is formed out of memory... We often shape our present situation according to those habitual memories. Instead of starting fresh, we go back to what we've done in the past... easier for us than fighting our way through foreign territory.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Memorizing, guessing, looking at pictures, predicting, substituting, and skipping, are not reading; they are very bad habits.
quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.quote: To cure worry, spend fifteen minutes daily filling your mind full of God. Worry is just a very bad mental habit. You can change any habit with God's help.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Habits begin to form at the very first repetition. After that there is a tropism toward repetition, for the patterns involved are defenses , bulwarks against time and despair.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley

quotes.quote: These various habits of thought, or habitual expressions of life, are all phases of the single life sequence of the individual; therefore a habit formed in response to a given stimulus will necessarily affect the character of the response made to other stimuli. A modification of human nature at any one point is a modification of human nature as a whole.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.quote: An unfortunate thing about this world is that the good habits are much easier to give up than the bad ones.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Habits begin as offhanded remarks, ideas and images. And then, layer upon layer, through practice, they grow from cobwebs into cables that shackle or strengthen our lives.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Habit must play a larger place in our religious life. We worship when we feel like it, we pray when we feel like it. We read the Bible when we feel like it. Leaving our religious exercises to the promptings of impulse, we become creatures of impulse rather than soldiers of Christ. An army made up of creatures of impulse would be only a mob. So is a church.
quotes.author: Ralph Washington Sockman

quotes.quote: Life becomes a habit. You get up, dress, eat, go tae work, clock in etcetera etcetera automatically, and think about nothing but the pay packet on Friday and the booze-up last Saturday. Life's easy when you're a robot.
quotes.author: Alasdair Gray

quotes.quote: Habit is the most imperious of all masters.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Good habits are hard to develop but easy to live with; bad habits are easy to develop but hard to live with. The habits you have and the habits that have you will determine almost everything you achieve or fail to achieve.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Repetition of the same thought or physical action develops into a habit which, repeated frequently enough, becomes an automatic reflex.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Be careful what you choose to do consciously, for unless your will is very strong, that is what you may have to do repeatedly and compulsively through the habit-influencing power of the subconscious mind.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: The only habits you never conquer are the ones you put off doing something about.
quotes.author: Wess Roberts

quotes.quote: Habit is a man's sole comfort. We dislike doing without even unpleasant things to which we have become accustomed.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Evil habits, in which men indulge, are the chief cause of disease in the physical as well as the mental state.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Habit is a second nature which prevents us from knowing the first, of which it has neither the cruelties nor the enchantments.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Your behavior is based on your beliefs, and what you do and say, over and over again, helps develop your habits.
quotes.author: Darren Johnson

quotes.quote: Habit is thus the enormous flywheel of society, its most precious conservative agent. It alone is what keeps us all within the bounds of ordinance, and saves the children of fortune from the envious uprisings of the poor.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Habit gives endurance, and fatigue is the best night cap.
quotes.author: Jamaica Kincaid

quotes.quote: Habit is the beneficent harness of routine which enables silly men to live respectfully and unhappy men to live calmly.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Habit is habit, and not to be flung out of the window by any man, but coaxed down-stairs one step at a time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Habits are to the soul what the veins and arteries are to the blood, the courses in which it moves.
quotes.author: Horace Bushnell

quotes.quote: The wise say that our failure is to form habits: for habit is the mark of a stereotyped world.
quotes.author: A.C. Grayling

quotes.quote: Habits are like the wrinkles on a man's brow; if you will smooth out the one, I will smooth out the other.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Success is not a sometimes thing. In other words, you don't do what is right once in awhile, but all the time. Success is a habit. Winning is a habit.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Practice hope. As hopefulness becomes a habit, you can achieve a permanently happy spirit.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Basically, morphic fields are fields of habit, and they've been set up through habits of thought, through habits of activity, and through habits of speech. Most of our culture is habitual.
quotes.author: Rupert Sheldrake

quotes.quote: Successful people form habits that feed their success, instead of habits that feed their failure.
quotes.author: Jeff Olson

quotes.quote: If you want to change your art, change your habits.
quotes.author: Clement Greenberg

quotes.quote: Habit is the cement of society, the comfort of life, and, alas! The root of error.
quotes.author: Fulke Greville

quotes.quote: Habit: The great economizer of energy.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Habits are where our lives and careers and bodies are made.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Habits, soft and pliant at first, are like some coral stones, which are easily cut when first quarried, but soon become hard as adamant.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is a result of good work habits.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Good habits are the key to all success. Bad habits are the unlocked door to failure.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: To make anything a habit, do it; to not make it a habit, do not do it; to unmake a habit, do something else in place of it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Habit and routine have an unbelievable power to waste and destroy.
quotes.author: Henri de Lubac

quotes.quote: I believe you can never change a habit, or create one, with a word or a piece of chalk. You can talk all day, put all sorts of diagrams on the board, but a habit is not going to change. It's a conditional reflex, created by a repetitive act.
quotes.author: Pete Newell

quotes.quote: Do something everyday that you don't want to do; this is the golden rule for acquiring the habit of doing your duty without pain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To change a habit, make a conscious decision, then act out the new behavior.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the hardest habit to break is the habit of doing nothing beyond the necessary.
quotes.author: Mira Grant

quotes.quote: Positive thinking is a habit, like everything else, you get better at it with time.
quotes.author: Alexander Gustafsson

quotes.quote: Ancient Rule of Twenty-one: if you do anything for twenty-one days in a row, it will be installed as a habit.
quotes.author: Robin S

quotes.quote: A habit is good if it helps you achieve your goal; it is bad if it hinders your achievement.
quotes.author: Douglas Merrill

quotes.quote: A habit is something you can do without thinking - which is why most of us have so many of them.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: You are what you do repeatedly every day. If excellence is something you're striving for, then it's not an accident. It's a habit.
quotes.author: Greg Plitt

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.quote: The habit of virtue cannot be formed in a closet. Habits are formed by acts of reason in a persevering struggle through temptation.
quotes.author: Bernard Gilpin

quotes.quote: The successful person makes a habit of doing what the failing person doesn't like to do.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Are hackers a threat? The degree of threat presented by any conduct, whether legal or illegal, depends on the actions and intent of the individual and the harm they cause.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.quote: Most hackers are young because young people tend to be adaptable. As long as you remain adaptable, you can always be a good hacker.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

quotes.quote: Hackers are arrogant geek romantics. They lack the attentive spirit of inquiry.
quotes.author: Bruce Sterling

quotes.quote: It is a fairly open secret that almost all systems can be hacked, somehow. It is a less spoken of secret that such hacking has actually gone quite mainstream.
quotes.author: Dan Kaminsky

quotes.quote: Younger hackers are hard to classify. They're probably just as diverse as the old hackers are. We're all over the map.
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: A hacker is someone who uses a combination of high-tech cybertools and social engineering to gain illicit access to someone else's data.
quotes.author: John McAfee

quotes.quote: Behind every successful Coder there an even more successful De-coder to understand that code.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A hacker is someone who enjoys playful cleverness, not necessarily with computers. The programmers in the old MIT free software community of the 60s and 70s referred to themselves as hackers. Around 1980, journalists who discovered the hacker community mistakenly took the term to mean "security breaker."
quotes.author: Richard Stallman

quotes.quote: A hacker does for love what others would not do for money.
quotes.author: Laura Creighton

quotes.quote: If you rate a programmer or coder 7.5/10 on knowledge basis, you would definitely have to rate a hacker 10.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's actually a smarter crime because imagine if you rob a bank, or you're dealing drugs. If you get caught you're going to spend a lot of time in custody. But with hacking, it's much easier to commit the crime and the risk of punishment is slim to none.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.quote: Hacking is not a crime, it's a profession till the time you play with it safely.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hacking just means building something quickly or testing the boundaries of what can be done.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: There are more hackers breeding every day, and more brilliant minds are turning into hackers. Security has advanced, but so have hackers.
quotes.author: Michael Demon Calce

quotes.quote: While many hackers have the knowledge, skills, and tools to attack computer systems, they generally lack the motivation to cause violence or severe economic or social harm.
quotes.author: Dorothy E. Denning

quotes.quote: The hacker mindset doesn't actually see what happens on the other side, to the victim.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.quote: Flying down a tunnel of 1s and 0s is not how hacking is really done.
quotes.author: Walter O'Brien

quotes.quote: Hacking involves a different way of looking at problems that no one's thought of.
quotes.author: Walter O'Brien

quotes.quote: The hackers don't want to destroy the network. They want to keep it running, so they can keep making money from it.
quotes.author: Vinton Cerf

quotes.quote: Old hackers never die. They just go to bitnet.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The difference between a hacker and consumer is a consumer says, "I wish it would work this way." A hacker says, "I've got a screwdriver and a few minutes.
quotes.author: Rael Dornfest

quotes.quote: A hacker to me is someone creative who does wonderful things.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: While the vast majority of hackers may be disinclined towards violence, it would only take a few to turn cyber terrorism into reality.
quotes.author: Dorothy Denning

quotes.quote: A hacker doesnt deliberately destroy data or profit from his activities.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.quote: Hackers are actually good, pleasant and extremely intelligent people who could keep computer criminals on the run.
quotes.author: Ankit Fadia

quotes.quote: Hackers are breaking the systems for profit. Before, it was about intellectual curiosity and pursuit of knowledge and thrill, and now hacking is big business.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.quote: It is only the inadequacy of the criminal code that saves the hackers from very serious prosecution.
quotes.author: Ken Thompson

quotes.quote: If you give a hacker a new toy, the first thing he'll do is take it apart to figure out how it works.
quotes.author: Jamie Zawinski

quotes.quote: What hackers do is figure out technology and experiment with it in ways many people never imagined. They also have a strong desire to share this information with others and to explain it to people whose only qualification may be the desire to learn.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

quotes.quote: Human Stupidity, that’s why hackers always win.
quotes.author: Med Amine Khelifi

quotes.quote: Most hackers are young because young people tend to be adaptable. As long as you remain adaptable, you can always be a good hacker.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

quotes.quote: What hackers do is figure out technology and experiment with it in ways many people never imagined. They also have a strong desire to share this information with others and to explain it to people whose only qualification may be the desire to learn.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

quotes.quote: We worried for decades about WMDs – Weapons of Mass Destruction. Now it is time to worry about a new kind of WMDs – Weapons of Mass Disruption.
quotes.author: John Mariotti

quotes.quote: The hacker community may be small, but it possesses the skills that are driving the global economies of the future.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.quote: Social engineering has become about 75% of an average hacker's toolkit, and for the most successful hackers, it reaches 90% or more.
quotes.author: John McAfee

quotes.quote: To see a hacker actually hacking is not the most interesting thing visually, and it's pretty boring as an actor: a hacker taps on her keyboard. There's really not much more than that.
quotes.author: Finn Wolfhard

quotes.quote: The core hacker premise that 'code wins arguments' is just another way of saying that anything is worth trying, regardless of whether it is a conservative or liberal idea, and that whatever works is worth keeping.
quotes.author: Glenn Kelman

quotes.quote: People in tech love to see their work as embodying the 'hacker ethos': a desire to break systems down in order to change them. But this pride can often be conveyed rather clumsily.
quotes.author: Jenna Wortham

quotes.quote: Leveraging community intelligence and making connections is a key component to being a growth hacker.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: If there is a hacker's credo, it's that information wants to be free.
quotes.author: Mike Holderness

quotes.quote: Cyber-terrorism could be defined as the use of computing resources to intimidate or coerce others. Cyber terrorism could be hacking into a hospital computer system and changing someone's medicine prescription to a lethal dosage as an act of revenge.
quotes.author: Jimmy Sproles and Will Byars

quotes.quote: With $1 billion and 20 capable hackers (the number is about the same as in the recent US catastrophe in New York and Washington D.C.), he could shut down America.
quotes.author: Eas Bokhari

quotes.quote: Data privacy and security is about much more than keeping hackers at bay. It is also about assuring consumers that the trust they place in a consumer product brand is warranted.
quotes.author: Anupam Narula

quotes.quote: I wasn't a hacker for the money, and it wasn't to cause damage. It was all about getting the information, learning more. It was all about the intoxication for the technology.
quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

quotes.quote: Hacking is not a competitive sport, and security breaches are not a game!
quotes.author: Paul J. Fishman

quotes.quote: Very smart people are often tricked by hackers. By phishing. I don't exclude myself from that. It's about being smarter than a hacker. Not about being smart.
quotes.author: Harper Reed

quotes.quote: The hacker didn't succeed through sophistication. Rather he poked at obvious places, trying to enter through unlocked doors. Persistence, not wizardry, let him through.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.quote: God is a hacker, not an engineer. You can do reverse engineering, but you can’t do reverse hacking.
quotes.author: Francis Crick

quotes.quote: Being a hacker does not say what side you are on. Being a hacker means you know how things actually work and can manipulate the way things actually work for good or for harm.
quotes.author: Dan K

quotes.quote: Hollywood portrays hackers in a bad light most of the time, and I think that's wrong, because most of the hackers that I know are damn good people who are just trying to break things to make them work better.
quotes.author: Banshee

quotes.quote: Hackers are people, right? They really are; you know they mow lawns! What's a hacker documentary? It's a guy doing his laundry.
quotes.author: Flea

quotes.quote: Hackers. We inherently trust no one, including each other. I'll never be able to tell her there will always be this divide, my walls she can't look over... and she knows it.
quotes.author: Elliot Alderson

quotes.quote: Humiliation is the favorite currency of the hacker.
quotes.author: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.quote: It's a story of kids and some older ones / Ripping up the world just for fun / And exploration, of an academic kind / Their finding all kinds of things and expanding their mind / It's the life of the hacker, an intellectual / On a quest for more knowledge, time gets perpetual / Forgetting about the real world is how it's done.
quotes.author: Gregory Tangey and Luke Skinner

quotes.quote: My friend's a computer hacker / But in school everybody said he was a slacker / He writes science fiction novels / He builds whole towns and villages from cola bottles.
quotes.author: Michael Raphael and James Elliot Bourne

quotes.quote: I embark on life; my path is all math / I understand the codes these hackers can't crack / I understand the folks expect me to fold / Community control to violate parole / I won't fail, but a lot of men will / I'm iconic in the field like Solomon's Seal.
quotes.author: Shawn Carter; John Stephens; Johnny Mollings; et al.

quotes.quote: But in the land of technology, the hacker is God / Everybody charge or church up, get the bag / Hoping your social media buy your aunt's the bread /Type or hype, got nihilists getting scared, / Better life, you fightin' but unaware, / Whoever new revelation is really a revelation / Forget the babies waking up off of the plantation.
quotes.author: Joshua Paul Davis

quotes.quote: We go be hackers / Makin' loot like Lakers / While we become workers / You become golfers / The modern day coppers / Beatin' on us for the papers.
quotes.author: Derek Miller and Mathangi Arulpragasam

quotes.quote: Yes! I'm talking on the Network w/ the protocol RIP / Moving up the model layer 4 now I'm in / Cause All People Seem To Need Data Processing / This rhyme for the IT world living at large / And All the Hackers out there get credit w/out the charge / Barge down the Firewall access to the core / No matter your encryption bit-rate I know more.
quotes.author: Howard Palmer

quotes.quote: Change happens when one individual has had enough pain and finds the inner resolve to ask for help and make a difference.
quotes.author: Mike Ferguson

quotes.quote: Enough had been thought, and said, and felt, and imagined. It was about time that something should be done.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Life is an end in itself, and the only question as to whether it is worth living is whether you have had enough of it.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Learn to say no, I've had enough. Then nothing and no one can hurt you.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just need to know when to move on, to know when you've had enough, and when he/she just doesn't seem to care anymore. So be strong and one day you will find that one guy or girl that wouldn't dream of hurting you.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: There always comes a point in life when you've had enough and just have to let go of the things that keeps weighing you down no matter how convincing they seem, that you can't do without them, it's just a matter of time you'll surely get over it.
quotes.author: Blaze Olermiday

quotes.quote: Only when you've truly had enough suffering in your life, are you able to say I don't need it anymore.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: This is what happens when nice people are pushed too far. We give too many chances, and so when we've finally had enough, we are well and truly done. When a nice person shuts a door on you, it's shut for good.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: We know when we have had enough of a friend, and we know when a friend has had enough of us. The first truth is no more palatable than the second.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: There is a difference between giving up and knowing when you have had enough.
quotes.author: Sushan Sharma

quotes.quote: There's a difference between giving up and knowing when you've had enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Just because you've had enough doesn't mean you wanted too much.
quotes.author: Dean Young

quotes.quote: People who never had enough thrift and forethought to buy and pay for property in the first place seldom have enough to keep property up after they have gained it in some other way.
quotes.author: Thomas Nixon Carver

quotes.quote: There are times when we have had enough even of our friends.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: No one that ever lived has ever had enough power, prestige, or knowledge to overcome the basic condition of all life you win some and you lose some.
quotes.author: Ken Keyes Jr.

quotes.quote: No matter how strong a girl is, she always has a breaking point.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The heart is willing, the head is willing but the body's had enough.
quotes.author: Keith Wood

quotes.quote: She had to have faith not just in trying but in failing. Was she strong enough to fail Was she strong enough not to.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Giving up is not failing its just knowing when you have had enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: They had enough. They wanted to enjoy their life.
quotes.author: Harold Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Once you've had enough and you can't do it anymore, you consider the possibility that there might be a better way. That's when your head cracks open and God comes in.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The heart is willing, the head is willing but the body's had enough.
quotes.author: Keith Wood

quotes.quote: If you have enough room for your books, you don't have enough books.
quotes.author: James Bryce

quotes.quote: We had enough quite enough snobbery in this world without exporting it to the hereafter.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: When someone had enough of being lied to, mistreated, mislead, or tired of feeling neglected, nothing can stand in the way of them leaving you.
quotes.author: Bernajoy Vaal

quotes.quote: No man has ever lived that had enough of children's gratitude or woman's love.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: If you had enough money, you could hardly commit crimes at all. You just perpetrated amusing little peccadilloes.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: We had enough chances to win the game. In fact we did win it.
quotes.author: Alex Smith

quotes.quote: I've had enough of worrying about everybody else. Now I'm taking care of me.
quotes.author: John Daly

quotes.quote: Even rats can only be kicked around for so long before they've had enough.
quotes.author: Joe Cowley

quotes.quote: When I chased after money, I never had enough. When I got my life on purpose and focused on giving of myself and everything that arrived into my life, then I was prosperous.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: I look at life like a big book and sometimes you get half way through it and go 'Even though I've been enjoying it, I've had enough. Give us another book.'
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: That if you could acquire enough, accomplish enough, you’d never want to own or do another thing. That if you could eat or sleep enough, you’d never need more. That if enough people loved you, you’d stop needing love.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Whoever is not in his coffin and the dark grave, let him know he has enough.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The people who have more money and goods than any people in the history of the world spend most of their time worrying about not having enough.
quotes.author: Jim Wallis

quotes.quote: When starting out, don't worry about not having enough money. Limited funds are a blessing, not a curse. Nothing encourages creative thinking in quite the same way.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: The fact is, if a young man is naturally indolent, the spur of necessity will drive him but a very little way, while the having enough to live upon is often the means of preserving his self-respect.
quotes.author: James Payn

quotes.quote: Enough is enough, and too much spoils.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Many have too much, but none have enough.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: The one who has enough for his share, should wish for nothing more.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Keep no more cats than will catch mice.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: I wear a hijab. Since September 11, people look at me differently. They prejudge me and I am always looking over my shoulder . . . Today we are here to say, as a community, enough is enough, enough with the targeting, enough with the harassment. We are not terrorists but we are your neighbor, co-worker, schoolmate. We are here for the same reason your ancestors came here, fear of persecution, freedom of religion.
quotes.author: Asha Mohamed

quotes.quote: Learning when "enough is enough" is the discipline of a lifetime.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: Keep your ideals high enough to inspire you and low enough to encourage you.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: A long life may not be good enough, but a good life is long enough.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you don't want to work, you have to work to earn enough money so that you won't have to work.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Would that there were an award for people who come to understand the concept of enough. Good enough. Successful enough. Thin enough. Rich enough. Socially responsible enough. When you have self-respect, you have enough.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: If you have enough butter, anything is good.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: When we grow old, there can only be one regret—not to have given enough of ourselves.
quotes.author: Eleonora Duse

quotes.quote: I do not want to live in paradise; this world is enough, so broken and so full of promise.
quotes.author: Pam Durban

quotes.quote: Like water, be gentle and strong. Be gentle enough to follow the natural paths of the earth, and strong enough to rise up and reshape the world.
quotes.author: Brenda Peterson

quotes.quote: Keep your sense of humor. There's enough stress in the rest of your life to let bad shots ruin a game you're supposed to enjoy.
quotes.author: Amy Alcott

quotes.quote: You can't start worrying about what's going to happen. You get spastic enough worrying about what's happening now.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: Providing you have enough courage—or money—you can do without a reputation.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: At some point in life the world's beauty becomes enough. You don't need to photograph, paint or even remember it. It is enough.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: To live at all is miracle enough.
quotes.author: Mervyn Peake

quotes.quote: I have always thought that if women's hair posed so many problems, God would certainly have made us bald.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: When red-headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Anyone can be confident with a full head of hair. But a confident bald man - there's your diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: Her albino hair illuminated my dreams, shining brighter than moonlight.
quotes.author: Anna Kavan

quotes.quote: Long hair is considered bohemian, which may be why I grew it, but I keep it long because I love the way it feels, part cloak, part fan, part mane, part security blanket.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: Relaxing your hair is like being in prison. You're caged in. Your hair rules you. You didn't go running with Curt today because you don't want to sweat out this straightness. You're always battling to make your hair do what it wasn't meant to do.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: Hair brings one's self-image into focus; it is vanity's proving ground. Hair is terribly personal, a tangle of mysterious prejudices.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: A fine head of hair adds beauty to a good face, and terror to an ugly one.
quotes.author: Lycurgus

quotes.quote: I love my hair because it's a reflection of my soul. It's dense, it's kinky, it's soft, it's textured, it's difficult, it's easy and it's fun. That's why I love my hair.
quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quotes.quote: By common consent gray hairs are a crown of glory; the only object of respect that can never excite envy.
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.quote: Symbolic of life, hair bolts from our heads. Like the earth, it can be harvested, but it will rise again. We can change its color and texture when the mood strikes us, but in time it will return to its original form, just as Nature will in time turn our precisely laid-out cities into a weed-way.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: Red hair sir, in my opinion, is dangerous.
quotes.author: PG Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The hair is the richest ornament of women.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Gray hair is God's graffiti
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: For years I used to try to straighten my hair, but I've reached a stage where I think, I've got red curly hair, and it's actually really great.
quotes.author: Bonnie Langford

quotes.quote: Hair style is the final tip-off whether or not a woman really knows herself.
quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

quotes.quote: A woman who cuts her hair is about to change her life.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: With short hair you have to get a haircut every two or three weeks. And if you're coloring your hair, you have to color it that often. Every time I did it, I felt fraudulent.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.quote: Beauty draws us with a single hair.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: I think we're all obsessed with our hair - the daily ritualised pruning that we do, and the way in which we spend a lot of our time putting hair on, or ripping it off.
quotes.author: Judy Darragh

quotes.quote: It is foolish to tear one's hair in grief, as though sorrow would be made less by baldness.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Long hair minimizes the need for barbers; socks can be done without; one leather jacket solves the coat problem for many years; suspenders are superfluous.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Her messy hair a visible attribute of her stubborn spirit. As she shakes it free, she smiles knowing wild is her favorite color.
quotes.author: J. Iron Word

quotes.quote: I always get bored with my hair. That's why I would always change it throughout my career.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: Babies haven't any hair: Old men's heads are just as bare; From the cradle to the grave. Lies a haircut and a shave.
quotes.author: Samuel Goodman Hoffenstein

quotes.quote: It is not by the gray of the hair that one knows the age of the heart.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: For me, hair is an accoutrement. Hair is jewelry. It's an accessory.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.quote: I would rather have had one breath of her hair, one kiss from her mouth, one touch of her hand, than eternity without it.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: There are times when I flick through magazines and think I'm in danger of becoming a prisoner of my own hair.
quotes.author: Brian May

quotes.quote: Beware of her fair hair, for she excels. All women in the magic of her locks; And when she winds them round a young man's neck, she will not ever set him free again.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: If my hair gets any frizzier, I'll shave it to the scalp. Or light it on fire. Whichever is easier.
quotes.author: Victoria Scott

quotes.quote: Pull the hair on my head the wrong way, and I would be on my knees begging for mercy. I have very sensitive follicles.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: She was the most beautiful creature on Earth - her hair said so in that language only hair can speak.
quotes.author: Gabriel Ba

quotes.quote: Anybody who has curly hair knows you don't want it to be brushed out because it becomes a never-ending tangle.
quotes.author: Judy Davis

quotes.quote: Red hair is great. It's rare, and therefore superior.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: Can't say it often enough. Change your hair, change your life.
quotes.author: Thomas Pynchon

quotes.quote: Long hair will make thee look dreafully to thine enemies, and manly to thy friends: it is, in peace, an ornament; in war, a strong helmet; it... deadens the leade thump of a bullet: in winter, it is a warm nightcap; in summer, a cooling fan of feathers.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.quote: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Your hair is the ball gown you never take off.
quotes.author: Jo Robertson

quotes.quote: It seems no more than right that men should seize time by the forelock, for the rude old fellow, sooner or later, pulls all their hair out.
quotes.author: George D. Prentice

quotes.quote: A hair divides what is false and true.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: I wish I had more hair on my head. Maybe if I sprinkled fertilizer on it, it would grow.
quotes.author: Kylie Bax

quotes.quote: I have little hair because my brain is so big it pushes the hair out.
quotes.author: Silvio Berlusconi

quotes.quote: There is one thing about baldness: it's neat.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how long my hair is or what colour my skin is or whether I'm a woman or a man.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Inflation is when you pay fifteen dollars for the ten-dollar haircut you used to get for five dollars when you had hair.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge.
quotes.author: Ivana Trump

quotes.quote: No rival will steal away my sure love; that glory will be my gray hair.
quotes.author: Propertius

quotes.quote: The worse the haircut, the better the man.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: There's many a man has more hair than wit.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: My blackness has never been in my hair. Blackness is not a hairstyle.
quotes.author: Bertha Gilkey

quotes.quote: Once you've had chemotherapy, there's no such thing as bad hair day.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Tirbelis

quotes.quote: I've discovered that how I look is not a function of anything as ephemeral as my hair.
quotes.author: Judith Light

quotes.quote: When a woman ceases to alter the fashion of her hair, you guess that she has passed the crisis of her experience.
quotes.author: Mary Austin

quotes.quote: People always ask me how long it takes to do my hair. I don't know, I'm never there.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: I refuse to think of them as chin hairs. I think of them as stray eyebrows.
quotes.author: Janette Barber

quotes.quote: I'm waxed clean— hairless as the day I was born. But don't say 'Tia has no pubic hair.' That's so clinical. Use a nice euphemism. Say, 'She's mowed her secret garden' or 'She's cleared the way to the Promised land.' Because that's what it is, right?
quotes.author: Tia Carrere

quotes.quote: My real hair color is kind of a dark blonde. Now I just have mood hair.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Gentlemen prefer blondes...but gentlemen marry brunettes.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.quote: Once in his life, every man is entitled to madly fall in love with a gorgeous redhead.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Blondes have more hair than the rest of us; redheads have the least.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Hair grows faster at night than during the day and between the ages of sixteen and twenty-four.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: How much hair do you have on your body? Scientists put it at about 5 million hairs, many of them so fine you can hardly see them.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Some early hair dyes; crushed dry tadpoles in oil ancient Egypt; black wine, raw crow's eggs, and putrefied leeches in ancient Rome.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Long, straight blonde hair (think Gwyneth Paltrow) are considered the wealthiest and most sexy.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Short, tousled hairstyles (like Meg Ryan) are thought to be outgoing and self-assured.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Your hair, your hair is like a field of silver daisies — I should like to run barefoot through your hair.
quotes.author: Franchot Tone

quotes.quote: I always used to think: If a woman's got pitch-black hair, she's already halfway to being a beauty.
quotes.author: Wendell Corey

quotes.quote: If you want to get ahead in business, you've got to have serious hair.
quotes.author: Melanie Griffith

quotes.quote: I'm losing my hair when I want hair and getting hair where I don't.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: Men don't get smarter as they grow older, they just lose their hair.
quotes.author: Mary Astor

quotes.quote: When I see the pictures you play in that theater, it makes the hair stand on the edge of my seat.
quotes.author: Michael Curtiz

quotes.quote: When a woman isn't beautiful, people always say, 'You have lovely eyes, you have love;y hair.'
quotes.author: Anton Chekov

quotes.quote: One hair of a woman can draw more than a hundred pairs of oxen.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: Grey hair is a sign of age, not wisdom.
quotes.author: Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: If a woman hath long hair, it is a glory to her.
quotes.author: 1 Corinthians 11:15

quotes.quote: Experience is a precious gift, only given a man when his hair is gone.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: The only equal treatment in the world is white hair.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: all humans born had fragile bunches of hair emanating from their scalp, / the same grew into islands inhabited by deceit and lechery, / as advancing years crept, vanquishing immaculate hair of childhood, / into traces of everlasting oblivion.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Oh! little lock of golden hue / In gently waving ringlet curls, / By the dear head on which you grew, / I would not lose you for a world.
quotes.author: George Gordon Byron

quotes.quote: A woman with her hair turned up always looks as if she were going some place either to the opera or the shower bath.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Economics makes no sense; no matter how much or how little hair you have, the price of a haircut is the same.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Things are good for gray hair, but the best one is a sensible head.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Another thing about women is that they can be persuaded to do anything with their hair, except leave it alone.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: They want someone to look past the surface stuff like bad-hair days.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: It is not human to live to appease external expectation, paying attention to how we dress, how we comb out hair.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Girls and young dancers in ancient Egypt and young girls in ancient Rome also wore their hair in the style that we now call a ponytail.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: The hairstyle known as ponytail can be seen on frescoes painted thousands of years ago in Crete, so it may have emerged in Greece during ancient times.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: Today, state fairs continue to sponsor hair contests of various kinds. For example, the Michigan State Fair has traditionally held a Longest Ponytail contest.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: Men in Europe and the American colonies wore short ponytails during the 1700s, or they wore wigs with a type of ponytail that was called queue.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: A ponytail can be neat, simple, and practical, since it keeps the hair off the face during certain jobs, sports, or other activities, and can be more comfortable in hot weather.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: The high ponytail is flattering for most face shapes and it's easy to do. When the ponytail is in place on the high crown area. It helps lift the face. This hairstyle is ideal for girls with naturally straight, thick hair and a silky texture.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote: The half pony is a very casual style and works well for mid-length hair. It's great if your hair is extremely thick because it allows you to wear your hair down but you have most of it pulled back and out of your face.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote: The low pony is one of those simple classic styles that can be worn in a number of ways from sporty to chic. This look is a great option for girls who have extremely thick hair.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote: French back pony. This style is perfect for anyone with heavy, limp hair that just won't hold in a ponytail.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote: Hair, hair styling and hair care is a trillion-dollar industry with many hair salons filled with licensed cosmetologists anxious and happy to serve you.
quotes.author: Ladosha Wright

quotes.quote: Hair styling is a part of hair care. Both require maintenance in a timely fashion.
quotes.author: Ladosha Wright

quotes.quote: No doubt as a result of their driving desire for a youthful appearance, the hair color segment of the salon industry continues to grow.
quotes.author: The Staff of Entrepreneur Media

quotes.quote: So no matter what the state of the economy and the world we live in, it's till a good time to start a harir salon ad day spa, and the prospects for 'shear' success and excellent.
quotes.author: The Staff of Entrepreneur Media

quotes.quote: If you're not a practicing cosmetologist, it's possible to be an absentee owner.
quotes.author: The Staff of Entrepreneur Media

quotes.quote: You'll probably want to be in the salon every day anyway, if only to keep an eye on things and make sure everything is running smoothly.
quotes.author: The Staff of Entrepreneur Media

quotes.quote: If you're providing salon services, you can expect to spend up to 60 hours a week or more in the salon, depending on your bookings.
quotes.author: The Staff of Entrepreneur Media

quotes.quote: The type of work on a health farm is similar to that of a beauty salon, but the hours can be much longer and there is more emphasis on body treatments and weight reduction.
quotes.author: Susan Cressy

quotes.quote: A beauty therapist has the opportunity to develop a close, personal relationship with clients that may go on for many years.
quotes.author: Susan Cressy

quotes.quote: As a beauty therapist, your appearance must be professional at all times.
quotes.author: Susan Cressy

quotes.quote: Movie and video hair stylists are creative forces to be reckoned with.
quotes.author: Gretchen Davis

quotes.quote: With individualistic artistic talent, hair stylists mold, shape, cut, and manipulate hair to create images that may linger forever in your memory.
quotes.author: Gretchen Davis

quotes.quote: In film, hair stylists are asked to do just about anything and everything.
quotes.author: Gretchen Davis

quotes.quote: As a multi-media hair stylist, you'll encounter many situations that require knowledge of facial anatomy, as well as the structure of the hair follicle.
quotes.author: Gretchen Davis

quotes.quote: Problems often arise for hair stylists who are just beginning their career, and that's why it's important that professional hair stylists know how to solve unexpected problems quickly.
quotes.author: Gretchen Davis

quotes.quote: The earliest record of personal hair care dates back 2.5 million years ago, when brushes used to create cave paintings in Spain and France were adapted for use in hair grooming.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: Although hairdressing techniques have evolved throughout the ages, some things have stayed the same.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: The first known school for hairdressing in the United States was established in Chicago in 1890.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: Many of the innovations in hair design that are still with us today originated in the late 19th century.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: On the hair salon side, the most sought-after services are, of course, haircutting and styling.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: Anybody with a head full of hair ca be confident, but a bald man there's your diamond in the rough.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: Hair has always been important.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: Old age adds to the respect due to virtue, but it takes nothing from the contempt inspired by vice; it whitens only the hair.
quotes.author: Ira Gershwin

quotes.quote: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Wisdom is the gray hair unto men. The wise how to quit the world before the world quits.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: It seems no more than right that men should seize time by the forelock, for the rude old fellow, sooner or later, pulls all their hair out.
quotes.author: George Dennison

quotes.quote: We grow gray in our spirit long before we grow gray in our hair.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Violet will be a good color for hair at just about the same tie that brunette becomes a good color for flowers.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: That the birds of worry and care fly over your head, this you cannot change, but that they build nests in your hair, this you can prevent.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Even to your old age, I am He, and even to gray hairs I will carry you! - ISAIAH 46:3-4
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: You are unique. Your combination of thoughts are yours alone. A strand of your hair is like no other.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Hair matter. Pay attention to your hair, because everyone else will.
quotes.author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.quote: Not having to worry about your hair any more is the secret upside of death.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Ronald Reagan doesn't dye his hair, he's just prematurely orange.
quotes.author: Gerald Ford

quotes.quote: For me the working of hair is architecture with a human element.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Blessed are the hairstylists, for they bring out the beauty in others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I really need a hairstylist to do my hair if it's going to look good.
quotes.author: Margot Robbie

quotes.quote: Good hairstylists never die. Vidal Sassoon and Paul Mitchell will always live on.
quotes.author: John Paul Deloria

quotes.quote: Inflation is when you pay fifteen dollars for the ten dollar haircut you used to get for five dollars when you had hair.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: I'm a hairstylist I could tell you stories that would curl your hair.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hairdressing in general hasn't been given the kudos it deserves. It's not recognised by enough people as a worthy craft.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: If I weren't performing, I'd be a beauty editor or a therapist. I love creativity, but I also love to help others. My mother was a hairstylist, and they listen to everyone's problems like a beauty therapist!
quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

quotes.quote: Like a therapist, or the local barkeep, hairdressers are in a position of trust, We are transforming not just how a person looks but how they feel and, therefore, they want to tell us things.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.quote: I play with scissors for the shear fun of it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You don't have to be a movie star for me to do your hair, when you sit in my chair you're my movie star.
quotes.author: Vincent Roppatte

quotes.quote: My idea was to cut shape into the hair, to use it like fabric and take away everything that was superfluous.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: To sculpt a head of hair with scissors is an art form. It's in pursuit of art.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Hairdressers are wonderful breed. You work one on one with another human being, and the object is to make them feel so much better, and to look at themselves with a twinkle in their eye.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: To me hair dressing means shape. It's very important that the foundations should be right.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Only a teen girl would be afraid of an evil hairstylist.
quotes.author: Simon Holt

quotes.quote: As stylists, we're groundshakers and daymakers. Setting trends, while fostering that special connection between a person's inner and outer self.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gregory

quotes.quote: Hair style is the final tip off whether or not a woman really knows herself.
quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

quotes.quote: I think that the most important thing a woman can have next to talent, of course is her hairdresser.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: When a woman walks in a room her hairstylist walks with her.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The hair is the richest ornament of women.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Be nice to your hairstylist. It's an instant gratification! It doesn't matter how badly their day has gone, in that moment they feel amazing. And the hairdresser has made them feel that way.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.quote: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: I think that as good architecture enhances a city, a good cut enhances the definition and expression of a face.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: A woman who cuts her hair is about to change her life.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: We'll probably never save our souls, but hell, at least we'll get our hair sorted.
quotes.author: Siddharth Dhanvant Shanghvi

quotes.quote: For me, the working of hair is architecture with a human element.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Hair that slays starts at the salon.
quotes.author: Redken

quotes.quote: Life is more beautiful when you meet the right hair dresser.
quotes.author: Peter Coppola

quotes.quote: I think the most important thing a woman can have – next to her talent, of course, – is her hairdresser.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: As stylists we’re ground shakers and and day makers. Setting trends, while fostering that inner connection between a person’s inner and outer self.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gregory

quotes.quote: To sculpt a head of hair with scissors is an art form. It’s in pursuit of art.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: To me, beauty and makeup and color is like the finishing touch on everything.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Hairdressers are wonderful breed. You work one on one with another human being, and the object it to make them feel so much better, and to look at themselves with a twinkle in their eye.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: I was all about my thoughts, my work, my inspiration. I was always in hair.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: If you hair is done properly and you're wearing good shoes, you can get anyway with anything.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: Now you go to a barber, but a hair stylist could do wonders for you.
quotes.author: Jack Webb

quotes.quote: There's nothing in life more awkward than obligatory conversation with hair stylists and cab drivers. No offense.
quotes.author: Sam Simon

quotes.quote: I'd also like to thank my personal hair stylist, who, for 14 years, has been trying to destroy my natural good looks.
quotes.author: Barry Adelman

quotes.quote: Now you go to a barber, but a hair stylist could do wonders for you.
quotes.author: Henry Irving

quotes.quote: I'd also like to thank my personal hair stylist, who, for 14 years, has been trying to destroy my natural good looks.
quotes.author: Barry Adelman

quotes.quote: Hair dressers are like therapists.
quotes.author: Nicole Russin-McFarland

quotes.quote: My home hair dye fries your hair on purpose.
quotes.author: Nicole Russin-McFarland

quotes.quote: When your girl leave me she need a hair salon / Hair weave killer going on a trapathon
quotes.author: Sean Combs

quotes.quote: So I work in that same beauty salon / I'm chained to the old masquerade / The lipstick, the shadow, the silicone / I follow my father's trade
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: In and out the hair salon, she got her nail polished / Turn up in tennis shoes, turn up in red bottoms / She turn up in red bottoms, turn up, turn up in red bottoms
quotes.author: Tauheed Epps

quotes.quote: The neighborhood salon is the place I am working for the moment / As I cut their hair, ladies talk and share / Every day, who's doing who and why
quotes.author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quotes.quote: Hey, go back to the salon! / What doesn't kill you / Only makes you blonder
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: See, hit the salon get a mani and a pedi / Have a massage, get a sip and then I'm ready / Gotta take time out / And my real ladies know what I'm talking about
quotes.author: Briggs

quotes.quote: You getting ready so I know we gonna be here awhile / In the bathroom flat irons and nail files / Spending hours in salons on your hairstyles
quotes.author: Matthew Samuels

quotes.quote: It took me four years to find the right hair dresser and we still fight.
quotes.author: Greg Daniels

quotes.quote: Hair, hair styling and hair care is a trillion-dollar industry with many hair salons filled with licensed cosmetologists anxious and happy to serve you.
quotes.author: Ladosha Wright

quotes.quote: Hair styling is a part of hair care. Both require maintenance in a timely fashion.
quotes.author: Ladosha Wright

quotes.quote: The first known school for hairdressing in the United States was established in Chicago in 1890.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: Many of the innovations in hair design that are still with us today originated in the late 19th century.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: On the hair salon side, the most sought-after services are, of course, hair cutting and styling.
quotes.author: Eileen Figure Sandlin

quotes.quote: Beauty isn't worth thinking about. What's important is your mind. You don't want a fifty dollar haircut on a fifty cent head.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: A hair in the head is worth two in the brush.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Hair brings one’s self image into focus. It is vanity’s proving ground. Hair is terribly personal, a tangle of mysterious prejudices.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: When red headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You don't ever ask a barber whether you need a haircut.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: You're only as good as your last haircut.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: God is like a barber: don't expect him to give you a haircut, you must first get at his barbershop.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One of the most important things about looking youthful is to have a modern haircut.
quotes.author: Evelyn Lauder

quotes.quote: What we offer is good enough. It's like my haircut: It ain't pretty, but it's good enough.
quotes.author: Scott Mcnealy

quotes.quote: To this day, my haircut is the number two clippers, which I apply to myself every month.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Hair style is the final tip-off whether or not a woman really knows herself.
quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

quotes.quote: The worse the haircut, the better the man.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: With short hair you have to get a haircut every two or three weeks. And if you're coloring your hair, you have to color it that often. Every time I did it, I felt fraudulent.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.quote: Some of the worst mistakes in my life were haircuts.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: A woman who cuts her hair is about to change her life.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: My hair had grown out long and shaggy not in that sexy young rock star kind of way but in that time to take rover to the groomer kind of way.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: It's an ill will that blows when you leave the hairdresser.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Losing love is so rich a philosophical ordeal that it makes a hairdresser into a rival of Socrates.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: When red headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Hair style is the final tip off whether or not a woman really knows herself.
quotes.author: Givenchy

quotes.quote: All a woman needs is a good bath, clean clothes, and for her hair to be combed. These things she can do herself. I very seldom go to the hairdresser, but when I do, I just marvel.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Talking to your hairdresser is almost like talking to your therapist.
quotes.author: Andie MacDowell

quotes.quote: I think that the most important thing a woman can have next to talent, of course is her hairdresser.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Hairdressers are a wonderful breed. You work one-on-one with another human being and the object is to make them feel so much better and to look at themselves with a twinkle in their eye.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Hairdressers are professional gossips; when only the hands are busy, the tongue is seldom still.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: Hair style is the final tip-off whether or not a woman really knows herself.
quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

quotes.quote: Like a therapist hairdressers are in a position of trust. We are transforming not just how a person looks but how they feel.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.quote: To be a good hairdresser, you have to understand what the vision is of the designer or the photographer and then sort of add your thing.
quotes.author: Guido Palau

quotes.quote: A hairdresser holds a trusted place in a woman's life.
quotes.author: Linda Wells

quotes.quote: Be nice to your hairstylist. It's an instant gratification! It doesn't matter how badly their day has gone, in that moment they feel amazing. And the hairdresser has made them feel that way.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.quote: A prudent question is one half of wisdom.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: No half measures. Some things can’t be cut in half. You can’t half love someone. You can’t half betray, or half lie.
quotes.author: Mark Lawrence

quotes.quote: Half of your power lies in your sameness with others. The other half lies in your uniqueness.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Remember, half the people you know are below average.
quotes.author: Larry the Cable Guy

quotes.quote: There is nothing so fatal to character as half finished tasks.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: Remember, half the doctors in this country graduated in the bottom half of their class.
quotes.author: Al McGuire

quotes.quote: The judgment of the intellect is, at best, only the half of truth.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: A half truth, like half a brick, is always more forcible as an argument than a whole one. It carries better.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: Half the worry in the world is caused by people trying to make decisions before they have sufficient knowledge on which to base a decision.
quotes.author: Dean Hawkes

quotes.quote: The second half of the 20th Century is a complete flop.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: If you had half as much brains as you have beard, you would have looked before you leaped.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Half the charm of climbing mountains is born in visions preceding this experience. Visions of what is mysterious, remote, inaccessible.
quotes.author: George Leigh Mallory

quotes.quote: God Almighty never created a man half as wise as he looks.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: One half of my life has put the other half in the grave.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: A half-truth is usually less than half of that.
quotes.author: Bern Williams

quotes.quote: The firstÂ halfÂ ofÂ our lives are ruined by our parents and the secondÂ halfÂ by our children.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: The first half of life is spent mainly in finding out who we are through seeing ourselves in our interaction with others.
quotes.author: Dr. June Singer

quotes.quote: Half the world does not know how the other half lives.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Half the battle is that people have to like you before you say one joke, one bit of humor.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.quote: One half of the world cannot understand the pleasures of the other.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Half a truth is better than no politics.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Half a truth is often a great lie.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Half my life is an act of revision.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: Bring forth the raisins and the nuts- Tonight All-Hallows' Spectre struts. Along the moonlit way.
quotes.author: John Kendrick Bangs

quotes.quote: Halloween wraps fear in innocence, as though it were a lightly sour sweet. Let terror, then, be turned into a treat...
quotes.author: Nick Gordon

quotes.quote: As spirits roam the neighborhoods at night, let loose upon the Earth till it be light...
quotes.author: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.quote: I don't know that there are real ghosts and goblins, but there are always more trick-or-treaters than neighborhood kids.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Tis the nightâ€”the night of the grave's delight, and the warlocks are at their play; Ye think that without, the wild winds shout, but no, it is theyâ€”it is they!
quotes.author: Arthur Cleveland Coxe

quotes.quote: Clothes make a statement. Costumes tell a story.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: On Halloween, witches come true; Wild ghosts escape from dreams. Each monster dances in the park.
quotes.author: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.quote: Double, double toil and trouble; Fire burn and cauldron bubble.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The Harvest Moon glows round and bold, in pumpkin shades outlined in gold, illuminating eerie forms, unnatural as a candied corn. Beware what dare crawls up your sleeve,for 'tis the night called Hallows Eve.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: At first cock-crow the ghosts must go back to their quiet graves below.
quotes.author: Theodosia Garrison

quotes.quote: From ghoulies and ghosties and long leggety beasties and things that go bump in the night, Good Lord, deliver us!
quotes.author: Scottish Saying

quotes.quote: There is nothing funny about Halloween. This sarcastic festival reflects, rather, an infernal demand for revenge by children on the adult world.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Tis now the very witching time of night, when churchyards yawn, and hell itself breathes out contagion to this world.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Halloween wraps fear in innocence, As though it were a slightly sour sweet. Let terror, then, be turned into a treat.
quotes.author: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.quote: If human beings had genuine courage, they'd wear their costumes every day of the year, not just on Halloween.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: A grandmother pretends she doesn't know who you are on Halloween.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Pixie, kobold, elf, and sprite, All are on their rounds tonight; In the wan moon's silver ray, Thrives their helter-skelter play.
quotes.author: Joel Benton

quotes.quote: Men say that in this midnight hour, the disembodiÃ¨d have power to wander as it liketh them, by wizard oak and fairy stream.
quotes.author: William Motherwell

quotes.quote: I can see lights in the distance trembling in the dark cloak of night. Candles and lanterns are dancing, dancing a waltz on All Souls Night.
quotes.author: Loreena McKennitt

quotes.quote: In masks and gown we haunt the street and knock on doors for trick or treat tonight we are the king and queen, for oh tonight it's Halloween!
quotes.author: Jack Prelutsky

quotes.quote: When witches go riding, and black cats are seen, the moon laughs and whispers, â€˜tis near Halloween.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A house is never still in darkness to those who listen intently; there is a whispering in distant chambers, an unearthly hand presses the snib of the window, the latch rises. Ghosts were created when the first man awoke in the night.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: Eye of newt, and toe of frog, Wool of bat, and tongue of dog, Adder's fork, and blind-worm's sting, Lizard's leg, and owlet's wing, For a charm of powerful trouble, Like a hell-broth boil and bubble.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Oh how the candles will be lit and the wood of worm burn in a fiery dust. For on all Hallow's Eve will the spirits come to play, and only the fruit of thy womb will satisfy their endless roaming.
quotes.author: Solange nicole

quotes.quote: Nothing beats a haunted moonlit night on All Hallows Eve.... And on this fatal night, at this witching time, the starless sky laments black and unmoving. The somber hues of an ominous, dark forest are suddenly illuminated under the emerging face of the full moon.
quotes.author: Kim Elizabeth

quotes.quote: Shadows of a thousand years rise again unseen, Voices whisper in the trees, "Tonight is Halloween!"
quotes.author: Dexter Kozen

quotes.quote: May Jack-o-lanterns burning bright, Of soft and golden hue, Pierce through the future's veil and show, What fate now holds for you?
quotes.author: Jerry Smith

quotes.quote:
Hark! Hark to the wind! 'Tis the night, they say, when all souls come back from the far away-
the dead, forgotten this many a day!
quotes.author: Virna Sheard

quotes.quote: The witches fly across the sky, The owls go, Who? Who? Who? The black cats yowl And green ghosts howl, Scary Halloween to you!
quotes.author: Nina Willis Walter

quotes.quote: Nothing on Earth so beautiful as the final haul on Halloween night.
quotes.author: Steve Almond

quotes.quote: From Ghoulies and ghosties and long-legged beasties, / And things that go bump in the night / Good Lord deliver us.
quotes.author: Cornish Prayer

quotes.quote: Now it is the time of night / That the graves, all gaping wide / Every one lets forth his sprite, / In the church-way paths to glide.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I believe that men are generally still a little afraid of the dark, though the witches are all hung, and Christianity and candles have been introduced.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: At the very glimpse of Jack-o'-lantern, / I've got one foot on the bus to Scranton / When Halloween next delivers the goods, / You may duck for apples— I'll duck for the woods.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: This Halloween you come one week, / You masquerade as a vermilion sleek, / fat, cross-eyed fox in the parade or, / where grim jack o'lanterns leer, / go with your bag from door to door foraging for treats.
quotes.author: W.D. Snodgrass

quotes.quote: It was Halloween that did me in, that single day when your children turn to you for imagination and creativity, the one day of the year when you must transcend fantasy.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Although' outside it teems and pours, / The boys about sixteen / Are busy running' rappin' doors / With Turf—at Halloween.
quotes.author: B.M. Teggart

quotes.quote: There was a mystery here; there was a mystery in the black cats and walking skeletons and living scarecrows that we saw decorating school windows, mystery in the grinning gargoyles and jack-o-lanterns on all the porches. I loved Halloween.
quotes.author: Jack Santino

quotes.quote: Halloween was a time of candy corn, jack-o'-lanterns, candy kisses, peanut butter cups, bubble gum, Fig Newtons, soapy windows. I tried to tell about Halloween and what it represented to me— a great ritual of childhood when the world for a single night opened its doors and its coffers of candy and fun and happiness.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: I'm always in town for Halloween. Even if I didn't happen to enjoy walking in the Village Halloween parade in my ax murderer's mask, I would feel it my duty to be there because of the long-established role of a father in passing on important cultural traditions to the next generation.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: The evening of October 31 is Halloween or Nut Crack Night. It is clearly a relic of pagan times but it is still very popular. It is a night set apart for walking about for walking harmless pranks, such as placing the hotel omnibus on top of the Baptist church or plugging the milkman's pump.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: The moon...rode bonily in the sky, looking stark and abandoned like a decoration kid had put up for Halloween and forgotten to take down.
quotes.author: William Dieter

quotes.quote: But I love Halloween, and I love that feeling: the cold air, the spooky dangers lurking around the corner.
quotes.author: Evan Peters

quotes.quote: I peer outside, there's something there. / That makes me shiver, spikes my hair / It must be Halloween.
quotes.author: Kirkus Reviews

quotes.quote: It’s Halloween, everyone’s entitled to one good scare.
quotes.author: Brackett

quotes.quote: October was always the least dependable of months … full of ghosts and shadows.
quotes.author: Joy Fielding

quotes.quote: Believe nothing you hear and only one half that you see.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The world turned upside down — in a good way — for one black velvet night.
quotes.author: Karen Fortunati

quotes.quote: Halloween is an opportunity to be really creative.
quotes.author: Judy Gold

quotes.quote: A person should always choose a costume that is in direct contrast to her own personality.
quotes.author: Lucy Van Pelt

quotes.quote: Halloween is not only about putting on a costume, but it's about finding the imagination and costume within ourselves.
quotes.author: Elvis Duran

quotes.quote: The moon has awoken with the sleep of the sun, the light has been broken; the spell has begun.
quotes.author: Midgard Morningstar

quotes.quote: 'Tis the night—the night / Of the grave's delight, / And the warlocks are at their play; / Ye think that without, / The wild winds shout, / But no, it is they—it is they!
quotes.author: Arthur Cleveland

quotes.quote: I was born on the night of Samhain, when the barrier between the worlds is whisper-thin and when magic, old magic, sings its heady and sweet song to anyone who cares to hear it.
quotes.author: carolyn MacCollough

quotes.quote: The farther we've gotten from the magic and mystery of our past, the more we've come to need Halloween.
quotes.author: Paula Curan

quotes.quote: Halloween trickster. / Spiders on string. / Children in costume. / Startle and scream.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: I long for the days / Of pumpkins and ghosts; / When the dead use homes / And people as hosts.
quotes.author: E. Reyes

quotes.quote: I long for the days / Of pumpkins and ghosts; / When the dead use homes / And people as hosts.
quotes.author: E. Reyes

quotes.quote: Nobody goes trick-or-treating anymore. The monsters have gotten too real.
quotes.author: E.K. Barnes

quotes.quote: Have a ghost of a time. Have a happy Halloween!
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: A hallucination is a fact, not an error; what is erroneous is a judgment based upon it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: There is no line between the 'real world' and 'world of myth and symbol.' Objects, sensations, hit with the impact of hallucination.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Psychotic hallucinations, whether they are visual or vocal, they address you. They accuse you. They seduce you. They humiliate you. They jeer at you. You interact with them.
quotes.author: Oliver Sacks

quotes.quote: Hallucinations and illusions are not facts useful for scientific investigation.
quotes.author: Goparaju Ramachandra Rao

quotes.quote: A hallucination is to be in the presence of that which previously could not be imagined, and if it previously could not be imagined then there is no grounds for believing that you generated it out of yourself.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: While he mused on the effect of the flowing sands, he was seized from time to time by hallucinations in which he himself began to move with the flow.
quotes.author: Kōbō Abe

quotes.quote: Hallucinations aren’t always out of the ordinary. How do we know we’re not hallucinating if everything seems plausible?
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Hallucinations are a known aspect of working at very high altitudes.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Every night of our lives, we dream, and our brain concocts visions which are, at least until we wake up, highly convincing. Most of us have had experiences which are verging on hallucination. It shows the power of the brain to knock up illusions.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: All observers not laboring under hallucinations of the senses are agreed, or can be made to agree, about facts of sensible experience, through evidence toward which the intellect is merely passive, and over which the individual will and character have no control.
quotes.author: Chauncey Wright

quotes.quote: The hallucination of being a separate ego will not stand up to biological tests.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Chemically induced hallucinations, delusions and raptures may be frightening or wonderfully gratifying; in either case they are in the nature of confidence tricks played on one's own nervous system.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Lack of awareness of the basic unity of organism and environment is a serious and dangerous hallucination.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Any attempt to dismiss a phenomenon that is not understood merely by explaining it as hallucination becomes irrelevant when a coherent scientific theory can be applied.
quotes.author: Amit Goswami

quotes.quote: Maybe hallucinations are just another reality that we don't see most of the time.
quotes.author: Lynne Ewing

quotes.quote: What we call reality is in fact nothing more than a culturally sanctioned and linguistically reinforced hallucination.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: We are caged by our cultural programming. Culture is a mass hallucination, and when you step outside the mass hallucination you see it for what it's worth .
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Probably we have here but a highly sophisticated expression of the doctrine that ideals are hallucination and that the only normal, sane person is the healthy extrovert, making instant, instinctive adjustments to the stimuli of the material world.
quotes.author: Richard Weaver

quotes.quote: Using hypnosis, scientists have temporarily created hallucinations, compulsions, certain types of memory loss, false memories, and delusions in the laboratory so that these phenomena can be studied in a controlled environment.
quotes.author: Michael Nash R

quotes.quote: Hallucinations are an inner experience in which most of the time you forget you're there.
quotes.author: Gaspar Noe

quotes.quote: The ten thousand states of mind are hallucinatory. Hallucinations are real. Dreams are real. But there are some things more real.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann
