quotes.quote: A hallucination is a species of reality, as capable of teaching you as a videotape about Kilimanjaro or anything else that falls through your life.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: My art originates from hallucinations only I can see. I translate the hallucinations and obsessional images that plague me into sculptures and paintings.
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.quote: In general, people are afraid to acknowledge hallucinations because they immediately see them as a sign of something awful happening to the brain, whereas in most cases theyre not.
quotes.author: Oliver Sacks

quotes.quote: Cyberspace. A consensual hallucination experienced daily by billions of legitimate operators, in every nation, by children being taught mathematical concepts.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: It is not materialism that is the chief curse of the world, as pastors teach, but idealism. Men get into trouble by taking their visions and hallucinations too seriously.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Memory creates a hallucination of the past, desire creates a hallucination of the future.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: The hallucination of being a separate ego will not stand up to biological tests.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: You have to learn how to stay in a good mood as you overthrow the sour, puckered hallucination that is mistakenly referred to as reality.
quotes.author: Bob Brezsny

quotes.quote: Modern humans became fixated on a collective hallucination of linear time, ignoring the fractal spirals of the surrounding universe.
quotes.author: Daniel Pinchbeck

quotes.quote: I think hallucinations need to be discussed. There are all sorts of hallucinations, and then many sorts which are okay, like the ones I think which most of us have in bed at night before we fall asleep, when we can see all sorts of patterns or faces and scenes.
quotes.author: Oliver Sacks

quotes.quote: Hamburger steak is carrion, and quite unfit for food except by a turkey buzzard, a hyena, or some other scavenger.
quotes.author: John Harvey Kellogg

quotes.quote: If only meat weren't so delicious! Sure, meat may pave the way to a heart attack. Yes, factory farms torture animals. Indeed, producing a single hamburger patty requires more water than two weeks of showers. But for those of us who are weak-willed, there's nothing like a juicy burger.
quotes.author: Nicholas Kristof

quotes.quote: It requires a certain kind of mind to see beauty in a hamburger bun.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: Man who invented the hamburger was smart; man who invented the cheeseburger was a genius.
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.quote: You can find your way across this country using burger joints the way a navigator uses stars.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: When I'm in need of a quick meal or a part dish, a burger is hands-down my go-to pick! Burgers are easy, fast, and don't even require utensils to eat, making them the perfect get-together main course, tailgating essential, and simple dinner recipe to whip up any night of the week.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: A Hamburger is warm and fragrant and juicy. A hamburger is soft and nonthreatening. It personifies the Great Mother herself who has nourished us from the beginning. A hamburger is an icon of layered circles, the circle being at once the most spiritual and the most sensual of shapes. A hamburger is companionable and faintly erotic. The nipple of the Goddess, the bountiful belly-ball of Eve. You are what you think you eat.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: A hamburger is an icon of layered circles, the circle being at once the most spiritual and the most sensual of shapes.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: It would not do for the consumer to know that the hamburger she is eating came from a steer who spent much of his life standing deep in his own excrement in a feedlot, helping to pollute the local streams. Or that the calf that yielded the veal cutlet on her plate spent its life in a box in which it did not have room to turn around.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: When you see the cows go into McDonalds you know that their beef burgers are fresh.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: Mother Nature clearly intended for us to get our food from the "patty" group, which includes hamburgers, fish sticks, and McNuggets- foods that have had all of their organs safely removed.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: You know most of the food that Americans hold so dear - things like hamburgers and hot dogs - were road food, but even before they were road food, they were peasant food.
quotes.author: Alton Brown

quotes.quote: The cow, basically, eats three basic things in their feed: corn, beets, and barley, and so what I do is I actually challenge my staff with these crazy, wild ideas. Can we take what the cow eats, remove the cow, and then make some hamburgers out of that?
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.quote: A waft of sweet hash drifted by, and I wanted to float after it like wimpy levitating at the scent of a hamburger.
quotes.author: Jerry Stahl

quotes.quote: There is something wrong when you wait in line thirty minutes to get a hamburger that was cooked for ninety seconds an hour ago.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.quote: The fact is: America's obsession with meat and dairy has pretty much destroyed our sense of taste. The average burger and milkshake meal is so overloaded with fat, salt and sugar that it has numbed our taste buds to virtually anything else.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.quote: Some companies out there make a great burger; Beyond Beef does a great job. But making a burger at home that feels soul-satisfying and fatty and protein-based while still being plant-based was a challenge.
quotes.author: Damaris Phillips

quotes.quote: There are only two things our customers have, time and money - and they don't like spending either one of them, so we better sell them their hamburgers quickly.
quotes.author: James McLamore

quotes.quote: Anybody who doesn't think that the best hamburger place in the world is in his home town is a sissy.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: In time, foods such as hamburgers and ice cream became more than just meals. They became part of American history and culture, touchstones that are almost immediately nostalgic and sentimental no matter how old you are or what part of the country you are from.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.quote: Forests and meat animals compete for the same land. The prodigious appetite of the affluent nations for meat means that agribusiness can pay more than those who want to preserve or restore the forest. We are, quite literally, gambling with the future of our planet – for the sake of hamburgers.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.quote: I generally don't select my chicken or my hamburgers based on the personal ideology of the person who is either flipping the hamburgers or making the money back at corporate headquarters. But if people want to do that, they're free to do it.
quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

quotes.quote: The executives who run the fast food industry are not bad men. They are businessmen. They will sell free-range, organic, grass-fed hamburgers if you demand it. They will sell whatever sells at a profit.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.quote: Everyone has a right to a university degree in America, even if it's in Hamburger Technology.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: While sleeping in a hammock, with the touch of a warm wind we remember why we are in love with the life!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A hermitage in the forest is the refuge of the narrow-minded misanthrope; a hammock on the ocean is the asylum for the generous distressed.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: A hammock is like a steady drip of morphine, without the danger of renal failure.
quotes.author: Dale Gribble

quotes.quote: A hammock. It’s like a giant net for catching lazy people .
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: I have two hammocks, one Mayan and one Guatemalan, both family size because I like to lie in them perpendicular. When I'm working on a character, I lie in them and daydream. They're the best tools for working that I have.
quotes.author: Mark Ruffalo

quotes.quote: Tropical nights are hammocks for lovers.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Of course we have compassion. We just don't believe the safety net should be used as a hammock.
quotes.author: Allen West

quotes.quote: People who work hard often work too hard. ... May we learn to honor the hammock, the siesta, the nap and the pause in all its forms.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Floating in a lake, lying in a hammock, playing a bit of Scrabble...that's what I'm in need of.
quotes.author: Karen Walker

quotes.quote: Personally, I believe a rocking hammock, a good cigar, and a tall gin-and-tonic is the way to save the planet.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: I like to sit in my backyard. I go out on the hammock and sit in silence and kind of meditate. Nature is calming, and it's nice to go out there and clear my head
quotes.author: Devon Werkheiser

quotes.quote: My perfect day is constantly changing. Right now, it would be to lie around in a hammock reading with a portable phone and a table of food next to it. I would spend all day there. And that's all that I can possibly come up with on the spur of the moment.
quotes.author: Eric Stoltz

quotes.quote: Reading is a joy for my kids, and to swing in a hammock on a lazy summer day reading a good book just goes with summer.
quotes.author: Marcia Gay Harden

quotes.quote: I'd rather lie in a hammock with you -- with nothing but happiness surrounding us -- and be ambushed than run away.
quotes.author: Anne Greenwood Brown

quotes.quote: My goal involves a hammock, a vegetable patch, and a solar-powered house. And I hope to eventually get there.
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.quote: We don't want to turn the safety net into a hammock that lulls able-bodied people into complacency and dependence.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: Reading is a joy for my kids, and to swing in a hammock on a lazy summer day reading a good book just goes with summer.
quotes.author: Marcia Gay Harden

quotes.quote: There are many terms that have been used to describe me: man, comedian, disappointment, hammock enthusiast.
quotes.author: Joe Lycett

quotes.quote: I’m lucky to have a great support system in my friends and some of my family. If you have those people that you trust, go ahead and fall back into them and let them be your hammock and cocoon and let them embrace you
quotes.author: JoJo

quotes.quote: Suddenly, the wind got hold of the hammock. Leaves murmured. It was cold and the sun had gone down.
quotes.author: Marcus Speh

quotes.quote: I don't care who you are, the pressure is on to go to the next task immediately. What happened to the days of hanging out in the hammock all afternoon?
quotes.author: James Brolin

quotes.quote: Your best ideas, those eureka moments that turn the world upside down, seldom come when you're juggling emails, rushing to meet the 5 P.M. deadline or straining to make your voice heard in a high-stress meeting. They come when you're walking the dog, soaking in the bath or swinging in a hammock.
quotes.author: Carl Honore

quotes.quote: A hammock is the best place to spend a midsummer afternoon. When you climb into a hammock, you are linked to reality only by the narrowest of cords. Suspended in time and space, you shed any sense of weight or corporal substance. As you sway with the gentle rhythm of the breeze, you drift and dream between heaven and Earth, glimpsing the blue truth of sky beyond the wagging treetops.Then suddenly the spell is broken by a dog’s snout poking you, a rumble of thunder or a child’s cry, and you are brought back to a world you temporarily left behind. But the hammock’s solace is not forgotten. Its gentle crescent lingers.
quotes.author: Robert S. Kyff in Hartford

quotes.quote: The word hammockable (describing two trees that are the perfect distance apart between which a hammock can be hung) is not in the dictionary, but it should be. [Of lying in hammocks]
quotes.author: Dan Kieran

quotes.quote: If you could weave, you could make me a hammock. I never had a hammock made of fifty dollar bills.
quotes.author: Morton S. Fine

quotes.quote: Romero's gonna split his banana hammock when he sees this!
quotes.author: Nathan Oliver

quotes.quote: Holy Ibiza, Monaco and Saint-Tropez. That is some banana hammock.
quotes.author: Bryan Fuller

quotes.quote: You guys are crazy if you think we're going in these... BANANA hammocks.
quotes.author: Buddy Valastro

quotes.quote: Overall, I'd rather lay in a hammock with a couple of girls than be dead.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: It's like letting your best friend sleep in a silk hammock. They're breezy. They don't bind. And they give you just enough swing.
quotes.author: Jeff Lowell

quotes.quote: Well when I think of home, I... I think of something specific. I think of my, my hammock in the backyard or my wife pruning the rosebushes in a pair of my old work gloves.
quotes.author: Robert Rodat

quotes.quote: A banana hammock. Not everybody has one of those.
quotes.author: Bob Dolman

quotes.quote: I'll take you to your house and swing you on the hammock.
quotes.author: Maritta M. Wolff

quotes.quote: They're on a special happy farm, where they make buttermilk. They romp and play. There's a hammock made of dreams.
quotes.author: Rich Blomquist

quotes.quote: But I just moved into a bigger crib / Spot gotta calmly balance to it / I should go throw a hammock in it.
quotes.author: Carlito SF

quotes.quote: Everyday brings new lessons / In my hammock ain't no stressing.
quotes.author: Carlito SF

quotes.quote:
I got that deer in the headlight look / She read my face like the cover of a book / And said: 'Don't expect me to believe all that static,
'cause just last week, I threw that hammock in the attic.
quotes.author: C. Alex Hawkins

quotes.quote: Cause love remembers / The smell of a summer day / Lying in a hammock over fresh cut grass / And the promise of forever.
quotes.author: Craig Morgan

quotes.quote: I've got a hammock for two, and it's got me and you / Written all over it / Swaying peacefully, in the warm ocean breeze / I hope this day never ends
quotes.author: Greg Dillard

quotes.quote: Ah, the apple trees / Sunlit memories / Where the hammock swung / On our backs we'd lie / Looking at the sky.
quotes.author: Michel Philippe-Gerard

quotes.quote: All day long just taking it easy / Laying in a hammock where it's nice and breezy / And sleeping off the night before / Cause when the sun goes down we'll be back for more
quotes.author: Brett James

quotes.quote: Squalls out on the gulf stream / Big storm comming soon / Passed out in my hammock / God, I slept till way past noon.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: There are relics from Apollo trips / When the earthmen came to play / And a hammock from a distant star / Out in the Milky Way.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Man, I could use a Pina Colada / Little bit of sun on my skin / A hammock, a book / Never gonna look back
quotes.author: Dean Dillon

quotes.quote: Hammocking is one of my favorite pastimes while camping, especially if I'm on Mommy's lap.
quotes.author: Sy Brandon

quotes.quote: While there are many places to stretch out and relax, I like the hammock.
quotes.author: Marga Odahowski

quotes.quote: The relaxing hammock practice of stillness is perfect, as it nestles you in nature surrounded by beauty and connects you to that quiet source of inner wisdom.
quotes.author: Marga Odahowski

quotes.quote: Let your hammock practice guide you to the quiet magnificence within you.
quotes.author: Marga Odahowski

quotes.quote: Time in the hammock allows for insights and allows you to rest in the images of you resolution.
quotes.author: Marga Odahowski

quotes.quote: The king of porch relaxation is the hammock .
quotes.author: Megan Fulweiler

quotes.quote: Similar to the way you can hold a conch to your ear and hear the ocean , you can lie down on a hammock and feel the gentle rocking of waves .
quotes.author: Megan Fulweiler

quotes.quote: Relax in a hammock or lawn chair on a summer evening and watch the fireflies.
quotes.author: Lorraine Bodger

quotes.quote: Lose yourself-staring at the flames, gazing at the waves, listening to music, kneading bread, swinging in a hammock.
quotes.author: Lorraine Bodger

quotes.quote: Sleeping outside in the colorful hammocks was more fun than lying on the pool lounge chairs or being inside the tent.
quotes.author: Ana Jaye

quotes.quote: Don't hate me because I'm handsome, hate me because your girlfriend thinks I am.
quotes.author: Azgraybebly Josland

quotes.quote: An evil for these times destined to move through the world in handsome human guise.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: The best accessory for a woman, handsome man!
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Though they may not always be handsome men doomed to evil posses the manly virtues.
quotes.author: Jean Genet

quotes.quote: Nothing is more appealing than a handsome man who is also uncertain of himself.
quotes.author: Laurell K Hamilton

quotes.quote: An agreeable manner may set off handsome features, but can never alter plain ones.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Handsome people are always interesting to watch. But a handsome person in crisis is riveting.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: Handsome husbands often make a wife's heart ache.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: A clever, ugly man every now and then is successful with the ladies, but a handsome fool is irresistible.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Women were gravitating towards him from all directions like a planetary orbit.
quotes.author: Dannika Dark

quotes.quote: A handsome person, with perverted will, is a fine craft that's handled without skill.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Don't let the devil fool you! Unless he's handsome.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: Being handsome wasn't much of a burden. It worked for me.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.quote: It is a great plague to be too handsome a man.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Handsome is as handsome does.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Because his victims willingly follow him in broad daylight, he appears harmless. He's most likely handsome.
quotes.author: Jeff Davis

quotes.quote: I'm sorry that good-looking people like us made you throw up and feel bad about yourself.
quotes.author: Drake Sather

quotes.quote: Why is it that every time a good looking man comes around here I am a mess?
quotes.author: Jim Byrnes

quotes.quote: Young people today are hopeless. Good-looking, elegant, well-fed. They're all alike, like California oranges.
quotes.author: Pierre Drieu La Rochelle

quotes.quote: He's suspiciously good looking in ways that normal people are not!
quotes.author: Rachel Bloom

quotes.quote: It's because you're good-looking. Everybody's looking at you.
quotes.author: Kôtarô Terauchi

quotes.quote: His face is handsome, regal, majestic, lovable. A cuddly face.
quotes.author: Larry Clemmons

quotes.quote: High wide and handsome - that's how I like living. / High wide and handsome - that's how life should be. / Low skinny and ugly - that's for other people. / High wide and handsome suits me to a tee.
quotes.author: Loudon Wainwright

quotes.quote: Way back in history, three thousand years / In fact, ever since the world began / There's been a whole lotta good women shedding tears / Over a brown-eyed, handsome man / A lot of trouble was a brown-eyed, handsome man
quotes.author: Chuck Berry

quotes.quote: I'm independent / Smooth and confident / Always in command / With a graceful element / A tasteful compliment / I'm a deadly handsome man
quotes.author: John K Wozniak

quotes.quote: Fit like a champion, young, rich and handsome / Big bottles splashin', wrist like a magnet
quotes.author: Eric A. Bellinger

quotes.quote: The man is tall, mad, mean, and good-looking / And he's got me his eye / When he looks at me, I go weak at the knees / He's got me going like no other guy
quotes.author: Imelda May

quotes.quote: Cause he's my big, bad, handsome man / He's got me in the palm of his hand / He's the Devil Divine, I'm so glad that he's mine / Cause he's my big, bad, handsome man.
quotes.author: Imelda May

quotes.quote: With his rugged good looks yeah he's got me hooked / Got me where he wants me to be / With his arms so wide, he pulls me in by his side / He's the kind of guy that does it for me.
quotes.author: Imelda May

quotes.quote: I had a tall dark handsome stranger / I've had the devil in disguise / I've been attracted to the danger
quotes.author: Albert Hammond

quotes.quote: Tall and tan and young and handsome / The boy from Ipanema goes walking / And when he passes, each girl he passes goes aah
quotes.author: Antonio Carlos Jobim

quotes.quote: Good looks can, in fact, hinder your success with women.
quotes.author: David Clare

quotes.quote: A very good looking, handsome, or dapper man is expected to be an expert with women.
quotes.author: David Clare

quotes.quote: A man who looks life he is good with women should be good with women.
quotes.author: David Clare

quotes.quote: All women liked handsome men, but other factors mattered more, and there were some who worried about too handsome men: 'He mustn't be repulsive, but not so good-looking that the attracts other women.'
quotes.author: Fengshu Liu

quotes.quote: For a husband, someone with a good income, but also very steady, reliable, not risk-taking and not too handsome - someone to make a stable and happy family life with.
quotes.author: Fengshu Liu

quotes.quote: Stick with good looking men. Contrary to popular belief, if you mixed with a few other handsome men, it will enhance you.
quotes.author: Jean-Charles Beytrison

quotes.quote: Either we are born handsome or we're not; there is not much we can do to change that, even if we take good care of ourselves.
quotes.author: Jean-Charles Beytrison

quotes.quote: If you're handsome, you automatically attract women's attention or atleast you give them a favorable first impression.
quotes.author: Jean-Charles Beytrison

quotes.quote: Of course being good-looking is a responsibility.
quotes.author: Kevin Shively

quotes.quote: If you're a handsome man and don't consider your looks to be a 'power' then you haven't been utilizing your gifts the way the great spirits intended...or maybe your good looks are just so engrained into your being that your never paid attention to the effect they have on the world around you.
quotes.author: Kevin Shively

quotes.quote: Being broke sucks..One of your first lessons of being a handsome man is to stop doing it.
quotes.author: Kevin Shively

quotes.quote: These days it takes more than just being a handsome man or pretty a woman.
quotes.author: Minister Jewel M. Taylor

quotes.quote: Being handsome or pretty doesn't pay the bills or put food on the table.
quotes.author: Minister Jewel M. Taylor

quotes.quote: Mannerly-hearted! more than handsome face— / Beauty’s bearing or muse of mounting vein, / All, in this case, bathed in high hallowing grace…
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: I'm not a handsome guy, but I can give my hand to someone who needs help. Beauty is in the heart, not in the face.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: There was nothing so attractive as a powerful, handsome, and self-assured man.
quotes.author: Sylvia Day

quotes.quote: He that is not handsome at 20, nor strong at 30, nor rich at 40, nor wise at 50, will never be handsome, strong, rich or wise.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: I'm not handsome in the classical sense. The eyes droop, the mouth is crooked, the teeth aren't straight, the voice sounds like a Mafioso pallbearer, but somehow it all works.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: I am, as I am; whether hideous, or handsome, depends upon who is made judge.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: You should take some responsibility for the way you present yourself. But you should not be hung up on your looks, whether you are ugly or handsome, because it isn't an achievement.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Personality is to a man what perfume is to a flower.
quotes.author: Doris Roberts

quotes.quote: I'm a handsome man with a charming personality.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: A handsome face is a silent recommendation.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Even the Devil was handsome at eighteen.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Handsome is as handsome does.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Handsome is not what is handsome, but what pleases.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Handsome women generally fall to the lot of ugly men.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: It is a great affliction to be too handsome a man.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: I require only three things of a man. He must be handsome, ruthless, and stupid.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: With money in your pocket, you are wise and you are handsome—and you sing well too.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, handsome, talented, and fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be?
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Says he, 'I am a handsome man, but I'm a gay deceiver.'
quotes.author: George Colman the Younger

quotes.quote: O, what a world of vile ill-favoured faults / Looks handsome in three hundred pounds a year!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: What are the natural features which make a township handsome? A river, with its waterfalls and meadows, a lake, a hill, a cliff or individual rocks, a forest, and ancient trees standing singly. Such things are beautiful; they have a high use which dollars and cents never represent.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The handsome man is king, if there is no rich man near.
quotes.author: Nigeria Proverb

quotes.quote: Marry a handsome man and you marry trouble.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: My parents couldn't give me a whole lot of financial support, but they gave me good genes. My dad is a handsome son-of-a-gun, and my mom is beautiful. And I've definitely been the lucky recipient.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.quote: It was better to be good-looking than to be good.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There's a million good-looking guys, but I'm a novelty.
quotes.author: Jimmy Durante

quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: God never shuts one door without opening a bigger better door. Hang in there. You are closer to success than you may think.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Hang on! God will be thy strength in any act of your pursuit.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: One has to remember that every failure can be a stepping stone to something better.
quotes.author: Col. Harland Sanders

quotes.quote: I know God will not give me anything I can't handle. I just wish that He didn't trust me so much.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: We love being mentally strong, but we hate situations that allow us to put our mental strength to good use.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: You will encounter many distractions and many temptations to put your goal aside: The security of a job, a wife who wants kids, whatever. But if you hang in there, always following your vision, I have no doubt you will succeed.
quotes.author: Larry Flynt

quotes.quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: Problems are only opportunities with thorns on them.
quotes.author: Hugh Miller

quotes.quote: One of the most difficult things everyone has to learn is that for your entire life you must keep fighting and adjusting if you hope to survive. No matter who you are or what your position is you must keep fighting for whatever it is you desire to achieve.
quotes.author: George Allen

quotes.quote: Perhaps everything terrible is in its deepest being something helpless that wants help from us.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Never give up. Keep your thoughts and your mind always on the goal.
quotes.author: Tom Bradley

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: In the end, everything will be okay. If it's not okay, it's not yet the end.
quotes.author: Fernando Sabino

quotes.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: We shall draw from the heart of suffering itself the means of inspiration and survival.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Sometimes you will think you can't take it another day. But if you hang in there, one step at a time, you will be able to accomplish more than you ever imagine.
quotes.author: Taya Kyle

quotes.quote: At the very moment when people underestimate you is when you can make a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: The longer you hang in there, the greater the chance that something will happen in your favor. No matter how hard it seems, the longer you persist, the more likely your success.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: But ne'er the rose without the thorn.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Defeat may serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: The pressure of survival in the big city will make you lose sight of your dream... Hang in there.
quotes.author: James De La Vega

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Henry Stanley Haskins

quotes.quote: You can do amazing things if you have strong faith, deep desire, and just hang in there.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Consider the postage stamp, my son. It secures success through its ability to stick to one thing till it gets there.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Once you have been through a certain amount of things in life, you definitely grow more comfortable with yourself. To persevere and hang in there and believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Steve Nash

quotes.quote: Sometimes life gets weird. Hang in there, it gets better.
quotes.author: Tanner Patrick

quotes.quote: When one door closes another door opens; but we so often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: I'm not telling you it's going to be easy--I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
quotes.author: Art Williams

quotes.quote: The soul would have no rainbow had the eyes no tears.
quotes.author: John Vance Cheney

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Let your strongest muscle be the will.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: When you get to the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragement s, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Hang in there. It is astonishing how short a time it can take for very wonderful things to happen.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the roadâ€¦Unless you fail to make the turn.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again.
quotes.author: Flavia Weedn

quotes.quote: Most of us, swimming against the tides of trouble the world knows nothing about, need only a bit of praise or encouragement - and we will make the goal.
quotes.author: Jerome Fleishman

quotes.quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.
quotes.author: Ivy Baker Priest

quotes.quote: So often in life a new chapter awaits. You ride off into the sunset and discover it's the sunrise.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Hope says every drought comes to an end an regardless of the general consensus there is an expected end.
quotes.author: Debbie-Ann Lawrence

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Be ready to face all the challenges that life may bring, and never lose hope! Be in command of your life. Better your brain by having a better attitude about life.
quotes.author: Chris Mentis

quotes.quote: Let yourself picture everything being better than you've ever dreamed.
quotes.author: Eve Menezes Cunningham

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart . Who looks inside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Faith is to believe what we do not seem and the reward of this faith is to see what we believe.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Everything and anything is possible when you believe, put forth some action, and focus!
quotes.author: Aliya Abbas

quotes.quote: To push forward and show the world that you won't take any more of this nonsense truly defines the person you are and want to be.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Challenges will come your way. But you must not lose faith or get discouraged by the temporary setbacks and roadblocks.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Nothing is this world is impossible to accomplish if you are determined to pursue it. You have within you immense power, strength, and potential.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Difficulties only make you aware of your strengths and bring out the best in you. They have made you who you are and have helped you reach where you are today.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: So come what may, never give up and never lose hope. No matter how big the troubles are, they cannot keep you down if your determination to get back on your feet is strong enough.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: When the chips are down and you are feeling worn out, give yourself a boost to get yourself back on track.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: The difference in winning and losing is most often, not quitting.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: I do not think there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.
quotes.author: John D Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Continuity gives us roots; change gives us branches, letting us stretch and grow and reach new heights.
quotes.author: Pauline R Kezer

quotes.quote: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope or confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful men keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hiton

quotes.quote: Just smiling goes a long way toward making you feel better about life. And when you feel better about life, your life is better.
quotes.author: Art Linkletter

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory consists, not in falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: Gen. George S Patton

quotes.quote: Life would be dull if you got everything you wanted without having to struggle a bit. The key is to turn whatever setback you experienced into something positive.
quotes.author: Jamyn Edis

quotes.quote: To every life there are challenges and some happenings, which may come up as one continues the journey of making life worth it and achieving said tasks and goals.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Being mindful of your state gives you the power to prove something against the challenges in your life.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Challenges are less if we hold on to the power to resist the frustrations of our life.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: One way or the other, one can also overcome life and its challenges by aspiring to use the power, knowledge and wisdom given them from above.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Those challenges you are battling with in your life have their main sources and you need to deal with them fast whenever they approach you.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: One of our greatest challenges is to allow hard, painful, and tear-filled experiences to be our teacher in the classroom of life.
quotes.author: Bill Crowder

quotes.quote: Life is hard and what you do with your difficult life experiences will determine how you turn out in the end.
quotes.author: Franca Lawrence

quotes.quote: There will always be problems and challenges as long as we live.
quotes.author: Franca Lawrence

quotes.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you; they are supposed to help you discover who you are and what you are made of.
quotes.author: Spence Finlayson

quotes.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass; it's about learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Spence Finlayson

quotes.quote: Facing those challenges can be difficult, as it often requires a great deal of self-reflection and introspection.
quotes.author: Don Mann

quotes.quote: Knowledge and experience can play a critical role in identifying obstacles, allowing us to better understand and evaluate the challenges we face at any given time.
quotes.author: Don Mann

quotes.quote: Life has a beautiful way of teaching lessons through the challenges you face.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: Challenges are part of life and can redefine who you are.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: It is wisdom to brazen out challenges and deal with the problem directly to fling down the gauntlet of difficulties.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: No matter the intensity of your challenges in this life, increase your curiousty to find a way out of the challenging circumstance.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Always hold your head high, it will provide a sense of pride and will feel better inside.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: When life sends us a battlefield, we are blessed to be armed with a shield.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: Faith and doubt cannot exist in the same time, for one will dispel the other.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: Purpose is the ultimate fuel for our journey through life. When we drive with purpose we don't get tired or bored and our engines don't burn out.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: No matter how tired you feel, no matter how much you want to quit, no matter what obstacles is in your way, keep moving toward the vision you have for your future.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Knocked down but not beaten. Tired but not giving up. I saw the sun peek through the clouds. Sometimes all we need is a glimmer of hope.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives neve enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: You need resilience not just for the hard times. You need resilience if you're going to be happy.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a day, go fishing. If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help someone else.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Happiness is like a butterfly; the more you chase it, the more it will elude you, but if you turn your attention to other things, it will come and sit softly on your shoulder.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Happiness cannot come from without. It must come from within. It is not what we see and touch or that which others do for us which makes us happy; it is that which we think and feel and do, first for the other fellow and then for ourselves.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts: therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, or worn. It is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Happiness is the only good. The time to be happy is now. The place to be happy is here. The way to be happy is to make others so.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Happiness is a ball after which we run wherever it rolls, and we push it with our feet when it stops.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Surely happiness is reflective, like the light of heaven; and every countenance, bright with smiles, and glowing with innocent enjoyment, is a mirror transmitting to others the rays of a supreme and ever-shining benevolence.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Happiness is like a cat, If you try to coax it or call it, it will avoid you; it will never come. But if you pay no attention to it and go about your business, you'll find it rubbing against your legs and jumping into your lap.
quotes.author: William John Bennett

quotes.quote: If you ever find happiness by hunting for it, you will find it, as the old woman did her lost spectacles, safe on her own nose all the time.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Happiness is the art of never holding in your mind the memory of any unpleasant thing that has passed.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: A quiet secluded life in the country, with the possibility of being useful to people to whom it is easy to do good, and who are not accustomed to have it done to them; then work which one hopes may be of some use; then rest, nature, books, music, love for one's neighbor — such is my idea of happiness.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Happiness comes when you believe in what you are doing, know what you are doing, and love what you are doing.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions and not in gold; the feeling of happiness dwells in the soul.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The greater part of our happiness depends on our dispositions, and not on our circumstances.
quotes.author: Martha Washington

quotes.quote: We tend to forget that happiness doesn't come as a result of getting something we don't have, but rather of recognizing and appreciating what we do have.
quotes.author: Frederick Keonig

quotes.quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Happiness exists on earth, and it is won through prudent exercise of reason, knowledge of the harmony of the universe, and constant practice of generosity.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Happiness is different from pleasure. Happiness has something to do with struggling, enduring, and accomplishing.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: The bad news: there is no key to happiness. The good news: it isn't locked.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I think happiness is what makes you pretty. Period. Happy people are beautiful. They become like a mirror and they reflect that happiness.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Remember that happiness is a way of travel, not a destination.
quotes.author: Roy Goodman

quotes.quote: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have, it depends solely upon what you think.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The surest way to happiness is to lose yourself in a cause greater than yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Happiness is like manna; it is to be gathered in grains, and enjoyed every day. It will not keep; it cannot be accumulated; nor have we got to go out of ourselves or into remote places to gather it, since it has rained down from a Heaven, at our very door.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a brilliant climax to years of grim struggle and anxiety. It is a long succession of little decisions simply to be happy in the moment.
quotes.author: J. Donald Walters

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our happiness depends on the habit of mind we cultivate. So practice happy thinking every day. Cultivate the merry heart, develop the happiness habit, and life will become a continual feast.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Happiness is neither virtue nor pleasure nor this thing nor that but simply growth, We are happy when we are growing.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Happiness lies in making others happy, in forsaking self-interest to bring joy to others.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Happiness is spiritual, born of Truth and Love. It is unselfish; therefore it cannot exist alone, but requires all mankind to share it.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Happiness comes from spiritual wealth, not material wealth... Happiness comes from giving, not getting. If we try hard to bring happiness to others, we cannot stop it from coming to us also. To get joy, we must give it, and to keep joy, we must scatter it.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in our circumstance but in ourselves. It is not something we see, like a rainbow, or feel, like the heat of a fire. Happiness is something we are.
quotes.author: John B. Sheerin

quotes.quote: Happiness... is not a destination: it is a manner of traveling. Happiness is not an end in itself. It is a by-product of working, playing, loving and living.
quotes.author: Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: Happiness must be cultivated. It is like character. It is not a thing to be safely let alone for a moment, or it will run to weeds.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stuart Phelps

quotes.quote: Happiness is a sunbeam which may pass through a thousand bosoms without losing a particle of its original ray; nay, when it strikes on a kindred heart, like the converged light on a mirror, it reflects itself with redoubled brightness. It is not perfected till it is shared.
quotes.author: Jane Porter

quotes.quote: Many persons have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self-gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is a habit - cultivate it.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Happiness is like peeing in your pants. Everyone can see it, but only you can feel its warmth.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence about the future.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Happiness is a kind of activity of the soul; whereas the remaining good things are either merely indispensable conditions of happiness, or are of the nature of auxiliary means, and useful instrumentally.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness does not lie in amusement; it would be strange if one were to take trouble and suffer hardship all one's life in order to amuse oneself.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: As health produces health, so does philosophical wisdom produce happiness. Wisdom is a part of virtue that once possessed makes a man happy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a station you arrive at, but a manner of travelling.
quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quotes.quote: Happiness depends, as nature shows, less on exterior things than most suppose.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Happiness consists in the attainment of our desires, and in our having only right desires.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in stranger's garden.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: Happiness does not depend on outward things but on the way we see them.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Happiness makes up in height what it lacks in length.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: O happiness! Our being's end and aim! For which we bear to live, or dare to die.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The only ones among you who will really be happy are those who will have sought and found how to serve.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Talk happiness. The world is sad enough without your woe. No path is wholly rough.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: How bitter a thing it is to look into happiness through another man's eyes.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Most of us are just about happy as we make up our minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: To be happy is not the purpose of our being, but to deserve happiness.
quotes.author: Fichte

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one has to do.
quotes.author: Sir James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: We cannot find happiness until we forget to seek for it.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: The loss of wealth is loss of dirt, as sages in all times assert; The happy man is without a shirt.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: A great obstacle to happiness is to expect too much happiness.
quotes.author: Bernard de Fontenelle

quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life. It is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one's values. No one's happiness but my own is in my power to achieve or to destroy.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Happiness is as a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Happiness comes most to persons who seek her least, and think least about it. It is not an object to be sought. It is a state to be induced. It must follow and not lead. It must overtake you, and not you overtake it.— The secret of happiness is something to do.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Happiness consumes itself like a flame. It cannot burn forever.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: All happiness is a chance encounter and at every moment presents itself to you like a beggar by the roadside.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Happiness is like mana; it is to be gathered in grains and enjoyed everyday. It will not keep; it cannot be accumulated.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: Happiness is a way station between too little and too much.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: Happiness? A good cigar, a good meal, a good cigar and a good woman— or a bad woman; it depends on how much happiness you can handle.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions— the little, soon-forgotten charities of a kiss or smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: I don't have to chase extraordinary moments to find happiness— it's right in front of me if I'm paying attention and practicing gratitude.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: Perfect happiness is a beautiful sunset, the giggle of a grandchild, the first snowfall. It's the little things that make happy moments, not the grand events. Joy comes in sips, not gulps.
quotes.author: Sharon Draper

quotes.quote: The search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice, you cannot choose what happens, but you can choose your reaction to it and be happy.
quotes.author: RVM

quotes.quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in strangers' gardens.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: Happiness is never stopping to think if you are.
quotes.author: Palmer Sondreal

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The only reason you are happy is because you choose to be happy. Happiness is a choice, and so is suffering.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: The secret to happiness is to put the burden of proof on unhappiness.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Stop looking for happiness in the same place you lost.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The pursuit of happiness is a most ridiculous phrase: if you pursue happiness you'll never find it.
quotes.author: C.P. Snow

quotes.quote: Whatever you set aside to seek happiness, remember where you put it.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Happiness is a way of travel not a destination.
quotes.author: Roy M. Goodman

quotes.quote: We all have hapiness inside and it's not at all hard to find. It's sealed deep in our hearts and guarded by our soul. You don't have to beg to use it. All you have to do is choose it!
quotes.author: Bebeth

quotes.quote: There are two things to aim at in life: first, to get what you want; and after that, to enjoy it. Only the wisest of mankind achieve the second.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Two things prevent us from happiness; living in the past and observing others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is a present attitude and not a future condition.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy you have to work to make it happen. You can't just wish for it and you can't put it in the hands of other people.
quotes.author: Michael Buckley

quotes.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: You can only have bliss if you don't chase it.
quotes.author: Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.quote: Happiness is a state of mental,physical and spiritual well-being. Think pleasantly,engaged sport and read daily to enhance your well-being.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: There is no way to happiness - happiness is the way.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The art of happiness is to serve all. To be truly happy, we must think not only of how we can help ourselves, but how we can help others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In life everyone has a choice. The key is: make a right choice.
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Happiness is the feeling you're feeling when you want to keep feeling it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice I am making now. Once we understand that and find love consciousness, we learn that this place of internal plenitude needs nothing.
quotes.author: Isha Judd

quotes.quote: It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: No one can grant you happiness. Happiness is a choice we all have the power to make.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice. You grieve, you stomp your feet, you pick yourself up and choose to be happy.
quotes.author: Lucy Lawless

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy. No person will make you happy unless you decide to be happy. Your happiness will not come to you. It can only come from you.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice, a repetitive one.
quotes.author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

quotes.quote: We often feel paralyzed by choice and make no choice. But the thing is, no choice is a choice. If you're not doing something about it, you're doing something about it.
quotes.author: Chris Guillebeau

quotes.quote: A life by choice is one that is filled with love, happiness, and an appreciation of each day.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: Happiness is the secret to all beauty; there is no beauty that is attractive without happiness.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: Happiness is a conscious choice, not an automatic response.
quotes.author: Mildred Barthel

quotes.quote: Ask yourself whether you are happy and you cease to be so.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Happiness is the first principle of life. Happiness basically means well-being. It is always good and always a choiceâ€¦ We need to make the choice to be happy in a particular situation, just as it is, and at a given moment.
quotes.author: Alexandra Stoddard

quotes.quote: No choice is the wrong choice as long as you make a choice. The only wrong choice is choosing not to make one.
quotes.author: Jake Abel

quotes.quote: We tend to seek happiness when happiness is actually a choice
quotes.author: Rodney White

quotes.quote: Feeling happy or hurt by every little thing is a choice that makes life beautiful or ugly.
quotes.author: Archana Chaurasia Kapoor

quotes.quote: You cannot always have happiness, but you can always give happiness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It is never too late to make happiness your choice of life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: Happiness is a conditioning of the mind and body so that happiness is totally within the way you perceive things and handle situations in life. You choose to be happy; happiness doesn't choose you.
quotes.author: Charmaine Smith Ladd

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: Grow old with me, the best is yet to be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: For you see, each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rosemonde Gerard

quotes.quote: I want you for always â€¦ days, years, eternities.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Real love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Love seems the swiftest, but it is the slowest of all growths. No man or woman really knows what perfect love is until they have been married a quarter of a century.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: May the love that you share last your lifetime, A blessing hand always be there, May success and happiness be yours forever As you make a wonderful pair!
quotes.author: Rushi Kanya

quotes.quote: You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Love is the emblem of eternity, it confounds all notion of time, effaces all memory of a beginning, all fear of an end
quotes.author: Germaine De Stael

quotes.quote: I wouldn't change a thing, as happiness you bring. You are my soulmate. A marriage made by fate.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote:
In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours.
In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I never loved you any more than I do, right this second. And I'll never love you any less than I do, right this second.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.quote: The sum which two married people owe to one another defies calculation. It is an infinite debt, which can only be discharged through eternity.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang

quotes.quote: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: There is no mystery â€” that's the beauty of it. We are entirely explicable to each other, and yet we stay. What a miracle that is.
quotes.author: Kamila Shamsie

quotes.quote: As we begin a new chapter in our lives, remember one thing: My heart is forever yours, and I will cherish every passing second I have you in my life. Keep my heart for I will always be deeply in love with you.
quotes.author: Emily Winters

quotes.quote: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change. . . I will always keep falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Karen Clodfelder

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there's a life after that, I'll love you then.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Forever is a measure of time used by people who share an ordinary love. Our extraordinary love is immeasurable ... for us, forever just won't do.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Like good wine, marriage gets better with age â€” once you learn to keep a cork in it
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Not only have I seen truth in your eyes, you remind me of time itself for you are my Past, Present, Future, and Forever. I love you. Happy Anniversary.
quotes.author: Emily Winters

quotes.quote: I will spend an eternity loving you, caring for you, respecting you, showing you every day that I hold you as high as the stars.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: However, you forgot our anniversary date , but it does not matter because I know that you may have forgotten the date but you haven't forgotten my value in your life.
quotes.author: Shattered Girl

quotes.quote: “Most modern calendars mar the sweet simplicity of our lives by reminding us that each day that passes is the anniversary of some perfectly uninteresting event.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: “To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved anyhow - this is a human offering that can border on miraculous."
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: “Happiness [is] only real when shared”
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: “Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: “Marriage can wait, education cannot.”
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: “And she's got brains enough for two, which is the exact quantity the girl who marries you will need.”
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: “The trouble with some women is that they get all excited about nothing - and then marry him.”
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: “No woman wants to be in submission to a man who isn't in submission to God!”
quotes.author: T D Jakes

quotes.quote: “Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “The devil's happy when the critics run you off.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “No woman wants to be in submission to a man who isn't in submission to God!”
quotes.author: T D Jakes

quotes.quote: “Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.”
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: “Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then.”
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: “If I get married, I want to be very married.”
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: “Marriage is a fine institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.”
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: “A fine glass vase goes from treasure to trash, the moment it is broken. Fortunately, something else happens to you and me. Pick up your pieces. Then, help me gather mine.”
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: “my heart when I stared at you beat irregularly and jagged”
quotes.author: Lori Jenessa Nelson

quotes.quote: “A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.”
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: “I’m in love with you, and I’m not in the business of denying myself the simple pleasure of saying true things.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash."
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: “For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.”
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.quote: “The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.”
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: “Life is a journey, and love is what makes that journey worthwhile.”
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: “Immature love says: ‘I love you because I need you.’ Mature love says ‘I need you because I love you.’”
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: “Success in marriage does not come merely through finding the right mate, but through being the right mate.”
quotes.author: Barnette R. Brickner

quotes.quote: “Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you I had no control over."
quotes.author: "Unknown "

quotes.quote: "I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect, and I loved you even more."
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: "If I know what love is, it is because of you."
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: "You're nothing short of my everything."
quotes.author: Ralph Block

quotes.quote: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own."
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: There is no way to be a perfect mother, and a million ways to be a good one. Happy Birthday.
quotes.author: Jill Churchill

quotes.quote: When it comes to mothers there's lots of them about, but you're the very very best of that, there is no doubt. Happy Birthday Momsie.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: You were there when I was barely able to stand up and speak for myself. You were then even though I have finally learned how to talk and how to walk. And now that I am old enough to fend for myself, you are still by my side, just like a true mother. Happy Birthday!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dear Mother I love you and want you to know, I think of you often wherever I go. You lift me up; you're like walking sunshine; I am lucky to have a great mother like mine. Your endless affection makes you special and rare; I'm always amazed by how much you care. What you've given to me I can never repay, thank you, Mom, on your (40th, 52nd, etc.) birthday.
quotes.author: Joanna Fuchs

quotes.quote: May you be gifted with life's biggest joys and never-ending bliss. After all, you yourself are a gift to earth, so you deserve the best. Happy Birthday Mom.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happy birthday mom. To the best mom in the world! Hope you have an awesome day!
quotes.author: Gabriell

quotes.quote: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life. Happy Birthday Mom.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: This loving greeting comes to one. Who has given me love and care. A mother, the best mother, my mother. A mother beyond compare. Have a lovely day Mom.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: Happy Birthday to the most amazing woman in my life. I love you mom, and thank you for always having my back and believing in everything I do. I don't know where I would be without you!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happy birthday my angel mother. Heaven holds my mother on this her special day. Lord I ask this of you to give her a bouquet of beautiful, scented flowers and tell her they're from me please tell her I will love her for all eternity.
quotes.author: Toni Kane

quotes.quote: Happy birthday to my mom and thank you for everything you've done for me and my kids. I don't know what I'd do without you. Thank you for teaching me to be respectful and caring adults. I couldn't do it without you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: God could not be everywhere and therefore he made mothers. Happy Birthday Mom.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Happy birthday to my best mother in the world. Today is your birthday. I promise that I'll always remember all the things you did for me. You're my my love.
quotes.author: Hiwa

quotes.quote: Mother, I wish you the best on your birthday; No one has earned it like you. You provide the love that makes our dream of a happy home come true. Your family loves and reveres its Mom; You enrich everything you come near; You're our rock, our beacon and our pleasure, and everything we all hold so dear.
quotes.author: Karl Fuchs

quotes.quote: Even when I don't see you, the thought of you makes me feel loved. Often, I catch myself doing something right and realize that it was you who taught me to do it. I owe so much to you, Mom! Happy birthday!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The day you got to know that I came into you, the day when I was born and you saw me, the day when I whispered Mom for the first time of my life, the day everybody came to my first birthday, and all the other days untill now you was happy and smile because of me, never ends mom! Yet to come! Happy birthday mom keep your lovely smile in your face as always! I love you mom.
quotes.author: Suran Jaya

quotes.quote: I regard no man as poor who has a godly mother. Happy Birthday Mom.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Thanks, Mom for always being there, for showing me such love and care. Thanks for all you've done and do. How I turned out is down to you. I love you. Have a lovely birthday.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: Mom, your birthday means so much to me; To have you in my life another year, the time I spent enfolded in your love, each day, each moment with you is so dear. I cherish the very special bond we have. You lift my spirit in so many ways. I celebrate your life; I honor you, and send to you my love and care and praise.
quotes.author: Joanna Fuchs

quotes.quote: Each year I'm extra happy on your birthday; Your day reminds me of God's gift to me-- A mom who gave her all to raise me right, a mother like the one I want to be.
quotes.author: Joanna Fuchs

quotes.quote: Happy birthday mom. I think my mother is my biggest influence. There are so many things I hate about her but at the same time I'm thankful for her. All I know is that when I'm a parent I want to be just like my mom. I can talk to my mom more than any of my friends could talk to their parents.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.quote: To the nicest Mom in the world better than any other, have a really super birthday. I'm so glad that you're my mother.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: Happy Birthday to my mom; As mothers go, you're the bomb! You pick me up when I am down; Around you, I can't wear a frown. Your gifts cannot begin to say how much you deserve this holiday. Enjoy your birthday Mom; take a break. You're supermom, so take the cake!
quotes.author: Joanna Fuchs

quotes.quote: All that I am or ever hope to be, I owe to my angel mother.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The only love that I really believe in is a mother’s love for her children.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: To describe my mother would be to write about a hurricane in its perfect power. Or the climbing, falling colors of a rainbow.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: All that I am or ever hope to be, I owe to my angel mother.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: My mother was the most beautiful woman I ever saw. All I am I owe to my mother. I attribute my success in life to the moral, intellectual, and physical education I received from her.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I realized when you look at your mother, you are looking at the purest love you will ever know.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Love as powerful as your mother’s for you leaves its own mark … to have been loved so deeply .. will give us some protection forever.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Successful mothers are not the ones who have never struggled. They are the ones who never give up, despite their struggles.
quotes.author: Sharon Jaynes

quotes.quote: A mother is not a person to lean on, but a person to make leaning unnecessary.
quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.quote: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: No language can express the power and beauty and heroism of a mother’s love.
quotes.author: Edwin Chapin

quotes.quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: I am sure that if the mothers of various nations could meet, there would be no more wars.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: I got to grow up with a mother who taught me to believe in me.
quotes.author: Antonio Villaraigosa

quotes.quote: A mother’s happiness is like a beacon, lighting up the future but reflected also on the past in the guise of fond memories.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: If you ever catch a great boss, it's just such a rare thing, and it's amazing.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: I'm a big believer in picking your boss, not the job. Great people create great jobs.
quotes.author: Nancy Dubuc

quotes.quote: As a villain or a superhero, as a good guy or a bad guy, I think I can do, at this point, 'Okay, whatever you need boss. Is this what you need? Great, I will grab the brass ring doing it.'
quotes.author: Lana

quotes.quote: Next to excellence is the appreciation of it.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: I awoke this morning with devout thanksgiving for my friends, the old and new.
quotes.author: Will Carleton

quotes.quote: When I'm not thank'd at all, I'm thank'd enough. I've done my duty, and I've done no more.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: Whatever action is performed by a great man, common men follow in his footsteps, and whatever standards he sets by exemplary acts, all the world pursues.
quotes.author: Bhagavad-Gita

quotes.quote: A really great man is known by three signs—generosity in the design, humanity in the execution, moderation in success.
