quotes.quote: A new year is simply the turn of a calendar page and a beautiful chance for us to turn over a new leaf.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: New Year brings fresh beginnings, exciting new experiences and relationships await. Let us be thankful for the blessings of the past and the promise of the future.
quotes.author: Peggy Toney Horton

quotes.quote: A New Year has tiptoed in. Let's go forward to meet it. Let's welcome the 365 days it brings. Let's live well with love in our hearts towards God and all people. Let's walk through its corridors with praise songs on our lips.
quotes.author: AnushaAtukorala

quotes.quote: Hope Smiles from the threshold of the year to come, Whispering 'it will be happier
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Youth is when you're allowed to stay up late on New Year's Eve. Middle age is when you're forced to.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: Drop the last year into the silent limbo of the past. Let it go, for it was imperfect, and thank God that it can go.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: Today, as we wish each other a Happy New Year, let us determine to be more sincere, compassionate, warm-hearted human beings, trying to make our world a more equal place. That way we'll actually make it a happy year.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: We spend January 1st walking through our lives, room by room, drawing up a list of work to be done, cracks to be patched. Maybe this year, to balance the list, we ought to walk through the rooms of our lives not looking for flaws, but for potential.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: Maybe this year, we ought to walk through the rooms of our lives not looking for flaws, but looking for potential.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on, with all the wisdom that experience can instill in us.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: New Year's eve is like every other night; there is no pause in the march of the universe, no breathless moment of silence among created things that the passage of another twelve months may be noted; and yet no man has quite the same thoughts this evening that come with the coming of darkness on other nights.
quotes.author: Hamilton Wright Mabie

quotes.quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I think in terms of the day's resolutions, not the years
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.quote: Decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
quotes.author: J. P. Morgan

quotes.quote: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide you’re not going to stay where you are.
quotes.author: J.P. Morgan

quotes.quote: One resolution I have made, and try always to keep, is this. To rise above little things
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: We meet today To thank Thee for the era done, And Thee for the opening one.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Celebrate endings for they precede new beginnings.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Happiness is too many things these days for anyone to wish it on anyone lightly. So let's just wish each other a bileless New Year and leave it at that.
quotes.author: Judith Crist

quotes.quote: Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life. The secret of success is in turning that diary into the best story you possibly can. I wish you Happy New Year and diary full of best stories ever written in your life.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: From New Year's on the outlook brightens; good humor lost in a mood of failure returns. I resolve to stop complaining.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: Whether we want them or not, the New Year will bring new challenges whether we seize them or not, the New year will bring new opportunities.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you can go. They merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Learn From Yesterday, Live for Today, hope for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Good resolutions are simply checks that men draw on a bank where they have no account.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: And now we welcome the new year. Full of things that have never been.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Take a leap of faith and begin this wondrous new year by believing. Believe in yourself. And believe that there is a loving Source - a Sower of Dreams - just waiting to be asked to help you make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The happiest moments of my life have been the few which I have passed at home in the bosom of my family.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Just for a moment, amid all the bad stuff, this was a happy place again.
quotes.author: Caroline Green

quotes.quote: I've taken my destiny into my own hands and I'm in a happy place.
quotes.author: Charlie Simpson

quotes.quote: I found my happy place the minute I saw you.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Happiness is the only good. The time to be happy is now. The place to be happy is here. The way to be happy is to make others so.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: I'm in a happy place. I'm very at peace with who I am and what I'm doing and the people around me, so I think I'm probably most ambitious at where I am.
quotes.author: Norman Reedus

quotes.quote: Let your intentions be good - embodied in good thoughts, cheerful words, and unselfish deeds - and the world will be to you a bright and happy place in which to work and play and serve
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: And the more people meditate, the more it increases the positive vibrations turning the planet into a positive, happy place. The more you do that, the greater service you are to God.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: My home is a happy place to be. I bless everyone who enters, myself included. Pleasant experiences fill every room.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Take a couple of days by yourself and rent a nice cabin in some nice, happy place. Stay a day or two and meditate and take walks in areas that feel good to you. Find out who you are again. Remember.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: I'll always want to play and share my music with as many people as I can, but the emphasis is more on how do I find a happy place, what's my balance, what's my ideal.
quotes.author: Lissie

quotes.quote: Sometimes life just sucks, and all we can do is go to our happy place where we plot our revenge.
quotes.author: Antsy McClain

quotes.quote: I like a set to be a happy place, where people can feel free to experiment.
quotes.author: Damien Chazelle

quotes.quote: It took me several years to figure out who I am and a few more to accept what I discovered. Now, I'm in the enjoyment stage of that process and it's a happy place
quotes.author: Jolene Blalock

quotes.quote: My happy place where love grows from within.
quotes.author: Clarissa Carmack

quotes.quote: Some will make religion a happy place; some will make family, friends, and relationships a happy place; and some will make just being healthier a happy place.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: A happy place can help you get through the many negative situations life throws at you. It can help you cope with stress, physical illness, and loss of mental energy.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Therefore, we often think of going someplace to escape, a place to release our tension, a place that will help us have a sense of calm. We may call this our "happy place".
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Going to a happy place may help restore a healthy balance in one's life and allow him or her to work things out.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: People who have a happy place will have mental stability, an oasis, ultimately helping them take back their lives.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: A happy place is a place in our minds where we can get away from all the problems and relax or meditate to release stress when life gets too overwhelming.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Think of your happy place.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Focus deeply on your happy place.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Keep your thoughts on where your happy place is and you will get in a calm and relaxed state, allowing you to return refreshed and renewed.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Religious people who go to church, mosque, or temple tend to be closer to their happy place.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: We are responsible for our happy place.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Happy place is the mental state achieved when a person wants to avoid unpleasant surroundings.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: Everyone's happy place is different, and usually consists of the things that will make them happy.
quotes.author: Sayed Ahmed

quotes.quote: I’m going to find a happy place.
quotes.author: Katie Melua

quotes.quote: To find another happy place now I'm left here all alone.
quotes.author: Dune

quotes.quote: Go on and get in your happy place every day It's okay.
quotes.author: Susanna Hoffs

quotes.quote: You must learn to meditate and stop your thoughts. You must overcome all egotism and selfishness by serving others. You must cleanse your mind so that enlightenment will find a happy place to reside there.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It is impossible for a man to be made happy by putting him in a happy place, unless he be first in a happy state.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: When things in the real world get too stressful, take a short while to close your eyes and visualize something nice. Go to your happy place in your mind and think of things that make you smile. Your imagination can help improve your mood more than you think.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: When you leave a beautiful place, you carry it with you wherever you go.
quotes.author: Alexandra Stoddard

quotes.quote: It's a good place when all you have is hope and not expectations.
quotes.author: Danny Boyle

quotes.quote: There is one safe and happy place, and that is in the will of God.
quotes.author: David Livingstone

quotes.quote: Find your safe spot and your happy place. Allow no one to penetrate your soul.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To the happy sounds of Saturday. Saturday, ever lovin' Saturday.
quotes.author: Carpenters

quotes.quote: It's so happy on Saturday bounce around on Saturday.
quotes.author: The Fall

quotes.quote: Oh, whatever makes her happy on a Saturday night, oh, whatever makes her happy, whatever makes it alright.
quotes.author: Suede

quotes.quote: Where we while away the happy saturdays between the television and the telephone.
quotes.author: Del Amitri

quotes.quote: Happy Saturday! Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Every man has a right to a Saturday night bath.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Most people are in a factory from nine till five. Their job may be to turn out 263 little circles. At the end of the week they're three short and somebody has a go at them. On Saturday afternoons they deserve something to go and shout about.
quotes.author: Rodney Marsh

quotes.quote: Happy Saturday ! When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.quote: Welcome this morning with a smile! Happy Saturday!If you don't have a smile, I'll give you one of mine.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Weekends are a bit like rainbows; they look good from a distance but disappear when you get up close to them.
quotes.author: John Shirley

quotes.quote: The only reason why we ask other people how their weekend was is so we can tell them about our own weekend.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Sunday evenings often feel like the weekend is over before it's even begun.
quotes.author: Catherine McCormack

quotes.quote: Just in terms of allocation of time resources, religion is not very efficient. There's a lot more I could be doing on a Sunday morning.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Sunday morning may be cheery enough, with its extra cup of coffee and litter of Sunday newspapers, but there is always hanging over it the ominous threat of 3 P.M., when the sun gets around to the back windows and life stops dead in its tracks.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Do not let Sunday be taken from you. If your soul has no Sunday, it becomes an orphan.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer.

quotes.quote: Sunday was always the best of days for being the self you had intended to be, but were not, for one reason or another.
quotes.author: Jesse Ball

quotes.quote: On Sunday morning, I'm not nervous... I can't wait to tell what God wants me to say.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Champagne makes you feel like it's Sunday and better days are just around the corner.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: So that Sunday morning I ended up going to church and that's when I got saved.
quotes.author: Russell Wilson

quotes.quote: Oh dear Sunday, I want to sleep in your arms and have fun day.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: There is always something new to learn and feel each Sunday.
quotes.author: Bishop Gerald Causse

quotes.quote: Sunday afternoon is for papers and writing.
quotes.author: Nicholas Haslam

quotes.quote: The goal of Sunday is to leave my home as little as possible.
quotes.author: Mark Morris

quotes.quote: Time flows in a strange way on Sundays.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: When I woke up Sunday morning at the Open and stepped outside and felt the wind and rain in my face, I knew I had an excellent chance to win if I just took my time and trusted myself.
quotes.author: Tom Kite

quotes.quote: Sunday is the golden clasp that binds together the volume of the week.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: On Sunday mornings, as the dawn burned into day, swarms of gulls descended on the uncollected trash, hovering and dropping in the cold clear light.
quotes.author: Edward Conlon

quotes.quote: It was Sunday morning, and old people passed me like sad grey waves on their way to church.
quotes.author: Barbara Comyns

quotes.quote: Sunday, the day for the language of leisure.
quotes.author: Elfriede Jelinek

quotes.quote: There are many persons who look on Sunday as a sponge to wipe out the sins of the week
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Between Monday and Saturday men make an audience. On Sunday, they make a congregation.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Stuttering is painful. In Sunday school, I'd try to read my lessons, and the children behind me were falling on the floor with laughter.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: People can be great competitors on Sunday and mates on Monday.
quotes.author: Casey Stoner

quotes.quote: Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The feeling of Sunday is the same everywhere, heavy, melancholy, standing still.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: The flower has no weekday self, dressed as it always is in Sunday clothes.
quotes.author: Malcolm De Chazal

quotes.quote: Here of a Sunday morning / My love and I would lie, / And see the coloured counties / And hear the lark so high / About us in the sky.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: Monday, n. In Christian countries, the day after the baseball game.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: It is a custom in Ireland, among shoemakers, if they intoxicate themselves on Sunday, to do no work on Monday; and this they call making a Saint Monday or keeping Saint Crispin's day. Many here adopted this good custom from the example of the shoemakers.
quotes.author: Maria Edgeworth

quotes.quote: It's just another manic Monday / I wish it was Sunday / 'Cause that's my fun day / My I don't have to run day.
quotes.author: Prince Nelson

quotes.quote: Half-way unto the end— the week's high noon. / The mourning hours do speed away so soon! / And when the noon is reached, however bright, / Instinctively, we look toward the night.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: My Wednesday nights came regularly round, our quartet parties came regularly off, my violoncello was in good tune, and there was nothing wrong in my world— or if anything not much— or little or much, it was no affair of mine.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Midst of wealth of facts and fancies / That our memories may recall, / Thus the old-school-day romances / Are the dearest after all!— / When some sweet thought revises / The half-forgotten tune / That opened "Exercises,' / On Friday afternoon.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: The evening of the last day of the week was always celebrated by what is styled on board of English vessels, 'The Saturday Night Bottles.' Two of these were sent down into the forecastle, just after dark; one for the starboard watch, and the other for the larboard.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Come Saturday morning / I'm going away with my friend. / We'll Saturday spend till the end of the day.
quotes.author: Dory Previn

quotes.quote: ...Saturday morning, / All my tiredness has gone away. / Got my money and my honey, / and I'm out on the stem to play.
quotes.author: Dave Bartholomew

quotes.quote: As Monday goes, so goes the week,' dames say. / Refreshed, renewed, use well the initial day./ And see thy neighbor / already seeks his labor.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Hangin' around / Nothing to do but frown / Rainy days and Mondays always get me down.
quotes.author: Roger Nichols and Paul Williams

quotes.quote: Move languidly...like a hostess in her bathrobe emptying ashtrays on Sunday morning.
quotes.author: Alice McDermott

quotes.quote: It was Sunday, and there was a feeling of quietness.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: So quiet...it felt like Sunday without church.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Spencer

quotes.quote: Don't waste a single Sunday. If you don't waste Sundays, you will be less likely to waste Mondays, Tuesdays, and Wednesdays.
quotes.author: Matthew Kelly

quotes.quote: Sunday is the day when I prepare for the week ahead by making improbable To Do lists and browsing Pinterest for ideas on how to decorate my imaginary mansion.
quotes.author: Nanea Hoffman

quotes.quote: Why is Sunday a day of rest because it is different than all the rest?
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: SUNDAY, The day I planned a lot but actually do nothing.
quotes.author: Lovely Goyal

quotes.quote: The frantic pace of life is only interrupted by the quietness of Sunday.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The city takes a breath on Sunday. Of all that’s lost with the pursuit of what’s next, I hope we don't lose that…
quotes.author: Hawksley Workman

quotes.quote: Now, every day when I wake up I am grateful. I have to be. And I have to count the things that are abundant in my life. Literally, count them.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: It’s not that we spend five days looking forward to just two. It’s that most people do what they enjoy most on those two days. Imagine living a life where every day is your Saturdays and Sundays. Make everyday your weekend. Make everyday a play-day.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: This is Sunday, and the question arises, what'll I start tomorrow?
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.quote: Well, there’s nothing better than putting your feet up on a Sunday afternoon and grabbing a good book.
quotes.author: Chris Klein

quotes.quote: But nothing beats a Woody Allen film on a Sunday night, with a glass of wine and some leftovers.
quotes.author: Kate Fleetwood

quotes.quote: I love waking up to Sunday morning pancakes. The whole process of making them, just out in the kitchen together making pancakes on a Sunday morning; that’s an experience every girl should have.
quotes.author: Ronda Rousey

quotes.quote: A Sunday morning spent reading the paper together, maybe drinking some mimosas, alone, and talking until noon. That would be pretty amazing.
quotes.author: Dierks Bentley

quotes.quote: When you are grateful fear disappears and abundance appears.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
quotes.author: W.T. Purkiser

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving-giving thanks in everything-prepares the way that God might show us His fullest salvation in Christ.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your live. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other as is though everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is impossible to be negative while we are giving thanks.
quotes.author: Donald Curtis

quotes.quote: I give thanks to my Creator for this wonderful life where each of us has the opportunity to learn lessons we could not fully comprehend by any other means.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: If you count all your assets, you always show a profit.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We can always find something to be thankful for, and there may be reasons why we ought to be thankful for even those dispensations which appear dark and frowning.
quotes.author: Albert Barnes

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving, after all, is a word of action.
quotes.author: W.J. Cameron

quotes.quote: Look at everything as though you were seeing it for the first or the last time, then your time on earth will be filled with glory.
quotes.author: Betty Smith

quotes.quote: But see, in our open clearings, how golden the melons lie; Enrich them with sweets and spices, and give us the pumpkin-pie!
quotes.author: Margaret Junkin Preston

quotes.quote: Things turn out best for people who make the best of the way things turn out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving Day is a jewel, to set in the hearts of honest men; but be careful that you do not take the day, and leave out the gratitude.
quotes.author: E.P. Powell

quotes.quote: Gratitude is a quality similar to electricity: It must be produced and discharged and used up in order to exist at all
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: We should certainly count our blessings, but we should also make our blessings count.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: To speak gratitude is courteous and pleasant, to enact gratitude is generous and noble, but to live gratitude is to touch Heaven.
quotes.author: Johannes A. Gaertner

quotes.quote: For flowers that bloom about our feet; for tender grass, so fresh, so sweet; for song of bird, and hum of bee; for all things fair we hear or see, father in heaven, we thank Thee!
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When asked if my cup is half-full or half-empty my only response is that I am thankful I have a cup.
quotes.author: Sam Lefkowitz

quotes.quote: Let us remember that, as much has been given us, much will be expected from us, and that true homage comes from the heart as well as from the lips, and shows itself in deeds.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: He who thanks but with the lips thanks but in part; the full, the true thanksgiving comes from the heart.
quotes.author: J.A. Shedd

quotes.quote: If the only prayer you said in your whole life was, "thank you," that would suffice.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Over and over I marvel at the blessings of my life: Each year has grown better than the last.
quotes.author: Lawrence Welk

quotes.quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relations.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Now is no time to think of what you do not have. Think of what you can do with what there is.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is one of my favorite days of the year because it reminds us to give thanks and to count our blessings. Suddenly, so many things become so little when we realize how blessed and lucky we are.
quotes.author: Joyce Giraud

quotes.quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: The unthankful heartâ€¦ discovers no mercies; but let the thankful heart sweep through the day and, as the magnet finds the iron, so it will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings!
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Remember God's bounty in the year. String the pearls of His favor. Hide the dark parts, except so far as they are breaking out in light! Give this one day to thanks, to joy, to gratitude!
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: A grateful heart is not only the greatest virtue, but the parent of all the other virtues.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: A sincere attitude of gratitude is a beatitude for secured altitudes. Appreciate what you have been given and you will be promoted higher.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: For each new morning with its light, for rest and shelter of the night, for health and food, for love and friends, for everything Thy goodness sends.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is lil wrapping a present and not giving it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The root of joy is gratefulness. It is not joy that makes us grateful; it is gratitude that makes us joyful.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: So once in every year we throng upon a day apart, to praise the Lord with feast and song in thankfulness of heart.
quotes.author: Arthur Guiterman

quotes.quote: To give thanks in solitude is enough. Thanksgiving has wings and goes where it must go. Your prayer knows much more about it than you do.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Pride slays thanksgiving, but a humble mind is the soil out of which thanks naturally grow. A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving dinners take eighteen hours to prepare. They are consumed in twelve minutes. Half-times take twelve minutes. This is not coincidence.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: If a fellow isn't thankful for what he's got, he isn't likely to be thankful for what he's going to get.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: I would rather be able to appreciate things I cannot have than to have things I am not able to appreciate.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Thou hast given so much to me, give one thing more, â€” a grateful heart; not thankful when it pleaseth me, as if Thy blessings had spare days, but such a heart whose pulse may be Thy praise.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: If you think about a Thanksgiving dinner, it's really like making a large chicken.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.quote: Forever on Thanksgiving Day the heart will find the pathway home.
quotes.author: Wilbur D. Nesbit

quotes.quote: As we pause to thank Him for the blessings of the past year, we must not forget to thank Him for the lessons we have learned through our difficult times. We are not to be thankful for just the pleasant, easy things, but ALL things.
quotes.author: Millie Stamm

quotes.quote: Let gratitude be the pillow upon which you kneel to say your nightly prayer. And let faith be the bridge you build to overcome evil and welcome good.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Got no check books, got no banks. Still I'd like to express my thanks â€” I got the sun in the morning and the moon at night
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: Small cheer and great welcome makes a merry feast.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Of all the griefs that harass the distrest, Sure the most bitter is a scornful jest.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Men who are offenders of street harassment and women who experience street harassment can walk by and feel something about it, because it's out there in the environment where the harassment actually happens. So it's a lot more powerful than an oil painting that's stuck in a gallery or under my bed or in my studio where only a couple of eyes are going to see it, as opposed to it being in an environment where it could possibly effect a change.
quotes.author: Tatyana Fazlalizadeh

quotes.quote: Harassment is one of puberty's darkest, most unreported rites of passage.
quotes.author: Rachel Simmons

quotes.quote: I think that online harassment has become so ubiquitous on the Internet that a lot of women do feel safer, whatever that means, in spaces where they know like people are not going to bother them in that kind of way.
quotes.author: Jessica Valenti

quotes.quote: But the issue of sexual harassment is not the end of it. There are other issues - political issues, gender issues - that people need to be educated about.
quotes.author: Anita Hill

quotes.quote: Coercion may prevent many transgressions; but it robs even actions which are legal of a part of their beauty. Freedom may lead to many transgressions, but it lends even to vices a less ignoble form.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm von Humboldt

quotes.quote: All too often, parents and kids struggle to find an empathetic ear when confronting bullying situation; these escalate and too often result in marginalization, on top of what may well be a daily gauntlet of harassment and abuse that is fundamentally torture.
quotes.author: Lee Hirsch

quotes.quote: There is no kind of harassment that a man may not inflict on a woman with impunity in civilized societies.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: It takes a certain kind of bravery and a certain kind of goodness to be able to not just put your destructive past behind you, but to continue to take harassment from society and from police for your past.
quotes.author: Tom Hayden

quotes.quote: Intimidation, harassment and violence have no place in a democracy.
quotes.author: Mo Ibrahim

quotes.quote: It is not poverty so much as pretence, that harasses a ruined man--the struggle between a proud mind and an empty purse.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Any action that is dictated by fear or by coercion of any kind ceases to be moral.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: All socialism involves slavery. That which fundamentally distinguishes the slave is that he labours under coercion to satisfy anothers desires.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: If you want to control someone, all you have to do is to make them feel afraid.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: In a fascist shift, reporters start to face more and more harassment, and they have to be more and more courageous simply in order to do their jobs.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: Coercion, after all, merely captures man. Freedom captivates him.
quotes.author: Robert McNamara

quotes.quote: Marriage: A legal or religious ceremony by which two persons of the opposite sex solemnly agree to harass and spy on each other for ninety-nine years, or until death do them join.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: I swore never to be silent whenever and wherever human beings endure suffering and humiliation. We must always take sides. Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim. Silence encourages the tormentor, never the tormented.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Harassment is about power---the undue exercise of power by a superior over a subordinate.
quotes.author: Michael Crichton

quotes.quote: Online harassment, especially gendered online harassment, is an epidemic. Women are being driven out; they're being driven offline. This isn't just in gaming. This is happening across the board online, especially with women who participate in or work in male-dominated industries.
quotes.author: Anita Sarkeesian

quotes.quote: Children should be able to live a life free from bullying and harassment and it is time that we all took a stand against this.
quotes.author: Katherine Jenkins

quotes.quote: The fact that women begin to avoid running for public office because of the harassment and sometimes even violence that they face as a hazard, it means that the world is being robbed of extraordinary leadership that women can bring to bear. And of course, if women as professionals begin to look at making career choices because they're looking at whether Am I going to be safe or not? You can imagine the missed opportunities that are out there for women.
quotes.author: Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka

quotes.quote: When bosses, leaders, and powerful men and women ignore or deny the accounts of harassment victims, they reinforce the idea that harassers are playing the game as they should and that the rest of us should fall in line.
quotes.author: Pramila Jayapal

quotes.quote: A compliment makes someone feel good about themselves. A catcall is harassment.
quotes.author: Laura Bates

quotes.quote: Stalking is an extension of harassment elevated to a level where it is causing disruption or physical threat to the person being harassed.
quotes.author: Mark Childress

quotes.quote: The liberal idea of tolerance is more and more a kind of intolerance. What it means is 'Leave me alone; don't harass me; I'm intolerant towards your over-proximity.
quotes.author: Slavoj Zizek

quotes.quote: We need to get rid of bullying. We need to get rid of abuse. We need to get rid of harassment. We need to get rid of the casting couch. Instead, we need to build the bench.
quotes.author: Nancy Dubuc

quotes.quote: Those children who are beaten will in turn give beatings, those who are intimidated will be intimidating, those who are humiliated will impose humiliation, and those whose souls are murdered will murder.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Sexual harassment at work... is it a problem for the self-employed?
quotes.author: Victoria Wood

quotes.quote: Beauty provokes harassment, the law says, but it looks through men's eyes when deciding what provokes it.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: We need to turn the question around to look at the harasser, not the target. We need to be sure that we can go out and look anyone who is a victim of harassment in the eye and say,' You do not have to remain silent anymore.'
quotes.author: Anita Hill

quotes.quote: The only women who don't believe that sexual harassment is a real problem in this country are women who have never been in the workplace.
quotes.author: Cynthia Heimel

quotes.quote: All you fine officials debauch the young girls who are afraid to lose their jobs: that's as old as Washington.
quotes.author: Christina Stead

quotes.quote: Sexual harassment on the job is not a problem for virtuous women.
quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.quote: I'm apologizing for the conduct that it was alleged that I did.
quotes.author: Robert Packwood

quotes.quote: The purpose of the suit is to harass and discourage rather than to win. The law can be used very easily to harass, and enough harassment on somebody who is simply on the thin edge anyway...will generally be sufficient to cause his professional decease. If possible, ruin him entirely.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: When a man talks dirty to a woman, it's sexual harassment. When a woman talks dirty to a man, it's $4.95 a minute.
quotes.author: Jim Shock

quotes.quote: Women who accuse men, particularly powerful men, of harassment, are often confronted with the reality of the men's sense that they are more important than women, as a group.
quotes.author: Anita Hill

quotes.quote: As if I didn't have enough troubles, here I am harassed by those that must have been known to the cavemen.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Do not harass your enemy, even if he seems weak, without first assessing his capabilities.
quotes.author: Tibetan Proverb

quotes.quote: If you let a bully intimidate you, he's going to do it again. You've got to stand up to these strong-arm tactics.
quotes.author: Charles Djou

quotes.quote: First, they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life, but define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey S. Firestone

quotes.quote: If your flirting strategy is indistinguishable from harassment, it's not everyone else that's the problem.
quotes.author: John Scalzi

quotes.quote: Harassment is nine-tenths of the law.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: If a woman is harassed, it is because she asked for it? She dressed for it? She walked for it? She spoke for it? I would like to challenge that.
quotes.author: Fatima Mohammed

quotes.quote: It is important to remember that blatant harassment of male workers by toxic female managers is also prevalent in the USA.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Harassing a person in the name of love or hate does not make any difference.
quotes.author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quotes.quote: It is generally found in health, safety, fraud, and harassment scandals that many people were aware of the abuses but stayed silent and did nothing.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: To even think of a woman with sexual intent without consent, is harassment!
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Most people die in improvised circumstances of harassment and confusion, whether in a hospital or out of it.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: We address the problems of so many Dutch citizens that are afraid to go out in their neighborhoods after 10 pm, who are afraid to send their children to school because of all the harassment they get from this parallel Islamic society. And people are not extreme in Holland.
quotes.author: Geert Wilders

quotes.quote: I am not your dog that you whistle for; I'm not a stray animal you call over, and I am not, I never have been, nor will I ever be, your 'baby'!
quotes.author: Joy Jennings

quotes.quote: If ever a fool utters all kinds of insults against you, The best bet is to not respond at all.
quotes.author: Miguel El Portugues

quotes.quote: What he labels sexual, she labels harassment.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Never give up, and be confident in what you do. There may be tough times, but the difficulties which you face will make you more determined to achieve your objectives and to win against all the odds.
quotes.author: Marta

quotes.quote: Hard days are the best because that's when champions are made.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Douglas

quotes.quote: One hard day of work proves you have heart. But day after day is what proves you have maturity and commitment.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: You have to remember that the hard days are what make you stronger. The bad days make you realize what a good day is. If you never had any bad days, you would never have that sense of accomplishment!
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.quote: Tough times are opportunities to prove to yourself that your mind is tougher than all challenges.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Tough times test your valor, persistence and ability to make decisions. They force you to fight for your dreams.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Tough times should serve only one purpose in your life; to teach you how to be tougher on the inside than your circumstances are on the outside.
quotes.author: DeWayne Owens

quotes.quote: Tough times are inevitable in life and in business. But how you compose yourself during those times defines your spirit and will define your future.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Tough times don't last always. Your hard times are there to shape you and develop your character. It causes you to become more aware of life and you develop an attitude of gratitude. Don't lose hope because it gets better.
quotes.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

quotes.quote: Hard times don't create heroes. It is during the hard times when the "hero" within us is revealed.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: Hard times build determination and inner strength. Through them we can also come to appreciate the uselessness of anger.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: We know that in tough times, cynicism is just another way to give up, and in the military, we consider cynicism or giving up simply as forms of cowardice.
quotes.author: Jim Mattis

quotes.quote: In prosperous times, the marginal workers get by. But in tough times, they get the shaft.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Once you've been through tough times, you can only become stronger.
quotes.author: Alesha Dixon

quotes.quote: After a hard day, choosing to do something to help you feel better - as opposed to staying in a bad mood - is a healthy skill.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: Tough times call for tough choices and pinching every penny.
quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

quotes.quote: Everybody has to deal with tough times. A gold medal doesn't make you immune to that. A skater is used to falling down and getting up again.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.quote: A lot of people don't see, when we lose and go through tough times, how upset and disappointed we are.
quotes.author: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain

quotes.quote: In tough times, we all hope for knights in shining armor, or the cavalry, to show up and effect change.
quotes.author: Dean Devlin

quotes.quote: There were hard days but I never felt sorry for myself.
quotes.author: Chris Bosh

quotes.quote: If you push through the hard days you can get through anything.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: At the end of every hard day, people find some reason to believe.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Sometimes a hard day's work is easier than a lot of things you can meet in life.
quotes.author: Chris LeDoux

quotes.quote: After a hard day, try to think of something good about it before you go to sleep - the result may surprise you.
quotes.author: John Avery

quotes.quote: Tough times teach trust.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: How we handle our tough times stays with us for a long time.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: In tough times, everyone has to take their share of the pain.
quotes.author: Theresa May

quotes.quote: You will go through tough times, it's about getting through them.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.quote: Going through tough times is a wonderful thing, and everybody should try it. Once.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: By sticking it out through tough times, people emerge from adversity with a stronger sense of efficacy.
quotes.author: Albert Bandura

quotes.quote: When tough times come, it is particularly important to offset them with much gentle softness. Be a pillow.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: There will be beautiful times and tough times, as such is life, but if your heart is in it, then it is worth it all the way.
quotes.author: Irena A. Hoffman

quotes.quote: Everyone experiences tough times, it is a measure of your determination and dedication how you deal with them and how you can come through them.
quotes.author: Lakshmi Mittal

quotes.quote: Hard times define one's character.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: Hard times produce your greatest gifts.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Hard times always lead to something great.
quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

quotes.quote: The hard times make a true friend afraid to ask.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Hard times always uncover the basic goodness and evil of the day.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Hard times fall upon everybody. Whatever it is, we're going to get out of it.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable.
quotes.author: Knute Nelson

quotes.quote: We all have to go through hard times. Tragedies. Those are given to us to see what we're going to do with them.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.quote: Hard times may have held you down, but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be increased.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Only during hard times do people come to understand how difficult it is to be master of their feelings and thoughts.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: If you can wear the hard times of your life as furrows on your brow, you can wear the good times as a twinkle in your eye.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: After a hard day scrambling to find your way around in the world, it's assuring to come home to a place you know. God can be equally familiar to you. With time you can learn where to go for nourishment, where to hide for protection , where to turn for guidance. Just as your earthly house is a place of refuge, so God's house is a place of peace.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Hard times don't create heroes. It is during the hard times when the 'hero' within us is revealed.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: Hard times may have held you down, but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be increased.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Hard times are sometimes blessings in disguise. We do have to suffer but in the end it makes us strong, better and wise.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: And hard times are good in their own way, too. Because the only way you can achieve true happiness is if you experience true sadness as well. It's all about light and shade. Balance.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Williams

quotes.quote: You may go through very difficult time. Where you feel like a failure but remember one thing, struggle and hard times are the most inspirational thing in the world.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Difficult times don't come your way just so you can survive them; God uses these times in your life to form and refine you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Every adversity, every failure, and every heartache, carries with it the seed of an equivalent or greater benefit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Hard times build determination and inner strength. Through them we can also come to appreciate the uselessness of anger.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Mero

quotes.quote: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: In the midst of these hard times it is our good healthand good sleep that are enjoyable.
quotes.author: Knute Nelson

quotes.quote: People need hard times and oppression to develop psychic muscles.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: I like to use the hard times of the past to motivate me today.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: Hard times make you bitter or make you more compassionate.
quotes.author: Jewel

quotes.quote: Confidence, courage and determined spirit are vital for surviving hard times.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Only during hard times do people come to understand how difficult it is to be master of their feelings and thoughts.
quotes.author: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

quotes.quote: Difficult times always create opportunities for you to experience more love in your life.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H Schuller

quotes.quote: Difficult times have helped me to understand better than before, how infinitely rich and beautiful life is in every way, and that so many things that one goes worrying about are of no importance whatsoever.
quotes.author: Zahid Abas

quotes.quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you are being positive and strong in difficult times half of your problems will be solved automatically.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash

quotes.quote: When things are bad, we take comfort in the thought that they could always get worse. And when they are, we find hope in the thought that things are so bad they have to get better.
quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.quote: Hard times sustain and strengthen others, inspiring them to strive toward personal growth.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: Going through challenging things can teach you a lot, and they also make you appreciate the times that aren't so challenging.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: Every struggle you had in your life shaped you into the person you are today. Be thankful for the hard times they can only make you stronger.
quotes.author: Anmol Andore

quotes.quote: Hard times may have put you down sometimes but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be wise and strong.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: No matter how hard it seems just keep going, don't quit because we only fail when we give up.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Those who make hostility a daily manner are often left in the lurch at difficult times.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Bad times, hard times, this is what people keep saying; but let us live well, and times shall be good. We are the times: Such as we are, such are the times.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: When you're already going through a rough patch of life; a slight wave from past thrash you down so gracefully that journey becomes an unending shore!
quotes.author: Monika Arora

quotes.quote: Hard days are the best because that's when champions are made.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Douglas

quotes.quote: In my experience, people who don't stick around during the hard times weren't worth having around anyway.
quotes.author: Kimberly Belle

quotes.quote: One small crack does not mean you are broken, it means that you were put to the test and you didn't fall apart.
quotes.author: Linda Poindexter

quotes.quote: Pain is your friend; it is your alie. Pain reminds you to finish the job and get the hell home. Pain tells you when you have been seriously wounded. And you know what the best thing about pain is? It tells you you're not dead yet!
quotes.author: G.I Jane

quotes.quote: You'll have bad times, but it'll always wake you up to the good stuff you weren't paying attention to.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: There's a lot of people out there who go through hard times, and they feel alone. They feel like nobody is there. But I'm in the same boat.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough reinvent.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: Hard times lifts the seeking souls to higher spiritual realms.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Hard Times Are Like a Washing Machine, They Twist,Turn and Knock Us Around, But In The End we Come OutCleaner, Brighter and Better Than Before
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hard times always lead to something great.
quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

quotes.quote: Hard times are moments of reflection.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to continually fear that you will make one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Born through hard times, Ghetto child of mine. I wonder if you have to suffer for your father's crimes.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Why worry? If you've done the very best you can, worrying won't make it any better.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: In difficult times, it's so hard to look around and to see what to be grateful for.
quotes.author: Alice Barrett

quotes.quote: Worrying does not empty tomorrow of its troubles, it empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Life will always be hard on you, but it doesn't mean you should give up.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: How do we handle unimaginable tragedy? What do we do when our worst nightmares come true? Instead of following conventional wisdom, Job fell down to the ground and worshiped ground.
quotes.author: Jeff Syverson

quotes.quote: When life changes itself to harder. Change yourself to stronger.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: In hard times, gold is a good friend and good friend is gold!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There are no hard times for good ideas.
quotes.author: Harry Gordon Selfridge

quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Write what you love. Love will hold you through the hard times and hold the world during the good times.
quotes.author: Mark Z Danielewski

quotes.quote: The world and everyone in it is always ready to blame a man for anything when he is already knocked down.
quotes.author: Therese May

quotes.quote: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be
quotes.author: Marcel Pagnol

quotes.quote: Even in hard times there's a possibility to have fun.
quotes.author: Eyden I

quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Hope is important because it can make the present moment less difficult to bear. If we believe that tomorrow will be better, we can bear a hardship today.”
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don’t pray when it rains if you don’t pray when the sun shines.
quotes.author: Leroy Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: It is only in our darkest hours that we may discover the true strength of the brilliant light within ourselves that can never, ever, be dimmed..
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness for it shows me the stars.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Just as despair can come to one only from other human beings, hope, too, can be given to one only by other human beings.
quotes.author: Elie Weisel

quotes.quote: In the midst of winter, I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Walked into hard times / Stepped into hard times / All of me is hard time / Welcome to hard times
quotes.author: Richard Melville Hall

quotes.quote: Through the hard times, people say that you gotta be strong / Through these hard times, people say you gotta keep going on
quotes.author: Eric Appapoulay

quotes.quote: Through the hard times, people try and kick you when you're down / Through these hard times, don't it always seem like there's never / anyone around to help you when you're strung out?
quotes.author: Eric Appapoulay

quotes.quote: Through these hard times people see what it's like for the poor / Through these hard times people really find out what it's like to be ignored
quotes.author: Eric Appapoulay

quotes.quote: It's been very hard / It's getting easier now / Hard times are over / Over for a while
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: All that I want / Is to wake up fine / Tell me that I'm alright / That I ain't gonna die
quotes.author: Taylor York

quotes.quote: All that I want / Is a hole in the ground / You can tell me when it's alright / For me to come out
quotes.author: Taylor York

quotes.quote: Hard times / Gonna make you wonder why you even try
quotes.author: Taylor York

quotes.quote: Hard times / Gonna take you down and laugh when you cry
quotes.author: Taylor York

quotes.quote: Many years you have lingered around my cabin door / Oh hard times come again no more
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Oh, hush a bye hard times go ye to rest / Cause my ragged baby wants a new ruffled dress
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Every day held a new surprise / I watched the hunger burning in my sister's eyes / The paste-board shack we called home / Would haunt me in my dreams / Cause there's nothing soft about hard times
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: We never knew anything groovy / A dime meant bread and not a movie
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: The muscles that controlled my smile were rarely ever used / Cause there's nothing soft about hard times
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Had to go 'cause I could see I wasn't meant for poverty / The family ties were broken soon and I went off to find the moon
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: So I sit on a bench in Jackson Square / I drink my wine and I breathe the midnight air / Tomorrow I'll just hit the street and bum another dime / Cause there's nothing soft about hard times
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: She asks me 'round to have a bite to eat / When I get there, she's invited the street / She gives me hard times, / But when she loves me, she loves me.
quotes.author: Peter Skellern

quotes.quote: She takes me home and slips on something cool / She let me kiss her where she don't as a rule / She gives me hard times / But when she loves me, she loves me.
quotes.author: Peter Skellern

quotes.quote: It isn't easy when you're making the scene / You either fit right in or fall in between / These are hard times for lovers
quotes.author: Neil Diamond

quotes.quote: Some people see it almost played like a game / The way it is today, it's kind of a shame / They're such hard times for lovers
quotes.author: Neil Diamond

quotes.quote: Can carry that weight / But I don't know how far / These are hard times / Truly hard times
quotes.author: Neil Diamond

quotes.quote: Hard times spreading just like the flu / Watch out homeboy, don't let it catch you
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: Prices go up, don't let your pocket go down / When you got short money you're stuck on the ground
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: Hard times are coming to your town / So stay alert, don't let them get you down
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: They tell you times are tough, you hear that times are hard / But when you work for that ace you know you pulled the right card
quotes.author: Joseph Simmons

quotes.quote: The hard times are dead and gone / But the hard times have made me strong
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Hard times have made me see / That the hard times ain't where I wanna be
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Well, I recall days in the city / And I think back, 'Oh what a pity' / Remembering how it wasn't pretty / Every day life in the city
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Out in the street we had to take it / With friends around, couldn't it / What wasn't there, we had to make it / Hanging out down in the city
quotes.author: Christopher Bridges

quotes.quote: Hard times / Blue and sad / Don't you cross the line / Run, run make it fun / Freeing up the time
quotes.author: Malcolm Mitchell

quotes.quote: Cause hard times they come and they go / Most of the time they're in the middle of the road / It's the same pain in different ways / Don't your know, Son, when it pours it rains
quotes.author: Ryan Bingham

quotes.quote: Let us pause in life's pleasures and count its many tears / While we all sup sorrow with the poor / There's a song that will linger forever in our ears / Oh, hard times, come again no more
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: Tis the song, the sigh of the weary / Hard times, hard times, come again no more / Many a days you have lingered around my cabin door / Oh, hard times, come again no more
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: While we seek mirth and beauty and music, light and gay / There are frail forms fainting at the door / Though their voices are silent, their pleading looks will say / Oh, hard times, come again no more
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: My mother told me / 'Fore she passed away / Said son when I'm gone / Don't forget to pray / Cause there'll be hard times / Lord those hard times / Who knows better than I?
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: Well I soon found out / Just what she meant / When I had to pawn my clothes / Just to pay the rent
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: I had a woman / Who was always around / But when I lost my money / She put me down
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: Same old sad eyed news man on my same old TV set/ Talking about our big depression but I ain't worried yet / About hard times, hard times
quotes.author: Gary Robert Rossington

quotes.quote: Fallen on hard times but it feels good to know / that milk and honey's just around the bend / Running on bad lines we'd better run as we go / Tear up, tear up the overdraft again.
quotes.author: Ian Anderson

quotes.quote: Looking for sunshine oh but it's black and it's cold / Yet, you say that milk and honey's just round the bend / Giving us a hard time, my friends / handing us the same line again.
quotes.author: Ian Anderson

quotes.quote: Have you ever felt / That your life is a wasting / Happiness beyond your reach / Sweet love has gone astray / Suddenly it's bitter / Hard times
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: When you're all alone / Nothing seems to matter / Sadness always fills the air / Hurts so deep inside / You just have to cry out / Wow, hard times
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Ain't a hard time been invented that I cannot handle.
quotes.author: Michael Mann

quotes.quote: I have a hard time with left and right. / And I have a hard time with right and wrong!
quotes.author: Amy Wolfram

quotes.quote: I think hard times are almost over. I think the country is going to get better. Until it does get better, I'll make a living here on Walton's Mountain.
quotes.author: The Waltons

quotes.quote: I deliver a hard day's work for my money. I just want the chance. It'll come. I believe in America. I follow the rules. Everybody's got their own hard times these days.
quotes.author: Ray Nelson

quotes.quote: Hard times can mean no money.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Hard times can mean no friends, no job, no hope.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Whatever you think, that you will be. If you think yourselves weak, weak you will be; if you think yourselves strong, strong you will be.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is hard. How do you hang on when things seem hopeless? You can tackle your problems as you would climb a mountain.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Through hard times. It puts your life into perspective. It will get you back on track.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Fruitful times are waiting those who are patient in the hard times.
quotes.author: Jonathan H. Wilson

quotes.quote: Those who desire good life never be in bed at the rising of the sun.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: You cannot beat hard time, but hard times bears fools and scatters their destiny.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: If you allow condition to get rid of you, you are not worthy of a good life.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: Do not fail in life, do not disappoint yourself, seek to know the hidden treasures of life; and you will live longer than your ancestors.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: When the bitterness of life covers a man, his sweet words become very bitter to his people.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: When things get really hard, people pray.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives never enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: You need resilience not just for the hard times. You need resilience if you're going to be happy.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: I just think, as women, we have to give ourselves room to be individuals. So when a woman makes a decision for herself, we as women shouldn't set those hardcore boundaries for another woman. Just like we don't want men setting hardcore boundaries for us.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: Never hide things from hardcore thinkers. They get more aggravated, more provoked by confusion than the most painful truths.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Finding a way to find humor in things that are hardcore is definitely something that, I think, the sitcom does best.
quotes.author: Megyn Price

quotes.quote: It is better to live in a world of poetic meaning rather than hardcore reality.
quotes.author: Mark Gonzales

quotes.quote: I'm not a religious person, so I'm not a hardcore fate fan but I guess it's got me thinking about that. I was very careful, though, not to link Jaye's stories always to that.
quotes.author: Carolyne Davhernas

quotes.quote: As far as what people will expect, I think people tend to read into things too much. Everybody's thinking that I'm hardcore, but that's an image.
quotes.author: Bobby Brown

quotes.quote: The more hardcore conservative you are, the more tightly identified you are with defending the interest of capital as an interest of the system based on hyper-competition, the more likely it is that you vehemently deny climate change. Because if climate change is real, your worldview will come crashing down around you.
quotes.author: Naomi Klein

quotes.quote: I'm quite curvy and I just try and exercise whenever I can. I don't do anything hardcore as I'm just not that dedicated.
quotes.author: Leona Lewis

quotes.quote: You may have thousands of lives to go between now and before you're a real hard-core seeker of enlightenment, hardcore meaning you just love it.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: You can be vegetarian and eat fish. Its your choice, just say: I am what I am. There are no hardcore divisions anymore.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: I have had a pretty hardcore crash course on living out of a suitcase. Some people take consistency in their lives for granted. When you have little to none, you discover it's kind of a nice thing.
quotes.author: Chet Faker

quotes.quote: Everyone and everything is at war, making my poetic expression hardcore.
quotes.author: Kris One

quotes.quote: You'll have bad times, but it'll always wake you up to the good stuff you weren't paying attention to.
quotes.author: Sean Maguire

quotes.quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: I'm full of fears and I do my best to avoid difficulties and any kind of complications. I like everything around me to be clear as crystal and completely calm.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: I just don't want to die without a few scars.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The pine stays green in winter, wisdom in hardship.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: The only thing that's the end of the world is the end of the world.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: In the midst of winter, I finally learned there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Enclose your heart in times of need with the steel of your determination and your strength. In doing this, all things will be bearable.
quotes.author: Lora Leigh

quotes.quote: Given a choice between grief and nothing, I'd choose grief.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Nothing is predestined. The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
quotes.author: Ralph H. Blum

quotes.quote: The real tragedy of the poor is the poverty of their aspirations.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: It was no hardship to me to spend long hours reading and writing.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: There is no success without hardship.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: For every dark night, there's a brighter day.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to fall apart because it is an opportunity to rebuild yourself the way you wish had been all along.
quotes.author: Rae Smith

quotes.quote: I know God will not give me anything I can't handle. I just wish that He didn't trust me so much.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: God tests His people through hardship.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: After great pain, a formal feeling comes. The Nerves sit ceremonious, like tombs.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's come, stop, come, stop. There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The very greatest things, great thoughts, discoveries, inventions have usually been nurtured in hardship, often pondered over in sorrow, and at length established with difficulty.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: If you can find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: What a weary time those years were, to have the desire and the need to live but not the ability.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Everybody's at war with different things. I'm at war with my own heart sometimes.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Your friends will believe in your potential, your enemies will make you live up to it.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: You can't run away from trouble. There ain't no place that far.
quotes.author: Uncle Remus

quotes.quote: The salvation of the world is in man's suffering.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: The robbed that smiles, steals something from the thief.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
quotes.author: Harry Golden

quotes.quote: Sometimes the issue isn't that your problems are so big, it's that you see yourself as being so small.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
quotes.author: Captain Jack Sparrow

quotes.quote: Life keeps throwing me curve balls and I don't even own a bat. At least my dodging skills are improving.
quotes.author: Jayleigh Cape

quotes.quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: It seems like every time you come up something happens to bring you back down.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: When you come out of the storm you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what this storm's all about.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Say not that this or that thing came to thwart you; it only came to test you.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode

quotes.quote: You have come into a hard world. I know of only one easy place in it, and that is the grave.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Hardship makes the world obscure.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: I shall come, not as one who has escaped pain, but as one who has glorified it.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode

quotes.quote: Fire tests gold, suffering tests brave men.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I think men, growing up, you have to go through some form of hardship. You've got to harden the metal.
quotes.author: Ice T.

quotes.quote: Don't know how I kept going. You just do. You have to, so you do.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wein

quotes.quote: To learn patience is not to rebel against every hardship.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: The healthy and strong individual is the one who asks for help when he needs it. Whether he's got an abscess on his knee or in his soul.
quotes.author: Rona Barrett

quotes.quote: What a weary time those years were -- to have the desire and the need to live but not the ability.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Did you hear about the rose that grew from a crack in the concrete? Proving nature's laws wrong, it learned to walk without having feet. Funny, it seems to by keeping it's dreams; it learned to breathe fresh air. Long live the rose that grew from concrete when no one else even cared.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.	If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Don't be too quick to draw conclusions from what happens to you; simply let it happen. Otherwise it will be too easy for you to look with blame... at your past, which naturally has a share with everything that now meets you.
quotes.author: Rainer Marie Rilke

quotes.quote: There are many who don't wish to sleep for fear of nightmares. Sadly, there are many who don't wish to wake for the same fear.
quotes.author: Richelle Goodrich

quotes.quote: When you leave home to follow your dreams, your road will probably be riddled with potholes, not always paved in happy Technicolor bricks. You'll probably be kicked to the ground 150 million times and told you're nuts by friends and strangers alike. As you progress you may feel lonely or terrified for your physical and emotional safety. You may overestimate your own capabilities or fail to live up to them, and you'll surely fall flat on your face once in a while.
quotes.author: Kelly Cutrone

quotes.quote: it is clear that we must trust what is difficult; everything alive trusts in it, everything in Nature grows and defends itself any way it can and is spontaneously itself, tries to be itself at all costs and against all opposition. We know little, but that we must trust in what is difficult is a certainty that will never abandon us; it is good to be solitary, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult must be one more reason for us to do it.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: It's easier to bleed than sweat
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: It's easier to bleed than sweat
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: It's easier to bleed than sweat
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor
