quotes.quote: No one is without troubles, without personal hardships and genuine challenges. That fact may not be obvious because most people don't advertise their woes and heartaches. But nobody, not even the purest heart, escapes life without suffering battle scars.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: To those who, in spite of everything, still choose goodness
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: It is more civilized to make fun of life than to bewail it
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Life has moments that feel as if the sun has blackened to tar and the entire world turned to ice.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Always do more than he expects of you, never less. Never flinch at any task or hardship. And above all, never shame the lord you serve.
quotes.author: Lora Leigh

quotes.quote: Easily mistaken, it is not about a love for adversity, it is about knowing a strength and a faith so great that adversity, in all its adverse manifestations, hardly even exists.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Explorers like to pretend that they are a select breed of people with iron nerve and an ability to endure terrible hardship.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: Only hardship softens the hardness of the human heart.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The worse the passage the more welcome the port.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: We need sometimes to escape into open solitudes, into aimlessness, into the moral holiday of running some pure hazard in order to sharpen the edge of life, to taste hardship, and to be compelled to work desperately for a moment at no matter what.”
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: With hope, we can endure any hardship.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I do not know anyone who has gotten to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but it will get you pretty near.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: If the power to do hard work is not a skill, it's the best possible substitute for it.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve some really big and interesting goals, you have to learn to fall in love with hard work.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: Hard work is painful when life is devoid of purpose. But when you live for something greater than yourself and the gratification of your own ego, then hard work becomes a labor of love.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote: Hard work pays off - hard work beats talent any day, but if you're talented and work hard, it's hard to be beat.
quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

quotes.quote: Hard work opens doors and shows the world that you are serious about being one of those rare - and special - human beings who use the fullness of their talents to do their very best.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If people knew how hard I had to work to gain my mastery, it would not seem so wonderful at all.
quotes.author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quotes.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. Work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: No one ever drowned in sweat.
quotes.author: U.S. Marine Corps

quotes.quote: Do not let your good ideas to spend your brain energy, do it with all the effort because the shadow of the success can become a reality only with hard work.
quotes.author: Isra

quotes.quote: You can't have a million dollar dream with a minimum wage work ethic.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.
quotes.author: J.G. Holland

quotes.quote: Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.
quotes.author: Edward H. Harriman

quotes.quote: I've got a theory that if you give 100 percent all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: Men are made stronger on realization that the helping hand they need is at the end of their own arm.
quotes.author: Sidney J. Phillips

quotes.quote: The person who is waiting for something to turn up might start with their shirt sleeves
quotes.author: Garth Henrichs

quotes.quote: There's nothing like biting off more than you can chew, and then chewing anyway.
quotes.author: Mark Burnett

quotes.quote: If you shoot for the stars and hit the moon, it's OK. But you've got to shoot for something. A lot of people don't even shoot.
quotes.author: Robert Townsend

quotes.quote: It takes struggle, a goal and enthusiasm to make a champion.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Hard work brings prosperity; playing around brings poverty.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Hard work is the yeast that raises the dough.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I believe in work, hard work, and long hours of work. Men do not breakdown from overwork, but from worry and dissipation.
quotes.author: Charles Evans Hughes

quotes.quote: The daily grind of hard work gets a person polished.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There are few things that you can't do as long as you are willing to apply yourself.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: There is no royal flower-strewn path to success. And if there is, I have not found it for if I have accomplished anything in life it is because I have been willing to work hard.
quotes.author: Madam C.J. Walker

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: Don't tell me how hard you work. Tell me how much you get done.
quotes.author: James Ling

quotes.quote: Initiative is key. Anybody who wants to be somebody is going to work as hard as they can to fulfill that dream.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The heights by great men reached and kept were not attained by sudden flight, but they while their companions slept, were toiling upward in the night
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: I don't wait for moods. You accomplish nothing if you do that. Your mind must know it has got to get down to work.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Hard work without talent is a shame, but talent without hard work is a tragedy.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: Hard work doesn't guarantee success, but improves its chances.
quotes.author: B. J. Gupta

quotes.quote: We forget that every good that is worth possessing must be paid for in strokes of daily effort. We postpone and postpone, until those smiling possibilities are dead.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: We all have a path to take; sometimes it's hidden under the weeds, so you might have to work a little.
quotes.author: Mike Dolan

quotes.quote: Look at a day when you are supremely satisfied at the end. It's not a day when you lounge around doing nothing; it's when you've had everything to do, and you've done it.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: I ride to fly.To feel. To touch. To breath.To laugh. To soar. To overcome. To relax. To belong. To feel strong. To heal. To love and be loved back. To communicate without words. I ride to live.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being a biker is more than riding a bike you feel it in your heart and in your soul.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Four wheels move the body. Two wheels move the soul.
quotes.author: Paul Payne

quotes.quote: Bikers and veterans go hand in hand and I can assure you that we never forget. That rumbling sound you hear when a group of bikes come together is not noise sir, it is the harmony of brotherhood coming together for a purpose and cause.
quotes.author: Crysta Baker

quotes.quote: The best bike is the one you're on, The best road is the one you're traveling, The best destination is wherever you're headed, The best time to get there is whenever you arrive.
quotes.author: Foster Kinn

quotes.quote: It's not what you ride, but that you ride. It's not how fast you go, it's about enjoying the ride. It's not when you started riding, but continuing to ride each day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'd rather be a rider for a minute than a spectator for a lifetime.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Riding a bike is like an art,something you do because feel something inside.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.quote: Young riders pick a destination and go... Old riders pick a direction and go.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bikes don't leak oil, they mark their territory.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Our Harley Days Our Rides... Our Adventures... Our Family and Friends... Traveling free and easy down a road that never ends...
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Life should not be a journey to the grave with the intention of arriving safely in a pretty and well preserved body, but rather to skid in broadside, in a cloud of smoke, thoroughly used up, totally worn out, and loudly proclaiming, Wow! What a Ride!
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: You can forget what you do for a living when your knees are in the breeze.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A motorcycle functions entirely in accordance with the laws of reason and a study of the art of motorcycle maintenance is really a miniature study of the art of rationality itself.
quotes.author: Robert A. Pirsig

quotes.quote: I don’t really feel like going for a ride today. Said no motorcycle rider ever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: They say life is a highway and we all travel our own roads, some good, some bad, yet each is a blessing of its own.
quotes.author: Jess "Chief" Brynjulson

quotes.quote: When Freedoms Live, We Ride; When We Ride, Freedoms Live.
quotes.author: Foster Kinn

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy for a day, drink. if you want to be happy for a year, marry. If you want to be happy for a lifetime, ride a motorcycle.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Work in Silence, Let your Harley Davidson make the noise.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No matter how bad your day is your bike will always make you feel better.
quotes.author: Unkwown

quotes.quote: Straight roads do not make skillful drivers.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Racing is life. Anything before or after is just waiting.
quotes.author: Steve Mcqueen

quotes.quote: The sun on your back. Two fists in the wind. And the horizon teasing you farther down a great road. We had longer ways to go. But no matter, the road is life.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: It's all about the journey, not the destination.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Wandering re-establishes the original harmony which once existed between man and the universe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Happiness is mental harmony; unhappiness is mental inharmony.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Harmony makes small things grow, lack of it makes great things decay.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: If you learn to make harmony with your past then there is no mountain you can't conquer in life.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: A successful work of art is not one which resolves contradictions in a spurious harmony, but one which expresses the idea of harmony negatively by embodying the contradictions, pure and uncompromised, in its innermost structure.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: The simplification of life is one of the steps to inner peace. A persistent simplification will create an inner and outer well-being that places harmony in one's life.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: You don't get harmony when everybody sings the same note.
quotes.author: Doug Floyd

quotes.quote: To create a vision of the harmony of the unequal, balance the infinite variety, the chaotic, the contradictions in a unity.
quotes.author: Hans Richter

quotes.quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Invisible harmony is better than visible.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Harmony is a beautiful balance between mind, body and soul measured in tender peaceful moments.
quotes.author: Melanie Koulouris

quotes.quote: A life in harmony with nature, the love of truth and virtue, will purge the eyes to understanding her text.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance and order and rhythm and harmony.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Harmony between two individuals is never granted-it has to be conquered indefinitely.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: The hidden harmony is better than the obvious.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Harmony is one phase of the law whose spiritual expression is love.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Harmony is something we must have with others, but it must start inside us first.
quotes.author: David DeNotaris

quotes.quote: Happiness exists on earth, and it is won through prudent exercise of reason, knowledge of the harmony of the universe, and constant practice of generosity.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: He who is in harmony with Nature hits the mark without effort and apprehends the truth without thinking.
quotes.author: Kongfuzi

quotes.quote: Real happiness consists of harmony between all the parts of your nature, such as feelings harmonizing with words, or thoughts harmonizing with actions.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: In studying ourselves, we find the harmony that is our total existence. We do not make harmony. We do not achieve it or gain it. It is there all the time.
quotes.author: Maezumi Roshi

quotes.quote: That center is the root of the universe; that harmony is the Tao, reaching out to all things. once we find the center and achieve harmony, heaven and earth take their proper places, and all things are fully nourished.
quotes.author: Zi Si

quotes.quote: Everyone shows harmony or disharmony according to how open he is to the music of the universe. The more he is open to all that is beautiful and harmonious, the more his life is tuned to that universal harmony, and the more he will show a friendly attitude to everyone he meets, his very atmosphere will create music around him.
quotes.author: Hazrat Khan

quotes.quote: The more we nurture ourselves, remove the masks and allow ourselves uncensored expression, the more the rhythms blend with those surrounding us. We create inner-outer harmony.
quotes.author: Barry Kaufman

quotes.quote: It is more difficult to restore harmony than sow dissension.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: What is important to a relationship is a harmony of emotional roles and not too great in disparity in the general level of intelligence.
quotes.author: Mirra Komarovsky

quotes.quote: millions of humans on earth survived in harmony with Sunlight, / thoroughly dependant on the first rays of dawn to start work, / and pitch dark beams of the night to fall in a sedative trance, / a blissfully refreshing, celestial sleep.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Through aural, emotional, and visual means / one is satisfied, appeased, entertained, and convinced, / That perceived complexities never go unobserved / and mingle in exquisite accord.
quotes.author: Lena Smith Carter

quotes.quote: Love and harmony combine, / And round our souls entwine / While thy branches mix with mine, / And our roots together join.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Like justice to all, / United we cannot fall. / Together with nature, family, and me, / We will live in harmony.
quotes.author: Alysa Hubiak

quotes.quote: I believe it's gonna be / When everybody here can sing along / Singin' in harmony / Stand on up, say the word / Together, all of our voices can be heard / Everybody knows the key / To livin' in harmony.
quotes.author: Clint Patrick Black

quotes.quote: Harmony! Harmony! /Let's all join in harmony / Sing of love, and brotherhood / And people doing what they should
quotes.author: Gary Kenneth Whelan

quotes.quote: The trick is to yield to what our will demand from us, to be in harmony with ourselves by desiring to become who already are.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: Women think of all colors except the absence of color. I have said that black has it all. White too. Their beauty is absolute. It is perfect harmony.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A choir is made up of many voices, including yours and mine. If one by one all go silent then all that will be left are the soloists. Don’t let a loud few determine the nature of the sound. It makes for poor harmony and diminishes the song.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: But what is happiness except for the simple harmony between a man and the life he leads?
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: When we feel, a kind of lyric is sung in our hearts. When we think, a kind of music is played in our mind. In harmony, both create a beautiful symphony of life.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: One must marry one’s feelings to one’s beliefs and ideas. That is probably the only way to achieve a measure of harmony in one’s life.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Harmony is pure love, for love is a concerto.
quotes.author: Lope de Vega

quotes.quote: We don't get harmony when everybody sings the same note. Only notes that are different can harmonize. The same is true with people.
quotes.author: Steve Goodier

quotes.quote: Compromise brings harmony to both, happiness to none.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: To put everything in balance is good, to put everything in harmony is better.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Harmony can not thrive in a climate of mistrust, cheating, bullying; mean-spirited competition.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Harmony with land is like harmony with a friend; you cannot cherish his right hand and chop off his left.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Thus then a single harmony orders the composition of the whole...by the mingling of the most contrary principles.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The perfect harmony of body and mind is my key to personal balance and happiness.
quotes.author: Gabriela Sabatini

quotes.quote: Harsh words live in the dungeon of the heart.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Harsh reality is always better than false hope.
quotes.author: Julian Fellowes

quotes.quote: Sometimes the harshest lessons were the most valuable.
quotes.author: S.M. Stirling

quotes.quote: Harshness is for the good of a boy, soft-heartedness will ruin him.
quotes.author: Ihara Saikaku

quotes.quote: Do not say anything harsh: what you have said will be said back to you.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Love in action is a harsh and dreadful thing compared to love in dreams.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: There is no harsher means of punishment, than to answer malice with kindness.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Don't judge anyone harshly until you yourself have been through his experiences
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Do not judge yourself harshly. Without mercy for ourselves we cannot love the world.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: If you find yourself under lethal attack don't be kind. Be harsh. Be tough. Be ruthless.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: Harsh counsels have no effect; they are like hammers, which are always repulsed by the anvil.
quotes.author: Claude Adrien Helvetius

quotes.quote: The harshest tyranny is that which acts under the protection of legality and the banner of justice.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: We set up harsh and unkind rules against ourselves. No one is born without faults. That man is best who has fewest.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Certain souls may seem harsh to others, but it is just a way, beknownst only to them, of caring and feeling more deeply.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Your harshest critic is always going to be yourself. Don't ignore that critic but don't give it more attention than it deserves.
quotes.author: Michael Ian Black

quotes.quote: The harshness and choice of words can cut deeply. Republicans need to show compassion and to be reasonable when talking to any ethnic group.
quotes.author: Henry Bonilla

quotes.quote: Do not speak harshly to any one; those who are spoken to will answer thee in the same way. Angry speech is painful: blows for blows will touch thee.
quotes.author: The Dhammapada

quotes.quote: There are many harsh lessons to be learned from the gambling experience, but the harshest one of all is the difference between having Fun and being smart.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Be harsh with yourself at times.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: It's the intent, not the word, that makes something harsh.
quotes.author: Lisa McMann

quotes.quote: In the harsh face of life faith can read a bracing gospel.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: There's a harsh reality - nothing lasts forever. You have to be ready to grow, and grow fast.
quotes.author: Pras Michel

quotes.quote: It is harsh enough for each man to bear his own wound. But he who leads bears the wounds of all who follow him.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: I'm sorry if this sounds harsh or surprises anyone, but this is where we are. If you want the outcome to be different, you will have to do something about it.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: We cast away priceless time in dreams, born of imagination, fed upon illusion, and put to death by reality.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: There's a harsh reality - nothing lasts forever. You have to be ready to grow, and grow fast.
quotes.author: Pras Michel

quotes.quote: Running is a road to self-awareness and reliance-you can push yourself to extremes and learn the harsh reality of your physical and mental limitations or coast quietly down a solitary path watching the earth spin beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Doris Brown Heritage

quotes.quote: Life will take its toll on all of us. We get injured, we get old. It's really sad to try to run away from these harsh realities of life. Looks are not everything. I am not going to look beautiful all the time.
quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quotes.quote: Life being full of harsh realities, we seek relief from them in a variety of pleasing delusions.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: And what's wrong with dimming the harsh reality of life a little, anyway? In essence, being alive is a bloody long and hard walk to death. Why not make it as pleasant along the way as you can?
quotes.author: Lucinda Riley

quotes.quote: As we age we begin to grasp at youthful bliss like a life raft in a sea of harsh reality.
quotes.author: Brad Herzog

quotes.quote: Cocooning: The need to protect oneself from the harsh, unpredictable realities of the outside world.
quotes.author: Faith Popcorn

quotes.quote: Reality is harsh. It can be cruel and ugly. Yet no matter how much we grieve over our environment and circumstances nothing will change. What is important is not to be defeated to forge ahead bravely. If we do this a path will open before us.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Hurricane Katrina exposed the harsh reality that we have been skating on thin ice when it comes to this country's energy concentrations on the Gulf Coast.
quotes.author: Pete Domenici

quotes.quote: As I observe my daily life and that of others, I have come to the conclusion that genuine joy is a potent mixture of harsh reality, and the realization that life can be funny.
quotes.author: Tone Bell

quotes.quote: There are those who believe that a new modernity demands a new morality. What they fail to consider is the harsh reality that there is no such thing as a new morality. There is only one morality . All else is immorality.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Mixing humour and harsh reality is a very human behaviour, it's the way people stay sane in their daily lives.
quotes.author: Jorge Garcia

quotes.quote: The harsh reality is that my flesh must die not so much because of what it does, but because of what it is.
quotes.author: Kelly Minter

quotes.quote: The work-life balance is a harsh reality for so many women, who are forced every day to make impossible choices. Do they take their kids to the doctor ... and risk getting fired? Do they work weekends so they can afford to send their kids to better childcare ... even though it means even less time with their families? Do they take another shift at work, so they can pay for piano lessons for their kids ... even though it means they have to stop volunteering for the PTA? It just shouldn't be this difficult to raise healthy families.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Experiences with their many echoes and their billows stand higher in his estimation than life with its tasks; for tasks always establish a bond with harsh reality. And from this he is in flight. He does not want to struggles against fate, but rather to receive it with an ardent and devout soul; he does not want to wrestle for the blessing, but to experience it, abandoning himself, devoid of will, to what spells salvation and bliss.
quotes.author: Leo Baeck

quotes.quote: In life man commits himself and draws his own portrait, outside of which there is nothing. No doubt this thought may seem harsh to someone who has not made a success of his life. But on the other hand, it helps people to understand that reality alone counts, and that dreams, expectations and hopes only serve to define a man as a broken dream, aborted hopes, and futile expectations.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: You can have the best intentions in the world, but if you do nothing, you are nothing. It is a harsh glare to shed that kind of light, but in my heart that is pure reality for me. How does the quote go? 'Evil triumphs when good men do nothing.' This is the downside to the longevity of sloth. It is an exit on a highway that leads to the worst parts of town.
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.quote: 9/10 startups fail, which is a harsh reality in the world of entrepreneurship. However, I believe that such a high number of startups fail because they do not take the right steps necessary when building their business. The biggest challenge people have is building something that their target audience or niche really wants.
quotes.author: Jeet Banerjee

quotes.quote: Graduates leave university and can't find a job. Old people reach retirement and have almost nothing to live on. Grown-ups have no time to dream, struggling from nine to five to support their families and pay for their children's education, always bumping up against the thing we all know as harsh reality.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: We build this false atmosphere. When it's over and the harsh reality sets in, that's the real joke we play on people ... Everybody wants to experience that superlative moment, and being an athlete can give you that. It's Camelot for them. But there's even life after it.
quotes.author: H. G. Bissinger

quotes.quote: The hurt means you're alive. It means your body is reacting and willing to fight - both to fight back and fight through it. So rather than running from grief's harsh reality, you may find that in letting it groan and pierce and ache and cry, you begin to exhaust some of its staying power. You expose its secret hiding places. You force it into the open air where it can be more easily outlined and dealt with.
quotes.author: Frank Page

quotes.quote: The trapdoor beneath our feet swings open. We find ourselves in bottomless free fall. We are lost in a great darkness, and there's no one to send out a search party. Given so harsh a reality, of course we're tempted to shut our eyes and pretend that we're safe and snug at home, that the fall is only a bad dream.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Youthful vigor becomes more rot than wisdom. Hopeful optimism is battered by harsh reality. Health and understanding seem to intersect in one's forties, the one peaking as the other begins its slow ascent. Maybe you'll know one day what you should've taken the time to appreciate. Maybe it'll be when your knees start popping, when your hands no longer work like they should. It probably won't be any sooner.
quotes.author: Hugh Howey

quotes.quote: I cannot, will not, withhold from my young readers the harsh realities of human hunger and suffering and loss, but neither will I neglect to plant that stubborn seed of hope that has enabled our race to outlast wars and famines and the destruction of death.
quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

quotes.quote: You can choose daily to brace up and face the harsh realities of life . . . Or while away the days that come by daydreaming . . . Better still, you can make your dreams your realities.
quotes.author: Ufuoma Apoki

quotes.quote: She was right that reality can be harsh and that you shut your eyes to it only at your peril because if you do not face up to the enemy in all his dark power, then the enemy will come up from behind some dark day and destoy you while you are facing the other way.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: Our stereotyping societies force us to feel more alone. They stamp masks on us and isolate out real selves. We all live in two worlds: the old comfortable man-centred world of absolutes and the harsh real world of relatives. The latter, the relativity reality, terrifies us; and isolates and dwarfs us all.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Everyone praises Harvard 'for the students.' But what makes Harvard's students so great is that they are, in many ways, a cross-section of the larger world. They are normal people who happen to be excellent, and this sets them apart. People who go to Yale go because they want to attend Yale. People who go to Harvard go because they can.
quotes.author: Alexandra Petri

quotes.quote: I went into Harvard one way and came out a different person... It's the air at Harvard; it's like a Renaissance court.
quotes.author: Erich Segal

quotes.quote: There's a rule they don't teach you at the Harvard Business School. It is, if anything is worth doing, it's worth doing to excess.
quotes.author: Edwin H. Land

quotes.quote: I am obliged to confess I should sooner live in a society governed by the first two thousand names in the Boston telephone directory than in a society governed by the two thousand faculty members of Harvard University.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.quote: I can always tell if someone's from Harvard because they trot out their vitae. I would die at Harvard.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: If Moses had gone to Harvard Law School and spent three years working on the Hill, he would have written the Ten Commandments with three exceptions and a saving clause.
quotes.author: Charles Morgan

quotes.quote: What's a good metaphor for a Harvard student? A talking, gold-plated pile of manure, wearing a fleece.
quotes.author: David Fahrenthold

quotes.quote: Harvard was an extraordinary window on the world.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: A Harvard education consists of what you learn at Harvard while you are not studying.
quotes.author: James Bryant Conant

quotes.quote: Harvard University, according to the directory of the American Society of Colleges and Universities, is a 'type of weevil.'
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I'd say Harvard graduates leave here with a sense of the possible and the limit - and a sense that there are no limits to what humans can do and that you can always be pushing, whatever limit you think might be there.
quotes.author: Drew Gilpin Faust

quotes.quote: At Harvard, you don't major. You concentrate.
quotes.author: Gram Parsons

quotes.quote: Would physics at Geneva be as good as physics at Harvard? I think not. Rome? I think not. In Britain, I don't think there is one place, neither Cambridge nor Oxford, which can compare with Harvard.
quotes.author: Sheldon Lee Glashow

quotes.quote: Four years was enough of Harvard. I still had a lot to learn, but had been given the liberating notion that now I could teach myself.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: I’m not the woman president of Harvard, I’m the president of Harvard.
quotes.author: Drew Gilpin Faust

quotes.quote: You are sadly mistaken if you view a Harvard education as primarily a gold-edged certificate to success.
quotes.author: John U. Munro

quotes.quote: Harvard makes mistakes too, you know. Kissinger taught there.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Here [at Harvard], if we are doing our job, you will be led to an intellectual abyss.
quotes.author: Raphael Demos

quotes.quote: I want to make as much of a contribution as I can, to Harvard, to higher education and hopefully, to education around the world.
quotes.author: Jim Breyer

quotes.quote: I know of no title that I deem more honorable than that of Professor of the Harvard Law School.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: At Harvard, people like to impart the idea that you are a mover and shaker.
quotes.author: Alexandra Petri

quotes.quote: In truth, I did enjoy the benefits of a Harvard connection.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: That said, there are a few clear factors that determine the potential of a university to reach the highest levels of excellence. In the case of Harvard University, it was true that by the time of its tercentenary (300th anniversary of its founding) in 1936, Harvard had already achieved a reputation as a world-class institution. Harvard did not have the stature that it does today.
quotes.author: Henry Rosovsky

quotes.quote: I too turned to Webster's Dictionary and it defined Harvard University as a season for gathering crops.
quotes.author: Andy Samberg

quotes.quote: I'm an ambitious person, and Harvard makes me feel successful, just having gotten in here. That's the ugly side of why I'm proud of being at Harvard Law School. Another reason is because there's a spirit of serious intellectual endeavor here.
quotes.author: Scott Turow

quotes.quote: The Harvard Law states: Under controlled conditions of light, temperature, humidity, and nutrition, the organism will do as it damn well pleases.
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: It might be said now that I have the best of both worlds. A Harvard education and a Yale degree.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Harvard is the home of American ideas.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: I picked Harvard because it was in a big city, and a lot of girls' schools were nearby. And I liked President Kennedy, who went to Harvard.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: If you're last in your class at Harvard, it doesn't feel like you're a good student, even though you really are. It's not smart for everyone to want to go to a great school.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: I teach at Harvard that the world and the heavens, and the stars are all real, but not so damned real, you see.
quotes.author: Josiah Royce

quotes.quote: A rich poet from Harvard has no sense in his mind, except the aesthetic.
quotes.author: Beatrice Wood

quotes.quote: We’ve all started lifelong friendships here, and some of us even families. That’s why I’m so grateful to this place. Thanks, Harvard.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: Not even a Harvard School of Business can make greed into a science.
quotes.author: W.E.B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: Part of being a big winner is the ability to be a big loser. There is no paradox involved. It is a distinctly Harvard thing to be able to turn any defeat into victory.
quotes.author: Erich Segal

quotes.quote: Every Harvard class should have one Democrat to rescue it from oblivion
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Harvard produces leaders. People with Harvard degrees go on to become administrators in high-level positions in state educational departments and in public schools around the country.
quotes.author: Christina Hoff Sommers

quotes.quote: Harvard was a kind of luxurious afternoon.
quotes.author: Lincoln Kirstein

quotes.quote: The truth of the matter is, you die, all you do is die, and yet you live, yes you live, and that's no Harvard lie.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: The only thing I ever learned was that some people are lucky and other people aren't and not even a graduate of the Harvard Business School can say why.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: I don't believe I'll ever get credit for anything I do in foreign affairs, no matter how successful it is, because I didn't go to Harvard.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: We're doomed to repeat the past no matter what. That's what it is to be alive. It's pretty dense kids who haven't figured that out by the time they're ten.... Most kids can't afford to go to Harvard and be misinformed.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: If I am not elected, I imagine that I will ask Harvard to let me back.
quotes.author: Michael Ignatieff

quotes.quote: Harvard has now de facto become a Chinese outpost.
quotes.author: Thorsten J. Pattberg

quotes.quote: A whale ship was my Yale College and my Harvard.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Your character is the harvest of your habits.
quotes.author: Adrian Rogers

quotes.quote: Every thought is a seed. If you plant crab apples, don’t count on harvesting golden delicious.
quotes.author: Bill Meyer

quotes.quote: Love is to the heart what the summer is to the farmer's year. It brings to harvest all the loveliest flowers of the soul.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I don't do much more than organise other people's ideas and insights and thoughts, and sort of harvest them, and inventory them and present them.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The sower of the seed is assuredly the author of the whole harvest of mischief.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Earth is here so kind, that just tickle her with a hoe and she laughs with a harvest.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: And thus of all my harvest-hope I have Nought reaped but a weedy crop of care.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: For man, autumn is a time of harvest, of gathering together. For nature, it is a time of sowing, of scattering abroad.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: When so rich a harvest is before us, why do we not gather it? All is in our hands if we will but use it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ann Seton

quotes.quote: Talk unbelief, and you will have unbelief; but talk faith, and you will have faith. According to the seed sown will be the harvest.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: The harvest of this world is to the resolute, and he that is infirm of purpose is ground betwixt the upper and the nether millstone.
quotes.author: Eric Rucker Eddison

quotes.quote: For believe me: The secret for harvesting from existence the greatest fruitfulness and greatest enjoyment is to live dangerously.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
quotes.author: Galatians 6:9

quotes.quote: Let us, therefore, not be weary of well-doing; for we shall reap an eternal harvest of comfort, if we faint not.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.quote: There must be labor, incessant and constant, if there is to be a harvest.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: The true harvest of my life is intangible - a little star dust caught, a portion of the rainbow I have clutched.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The seeds of freedom which are ever rejuvenescent in themselves, have now been scattered where despotism and tyranny ranked and ruled, will be watered by the enlivening dews of God's clemency, till the reapers abolitionists shall shout the harvest home.
quotes.author: Henry McNeal Turner

quotes.quote: The greatest form of maturity is at harvest time. This is when we must learn how to reap without complaint if the amounts are small and how to reap without apology if the amounts are big.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Don't be so shortsighted and so ingrown that if it doesn't happen right now, you're not going to be happy. No, you are sowing seeds that will reap a great harvest for generations to come.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: That a lawsuit is a suit for life. He that sows his grain upon marble will have many a hungry belly before his harvest.
quotes.author: John Arbuthnot

quotes.quote: The zest of life lies in right doing, not in the garnered harvest.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: When the sappy boughs Attire themselves with blooms, sweet rudiments Of future harvest.
quotes.author: John Phillips

quotes.quote: I grew up on a farm. We learned that there was a season to plant, a season to water, and season to harvest. The planting and watering could be laborious, but without those stages there would never be a harvest.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Happiness is the harvest of a quiet mind. Anchor your thoughts on peace, poise, security and divine guidance and your mind will be productive of happiness.
quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

quotes.quote: Autumn is the harvest of greedy death.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Who would have guessed it possible that waiting is sustainable. A place with its own harvest.
quotes.author: Kay Ryan

quotes.quote: You should first follow the plow if you want to dance the harvest jig.
quotes.author: Ken Follett

quotes.quote: Care less for your harvest than for how it is shared and your life will have meaning and your heart will have peace.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: Repentance and yearning, and yearning and repentance: this is the total harvest of life.
quotes.author: Khurram Murad

quotes.quote: Our God of Grace often gives us a second chance, but there is no second chance to harvest a ripe crop.
quotes.author: Kurt Von Schleicher

quotes.quote: The year goes wrong, and tares grow strong, Hope starves without a crumb; But God's time is our harvest time, And that is sure to come.
quotes.author: Lewis J. Bates

quotes.quote: If we want to reap the harvest of peace and justice in the future, we will have to sow seeds of nonviolence, here and now, in the present.
quotes.author: Mairead Corrigan

quotes.quote: Nature herself does not distinguish between what seed it receives. It grows whatever seed is planted; this is the way life works. Be mindful of the seeds you plant today, as they will become the crop you harvest.
quotes.author: Mary Morrissey

quotes.quote: It is like the seed put in the soil - the more one sows, the greater the harvest.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up. Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all people, especially to those who belong to the family of believers.
quotes.author: Paul the Apostle

quotes.quote: When we postpone the harvest, the fruit rots, but when we postpone our problems, they keep on growing.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: He who sows, even with tears, the precious seed of faith, hope, and love, shall doubtless come again with joy, bring his sheaves with him, because it is in the very nature of that seed, to yield, under the kindly influence secured to it, a joyful harvest.
quotes.author: Richard Cecil

quotes.quote: The strength of opening manhood is never so well employed, as, after the example of our Apostle himself, in practising subserviency to God's revealed will, and in triumphing over its spiritual enemies: it lends a grace and a beauty to religion, and produces an abundant harvest of good works and of glory to God.
quotes.author: Richard Mant

quotes.quote: To plow is to pray; To plant is to prophesy, and the harvest answers and fulfills.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Even in the business of corporations honesty is the best policy, and the companies that have acted in accordance with the highest standard, other things being equal, have reaped the richest harvest.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: I consider the success of my day based on the seeds I sow, not the harvest I reap.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The farmer has patience and trusts the process. He just has the faith and deep understanding that through his daily efforts, the harvest will come.And then one day, almost out of nowhere, it does.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Every tree, every growing thing as it grows, says THIS truth, you harvest what you sow. With life as short as a half-taken breath, don't plant anything but love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Autumn that year painted the countryside in vivid shades of scarlet, saffron and russet, and the days were clear and crisp under harvest skies.
quotes.author: Sharon Kay Penman

quotes.quote: Private victories precede public victories. You can't invert that process any more than you can harvest a crop before you plant it.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The only thing that endures over time is the 'Law of the Farm.' You must prepare the ground, plant the seed, cultivate, and water if you expect to reap the harvest.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The harvest is plentiful but the laborers are few.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Now is the accepted time, not tomorrow, not some more convenient season. It is today that our best work can be done and not some future day or future year. It is today that we fit ourselves for the greater usefulness of tomorrow. Today is the seed time, now are the hours of work, and tomorrow comes the harvest and the playtime.
quotes.author: W.E.B Du Bois

quotes.quote: The heritage of the past is the seed that brings forth the harvest of the future.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: Prayer is the only adequate way to multiply our efforts fast enough to reap the harvest God desires.
quotes.author: Wesley L Duewel

quotes.quote: Don't envy the harvest of the rich. Envy their planting.
quotes.author: Bo Sanchez

quotes.quote: It is only the farmer who faithfully plants seeds in the Spring, who reaps a harvest in the Autumn.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: We reap what we sow. Choose what you nourish carefully.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: One cannot collect all the beautiful shells on the beach. One can collect only a few, and they are more beautiful if they are few.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Every season has an end~for a harvest to begin. Embrace the process!
quotes.author: Prophetess Dina Rolle

quotes.quote: What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Honor the hands that harvest your crops.
quotes.author: Dolores Huerta

quotes.quote: Only the people who are working the victory by faith will experience the joy of harvest.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Happiness is the harvest of a quiet eye.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: It is not always granted to the sower to see the harvest.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Your thoughts are seeds, and the harvest you reap will depend on the seeds you plant.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: No one ever sowed the grain of generosity who gathered not up the harvest of the desire of his heart.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: The reaper does not listen to the harvest.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The harvest of old age is the recollection and abundance of blessing previously secured.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: When it is time to sow, sow and when it is time to harvest, you will harvest. Obey this rule.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Our task is to harvest from the mortal world fruits for the immortal.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: With every deed you are sowing a seed, though the harvest you may not see.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: While there may be many things in life you wish to harvest not every seed you plant will grow.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: We must give more in order to get more. It is the generous giving of ourselves that produces the generous harvest.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: You must give to get, You must sow the seed, before you can reap the harvest.
quotes.author: Scott Reed

quotes.quote: Your attitudes, action, reactions and expectations are harboured in the power of your thoughts. Think positively and you will smile at the harvest time.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Keep expecting and believing that your due season is coming. Declare that the good you have harvested in your life will manifest.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Harvest is a joyful time of gathering the produce of the land.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Do not measure success by today's harvest. Measure success by the seeds you plant today.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: You reap what you sow: Life is like a boomerang. Our thoughts, deeds and words return to us sooner or later, with astounding accuracy.
quotes.author: Grant M. Bright

quotes.quote: The day of fortune is like a harvest day, We must be busy when the corn is ripe.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: For no matter what the world, men who deal in headwear are men to be trusted above any other.
quotes.author: Frank Beddor

quotes.quote: Why should anyone be frightened by a hat?
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Some people’s heads are like their hats; it appears that just like hanging their hats they hang their heads somewhere and walk without them!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A real Bond girl wears so many skill hats...costumes are more like casual-chic code!
quotes.author: Tracey Bond

quotes.quote: Seems hats have been on top of all the stages comings and goings. Helping us remember heroes and idols.
quotes.author: Richard L. Ratliff

quotes.quote: A crown is merely a hat that lets the rain in.
quotes.author: Frederick The Great

quotes.quote: A person carries off the hat. Hats are about emotion. It is all about how it makes you feel.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.quote: Wearing a hat is fun; people have a good time when they're wearing a hat.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.quote: The personality of the wearer and the hat makes the hat.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.quote: People, when they buy a hat, they can't explain why they want to buy it or why they want it, but they do. It's like chocolate.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.quote: A hat should be taken off when you greet a lady and left off for the rest of your life. Nothing looks more stupid than a hat.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Some hats can only be worn if you're willing to be jaunty, to set them at an angle and to walk beneath them with a spring in your stride as if you're only a step away from dancing. They demand a lot of you.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: it wasn't the wearing of the hat that counted so much as having one to wear. Every trade, every craft had its hat.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: How a hat makes you feel is what a hat is all about.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.quote: And all your future lies beneath your hat.
quotes.author: John Oldham

quotes.quote: There's a technicality to designing and wearing hats. A hat is balancing the proportions of your face; it's like architecture or mathematics.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.quote: The success of a hat definitely lies with balancing the personality of the wearer with the type of occasion. Don't listen to those rules about face shape.
quotes.author: Philip Treacy

quotes.quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: From the deepest desires often come the deadliest hate.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Hating people is like burning down your own house to get rid of a rat.
quotes.author: Henry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Hate must make a man productive. Otherwise one might as well love.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: All men kill the thing they hate, too, unless, of course, it kills them first.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Hate cages all the good things about you.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The price of hating other human beings is loving oneself less.
quotes.author: Eldridge Cleaver

quotes.quote: Hate is like water in a dry gulch. The longer it runs, the deeper it digs.
quotes.author: Ken Alstad

quotes.quote: Hate destroys the very structure of the personality of the hater.... when you start hating anybody, it destroys the very center of your creative response to life and the universe; so love everybody.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: We hate some persons because we do not know them; and will not know them because we hate them.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself. What isn't part of ourselves doesn't disturb us.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: I imagine one of the reasons people cling to their hates so stubbornly is because they sense, once hate is gone, they will be forced to deal with pain.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: I think that hate is a thing, a feeling, that can only exist where there is no understanding.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: No one is born hating another person because of the colour of his skin, or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: That feelings of love and hate make rational judgments impossible in public affairs, as in private affairs, we can clearly enough see in others, though not so clearly in ourselves.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Hate is like a swordfish, working through water invisibly and then you see it coming with blood along its blade, but transparency disarms it.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity or registering wrongs.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Hatred is a cold fire, and it gives no warmth.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Blunted unto goodness is the heart which anger never stirreth, but that which hatred swelleth, is keen to carve out evil.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: The worst enemy is one whose doctrines are founded in hate and are thus beyond debate.
quotes.author: Tobsha Learner

quotes.quote: Hatred is like fire--it makes even light rubbish deadly.
quotes.author: George Elliot

quotes.quote: It is easier to hate those we love, than love those whom we have hated.
quotes.author: Norman MacDonald Maxims

quotes.quote: Hate is the consequence of fear; we fear something before we hate; a child who fears noises becomes the man who hates them.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: We have just enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love one another.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: You never really hate anyone as much as someone you cared about once.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Hate is a bottomless cup; I will pour and pour.
quotes.author: Euripedes

quotes.quote: Others may hate you. But those who hate you don't win, unless you hate them. And then, you destroy yourself.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: Dislike what deserves it, but never hate: for that is of the nature of malice; which is almost ever to persons, not things, and is one of the blackest qualities sin begets in the soul.
quotes.author: Willliam Penn

quotes.quote: Hate always sells well, but for repeat trade and the long pull happiness is sounder merchandise.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Those who hate most fervently must have once loved deeply; those who want to deny the world must have once embraced what they now set on fire.
quotes.author: Kurt Tucholsky

quotes.quote: Hate is always a clash between our spirit and someone else's body.
quotes.author: Cesar Pavese

quotes.quote: Hate is a lack of imagination.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Hatreds are the cinders of affection.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Ralegh

quotes.quote: Hate is not a good counselor.
quotes.author: Victoria Wolff

quotes.quote: Hatred is the atmosphere of hell.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Hate misleads, fear distorts and love blinds.
quotes.author: Tim Lebbon

quotes.quote: Hatred unlocks no doors in heaven.
quotes.author: William F. Devault

quotes.quote: Now hatred is by far the longest pleasure; Men love in haste, but they detest at leisure.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Hatred makes us all ugly.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: You lose a lot of time, hating people.
quotes.author: Marian Anderson

quotes.quote: Hate brings to men wars and fear!
quotes.author: Gertrude Buckingham

quotes.quote: Hatred is one long wait.
quotes.author: Ren Maran

quotes.quote: Hatred is self-punishment.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Hate less, live longer.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Hatred bounces.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: It is not violence that best overcomes hate — nor vengeance that most certainly heals injury.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Love me or hate me, both are in my favour. If you love me, I’ll always be in your heart... If you hate me, I’ll always be in your mind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If you have been hated, you have also been loved.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Love those that hate you, but to love those one hates is impossible.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him/her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Our hate is not hurting them at all, but our hate is turning our days and night into a hellish turmoil.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Hate is a prolonged form of suicide.
quotes.author: Douglas V. Steere

quotes.quote: There is no hate without fear. Hate is crystallized fear, fear's dividend, fear objectivized. We hate what we fear and so where hate is, fear is lurking.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Realise how careful one must be with hate - For you become what you hate too much.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Always remember, others may hate you. Those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: If you start to hate you can never stop. You can burn yourself from the inside. To retain one's personality, to survive, simply to keep common sense, one has to kill hatred, immediately.
quotes.author: Irina Ratushinskaya

quotes.quote: Hatred and bitterness can never cure the disease of fear; only love can do that. Hatred paralyzes life; love releases it. Hatred confuses life; love harmonizes it. Hatred darkens life; love illuminates it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: If you harbor hatred or ill feelings toward (a) person, the feeling does not hurt the enemy. It only harms your own peace of mind and eventually your own health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Hate burns its preserver.
quotes.author: Swahili Proverb

quotes.quote: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated.
quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

quotes.quote: Hate is a fear, and fear is rot / That cankers root and fruit alike / Fight cleanly then, hate not, fear not / Strike with no madness when you strike.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Hate will arise for you to despise / Hate is laughing at your fate / Love is beautiful and it is potent / Love inhibits the inhabitant of love / Love is the permanent state / Hate is for the late freight.
quotes.author: Scott Summers

quotes.quote: Hate's goin' round / Breaking many hearts / Breaking many hearts / Before it's gone too far.
quotes.author: Wynn

quotes.quote: Hate in the world's hand / Can carve and set its seal / Like the strong blast of sand / Which cuts into steel.
quotes.author: Elinor Morton Wylie

quotes.quote: I have seen how the finger of hate / Can mar and mould / Faces burned passionate / And frozen cold.
quotes.author: Elinor Morton Wylie

quotes.quote: People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite.
quotes.author: Susan Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself. What isn't part of ourselves doesn't disturb us.
quotes.author: Susan Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: In time we hate that which we often fear.
quotes.author: Susan Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: Don't hate the player, hate the game.
quotes.author: Teren Jones

quotes.quote: Hate to say goodbye, goodbye / Hate to see the end, the end / 'Cause it's been so long since I've made a friend like you.
quotes.author: Zooey Clare Deschanel

quotes.quote: Hate no one; hate their vices, not themselves.
quotes.author: Lloyd Albert Johnson

quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
quotes.author: Lloyd Albert Johnson

quotes.quote: One of the reasons why people cling to their hates so stubbornly is because they sense, once hate is gone, they will be forced to deal with pain.
quotes.author: Gary Guthrie

quotes.quote: Hate me for what I am and not for what you want me to be.
quotes.author: Jamie Spaniolo

quotes.quote: I hate you when you're gone, I hate you turn me on / I hate the way I need you when I don't know where you are / I love it even more when I find you on the floor / I know you think you hate me but I will always hate you more.
quotes.author: Martin H. Frederiksen

quotes.quote: We violently hate those whom we have greatly offended.
quotes.author: Daniel Weis

quotes.quote: These haters pretending that it's all good. Say that sh-t in person man, I wish y'all would.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: A hater is a person whose jealousy of another person success or achievements makes them verbally nit-pick any flaws no matter how small or just make up flaws in order to somehow try and belittle the successful person.
quotes.author: Rai M. Teves

quotes.quote: A haters job is to hate you, and they stay on their job 24/7. So, if you're expecting them to clock out, and leave you alone think again.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: And these haters try to knock me but they can't knock me off the hinges.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: Behind every sucessful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
quotes.author: Gloria Tesch

quotes.quote: Don't doubt yourself, that's what haters are for.
quotes.author: Turcois Ominek

quotes.quote: Don't try to win over the haters; you are not a jackass whisperer.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
quotes.author: Scylar Tyberius

quotes.quote: Haters are my favorite. I've built an empire with the bricks they've thrown at me. Keep on hating.
quotes.author: C.M. Punk

quotes.quote: Haters don't hate you. They hate themselves because you're a reflection of what they wish to be.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: Haters keep on hating, cause somebody's gotta do it.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.quote: Haters never win. I just think that's true about life, because negative energy always costs in the end.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: Haters teach you to be grateful for the people you love, hard times teach to you be grateful for the times that are good, and God, well God teaches you everything you need to know.
quotes.author: Carniel Dunlop

quotes.quote: I don't worry about the haters? They are just angry because the truth I speak contradicts the lie they live.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I only feel sorry for weak people. And mostly what I've come to find is that the weak people are the ones that are the haters.
quotes.author: R. Kelly

quotes.quote: I think people are just haters. When they see people doing well, some people, if there's something wrong, they'll pick at that.
quotes.author: Alana Blanchard

quotes.quote: I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater.
quotes.author: Tavi Gevinson

quotes.quote: Just be you. I've learned the hard way and in the end, some people are just so full of hate that no matter what you say or do, they'll always have something to say.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.quote: My haters are my motivators.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: My whole thing is, haters are gonna hate, but haters are also going to click on your YouTube video just to watch it, so I don't really care. You helped me break the record. Even if you were watching just to hate on me, and now I hold the record, so I win.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.quote: People who hate you because of a mere jealousy over your success hurt themselves in disguise. This is because you carry an image of who they wish they had become. Don't hate them back because they may also become like you one day and it will mean hurting that image you carry.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Respect your haters they're the only ones who think you're better than them.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: The best way to torture haters is with your happiness. There's nothing people hate more than seeing you be successful.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.
quotes.author: Karina Barton

quotes.quote: They're [haters] just building you up to knock you down. But for me, they haven't.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: To all the haters out there I wish you the best. You can't bring me down. I wake up everyday grateful for the opportunity and grateful to the fans.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.quote: You can't hate/love others without loving/hating yourself first.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: Be who you want to be and not care about what others think.
quotes.author: Andy Biersack

quotes.quote: Nations have come under the control of haters and fools
quotes.author: Carroll O'Connor

quotes.quote: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated.
quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

quotes.quote: The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Haters will broadcast your failure but whisper your success.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: So please take a seat if you really can't stand it, got success in my pocket, and these rappers in a panic
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Behind every sucessful person lies a pack of haters
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: When people don't want the best for you, they are not the best for you.
quotes.author: Gayle King

quotes.quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: To anyone that ever told you you're no good, they're no better.
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: Haters are like crickets. Crickets make a lot of noise, you hear it but you can’t see them, then right when you walk by them, they’re quiet.
quotes.author: Israel Houghton

quotes.quote: Haters are just confused admirers because they can't figure out the reason why everyone loves you.
quotes.author: Jeffree Star

quotes.quote: When you're blessed, the haters come out. When you wear God's blessings well, don't be surprised if it draws jealousy out on people
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Haters are just confused admirers.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.quote: Love your haters - they're your biggest fans
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: Of course there are certain things that get to me, but I try and lead by example and show people that, especially with haters, that you should just ignore them.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.quote: Remember, people only rain on your parade because they're jealous of your sun and tired of their shade.
quotes.author: Kim KardashianFavorite

quotes.quote: Judging a person does not define who they are. It defines who you are.
quotes.author: Kristen Stewart

quotes.quote: People that are obsessed with hating you, feel flattered. Their whole lives revolve around you.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Haters only hate things they can't have and the people they can't be. It's just a little thing called jealousy.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: Hate hurts the hater more'n the hated.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: If you're gonna be two-faced at least make one of them pretty.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Don't give to anyone the power to put you down. Haters are losers pretending to be winners.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and don't care about haters.
quotes.author: Perrie Edwards

quotes.quote: Never mind what haters say, ignore them 'til they fade away.
quotes.author: T.I.

quotes.quote: The best way to counter-attack a hater is to make it blatantly obvious that their attack has had no impact on you.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: The most terrible and violent of our own afflictions is to despise our own beings.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: You can't hate your origin and not end up hating yourself.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: We cannot think of being acceptable to others until we have first proven acceptable to ourselves.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: You should never hate yourself for hating others who do terrible things: the depth of your love is shown by the extent of your anger.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Any kiddie in school can love like a fool, / But hating, my boy, is an art.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Whether a man wearies himself senselessly or is treated severely by his spiritual father, the heart only suffers wounds. He is struck—it hurts—but no good comes of it. It is like a sick man who is given a wrong medicine.
quotes.author: St. Mark the Ascetic

quotes.quote: He who hates, hates himself.
quotes.author: Zulu Saying

quotes.quote: We never get to love by hate, least of all by self-hatred.
quotes.author: Basil W. Maturin

quotes.quote: In the end you become part of everything you hate, basically.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: Self-hatred and self-love are equally self-centered.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: You can't build joy on a feeling of self-loathing.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Impure like every moralist, eager to bind us to our torments and somehow to our wounds, he will have taught us to hate ourselves, to savor the pangs of self-loathing; if our conscience suppurates, if we are invalids in ecstasy, fanatics of our own rottenness, the responsibility for it is his.
quotes.author: E. M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Self-love, my liege, is not so vile a sin as self-neglecting.
quotes.author: (Henry V) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Hiding from yourself is the surest path to self hatred, self pity and a whole lot of missed potential.
quotes.author: Jon Westenberg

quotes.quote: Life is too short for self-hatred and celery sticks.
quotes.author: Marilyn Wann

quotes.quote: Feeling compassion for ourselves in no way releases us from responsibility for our actions. Rather, it releases us from the self-hatred that prevents us from responding to our life with clarity and balance.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: It's critical to have a good relationship with YOU & it will not exist within self-hatred.
quotes.author: Donna Reiners

quotes.quote: You cannot pick up self-esteem if you are clinging to self-loathing. You cannot pick up confidence while holding on to fear. You cannot pick up love while holding on to hate.
quotes.author: Bruce Van Horn

quotes.quote: You've been criticizing yourself for years and it hasn't worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Your greatest treasure hides behind your self-loathing. Love it out of hiding.
quotes.author: Pamela Mills

quotes.quote: People who practice self-love rebound from adversity faster than those who wallow in self-loathing.
quotes.author: Kalpna Suthar

quotes.quote: Progress does not require self-loathing. You can feel successful along the way.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: We should be rigorous in judging ourselves and gracious in judging others.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Change comes from self-love not self-loathing.
quotes.author: Lauren Fleshman

quotes.quote: Self hatred. Common hipster affliction.
quotes.author: Michael De Santa

quotes.quote: Repression. Repression is the father of neurosis, of self-hatred. Now, stress results when we fight against our impulses. We've all heard people talk about animal magnetism, the natural man. the noble savage, as if we'd lost something valuable in our long evolution into civilized human beings. Now there's a good reason for this.
quotes.author: Dr. George Waggner

quotes.quote: Miserable at every turn / Burned out from the inside / At every turn / But there's another option / Well you could like yourself a little / Be happy you're alive / Fall in love with doing things / Instead of hating on yourself / Expecting the worst / You can be the greatest thing / In your universe.
quotes.author: L. Leach

quotes.quote: On a Monday night I'm nothing / On a Tuesday night I'm nobody / On a Wednesday Thursday Friday night I'm sad / Then the weekend comes to haunt me / Of all the places I should be / Minding me of the best times I ever had / So there's nothing wrong with being alone / No need to call the doctor / Sometimes people need to be by themselves / And there's nothing weird about hating yourself / When you've seen the hours I've spent / Darkness comes and darkness goes / Just like my good times went.
