quotes.author: Malcolm Middleton

quotes.quote: Source of love, and light of day, / Tear me from myself away; / Every view and thought of mine / Cast into the mould of thine; / Teach, O teach this faithless heart / A consistent constant part; / Or, if it must live to grow / More rebellious, / break it now!
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Hatred and vengeance, my eternal portion, / Scarce can endure delay of execution, / Wait, with impatient readiness, to seize my / Soul in a moment. / Damned below Judas:more abhorred than he was, / Who for a few pence sold his holy Master. / Twice betrayed Jesus me, this last delinquent, / Deems the profanest. / Man disavows, and Deity disowns me: / Hell might afford my miseries a shelter; / Therefore hell keeps her ever hungry mouths all / Bolted against me. / Hard lot! encompassed with a thousand dangers; / Weary, faint, trembling with a thousand terrors; / I'm called, if vanquished, to receive a sentence / Worse than Abiram's. / Him the vindictive rod of angry justice / Sent quick and howling to the center headlong; / I, fed with judgment, in a fleshly tomb, am / Buried above ground.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Few friends are mine, though many wights there be / Who, meeting oft a phantasm that makes claim / To be myself, and hath my face and name, / And whose thin fraud I wink at privily, / Account this light impostor very me. / What boots it undeceive them, and proclaim / Myself myself, and whelm this cheat with shame? / I care not, so he leave my true self free, / Impose not on me also; but alas! / I too, at fault, bewildered, sometimes take / Him for myself, and far from mine own sight, / Torpid, indifferent, doth mine own self pass; / And yet anon leaps suddenly awake, / And spurns the gibbering mime into the night.
quotes.author: William Watson

quotes.quote: Somehow everything I own smells of you, and for the tiniest moment it's all not true
quotes.author: Snow Patrol

quotes.quote: The speed of the human mind is remarkable. So is its inability to face the obvious.
quotes.author: Simon Mawer

quotes.quote: Clouds cannot cover secret places, nor denials conceal truth.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: The easiest way to solve a problem is to deny it exists.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: To deny one's own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one's own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves. We live in denial of what we do, even what we think. We do this because we're afraid.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Hope is the denial of reality.
quotes.author: Margaret Weis

quotes.quote: denial was a weapon; it killed truth, numbed the mind, and I was a junkie.
quotes.author: John Hart

quotes.quote: oblivious, in denial, and dangerous
quotes.author: Brit Hume

quotes.quote: It just happened so fast. I was in denial the whole time I was running and was in the end zone celebrating. It sunk in after a while, but big guys don't get the ball very often. When we get the ball, we want to get in the end zone.
quotes.author: Rod Wright

quotes.quote: People need to speak out about their feelings to those of us who are in denial.
quotes.author: Eric Love

quotes.quote: To be haunted by my heart is no threat.
quotes.author: Nalini Singh

quotes.quote: ...the haunted always take refuge in stillness.
quotes.author: Christina Dodd

quotes.quote: You're always haunted by the idea you're wasting your life.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: To be haunted is to glimpse a truth that might best be hidden.
quotes.author: James Herbert

quotes.quote: In the haunted house of life, art is the only stair that doesn't creak.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: If you commit a crime, you maybe have to be haunted.
quotes.author: Judy Sheindlin

quotes.quote: No one escapes being haunted by something that absolutely terrifies them to the core, but very few feel it's okay to admit what it is that haunts us.
quotes.author: Nicholas Brendon

quotes.quote: We are haunted houses of history. Nobody that we meet ever dies while we are alive.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: If the living are haunted by the dead, then the dead are haunted by their own mistakes.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: To be haunted by past failures or satisfied with past successes is to arrest forward motion.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Haunted trees covered behind the curtains of their own leaves stare at the dark from the fringe of streets.
quotes.author: Suman Pokhrel

quotes.quote: We're all haunted in one way or another, are we not? If not by spirits, then by our own demons and regrets.
quotes.author: Teresa Medeiros

quotes.quote: We are haunted by an ideal life, and it is because we have within us the beginning and the possibility of it.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: We are neurotically haunted today by the imminence, and by the ignominy, of failure. We know at how frightening a cost one succeeds: to fail is something too awful to think about.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: We are too much haunted by ourselves, projecting the central shadow of self on everything around us. And then comes the Gospel to rescue us from this selfishness. Redemption is this, to forget self in God.
quotes.author: Frederick William Robertson

quotes.quote: He is haunted by a demon, a demon against which he feels powerless, because in its first manifestation it has no face, no name, nothing; and the words, the poem he makes, are a kind of exorcism of this demon.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: People haunted by the purposelessness of their lives try to find a new content not only by dedicating themselves to a holy cause but also by nursing a fanatical grievance. A mass movement offers them unlimited opportunities for both.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: 'Haunted by the past' is a commonplace phrase because it's a commonplace experience. Even if one is not, strictly speaking, 'haunted', the past is perpetually with one in the present, and the longer it grows and the further it recedes the stronger its presence seems to become.
quotes.author: Philip Roth

quotes.quote: She haunted him, as an ungenerous action haunts one.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: Houses are not haunted. We are haunted, and regardless of the architecture with which we surround ourselves, our ghosts stay with us until we ourselves are ghosts.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Each man is haunted until his humanity awakens.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: If nothing is the way it seems, then this life is just a haunted dream.
quotes.author: Steve Winwood

quotes.quote: You're so haunted by other people's futures that you forget, the only future you cannot see is your own.
quotes.author: Minority Report (TV show)

quotes.quote: Bad writers are nearly always haunted by the notion that Latin or Greek words are grander than Saxon ones.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: We aren't haunted by the dead, but by the impossible reach of history. By how unknowable these others are to us, how unfathomable we'd be to them.
quotes.author: Rebecca Makkai

quotes.quote: The mind is still haunted with its old unconscious ways; it broods on lost authorities; and the yearning, the deep and hollowing yearning for divine volition and service is with us still.
quotes.author: Julian Jaynes

quotes.quote: That's the strange thing about being a mother: Until you have a baby, you don't even realize how much you're missing one.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.
quotes.author: Nuno Bettencourt

quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: I understood once I held a baby in my arms, why some people have the need to keep having them.
quotes.author: Spalding Gray

quotes.quote: Having a baby changes the way you view your in-laws. I love it when they come to visit now. They can hold the baby and I can go out.
quotes.author: Matthew Broderick

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever-fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: Eda J. Le Shan

quotes.quote: Children reinvent your world for you.
quotes.author: Susan Sarandon

quotes.quote: A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years and in your heart till the day you die.
quotes.author: Mary Mason

quotes.quote: It was the tiniest thing I ever decided to put my whole life into.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: You never understand life until it grows inside of you.
quotes.author: Sandra C. Kassis

quotes.quote: A perfect example of minority rule is a baby in the house.
quotes.author: Milwaukee Journal

quotes.quote: Having a child is wondrous. It is to forever have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Having children makes you no more a parent than having a piano makes you a pianist.
quotes.author: Michael Levine

quotes.quote: Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: When you have a baby, love is automatic, when you get married, love is earned.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
quotes.author: Martin Fraquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like taking your lower lip and forcing it over your head.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: The joy of having a baby today can only be expressed in two words: tax deduction.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I loved having my baby inside of me, but I was very happy when he was finally here.
quotes.author: Marion Jones

quotes.quote: Having children is like living in a frat house - nobody sleeps, everything's broken, and there's a lot of throwing up.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.quote: One thing I had learned from watching chimpanzees with their infants is that having a child should be fun.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: Now the thing about having a baby - and I can't be the first person to have noticed this - is that thereafter you have it.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Babies are always more trouble than you thought- and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: It kills you to see them grow up. But I guess it would kill you quicker if they didn't.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Having a baby takes so much from you. It's the most glorious thing you'll ever do, but the aftermath is not so glorious!
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: I do not believe having a baby is punishment.
quotes.author: Allen West

quotes.quote: Having a baby's sweet face so close to your own, for so long a time as it takes to nurse 'em, is a great tonic for a sad soul.
quotes.author: Erica Eisdorfer

quotes.quote: Having a crying baby is inspiration to get the job done quickly.
quotes.author: Emily Procter

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like suddenly getting the world's worst roommate.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Having babies is a blessing, not a duty.
quotes.author: Betty Ford

quotes.quote: Having a baby is painful in order to show how serious a thing life is.
quotes.author: Lisa See

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like getting a tattoo on your face. You really need to be certain it's what you want before you commit.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: One thing about having a baby is that each step of the way you simply cannot imagine loving him any more than you already do, because you are bursting with love, loving as much as you are humanly capable of- and then you do, you love him even more.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Having a baby is part of a woman's life, and it is surely a great waste to be afraid of life.
quotes.author: Joan Lowery Nixon

quotes.quote: If men had to have babies, they would only ever have one each.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: I think it is such a privilege to give a baby its first home inside your body.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Carrying a baby is the most rewarding experience a woman can enjoy.
quotes.author: Jayne Mansfield

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: There is no finer investment for any community than putting milk into babies.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You never understand life until it grows inside of you.
quotes.author: Sandra C. Kassis

quotes.quote: Having my baby fall asleep in my arms takes away all of my worries and stresses. A sense of complete and total peace comes over me.
quotes.author: Maria Jose Ovalle

quotes.quote: A baby changes your dinner party conversation from politics to poops.
quotes.author: Maurice Johnstone

quotes.quote: It's extraordinary to look into a baby's face and see a piece of your flesh and your spirit. It makes you realize you are a part of the human race.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.quote: I knew it was going to be the most extraordinary thing in my life, but how powerful it is, you can never know until you have a baby.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: A man is not complete until he has seen the baby he has made.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.quote: People who say they sleep like a baby usually don't have one.
quotes.author: Leo J. Burke

quotes.quote: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day to be alive, whether the sun's shining or not.
quotes.author: Marty Robbins

quotes.quote: If you don't think every day is a good day, just try missing one.
quotes.author: Cavett Robert

quotes.quote: I hope everyone that is reading this is having a really good day. And if you are not, just know that in every new minute that passes you have an opportunity to change that.
quotes.author: Gillian Anderson

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day, some are just a little better than others.
quotes.author: Jeff Garthwaite

quotes.quote: On a bad day, I have mood swings - but on a good day, I have the whole mood playground.
quotes.author: Charles Rosenblum

quotes.quote: You can't live a perfect day without doing something for someone who will never be able to repay you.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Whenever I don't' have to wear makeup, it's a good day.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.quote: Every single day is a good day no matter how bright or dark it is, because it always brings an opportunity to start a positive beginning in your life.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: No matter, how is the start of the day, but end should be always good in the end of the day.
quotes.author: Gaurav GRV Sharma

quotes.quote: A lot of good days..makes a great life !!Each day is important. Plan & execute it meticulously.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: This is a wonderful day, I have never seen this one before.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The good old days are now.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Every day above earth is a good day.
quotes.author: Ernest Heminway

quotes.quote: We know nothing of tomorrow; our business is to be good and happy today.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Take each good day and relish each moment.Take each bad day and work to make it good.
quotes.author: Lisa Dado

quotes.quote: Joyful morning, good morning, good day.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Today is a Happy Day because I say it is.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: From the moment I woke up, I could tell that it was going to be a good day.
quotes.author: Aly Johnson

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day when you run.
quotes.author: Kevin Nelson

quotes.quote: Every day above ground is a good day.
quotes.author: Tony Montana

quotes.quote: A day will be good, when you do for someone good.
quotes.author: Gaurav GRV Sharma

quotes.quote: Everyone has highs and lows that they have to learn from, but every morning I start off with a good head on my shoulders, saying to myself, It's going to be a good day!'.
quotes.author: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.quote: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.quote: Good days, they come around the oddest corners.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: Good news equals good day.
quotes.author: Khaled Besrour

quotes.quote: I wake up every day and I think, I'm breathing! It's a good day.'
quotes.author: Eve Ensler

quotes.quote: Find peace in the morning rush and you will have a good day.
quotes.author: Michael Dolan

quotes.quote: You have good days, you have bad days. But the main thing is to grow mentally.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quotes.quote: A good day is a good day. A bad day is a good story.
quotes.author: Glennon Melton

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day. Your every-day mind - that is the Way!
quotes.author: Yunmen Wenyan

quotes.quote: When you're having a bad day at work, a lot of times it's your head. When you're having good days, a lot of times it's the absence of the mind.
quotes.author: Curt Schilling

quotes.quote: A well-spent day brings happy sleep.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Leave something good in every day.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Good days are to be gathered like grapes, to be trodden and bottled into wine and kept for age to sip at ease beside the fire. If the traveler has vintaged well, he need trouble to wander no longer; the ruby moments glow in his glass at will.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: Because when you stop and look around, this life is pretty amazing.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Hope can come from having a good day.
quotes.author: Emily Barnes

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, you have to be happy on purpose. When you wake up, you just can't wait to see what kind of day you'll have. You have to decide what kind of day you'll have.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: If we'd only stop trying to be happy, we could have a pretty good time.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: It's a good day to have a good day.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: Consider that this day never dawn again.
quotes.author: Dante

quotes.quote: A bad day is still a good day when we take actions, no matter how small, to live with joy. Then our good days don't happen by chance, they happen by design.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: If we are in a good mood when we get up in the morning, if there is a warm-hearted feeling within, automatically our inner door is opened for that day.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Just as a good day's work leads to pleasant sleep, so a life well-spent leads to a pleasant death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: A rainy morn oft brings a pleasant day.
quotes.author: Italian Proverbs

quotes.quote: Live today. Forget the cares of the past
quotes.author: Epirus

quotes.quote: Today means boundless and inexhaustible eternity. Months and years and all periods of time are concepts of men, who gauge everything by number but the true name of eternity is today.
quotes.author: Philo of Alexandria

quotes.quote: Seize the day and put the least possible trust in tomorrow.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Look to this day / For it is life, the very life of life / For yesterday is but a dream / And tomorrow is only a vision / But today well lived makes every yesterday a dream of happiness / And tomorrow a vision of hope / Look well, therefore, to this day.
quotes.author: Kalidasa

quotes.quote: If useless thoughts do not / Cloud your mind / Each day is the best of your life
quotes.author: Wumen Huikai

quotes.quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: This time, like all times, is a very good one, if we know what to do with it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Make the most of today. Translate your good intentions into actual deeds. Today is the day in which to express your noblest qualities of mind and heart, to do at least one worthy thing which you have long postponed.
quotes.author: Grenville Klesier

quotes.quote: A wish is that / Have a good time / Have a good life / A wish from the heart / Not from the mind.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Just wanted to pop in and wish you a good morning / Have a good day let's write a brand new story / Everyday different place brand new territory / Living like me it never gets boring.
quotes.author: Lil Ithy

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day. There is something to learn, care and celebrate.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, if I can say I had fun, it was a good day.
quotes.author: Simone Biles

quotes.quote: Anyone can have a good day, but you have to be able to perform on a bad day.
quotes.author: Jurgen Kloop

quotes.quote: Every day should be a good day. People fool themselves that they'll be here forever.
quotes.author: Stephen A. Schwarzman

quotes.quote: Every day that I wake up has to be a good day!
quotes.author: Bret Michaels

quotes.quote: I wake up every morning thinking…this is my last day. And I jam everything into it. There’s no time for mediocrity. This is no damned dress rehearsal.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: Give every day the chance to become the most beautiful day of your life.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Each day is a little life: every waking and rising a little birth, every fresh morning a little youth, every going to rest and sleep a little death.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: I get up every morning and it’s going to be a great day. You never know when it’s going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.
quotes.author: Paul Henderson

quotes.quote: Let today be the day you give up who you’ve been for who you can become.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: There is a quiet place in Hawaii where, for over thirty years, I've gone to draw inspiration and write many of my books.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: I love to surf. Hawaii has some of the best waves in the world, and the most consistent as well. That's always fun.
quotes.author: Brendon Urie

quotes.quote: That is the great thing about Hawaii. We're so culturally diverse and we inner-marry and appreciate each other's cultures.
quotes.author: Mazie Hirono

quotes.quote: Hawaii - the Aloha state - is built on the strength of its multicultural society, from our indigenous Native Hawaiian people to the many immigrants that followed.
quotes.author: Mazie Hirono

quotes.quote: In Hawaii, we understand that our way of life depends on a healthy ocean.
quotes.author: Mazie Hirono

quotes.quote: Hawaii is a small, close community.
quotes.author: Jake Shimabukuro

quotes.quote: I love Hawaii. I really enjoy surfing in Oahu, and Waianae is such a great area. And Maui - I like Maui a lot, too.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.quote: For me, the magic of Hawaii comes from the stillness, the sea, the stars.
quotes.author: Joanne Harris

quotes.quote: Hawaii is the only place I know where they lay flowers on you while you are alive.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Incredible as it might seem, Hawaii is like a gigantic raft, drifting slowly with the centuries.
quotes.author: Terence Barrow

quotes.quote: Hawaii is still the single most frequent fantasy destination, not because of political stability or conveniences, but because Hawaii seduces the imagination. It's the perfect postcard, no props, no fillers.
quotes.author: Robert Wintner

quotes.quote: Hawaii is a paradise--and I can never cease proclaiming it; but I must append one word of qualification: Hawaii is a paradise for the well-to-do.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Historically, Alaska is a place that has attracted those fed up with conventionality.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Honolulu is a melting pot.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: Whether a visitor or kama'aina, the beauty of the Hawaiian Islands inspires the heart and mind.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: The Hula is the heartbeat of the Hawaiian People.
quotes.author: David Kalakaua

quotes.quote: Hawaiian music is the roots for the Hawaiian people. It tells the history of where we came from. Not having Hawaiian music in my life would be like losing half of my body--- because Hawaiianmusic helps me to be a better person.
quotes.author: Kevin Brown

quotes.quote: After all, Hawaii is the best land. (O Hawaii no ka aina maikai)
quotes.author: Hawaiian Proverb

quotes.quote: Hawaii is paradise born of fire.
quotes.author: Rand McNally

quotes.quote: A slight breeze cooled the Hawaiian spring air, swaying the branches of palm trees, which cast black silhouettes against the purple and orange colors of the twilight sky.
quotes.author: Victoria Kahler

quotes.quote: We, the Hawaiian people, who are born from the union of Papahanaumoku and Wakea, earth mother and sky father, and who have lived in these islands for over 100 generations, will always have the moral right to the lands of Hawai'i now and forever, no matter what any court says.
quotes.author: Lilikal_ K. Kame'eleihiwa

quotes.quote: Mount Kilauea spilled glowing lava like cords of orange neon-lighting from seemingly nowhere. In the blackness that engulfed the night, electric heat lit flowing streams that fell into the sea, disappearing in a cloud of steam with a sizzling splash.
quotes.author: Victoria Kahler

quotes.quote: Look, Neal, Hawaii is not some magical pixie wonderland; it's an American state populated by atomic weapons, a remnant native population and people too stupid to spell their way out of a paper bag. Most of them came here to escape pathetic lives in the forty nine other states, so in some sense, Hawaii is a scenic cul-de-sac filled with people who want to drink themselves to death without feeling judged.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Kaohinani is a Hawaiian word meaning gatherer of beautiful things.
quotes.author: Rob Brezsny

quotes.quote: Aloha is the unconditional desire to promote the true good of other people in a friendly spirit out of a sense of kinship.
quotes.author: Abraham Akaka

quotes.quote: Nature is where it all begins for the Hawaiians. In fact, they call themselves keiki o ka aina children of the land'.
quotes.author: M.J. Harden

quotes.quote: I believe Hawaii is the most precious jewel in the world.
quotes.author: Don Ho

quotes.quote: Whether a visitor or kama'aina (resident), the beauty of the Hawaiian Islands inspires the heart and mind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Hawaii is not a state of mind, but a state of grace.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Hawaii has always been a very pivotal role in the Pacific. It is in the Pacific. It is a part of the United States that is an island that is right here.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: Come with me while the moon is on the seaThe night is young and so are weDreams come true in Blue HawaiiAnd mine could all come trueThis magic night of nights with you
quotes.author: Leo Robin

quotes.quote: Hawaii is the island of big dreams for both islanders and guests. Those dreams born in paradise can, indeed come true.
quotes.author: Sharon Linnea

quotes.quote: The loveliest fleet of islands that lies anchored in any ocean.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: No alien land in all the world has any deep strong charm for me but that one, no other land could so longingly and so beseechingly haunt me, sleeping and waking, through half a lifetime, as that one has done. Other things leave me, but it abides; other things change, but it remains the same. For me the balmy airs are always blowing, its summer seas flashing in the sun; the pulsing of its surfbeat is in my ear; I can see its garlanded crags, its leaping cascades, its plumy palms drowsing by the shore, its remote summits floating like islands above the cloud wrack; I can feel the spirit of its wildland solitudes, I can hear the splash of its brooks; in my nostrils still lives the breath of flowers that perished twenty years ago.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Be the Aloha you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I can't even speak Hawaiian, but if you go there and listen to a Hawaiian song, you get captured because it's so beautiful, like the melody is just gorgeous and you know Bob Marley is on the radio every single day. It's very reggae-influenced down there. Basically, you haven't been to paradise if you haven't been to Hawaii.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: Hawaii is paradise. It sounds cheesy to say it, but there's music in the air there.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: We need Hawaii just as much and a good deal more than we did California. It is Manifest Destiny.
quotes.author: William McKinley

quotes.quote: In Hawaii, we have something called Ho'oponopono, where people come together to resolve crises and restore peace and balance.
quotes.author: Duane Chapman

quotes.quote: In Hawaii, some of the biggest radio stations are reggae. The local bands are heavily influenced by Bob Marley.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled by appearances. In hawaii, some of the most powerful people look like bums and stuntmen.
quotes.author: Matt King

quotes.quote: If you want to surf, move to hawaii. If you like to shop, move to New York. If you like acting and Hollywood, move to California. But if you like college football, move to Texas.
quotes.author: Ricky Williams

quotes.quote: Hawaii is the best form of comfort for me. When I die, I want to be cremated, and I want half my ashes spread in the Pacific around the island, the rest on the property.
quotes.author: Richard Pryor

quotes.quote: I truly believe the brightest days lie ahead for the Great State of hawaii.
quotes.author: Linda Lingle

quotes.quote: Some people say hawaii is spoiled, but I don't think so. It's modern. It's a part of today's world.
quotes.author: James MacArthur

quotes.quote: Hawaii is a unique state. It is a small state. It is a state that is by itself. It is a -it is different from the other 49 states. Well, all states are different, but it's got a particularly unique situation.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: Hawaii can be heaven and it can be hell.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.quote: Hawaii is absolutely beautiful.
quotes.author: Rachelle Lefevre

quotes.quote: Most of what Hawaii has to offer is no secret. Pipeline is probably the most famous wave in the world.
quotes.author: Kelly Slater

quotes.quote: I can always remember that experience in Hawaii pleasantly on account of Elvis.
quotes.author: Minnie Pearl

quotes.quote: I grew up in Hawaii and I think it was easier because we did not have cliques at high school.
quotes.author: Kelly Preston

quotes.quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A vacation is like love - anticipated with pleasure, experienced with discomfort, and remembered with nostalgia.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being in Hawaii, it's almost impossible not to be fit, I think.
quotes.author: Henry Ian Cusick

quotes.quote: Hawaii is a special place because we have a very diverse population there, who are very respectful and tolerant of those who have differing opinions and different views.
quotes.author: Tulsi Gabbard

quotes.quote: Life is very nice in Hawaii. I rent a place that has its own cottage so when my friends and family come to visit, they have somewhere nice to stay.
quotes.author: Jorge Garcia

quotes.quote: Activities and attraction in Hawaii are designed to involve the whole family as one.
quotes.author: Jay Talwar

quotes.quote: Ohana means family and family means no one gets left behind.
quotes.author: Lilo and Stitch

quotes.quote: One's destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Hawaii is a beautiful place to bring up a family.
quotes.author: Henry Ian Cusick

quotes.quote: Wandering re-establishes the original harmony which once existed between man and the universe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: It is essential that none of the other great powers shall secure Hawaii. Such a possession would not consist with our safety and with the peace of the world.
quotes.author: Benjamin Harrison

quotes.quote: Hawaii, the loveliest fleet of islands that lies anchored in any ocean.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Gazes at far Hawaii crowned with palms where east and west are met.
quotes.author: William Vaughn Moody

quotes.quote: Not vainly Maui strove; no not in vain, he dared the old Mother of Death and her embrace
quotes.author: Johannes Carl Andersen

quotes.quote: The kings of Hawaii call out their men, the men go up the mountains in files.
quotes.author: Padraic Colum

quotes.quote: August is the month of the high-sailing hawks. The hen hawk is the most noticeable. He likes the haze and calm of these long, warm days. He is a bird of leisure and seems always at his ease. How beautiful and majestic are his movements!
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Hunting hawks did not belong in cages, no matter how much a man coveted their grace, no matter how golden the bars. They were far more beautiful soaring free. Heartbreakingly beautiful.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: In this world of ours, the sparrow must live like a hawk if he is to fly at all.
quotes.author: Hayao Miyazaki

quotes.quote: There’s a superstition among falconers that a hawk’s ability is inversely proportional to the ferocity of its name. Call a hawk Tiddles and it will be a formidable hunter; call it Spitfire or Slayer and it will probably refuse to fly at all.
quotes.author: Helen Macdonald

quotes.quote: The hawk is aerial brother of the wave which he sails over and surveys, those his perfect air-inflated wings answering to the elemental unfledged pinions of the sea.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You cannot friend a hawk, they said, unless you are a hawk yourself, alone and only a sojourner in the land, without friends or the need of them.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The hawk was everything I wanted to be: solitary, self-possessed, free from grief, and numb to the hurts of human life.
quotes.author: Helen Macdonald

quotes.quote: If we had great distant vision like a hawk we could avoid most disasters, altering our future.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The sparrow flying behind the hawk thinks the hawk is fleeing.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverbs

quotes.quote: To the mouse, snow means freedom from want and fear. ... To a rough-legged hawk, a thaw means freedom from want and fear.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: I have need of the sky, I have business with the grass; I will up and get me away where the hawk is wheeling. Lone and high, and the slow clouds go by. I will get me away to the waters that glass the clouds as they pass. I will get me away to the woods.
quotes.author: Richard Hovey

quotes.quote: The wild God of the world is sometimes merciful to those That ask mercy, not often to the arrogant. You do not know him, you communal people, or you have forgotten him; Intemperate and savage, the hawk remembers him; Beautiful and wild, the hawks, and men that are dying, remember him.
quotes.author: (John) Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: I am but mad north-north-west: when the wind is southerly, I know a hawk from a handsaw.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A hawk kills because it is his nature; a man because it is his pleasure.
quotes.author: Darkovan Proverb

quotes.quote: The Hawk unto the open sky/The red deer to the wold/The Romany lass for the Romany lad/As in the days of old.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We will fly that hawk when his pinions are grown.
quotes.author: Darkovan Proverbs

quotes.quote: You think so logically…like a hawk soaring – I feel so chaotically…like a kite without a tail plummeting to earth.
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: You missed the shadow of the hawk on the vole if you think how wonderfully free a vole is!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I am the hawk and there's blood in my feathers, but time is still turning they soon will be dry. And all those who see me and all who believe in me, share in the freedom I feel when I fly.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: He who makes himself a dove is eaten by the hawk.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Only in silence the word, only in dark the light, only in dying life: bright the hawk's flight on the empty sky.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Pheasants are fools if they invite the hawk to dinner.
quotes.author: Danish Proverbs

quotes.quote: When the cock is drunk, he forgets about the hawk.
quotes.author: African Proverbs

quotes.quote: The wild hawk stood with the down on his beak and stared with his foot on the prey.
quotes.author: Lord Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Say, will the falcon, stooping from above, Smit with her varying plumage, spare the dove? Admires the jay the insect's gilded wings? Or hears the hawk when Philomela sings?
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: You cannot take hawks without climbing some cliffs.
quotes.author: Darkovan Proverbs

quotes.quote: A hawk’s marriage: the hen is the better bird.
quotes.author: French Proverbs

quotes.quote: In hawks, hounds, arms, and love, for one leasure a thousand pains.
quotes.author: French Proverbs

quotes.quote: It is hard to lure hawks with empty hands.
quotes.author: Danish Proverbs

quotes.quote: Stood alone on a mountain top, starin' out at the Great Divide. I could go east, I could go west, it was all up to me to decide. Just then I saw a young hawk flyin' and my soul began to rise.
quotes.author: Bob Seger

quotes.quote: Dost thou love hawking? thou hast hawks will soar Above the morning lark.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Those greedy Hawks with deep peckish pockets, circled around the concrete jungle to search for its fresh penurious prey to snack on.
quotes.author: Komalica v

quotes.quote: But you make me happy. It's living up to being happy that's the difficult part.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident that is very sexy but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: I think happiness is what makes you pretty. Period. Happy people are beautiful. They become like a mirror and they reflect that happiness.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: The smile on your face lets me know that you need me, there's a truth in your eyes saying you'll never leave me. A touch of your hand says you'll catch me if ever I fall.. you say it best, when you say nothing at all.
quotes.author: Kieth Whitley

quotes.quote: Being called beautiful makes me so happy. No one ever tells me I am, but when someone does, it makes my world light up.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words, and a smile says, 'I like you. You make me happy. I am glad to see you.' That is why dogs make such a hit. They are so glad to see us that they almost jump out of their skins. So, naturally, we are glad to see them.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: He makes me so glad that music is not nearly as lucrative as it once was.
quotes.author: Soulja Boy

quotes.quote: It was only a sunny smile, and little it cost in the giving, but like morning light it scattered the night and made the day worth living.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Among those whom I like or admire, I can find no common denominator, but among those whom I love, I can: all of them make me laugh.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words, and a smile says, "I like you. You make me happy. I am glad to see you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: You fell in love with someone because of the tilt of his smile, or because he could make you laugh, or in this case, because he made you believe you were the only one who could save him.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: I am so infinitely happy that he loves me so much, and I pray that it will always be like this. It won't be my fault if he ever stops loving me.
quotes.author: Eva Braun

quotes.quote: If you can make me laugh, my heart is yours! I think there's nothing more attractive than someone who doesn't take themselves too seriously.
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.quote: I want someone who can make me laugh and just be normal and understand my lifestyle and how I wanna live it.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: For me, the most attractive thing in a man is the ability to make me laugh.
quotes.author: Mollie King

quotes.quote: You are my sunshine my only sunshine. You make me happy when skies are grey. You'll never know dear how much I love you. Please don't take my sunshine away.
quotes.author: Jimmie Davis

quotes.quote: And certainly, this would seem to be supported by everyday evidence. Happy peasants.
quotes.author: Lisa Grunwald

quotes.quote: Some people do regret not having spent more time with their families. And if another baby will make you happy, it'll make me happy too.
quotes.author: Lisa Grunwald

quotes.quote: He answers my question with a question. How can you tell when a person is happy? I suggest that, for one thing, happy people tend to look happy. He grins. And what does that mean? he asks. Well, I smile a lot. I laugh.
quotes.author: Lisa Grunwald

quotes.quote: What makes you happy? It would make me happy if you would do the apartment.
quotes.author: Lisa Grunwald

quotes.quote: You deserve to be happy.” “Oh, I know, sweetie. I couldn't ask for a better daughter. But just so you know, he makes me happier than anyone I've ever known.
quotes.author: Kate Russell

quotes.quote: Oh, he quite adores me. You should see us together. He opens the door for me, even the car. Such a gentleman, standing up every time I do.
quotes.author: Kate Russell

quotes.quote: He makes me happy. But he did make me happy. So happy, once. You can't sit here and tell me that you don't believe that I love you.
quotes.author: Anna Todd

quotes.quote: Happy, she replies and eyes begin to sting.
quotes.author: Anna Todd

quotes.quote: For once just consider what you want, what makes you happy? With big, round, beautiful, bloodshot, and crying eyes, she says.
quotes.author: Anna Todd

quotes.quote: She has a man in her life who obviously cares for her and would do anything to make her happy. She's so lucky.
quotes.author: Anna Todd

quotes.quote: Something about the way he called me a woman makes me happy, in my life, I've always felt like a child because everyone treats me like one.
quotes.author: Anna Todd

quotes.quote: He makes me feel I am his favorite. He manages to make me feel special, as though in all of time and space, there are just the two of us.
quotes.author: Susan Hill

quotes.quote: His patience astounds me. He pursues his children with such persistence, and then he waits for his children to respond. His love is beyond my ability to understand.
quotes.author: Susan Hill

quotes.quote: He gives me an easy smile.
quotes.author: Lyla Payne

quotes.quote: And he's seriously one of those guys who can say I only want you to be happy and not sound like a complete and utter douchebag in the process.
quotes.author: Lyla Payne

quotes.quote: Your belly button isn't a periscope. I think you're safe. She laughs, a fresh, happy sound that warms my heart.
quotes.author: Lyla Payne

quotes.quote: Every Hour he makes me happier, by his sweet condescension.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Has just left me, with the kindest, tenderest expressions, and gentlest behavior that ever blest a happy maiden.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: And I write up to the conclusion of this day, that they may see how happy you have made me.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: He makes me happy he starts my day with his morning wake and hug.
quotes.author: Betty Mills-January

quotes.quote: I love my brother very much because he is my brother and he makes me happy
quotes.author: Stanley D. Klein

quotes.quote: He makes me mad, and he makes me happy.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: We'll find one just as good. We'll find ours. I love you. He kissed each of her dimples. I'll make you happy.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: He was so patient with me, so genuinely happy for me.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: This man makes me want to live a little longer. He makes me want to experience life. I think he can make me happy.
quotes.author: K. C. Hopkins

quotes.quote: I have something better than a dream. I have someone who has the potential to be the real thing. It makes me feel all warm and tender inside just thinking about all of the possibilities.
quotes.author: K. C. Hopkins

quotes.quote: He told me I have beautiful eyes. He loves my eyes! He loves me in blue!
quotes.author: K. C. Hopkins

quotes.quote: I'm telling you, he brings out the best in me. He even told me he noticed I looked down a lot. He said eyes like mine were meant to be shared with the world.
quotes.author: K. C. Hopkins

quotes.quote: He loves me. Pure and simple. He wants me to be happy.
quotes.author: Patricia Lewis

quotes.quote: I have found someone. Someone special. He makes my heart sing. I can hear the soft sounds of my favorite instrumentalist playing when he's near.
quotes.author: Patricia Lewis

quotes.quote: He has reached down into the very essence of me and caressed it with love and understanding. He fills all those empty spaces in me.
quotes.author: Patricia Lewis

quotes.quote: The man that God has chosen for me to raise is the love of my life. He makes me happy when I am sad; he makes me look forward to another day.
quotes.author: Hasana-Amina

quotes.quote: He supports me. He takes away my fear. He takes care of me in the night . He makes me glad. O Happy.
quotes.author: Stephen Elkins

quotes.quote: If he only knew how he makes me feel If he only knew that my feelings were real In my mind, I hold pictures of the ideal. He also strokes the brush that paints my canvas I feel secure when he's around to make me happy.
quotes.author: Jean Clervil

quotes.quote: I have someone, and he makes me happy.
quotes.author: Delaney Diamond

quotes.quote: What I know is that he is there for me and he makes me happy. I am still searching but in love I am content.
quotes.author: B. W. Read

quotes.quote: Material blessings, when they pay beyond the category of need, are weirdly fruitful of headache.
quotes.author: Philip Wylie

quotes.quote: Do not undervalue the headache. While it is at its sharpest it seems a bad investment. But when relief begins, the unexpired remainder is worth $4 a minute.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Some people spend the day in complaining of a headache, and the night in drinking the wine that gives it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Arguments about Scripture achieve nothing but a stomachache and a headache.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: When you have one million dollars, you're a lucky person. When you have 10 million dollars, you've got trouble, a lot of headaches.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: I shall take all the troubles of the past, all the disappointments, all the headaches, and I shall pack them in a bag and throw them in the East River.
quotes.author: Trygve Lie

quotes.quote: I don't take the movies seriously, and anyone who does is in for a headache.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Never forget that there are only two philosophies to rule your life. The one of the cross, which starts with the fast and ends with the feast. The other of Satan, which starts with the feast and ends with the headache.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: It's obviously a headache for all of us the bowlers, the captain to the support staff.
quotes.author: John Buchanan

quotes.quote: The headache now is to work out all that billing and collect that money. But to start billing to the state would be more confusing.
quotes.author: Jim Bracewell

quotes.quote: It's a bit of a headache being a perfectionist. You're never satisfied.
quotes.author: Cherie Lunghi

quotes.quote: In headaches and in worry vaguely life leaks away, And time will have his fancy tomorrow or today.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Some pain you can distance yourself from, but a headache sits right where you live.
quotes.author: Mark Lawrence

quotes.quote: A great wind is blowing, and that gives you either imagination or a headache.
quotes.author: Catherine the Great

quotes.quote: The bigger the headache, the bigger the pill.
quotes.author: George Clinton

quotes.quote: It's a bit of a headache being a perfectionist. You're never satisfied.
quotes.author: Cherie Lunghi

quotes.quote: If you do not feel equal to the headaches that psychiatry induces, you are in the wrong business. It is work work the like of which I do not know.
quotes.author: Harry Stack Sullivan

quotes.quote: If the headache would only precede the intoxication, alcoholism would be a virtue.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Headaches were like birds. Starlings. They could be perfectly calm, then a single acorn could drop and send the entire flock to the sky.
quotes.author: Erika Swyler

quotes.quote: Writers don't give prescriptions. They give headaches!
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Life is a long headache in a noisy street.
quotes.author: John Masefield

quotes.quote: TheÂ headlineÂ is the most important element of an ad. It must offer a promise to the reader of a believable benefit. And it must be phrased in a way to give it memory value.
quotes.author: Morris Hite

quotes.quote: A goodÂ headlineÂ can make an advertisement good even if the picture is poor.
quotes.author: John Caples

quotes.quote: WritingÂ headlines is a specialty - there are outstanding writers who will tell you they couldn't write aÂ headlineÂ to save their lives.
quotes.author: Bill Walsh

quotes.quote: The writing ofÂ headlineÂ is one of the great journalistic arts. They either conceal or reveal an interest.
quotes.author: Claude C. Hopkins

quotes.quote: UnsuccessfulÂ headlinesÂ were not written without a strong appeal, but it was the wrong appeal for that product and that audience.
quotes.author: John Caples

quotes.quote: You don't have to make theÂ headlinesÂ to make a difference.
quotes.author: S. Truett Cathy

quotes.quote: The purpose of the headlines must be to convey a message to people who read headlines, then decide whether or not they will look at the copy.
quotes.author: John Caples

quotes.quote: TheÂ headlines are critically important. The majority of the public reads little else when deciding whether or not they are interested.
quotes.author: John Caples

quotes.quote: Headlines, in a way, are what mislead you because bad news is a headline, and gradual improvement is not.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: There is nothing likely to get you a biggerÂ headlineÂ than attacking your own party.
quotes.author: Michael Laws

quotes.quote: Headlines are so great in a sense that they can take a little bit from an article completely out of context and blow it into something it's not. Some people really only readÂ headlines.
quotes.author: Kristin Cavallari

quotes.quote: A longÂ headlineÂ that really says something is more effective than a brief heading that says nothing.
quotes.author: John Caples

quotes.quote: Hyperbolic headlines always attract more attention than mundane truths.
quotes.author: Ajit Pai

quotes.quote: It's no longer just reporting the headlines of the day, but trying to put the headlines into some context and to add some perspective into what they mean.
quotes.author: Bob Schieffer

quotes.quote: Today's gossip is tomorrow's headline.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: TheÂ headlineÂ is the 'ticket on the meat.' Use it to flag down readers who are prospects for the kind of product you are advertising.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Headlines twice the size of the events.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: You have to get a great headline to attract attention in your blog - it's about the lure - not the rod.
quotes.author: Michael Hyatt

quotes.quote: HeadlinesÂ pass; breadlines continue.
quotes.author: Robin Skelton

quotes.quote: HeadlinesÂ don't sell papes. Newsies sell papes.
quotes.author: Jack Kelly

quotes.quote: The bestÂ headlinesÂ are those that appeal to the reader's self-interest, that is,Â headlinesÂ based on reader benefits. They offer readers something they want - and get from you.
quotes.author: John Caples

quotes.quote: TheÂ headlineÂ is the most important element in most advertisements. It is the telegram which decides the reader whether to read the copy.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: In my headphones, I led a life of romance and incident and intrigue, none of which had anything to do with the world outside my Walkman.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.quote: I’ve come to the conclusion that people who wear headphones while they walk, are much happier, more confident, and more beautiful individuals than someone making the solitary drudge to work without acknowledging their own interests and power.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.quote: The guy who sits in front of the TV set with headphones on has lost the capacity to react to the tactile environment.
quotes.author: Peter Eisenman

quotes.quote: Our daily life is filled with electronic pianos, ring tones, the disembodied voice giving you your bank balance over the telephone. Even silence can be electronic, courtesy of sound-canceling headphones.
quotes.author: Serge Schmemann

quotes.quote: You are one-third as productive in open-plan offices as in quiet rooms. I have a tip for you: if you work in spaces like that, carry headphones with you, with a soothing sound like birdsong. Put them on, and your productivity goes back up to triple what it would be.
quotes.author: Julian Treasure

quotes.quote: Girl listens to radio. Girl finds music. Girl has whole other world. Girl slips on headphones. World gone.
quotes.author: Kathleen Glasgow

quotes.quote: I sometimes wear headphones even though I’m not listening to anything just so I’m left alone. It’s the next best thing to wearing a ‘Do Not Disturb’ sign.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: Headphones aren't big enough these days. Why not just throw a couple of stereo speakers in a full face motorcycle helmet.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: A kid that picks up a record, he doesn't need to know anything other than the music and have it in his or her headphones. They're getting ideas directly, it's like someone whispering in their ear. That's such a personal way to receive information.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.quote: Everything that enters our field of perception means something, large or small. Everything speaks to us, if we will take off our headphones and hear a different sound track. Everything corresponds. We travel better in the forest of symbols when we are open and available to all the forms of meaning that are watching and waiting for us.
quotes.author: Robert Moss

quotes.quote: I always wanted to have a headphone line but I feel like I'm going to do more than just headphones eventually, but we want to wake the world up right now with this.
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.quote: You've spent half of your life Trying to fall behind You're using your headphones Just to drown out your mind.
quotes.author: Regina Spektor

quotes.quote: Years of backseat drives full of noise and sounds that seem random until you're alone in your room with headphones on; so you can truly get the whole picture.
quotes.author: Waldo Austin

quotes.quote: I am appalled at the complete lack of situational awareness caused by people wearing headphones. If you are completely oblivious to the world around you, you are leaving yourself wide open to many types of criminal attack.
quotes.author: David Chamberlain

quotes.quote: At work, conversation increases productivity. And yet people go into work, put on their headphones. In one interview, somebody called it - they become pilots in their own cockpits.
quotes.author: Judy Woodruff

quotes.quote: They solved the problem of coexistence through the use of individual stereo headphones.
quotes.author: Stephen Billias

quotes.quote: When I was a kid I just had headphones on all the time, and it changed the way I see things and the way I interpret things.
quotes.author: Matt Nathanson

quotes.quote: Some time alone. Headphones on. World off.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All healing is first a healing of the heart.
quotes.author: Carl Townsend

quotes.quote: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: Eventually you will come to understand that love heals everything, and love is all there is.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Healing does not mean going back to the way things were before, but rather allowing what is now to move us closer to God.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Healing may not be so much about getting better, as about letting go of everything that isn't you - all of the expectations, all of the beliefs - and becoming who you are.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Humor is healing.
quotes.author: Brad Garrett

quotes.quote: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
quotes.author: Sarah Fielding

quotes.quote: I've experienced several different healing methodologies over the years - counseling, self-help seminars, and I've read a lot - but none of them will work unless you really want to heal.
quotes.author: Lindsay Wagner

quotes.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: Healing is simply attempting to do more of those things that bring joy and fewer of those things that bring pain.
quotes.author: O. Carl Simonton

quotes.quote: Healing is impossible in loneliness; it is the opposite of loneliness. Conviviality is healing. To be healed we must come with all the other creatures to the feast of Creation.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The main reason for healing is love.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Healing is embracing what is most feared; healing is opening what has been closed, softening what has hardened into obstruction, healing is learning to trust life.
quotes.author: Jeanne Achterberg

quotes.quote: The greatest barrier to own own healing is not the pain, sorrow or violence inflicted upon us as children. Our greatest hindrance is our ongoing capacity to judge, to criticize, and to bring tremendous harm to ourselves. If we can harden our heart against ourselves and meet our most tender feelings with anger and condemnation, we simultaneously armor our heart against the possibility of gentleness, love and healing.
quotes.author: Wayne Muller

quotes.quote: Healing requires from us to stop struggling, but to enjoy life more and endure it less.
quotes.author: Darina Stoyanova

quotes.quote: Healing takes time. Despite great advances in medicine, the biggestpart of your recovery is attributable to the enormous healing powerinside you. The body heals itself according to itsown timetable--anxious thoughts never hasten recuperation.
quotes.author: Criswell Freeman

quotes.quote: Healing is the journey. The destination is yourself. The full recognition of all the different aspects of yourself-your joy, your sorrow, your pain, your pleasure-all lead you to the source of who you are. Only by having intimate contact with this source can you experience the fullness of your life. Only by fearlessly looking within can you embrace the landscape of your life and open yourself completely to all the love and compassion that lives inside you.
quotes.author: Philip Berk

quotes.quote: Healing is the application of love.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: It has been said that time heals all wounds. The truth is that time does not heal anything. It merely passes. it is what we do during the passing of time that helps or hinders the healing process.
quotes.author: Jay Marshall

quotes.quote: By far the strongest poison to the human spirit is the inability to forgive oneself or another person. Forgiveness is no longer an option but a necessity for healing.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Healing doesn't mean the damage never existed. It means the damage no longer controls our lives.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Healing is an inside job.
quotes.author: Dr. B.J. Palmer

quotes.quote: Before healing others, Heal yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Emotional healing is almost always a process. It takes time. There is a very important reason for this. Our heavenly Father is not only wanting to free us from the pain of past wounds, he is also desirous of bringing us into maturity, both spiritually and emotionally. That takes time, because we need time to learn to make the right choices. He loves us enough to take the months and years necessary to not only heal our wounds, but also build our character. Without growth of character we will get wounded again.
quotes.author: Floyd McClung

quotes.quote: Healing has to occur on three planes: Mental (thinking), Emotional (feeling) & Physical (outcome).
quotes.author: Rev. Reggie Howard

quotes.quote: Any illness is a direct message to you that tells you how you have not been loving who you are, cherishing yourself in order to be who you are. This is the basis of all healing.
quotes.author: Barbara Brennan

quotes.quote: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: Love is the most important healing power there is.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Healing is taking place all the time, and we know it is God who is doing the work.
quotes.author: Malinda Cramer

quotes.quote: Healing begins in the moment a life-enhancing thought (an affirmation) is chosen to replace a life-diminishing thought, no matter how you may be feeling... no matter how much energy is moving or not moving in the body.
quotes.author: Binnie A. Dansby

quotes.quote: Healing is about transforming the consciousness, creating a resonance within a person so that the healing can reach them.
quotes.author: HA-Tony Neate

quotes.quote: A joyful heart is good for healing, a depressed spirit dries the bones.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Healing proceeds from the depths to the heights.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Healing begins with intention.
quotes.author: Dr. Jacqueline Fields

quotes.quote: Healing is a choice. It's not an easy one, because it takes work to turn around your habits, but keep making the choice and shifts will happen.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: One's attitude towards oneself is the single most important factor in healing and staying well.
quotes.author: Dr. Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: As soon as healing takes place, go out and heal somebody else.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Other people are going to find healing in your wounds. Your greatest life messages and your most effective ministry will come out of your deepest hurts.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Healing invokes the power of compassion, both for yourself and for others... At this point, the healed may become a healer.
quotes.author: David Hawkins

quotes.quote: Dancing, singing, storytelling and silence are the four universal healing salves.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: Healing is a journey. It involves stepping out of our habitual roles, our conventional scripts, and improvising a dancing path.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: With the gift of listening comes the gift of healing.
quotes.author: Catherine de Hueck Doherty

quotes.quote: Healing happens when you sleep.
quotes.author: Mary Rabyor

quotes.quote: The more you've suffered, the more you've wanted to bring healing to others.
quotes.author: Ralph Edwards

quotes.quote: To experience some healing within yourself, and to contribute healing to the world, you are summoned to wade through the muck from time to time.
quotes.author: James Hollis

quotes.quote: The body is a self-healing organism, so it's really about clearing things out of the way so the body can heal itself.
quotes.author: Barbara Brennan

quotes.quote: In fact, if you look at the word 'healing' it comes from the word 'holy.' And healing is more than just physical phenomenon.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: We heal in a variety of ways: by accepting, believing, changing, connecting, coping, creating, forgiving, laughing, living, persisting, and transcending.
quotes.author: Jena Pincott

quotes.quote: People go through challenging moments of losing people and of having their life threatened from illness and real grief. But they get through it. And that's the testament to the human spirit— we are fragile, but we also are divine.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: My faith really has played a huge role in healing. And I don't know how people deal with the loss of a loved one or a child without faith. It hasn't been easy.
quotes.author: John Ramsey

quotes.quote: Deep unspeakable suffering may well be called a baptism, a regeneration, the initiation into a new state.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The comfort of knowing you're not alone is in itself remarkably healing.
quotes.author: Jena Pincott

quotes.quote: It is true that one can temporarily feel good by blaming one's misfortunes on others, but this always ends up causing greater pain and confusion. Accepting without blame is the true turning point of healing.
quotes.author: Tulk Thondup

quotes.quote: Your medicine is in you, and you do not observe it. Your ailment is from yourself, and you do not register it.
quotes.author: Hazrat Ali

quotes.quote: True medicine only arises from the creative knowledge of the last and deeper powers of the whole universe; only he who grasps the innermost nature of man can cure him in earnest.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Healing without medicine is a good thing.
quotes.author: Madagascan Saying

quotes.quote: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
quotes.author: Franklin

quotes.quote: Healing comes only from that which leads the patient beyond himself and beyond his entanglements with ego.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The cure for anything is saltwater— sweat, tears, or the sea.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: Much of the pain is self-chosen. It is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Fortunately, analysis is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts. Life itself remains a very effective therapist.
quotes.author: Karen Horney

quotes.quote: We doctors do nothing. We only help and encourage the doctor within...We are at best when we give the doctor who resides within each patient a chance to go to work.
quotes.author: Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.author: Karl Menninger

quotes.quote: The greatest force in the human body is the natural drive of the body to heal itself— but that force is not independent of the belief system, which can translate expectations in physiological change.
quotes.author: Cousins

quotes.quote: The miracle of self-healing occurs when the inner patient yields to the inner physician.
quotes.author: Howard

quotes.quote: Our creator has given us five senses to help us survive threats from the external world, and a sixth sense, our healing system, to help us survive internal threats.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote:
In healing, one can concentrate on either of two attributes; the power of God, or the love of God. In every healing,
there is a manifestation of both.
quotes.author: Francis McNutt

quotes.quote: Healing comes when we choose to walk away from the darkness and move towards a brighter light.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: Cause Your love just keeps on healing me / No matter how I bruise / If I just trust You / Your love just keeps on healing me / One more clue / One more chance that wasn't there before / One more chance that wasn't there before / No pain can harm the way I'm feeling / Lord I know that Your love is healing.
quotes.author: Phil Sawyer

quotes.quote: Oh when everything's going right / Till you're satisfied with your life / Till you're living in the Light / Till we get the healing done.
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: Healing, gonna take some time / I'm on the mend / I'm healing / Starting over at the end / I'm feeling / Stronger now than I've ever been / I'm healing
quotes.author: Glen Allen

quotes.quote: So whatever the road you travel / Just yield to Him and He will unravel / All the hurts in your life. / He will heal you, cleanse you / Make you whole. / And give to you His healing love.
quotes.author: Beverly Laurel Brown

quotes.quote: The crickets sing, and man's o'er-labour'd sense / Repairs itself by rest.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: God is himself a vast medicine for man. It is the heart of God that carries restoration, inspiration, aspiration, and final victory.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It is the infinite, overflowing, swelling impulse of the Divine nature to cure souls of their diseases; to augment that which is good in them; to develop them; to equip them; to perfect them.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine, but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
quotes.author: Proverbs 17:22

quotes.quote: Better ten times ill than one time dead.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on health and wellness)

quotes.quote: Before healing others, heal yourself.
quotes.author: Gambian (on health and wellness)

quotes.quote: A man with a cough cannot conceal himself.
quotes.author: African proverb Yoruba Tribe

quotes.quote: When the heart is at ease, the body is healthy.
quotes.author: Chinese (on health and wellness)

quotes.quote: Sometimes the remedy is worse than the disease.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A man's health can be judged by which he takes two at a time - pills or stairs.
quotes.author: Joan Welsh

quotes.quote: The foundation of success in life is good health: that is the substratum fortune; it is also the basis of happiness. A person cannot accumulate a fortune very well when he is sick.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The trouble with always trying to preserve the health of the body is that it is so difficult to do without destroying the health of the mind.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.

quotes.quote: If you have health, you probably will be happy, and if you have health and happiness, you have all the wealth you need, even if it is not all you want.

quotes.quote: Ill-health of body or of mind, is defeat. Health alone is victory. Let all men, if they can manage it, contrive to be healthy!

quotes.quote: The ingredients of health and long life, are great temperance, open air, easy labor, and little care.

quotes.quote: A wise man should consider that health is the greatest of human blessings, and learn how by his own thought to derive benefit from his illnesses.

quotes.quote: If you don't do what's best for your body, you're the one who comes up on the short end.

quotes.quote: Health is the greatest of all possessions; a pale cobbler is better than a sick king.
quotes.author: Isaac Bickerstaff

quotes.quote: The higher your energy level, the more efficient your body. The more efficient your body, the better you feel and the more you will use your talent to produce outstanding results.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: A man too busy to take care of his health is like a mechanic too busy to take care of his tools.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To become a thoroughly good man is the best prescription for keeping a sound mind and a sound body.
quotes.author: Francis Bowen

quotes.quote: Many people treat their bodies as if they were rented from Hertz - something they are using to get around in but nothing they genuinely care about understanding.
quotes.author: Chungliang Al Huang

quotes.quote: The healthy, the strong individual, is the one who asks for help when he needs it. Whether he has an abscess on his knee or in his soul.
quotes.author: Rona Barrett

quotes.quote: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor's book.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Adapt the remedy to the disease.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: After dinner rest a while; after supper walk a mile.
quotes.author: T. Cogan

quotes.quote: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Eat to live, not live to eat.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Feed a cold and starve a fever.
quotes.author: C. Morley

quotes.quote: If you would live long, open your heart.
quotes.author: Bulgarian (on health and wellness)

quotes.quote: One day in perfect health is much.
quotes.author: Arabic (on health and wellness)

quotes.quote: When one is hungry, everything tastes good.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: All the money in the world can't buy you back good health.

quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.

quotes.quote: A fit, healthy body - that is the best fashion statement

quotes.quote: There's lots of people in this world who spend so much time watching their health that they haven't the time to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is health.

quotes.quote: To insure good health: Eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.

quotes.quote: The human body has been designed to resist an infinite number of changes and attacks brought about by its environment. The secret of good health lies in successful adjustment to changing stresses on the body.
quotes.author: Harry J. Johnson

quotes.quote: As I see it, every day you do one of two things: build health or produce disease in yourself.
quotes.author: Adelle Davis

quotes.quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.

quotes.quote: Health is not simply the absence of sickness.
quotes.author: Hannah Green

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you need medical advice, let these three things be your physicians; a cheerful mind, relaxation from business, and a moderate diet
quotes.author: Schola Salern

quotes.quote: The preservation of health is a duty. Few seem conscious that there is such a thing as physical morality.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Prevention is better than cure.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: People who laugh actually live longer than those who don't laugh. Few persons realize that health actually varies according to the amount of laughter.
quotes.author: James J. Walsh

quotes.quote: He who takes medicine and neglects to diet wastes the skill of his doctors.

quotes.quote: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.

quotes.quote: You're bound to lose your health at some point, but you don't have to lose your dignity, too.

quotes.quote: Money cannot buy health, but I'd settle for a diamond-studded wheelchair.

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.

quotes.quote: To safeguard one's health at the cost of too strict a diet is a tiresome illness indeed.

quotes.quote: The concept of total wellness recognizes that our every thought, word, and behavior affects our greater health and well-being..not only emotionally but also physically and spiritually.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Money is not one hundred percent of life, health and happiness is one percent.
