quotes.quote: Health must not be sacrificed to learning. A strong body makes the mind strong.

quotes.quote: Health is the first requisite after morality.

quotes.quote: To your good health old friend, may you live for a thousand years, and I be there to count them.
quotes.author: Robert Smith Surtees

quotes.quote: Happiness lies in good health and a bad memory.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: With perfect health, there are no low spirits and cannot be.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Pleasant words are as a honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.
quotes.author: Mark Levine

quotes.quote: Health is a great blessing, but the moment you make health one of your main direct objects, you start becoming a crank and imagining there is something wrong with you.

quotes.quote: It's no longer a question of being healthy. It's a question of finding a sickness you like.

quotes.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.

quotes.quote: Keep your vitality. A life without health is like a river without water.

quotes.quote: Knowing that we can be loved exactly as we are gives us all the best opportunity for growing into the healthiest of people.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Use your health, even to the point of wearing it out. That is what it is for. Spend all you have before you die; do not outlive yourself.

quotes.quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.

quotes.quote: Health is not a condition of matter, but of mind.

quotes.quote: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.

quotes.quote: A woman's health is her capital.

quotes.quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.

quotes.quote: Wellness encompasses a healthy body, a sound mind, and a tranquil spirit. Enjoy the journey as you strive for wellness.

quotes.quote: Health is like money, we never have a true idea of its value until we lose it.

quotes.quote: Our bodies are our gardens – our wills are our gardeners.

quotes.quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of year.

quotes.quote: Let food be thy medicine, thy medicine shall be thy food.

quotes.quote: Those who have no time for healthy eating will sooner or later have to find time for illness.

quotes.quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.

quotes.quote: Don't eat anything your great-grandmother wouldn't recognize as food.

quotes.quote: You can do a lot for your diet by eliminating foods that have mascots.

quotes.quote: Healthy eating is a way of life, so it's important to establish routines that are simple, realistically, and ultimately livable.

quotes.quote: I'm not strictly vegetarian, but meat doesn't play a big part in my diet.

quotes.quote: I've been just eating very healthy, all organic, no sugar, white flour, nothing artificial. I'm being so incredibly strict... not a lot of meat!

quotes.quote: My plant-based diet plus fish is to credit for my low blood pressure, high energy, and robust immunity.

quotes.quote: I eat very clean, healthy food at all times because I'm very focused about keeping myself in shape.

quotes.quote: If you keep good food in your fridge, you will eat good food.

quotes.quote: Any food that requires enhancing by the use of chemical substances should in no way be considered a food.

quotes.quote: The easiest diet is, you know, eat vegetables, eat fresh food. Just a really sensible healthy diet like you read about all the time.

quotes.quote: The more colorful the food, the better. I try to add color to my diet, which means vegetables and fruits.

quotes.quote: I eat egg whites a lot. Aside from that, I eat everything. I try to avoid too much oily food, but I do eat carbs. I have to have a balanced diet.

quotes.quote: I try to eat fruit and veggies and meat and all the different categories and have a well rounded diet.

quotes.quote: Eating a high-nutrient diet actually makes you more satisfied with less food, and actually gives the ability to enjoy food more without overeating.

quotes.quote: I eat healthy and don't go by a diet chart. The breakfast is usually heavy, complemented with short frequent meals. My dinner is high on proteins and low on carbohydrates.

quotes.quote: I don't go long without eating. I never starve myself: I grab a healthy snack.

quotes.quote: You feel better when you're eating food that retains nutritional value.
quotes.author: Amber Heard

quotes.quote: Eat breakfast like a king, lunch like a prince, and dinner like a pauper.
quotes.author: Adelle Davis

quotes.quote: Healthy does NOT mean starving yourself EVER. Healthy means eating the right food in the right amount
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: After dinner rest a while; after supper walk a mile.
quotes.author: T. Cogan

quotes.quote: Eating healthy food fills your body with energy and nutrients. Imagine your cells smiling back at you and saying: 'Thank you!'.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: When diet is wrong, medicine is of no use. When diet is correct, medicine is of no need
quotes.author: Ayurvedic Proverb

quotes.quote: Love yourself enough to live a healthy lifestyle.

quotes.quote: The food you eat can be either the safest and most powerful form of medicine or the slowest form of poison.

quotes.quote: Sorry, there´s no magic bullet. You gotta eat healthy and live healthy to be healthy and look healthy. End of story.

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don’t want, drink what you don’t like, and do what you’d rather not.

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty, otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.

quotes.quote: Healthy eating is a way of life, so it’s important to establish routines that are simple, realistically, and ultimately livable.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: From the bitterness of disease man learns the sweetness of health.
quotes.author: Catalan Proverb

quotes.quote: Eating crappy food isn’t a reward — it’s a punishment.

quotes.quote: Take care of yourself, be healthy, and always believe you can be successful in anything you truly want.

quotes.quote: A healthy amount of fat can be beneficial, as it provides additional energy if you do not eat enough carbohydrates.

quotes.quote: A person on a healthy diet can say 'NO' to bad food.

quotes.quote: Food is why you and I live. It should ideally assist us in getting along with our lives.

quotes.quote: A healthy diet is no longer a luxury rather a health necessity.

quotes.quote: No disease that can be treated with diet should be treated with any other means.

quotes.quote: Healthy eating does not mean simply counting calories. It means thinking about both the calories and nutrients in foods.

quotes.quote: Healthy eating is you all in one drugstore! You may effectively battle and prevent diseases if you consume healthy foods.

quotes.quote: Eating healthy may step-up your energy levels! You may become more productive and socially active if you stick with healthy foods.

quotes.quote: Eating healthy might make you look younger! Eating better brings younger looking skin. Healthy foods raise good cell growth and may eliminate adverse free radicals and toxins in your body.
quotes.author: Eva Blanc

quotes.quote: Eating healthy may step-up your productivity at work. Your job may appear to be easier as you have a lot of energy.

quotes.quote: Healthy eating may reduce your health care costs! The advantages of a healthy lifestyle as well include the expense of health care.

quotes.quote: By making the right choices, you can avoid some of the things we think of as inevitable penalties of getting older.

quotes.quote: Eating well--teamed with keeping your weight in the healthy range.

quotes.quote: A healthy diet can give you more energy and help you feel good today.
quotes.author: Walter Willett

quotes.quote: Eating nutritiously is one of the most important things you can do to enhance and maintain your health.
quotes.author: RD king

quotes.quote: Eating a healthy diet affects your body in a positive way. You'll notice you feel better and your body seems to function better.

quotes.quote: Eating balance meal helps the body to its full potential, which is particularly for people living with busy tight schedule, or just people who are constantly feeling not energized and easily falling sick.
quotes.author: RD king

quotes.quote: Eating healthy can also help you deal better with both physical and mental strain, operations and even the common cold or influenza.
quotes.author: RD king

quotes.quote: Healthy living - which includes both consuming healthy food and maintaining a regular exercise routine - can assist you in conforming to the natural maturing process and keep your youthful vigor.
quotes.author: RD king

quotes.quote: Eating healthy can promote a lot of benefits to your body and also your life in general.
quotes.author: RD king

quotes.quote: When we stick to a healthy, balanced diet, we are allowing our body to be properly nourished. Hence, as a result we will be able to gain health benefits from our healthful efforts.
quotes.author: RD king

quotes.quote: Healthy eating can have a positive impact on your life by leading to a more sustained elevated mood. It can reduce stress too.

quotes.quote: Eating the right nutritive food can also boost out energy levels, making us prepared to face each day.
quotes.author: RD king

quotes.quote: We should make healthy choices to ensure a healthy lifestyle. Eating healthy is not something difficult if you put you heart to it.

quotes.quote: In general, eating healthy, fresh food options instead of processed or foods rich in bad fats and sugar has a benefit to a person's overall health that does not just include healthy weight loss.

quotes.quote: Healthy eating means choosing the right kinds of carbohydrate.

quotes.quote: You can eat healthy for the same price as junk or fast food. You just need to shop smarter and wiser.

quotes.quote: If you eat healthy food physically, you need to feed healthy food to your mind too.
quotes.author: Afolake Janet Oyelami

quotes.quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Close your eyes and imagine the best version of you possible. That’s who you really are. Let go of any part of you that doesn’t believe it.
quotes.author: C. Assaad

quotes.quote: Man needs difficulties; they are necessary for health.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Wholeness is not achieved by cutting off a portion of one’s being, but by integration of the contraries.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Sickness is the vengeance of nature for the violation of her laws.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: We repeat what we don’t repair.
quotes.author: Christine Langley-Obaugh

quotes.quote: Happiness is the highest form of health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Every negative belief weakens the partnership between mind and body.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Wounds don’t heal the way we want them to, they heal the way they need to. It takes time for wounds to fade into scars. It takes time for the process of healing to take place. Give yourself that time. Give yourself that grace. Be gentle with your wounds. Be gentle with your heart. You deserve to heal.
quotes.author: Dele Olanubi

quotes.quote: Time And health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Prevention is better than cure.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: The greatest miracle on Earth is the human body. It is stronger and wiser than you may realize, and improving its ability to self-heal is within your control.
quotes.author: Dr Fabrizio Mancini

quotes.quote: Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve others from the overflow. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
quotes.author: Eleanor Brownn

quotes.quote: To feel aroused is to feel alive. Having great sex is like taking in huge lungfuls of fresh air, essential to your body, essential to your health, and essential to your life.
quotes.author: Fiona Thrust

quotes.quote: One life on this earth is all that we get, whether it is enough or not enough, and the obvious conclusion would seem to be that at the very least we are fools if we do not live it as fully and bravely and beautifully as we can.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: Exercise should be regarded as a tribute to the heart.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Health isn’t about being ‘perfect’ with food or exercise or herbs. Health is about balancing those things with your desires. It’s about nourishing your spirit as well as your body.
quotes.author: Golda Poretsky

quotes.quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Health is a large word. It embraces not the body only, but the mind and spirit as well;…and not today's pain or pleasure alone, but the whole being and outlook of a man.
quotes.author: James H. West

quotes.quote: People who laugh actually live longer than those who don’t laugh. Few persons realize that health actually varies according to the amount of laughter.
quotes.author: James J. Walsh

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Health is much more dependent on our habits and nutrition than on medicine.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Symptoms are not enemies to be destroyed, but sacred messengers who encourage us to take better care of ourselves.
quotes.author: Jon Gabriel

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is the first requisite of happiness.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: There's a lot of people in this world who spend so much time watching their health that they haven’t the time to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quotes.quote: The root of all health is in the brain. The trunk of it is in emotion. The branches and leaves are the body. The flower of health blooms when all parts work together.
quotes.author: Kurdish Saying

quotes.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I take my only exercise acting as a pallbearer at the funerals of my friends who exercise regularly.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you don't like something change it; if you can't change it, change the way you think about it.
quotes.author: Mary Engelbreit

quotes.quote: Three things in life – your health, your mission, and the people you love. That’s it.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Doctors won’t make you healthy. Nutritionists won’t make you slim. Teachers won’t make you smart. Gurus won’t make you calm. Mentors won’t make you rich. Trainers won’t make you fit. Ultimately, you have to take responsibility. Save yourself.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: You can learn to follow the inner self, the inner physician that tells you where to go. Healing is simply attempting to do more of those things that bring joy and fewer of those things that bring pain.
quotes.author: O. Carl Simonton

quotes.quote: Men worry over the great number of diseases, while doctors worry over the scarcity of effective remedies.
quotes.author: Pien Ch’iao

quotes.quote: The... patient should be made to understand that he or she must take charge of his own life. Don't take your body to the doctor as if he were a repair shop.
quotes.author: Quentin Regestein

quotes.quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
quotes.author: Robert Urich

quotes.quote: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
quotes.author: Sarah Fielding

quotes.quote: It is part of the cure to wish to be cured.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, or not to anticipate troubles, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly.
quotes.author: Siddartha Guatama Buddha

quotes.quote: Healing is the end of conflict with yourself.
quotes.author: Stephanie Gailing

quotes.quote: It is the cheerful mind persevering. It is the strong mind that hews its way through a thousand difficulties.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos- the trees, the clouds, everything.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The doctor of the future will give no medicine, but will instruct his patients in care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Exercise not only changes your body, it changes your mind, your attitude and your mood.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your body will be around a lot longer than that expensive handbag. Invest in yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Just because you're not sick doesn't mean you're healthy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is health.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: I have chosen to be happy because it is good for my health.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I know this transformation is painful, but you’re not falling apart; you’re just falling into something different, with a new capacity to be beautiful.
quotes.author: William C. Hannan

quotes.quote: To insure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.
quotes.author: William Londen

quotes.quote: Health is a state of complete mental, social and physical well-being, not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.
quotes.author: World Health Organization

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is not merely being alive, but being well.
quotes.author: Marcus Valerius Martialis

quotes.quote: Those who do not find time for exercise will have to find time for illness.
quotes.author: Edward Smith-Stanley

quotes.quote: Without health, life is not life; it is only a state of languor and suffering.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.quote: Until man duplicates a blade of grass, nature can laugh at his so-called scientific knowledge. Remedies from chemicals will never stand in favor compared with the products of nature, the living cell of the plant, the final result of the rays of the sun, the mother of all life.
quotes.author: T. A. Edison

quotes.quote: He who has health has hope, and he who has hope has everything
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Sickness is felt, but health not at all.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Measure your health by your sympathy with morning and Spring.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: Health is the first muse, and sleep is the condition to produce it.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: The power of love to change bodies is legendary, built into folklore, common sense, and everyday experience. Love moves the flesh, it pushes matter around. Throughout history, tender loving care' has uniformly been recognized as a valuable element in healing.
quotes.author: Larry Dossey

quotes.quote: He who takes medicine and neglects to diet wastes the skill of his doctors.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: If you have health, you probably will be happy, and if you have health and happiness, you have the wealth you need, even if it is not all you want.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty, otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A vigorous five-mile walk will do more good for an unhappy but otherwise healthy adult than all the medicine and psychology in the world.
quotes.author: Paul Dudley White

quotes.quote: The trouble with always trying to preserve the health of the body is that it is so difficult to do without destroying the health of the mind.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: One should eat to live, not live to eat.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: If you don't take care of yourself, the undertaker will overtake that responsibility for you.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: Nothing is more fatal to health than an over care of it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Preserving the health by too strict a regimen is a wearisome malady.
quotes.author: Francois Duc de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: A fit, healthy body that is the best fashion statement.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: When health is absent, wisdom cannot reveal itself, art cannot manifest, strength cannot fight, wealth becomes useless, and intelligence cannot be applied.
quotes.author: Herophilus

quotes.quote: The First wealth is health.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Any food that requires enhancing by the use of chemical substances should in no way be considered a food.
quotes.author: John H. Tobe

quotes.quote: The food you eat can be either the safest and most powerful form of medicine or the slowest form of poison.
quotes.author: Ann Wigmore

quotes.quote: Eat food. Not too much. Mostly plants.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Don't eat anything your great-grandmother wouldn't recognize as food.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: The body is like a piano, and happiness is like music. It is needful to have the instrument in good order.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A healthy body is a guest-chamber for the soul; a sick body is a prison.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: You pray for good health and a body that will be strong in old age. Good but your rich foods block the gods' answer and tie Jupiter's hands.
quotes.author: Persius

quotes.quote: Health and intellect are the two blessings of life.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
quotes.author: James Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: The part can never be well unless the whole is well.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The scientific truth may be put quite briefly; eat moderately, having an ordinary mixed diet, and don't worry
quotes.author: Robert Hutchison

quotes.quote: Sedentary people are apt to have sluggish minds. A sluggish mind is apt to be reflected in flabbiness of body and in a dullness of expression that invites no interest and gets none.
quotes.author: Rose Fitzgerald Kennedy

quotes.quote: A man's health can be judged by which he takes two at a time-pills or stairs.
quotes.author: Joan Welsh

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most iportant keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor's book.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind and spirit. When one is free from physical disabilities and mental distractions, the gates of the soul open.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Happiness lies, first of all, in health.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being, while movement and methodical physical exercise save it and preserve it.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The human body has been designed to resist an infinite number of changes and attacks brought about by its environment. The secret of good health lies in successful adjustment to changing stresses on the body.
quotes.author: Harry J. Johnson

quotes.quote: Each patient carries his own doctor inside him.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: It is easier to change a man's religion than to change his diet.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Eating crappy food isn't a reward it's a punishment.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.quote: Sorry, there s no magic bullet. You gotta eat healthy and live healthy to be healthy and look healthy. End of story.
quotes.author: Morgan Spurlock

quotes.quote: About eighty percent of the food on shelves of supermarkets today didn't exist 100 years ago.
quotes.author: Larry McCleary

quotes.quote: Live your life from your heart. Share from your heart. And your story will touch and heal people's souls.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Our hearts and souls are always the departing point for all thought, feeling and action.
quotes.author: Robert Scheid

quotes.quote: What your heart thinks is great, is great. The soul's emphasis is always right.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We transform our relationships when we listen with our ears, hearts, and souls.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Loving someone can be hard at times. You risk a lot when you love - your heart and soul, at the least. Love is the most important and most rewarding investment you can make in another person.
quotes.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

quotes.quote: Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: Falling in love is more than infatuation. It is the need to feel whole, to feel safe, to be healed, to join together with someone, heart and soul.
quotes.author: Michael R French

quotes.quote: An awakened man who is driven by his heart and soul, can touch the heart of a woman he loves, without touching her.
quotes.author: Angie karan

quotes.quote: Only my heart can see your love and only my soul can feel your touch.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Your kiss tells me to wait. To never let go, to hold onto us and never lose hope. I feel it in my soul and know it in my heart. You're my true love since the beginning of time, it's been written in the stars.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you welcome love with your whole heart, soul and body, love will welcome you with all its sweetness.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love sees with the heart, thinks with the soul and grows greater when given away.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
quotes.author: Paramhansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: In the end, we won't remember the most beautiful face and body. We'll remember the most beautiful heart and soul
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The windows of my soul Always stare at you. Knowing, That you have the perfect heart, To make a home.
quotes.author: clairel estevez

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. That's what I hope to give you forever.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: No matter how cold it gets, my heart and soul will forever warm for you.
quotes.author: William A Caldwell III

quotes.quote: One day someone will walk into your life.. open your heart and set your soul in fire.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A loving relationship is a wanting to celebrate, communicate, and know another's heart and soul.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: I'll tell you...what real love is. It is blind devotion, unquestioning self-humiliation, utter submission, trust and belief against yourself and against the whole world, giving up your whole heart and soul to someone who smites it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A soul connection knows no distance. The heart has no boundaries. Love transcends space and time. I love you with my heart and soul.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I will always lean my heart as close to your soul... As I can.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You sleep more peacefully when your heart is full of love and dream beautifully when your soul is in love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My love for you is past the mind, beyond my heart, and into my soul.
quotes.author: Boris Kodjoe

quotes.quote: Love sees with the heart, thinks with the soul and grows greater when given away.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: True love does not worry about the distance between, for the heart and soul travels through one's words.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Two souls with but a single thought, Two hearts that beat as one.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Love is a general acceptance of someone who is accepted by your heart and soul as part of your life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: True love comes from more than just the heart. It comes from your mind, your soul, and ever fiber of your being.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are my soulmate, my sweetheart, you are my dream come true, from now until the end of time I give my hear and soul to you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are my heart, my soul, my treasure, my today, my tomorrow, my forever and my Everything!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love connection starts from eyes to eyes, heart to heart, soul to soul.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you kissed me with love in your heart, you owned my soul.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Here's my love, take it. Here's my soul, use it. Here's my heart, don't break it. Here's my hand, hold it and together we will make it forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I was convinced that eventually I would die of heart disease, that we'd run out of time and out of treatment, the technology wouldn't keep ahead of my disease. And now all of the sudden, when you get the new heart, your life opens up before you again.
quotes.author: Dick Cheney

quotes.quote: When the doctors came they said she had died of heart disease - of joy that kills.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.quote: Heart attacks... God's revenge for eating his little animal friends.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: British scientists say they have developed a super broccoli that can help fight heart disease. You know, if you want to fight heart disease, why don't you come up with a food people will actually eat? Like a super glazed doughnut.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: The most dangerous heart disease: strong memory.
quotes.author: Nizar Qabbani

quotes.quote: My advice to anybody who has had a heart attack is not to simply think that that’s the end. Life can continue on normally afterwards.
quotes.author: Chris Courtenay Williams

quotes.quote: I want to show that anything is possible. My motto is ‘Get up, get dressed and get out there’, and I know this attitude helps me cope with my heart disease and the ICD.
quotes.author: Carl Portman

quotes.quote: People feel alcohol heals heart (diseases) but in theory, it peels the heart.
quotes.author: Dr Sivakumar Gowder

quotes.quote: I knew that my father was going to die of heart disease, and I was trying to make a heart for him.
quotes.author: Robert Jarvik

quotes.quote: Make your decisions with your heart, and you'll end up with heart disease.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Heart disease has changed my eating habits, but I still cook bacon for the smell.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: As the heart is, so is love to the heart. It partakes of its strength or weakness, its health or disease.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The thing about the heart was that you could not coax it or force it, as you could any other disease. Will power meant nothing.
quotes.author: Michael Shaara

quotes.quote: No man with a touch of heart disease should ever back his mounts.
quotes.author: Isaac Murphy

quotes.quote: Well you know, it's true that as a fat person I run a greater risk of heart disease, diabetes, and a number of other things. But guess what? The amount of that risk is almost infinitessimal!
quotes.author: Daniel Pinkwater

quotes.quote: I cannot sit down and say ‘I have got heart disease, oh dear’. I have got to say, ‘sorry, heart disease, but this [looking after my daughter] is more important.’ I couldn't allow it to beat me.
quotes.author: Sarah McBryde

quotes.quote: My heart attack has opened up a whole new life for me. It has made me look after myself.
quotes.author: Sean Moran

quotes.quote: One out of two women are going to have, live with, and/or die from heart disease and stroke. It is amazing women are still not getting that message, and one has to ask why.
quotes.author: Martha Hill

quotes.quote: Heart disease is a largely self-inflicted disease, hopefully, knowing the ‘heart age’ is a wake-up call and, for some of our participants, it has been.
quotes.author: Sheila Caldwell

quotes.quote: Millions of people around the world continue to die from a largely preventable disease, denial is our biggest enemy in the fight against heart disease… It is always someone else.
quotes.author: Sheila Caldwell

quotes.quote: I saw many people who had advanced heart disease and I was so frustrated because I knew if they just knew how to do the right thing, simple lifestyle and diet steps, that the entire trajectory of their life and health would have been different.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: Some people think plant-based diet, whole foods diet is extreme. Half a million people a year will have their chests opened up and a vein taken from their leg and sewn onto their coronary artery. Some people would call that extreme.
quotes.author: Caldwell Esselstyn

quotes.quote: The reason we have cancer and heart disease is the same reason you can't get rid of the wear and tear on your tires on your car: as soon as you use them, you are wearing them away. You can't make eternal tires, and it's the same with the human body.
quotes.author: S. Jay Olshansky

quotes.quote: The most chronic heart disease is caused by having greediness in your heart. Go for check ups regularly and learn how to swallow those lumpy pills of generousity. Be kind and be healthy.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The virtue of a heart attack lies in instantaneous arrival. The death of the body takes place before the death of the mind.
quotes.author: Ch'oe Yun

quotes.quote: According to a new study, women in satisfying marriages are less likely to develop cardiovascular diseases than unmarried women. So don't worry, lonely women, you'll be dead soon.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: We left no doubt that we are one heartbeat And something like that is pretty hard to stop once it gets going.
quotes.author: Oscar Lua

quotes.quote: Life isn't measured in minutes, but in heartbeats.
quotes.author: Joan Lowery Nixon

quotes.quote: You may not be down to your final heartbeat, but you may be down to your last paycheck, solution, or thimble of faith. Each sunrise seems to bring fresh reasons for fear.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: To listen to the silence is to hear the heartbeat of the universe.
quotes.author: Laurence Overmire

quotes.quote: You have to slow your heart rate, stay calm. You have to shoot in between your heartbeats.
quotes.author: Chris Kyle

quotes.quote: The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe, to match your nature with nature.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Every breath, every heartbeat, was one less until maybe things stopped hurting this much.
quotes.author: Jenny Downham

quotes.quote: Patients know in a heartbeat if they're getting a clumsy exam.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: To be in a body is to hear the heartbeat of death at every moment.
quotes.author: Andrew Harvey

quotes.quote: If you have a heartbeat, there's still time for your dreams.
quotes.author: Sean Stephenson

quotes.quote: And since time sets its own tempo, like a heartbeat or an ebb tide, timepieces don't really keep time. They just keep up with it, if they're able.
quotes.author: Dava Sobel

quotes.quote: We have our own little heartbeat, too. We already have what I would call polyrhythms going on.
quotes.author: John Densmore

quotes.quote: The final heartbeat for the Christian is not the mysterious conclusion to a meaningless existence. It is, rather, the grand beginning to a life that will never end.
quotes.author: James Dobson

quotes.quote: Things could change so entirely, in a heartbeat; the world could be made entirely anew, because someone was kind.
quotes.author: Jo Baker

quotes.quote: Don't do it for the money. Follow the path to do what makes your heartbeat faster. Follow your passion.
quotes.author: Lynn Tilton

quotes.quote: Life is more than breath and a heartbeat; meaning and purpose are the life of life.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: It was like the eve of a battle the hearts beat, the eyes laughed, and they felft that the life they were perhaps going to lose, was after all, a good thing.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: While the heartbeats, hope lingers.
quotes.author: Alison Croggon

quotes.quote: Every human heartbeat is a universe of possibilities.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: When you become aware of your heart, you want it to stop beating. You need a break from the constant rhythm, a rest.
quotes.author: Iain Reid

quotes.quote: Hands on your breast can keep your heart beating.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: While there is life there is hope. I beg to assert that as long as a man's heart beats, as long as a man's flesh quivers, I do not allow that a being gifted with thought and will can allow himself to despair.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: Repetition is based on body rhythms, so we identify with the heartbeat, or with walking, or with breathing.
quotes.author: Karlheinz Stockhausen

quotes.quote: The same heartbeats in every human breast.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: I believe that the Good Lord gave us a finite number of heartbeats and I'm damned if I'm going to use up mine running up and down a street.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Love is the heartbeat of all life.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: We all have music in us your heartbeat is your drum, your voice is your sound, and music is supposed to put you in tune with nature.
quotes.author: Randy Weston

quotes.quote: Lies were like acid, corrosive. They could dissolve trust in a heartbeat.
quotes.author: Rob Thurman

quotes.quote: The heavens and earth stay as they were my heart Beats as it beat: the truth remains the truth.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Laughter is the best way to make somebody's heartbeat
quotes.author: Robert Holden

quotes.quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: I leapt eagerly into books. The characters’ lives were so much more interesting than the lonely heartbeat of my own.
quotes.author: Ruta Sepetys

quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: We each have a finite number of heartbeats, a finite amount of time. But we have enough heartbeats and enough time to do what is important.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: Her heartbeat was in her hands, her heartbeat the way she moved her head, her whole body was her heart beating.
quotes.author: Tom Spanbauer

quotes.quote: It is still beautiful to hear the heartbeat but often the shadow seems more real than the body.
quotes.author: Tomas Transtromer

quotes.quote: By writing at the instant, the very heartbeat of life is caught.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The heart beats louder and the soul hears quicker in silence and solitude.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: You've got to learn to leave the table when love's no longer being served.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: It's hard to forget someone who you've imagined spending forever with.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't feel sad over someone who gave up on you. Feel sad for them because they gave up on someone who would have never given up on them.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: I am thinking of you in my sleepless solitude tonight. If it's wrong to love you, then my heart just won't let me be right cause I'm drowned in you and I won't pull through without you by my side.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Once you had put the pieces back together, even though you may look intact, you were never quite the same as you'd been before the fall.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Someday you're gonna look back on this moment of your life as such a sweet time of grieving. You'll see that you were in mourning and your heart was broken, but your life was changing.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Hearts can break. Yes, hearts can break. Sometimes I think it would be better if we died when they did, but we don't.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Mineko Iwasaki

quotes.quote: No matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief.
quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

quotes.quote: Heartbreak could be lived with if it weren't accompanied by regret.
quotes.author: Laura Kasischke

quotes.quote: Love hurts worse than getting slammed by a 250-pound linebacker.
quotes.author: Miranda Kenneally

quotes.quote: Don't you EVER break someone's heart, because they only have one. Break their bones, they have 206 on those!
quotes.author: Jayy Von Monroe

quotes.quote: When you have loved unconditionally one man and lost that love, it leaves a wound that never heals, a sad and broken heart, a void forever.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: I wish I was a kid again, because skinned knees are easier to fix then broken hearts.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A heart breaking isn't always as loud as a bomb exploding.. Sometimes it can be as quiet as a feather falling.. And the most painful thing is, no one really hears it, except you.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A final comfort that is small, but not cold: The heart is the only broken instrument that works.
quotes.author: T.E. Kalem

quotes.quote: I don't know why they call it heartbreak. It feels like every other part of my body is broken too.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Sadness flies on the wings of the morning and out of the heart of darkness comes the light.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: When love is lost, do not bow your head in sadness; instead keep your head up high and gaze into heaven for that is where your broken heart has been sent to heal.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't cry when the sun is gone, because the tears won't let you see the stars.
quotes.author: Violeta Parra

quotes.quote: If someone you love hurts you cry a river, build a bridge, and get over it.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have lost at all.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Perhaps some day I'll crawl back home, beaten, defeated. But not as long as I can make stories out of my heartbreak, beauty out of sorrow.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Heartbreak is funny to everyone but the heartbroken.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go, but rather, learning to start over.
quotes.author: Nicole Sobon

quotes.quote: The scariest part of letting someone go is not knowing if you will ever find a love that strong again. But, whats even scarier is staying with them and knowing you're missing out on every other love you should have known.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to learn to let go of the person you love, and just hold on to the memory of what was.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't hold on because you think there will be no one else. There will always be someone else. You've got to believe you are worth more than being repeatedly hurt by someone who doesn't really care. Believe that someone will see what you are really worth and treat you the way you should be treated.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Stop holding on to what hurts and start making room for what feels good.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: He already ruined your mascara, don't let him ruin your life.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: While I was holding on all you did was let go.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Trying to forget someone you love is like trying to remember someone you knew.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can't let go of the hurt, because it's all that's left of the greatest love story you never thought would end.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It's a certain tragedy when agony and resentment are all you have left connecting you to someone you once loved.
quotes.author: JSB Morse

quotes.quote: Sometimes the greatest enemy of our present happiness is the past happiness that is too well remembered.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: What's even more painful than being abandoned, is knowing that you're not even worth an explanation.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
quotes.author: JSB Morse

quotes.quote: A heartbreak is a terrible thing to someone who loves with passion.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to hold your head up high, blink away the tears and say good-bye.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's better to be alone. No one can hurt you that way.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Having a broken heart is like falling off a horse. Most people will get back on, but some walk away too afraid of the pain to take another chance.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: When the heart grieves over what is has lost, the spirit rejoices over what it has left.
quotes.author: Sufi Epigram

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: You've got to learn to leave the table when love's no longer being served.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: Pain makes you stronger, tears make you braver, and heartbreak makes you wiser. So thank the past for a better future.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: In the depths of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of withering's, of tarnishing's.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: So this was betrayal. It was like being left alone in the desert at dusk without water or warmth. It left your mouth dry and will broken. It sapped your tears and made you hollow.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: I won't ever leave you, even though you're always leaving me.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: Did I really want to stay on this road longer, knowing it was only going to end in devastation?
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: The biggest coward of a man is to awaken the love of a woman without the intention of loving her.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: I have not broken your heart - you have broken it; and in breaking it, you have broken mine.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: So it's true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.author: E. A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Sometimes I’m terrified of my heart; of its constant hunger for whatever it is it wants. The way it stops and starts.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Where you used to be, there is a hole in the world, which I find myself constantly walking around in the daytime, and falling in at night. I miss you like hell.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: In the absence of love, there is nothing worth fighting for.
quotes.author: Elijah Wood

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is too hard to be alone, and sometimes life is too good to be alone.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Don't feel sad over someone who gave up on you, feel sorry for them because they gave up on someone who would have never given up on them.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only way the good Lord can get into some hearts is to break them.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: It is a curious sensation: the sort of pain that goes mercifully beyond our powers of feeling. When your heart is broken, your boats are burned: nothing matters any more. It is the end of happiness and the beginning of peace.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: But that intimacy of mutual embarrassment, in which each feels that the other is feeling something, having once existed, its effect is not to be done away with.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: When you love you should not think you can direct the course of love, for love, if it finds you worthy, directs your course.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Hearts will never be practical until they can be made unbreakable.
quotes.author: L. Frank Baum

quotes.quote: Don't cry over someone who wouldn't cry over you.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: There is no better than adversity. Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I never wanted but your heart--that gone, you have nothing more to give.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Those who are faithful know only the trivial side of love: it is the faithless who know love's tragedies.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There are many ways of breaking a heart. Stories were full of hearts broken by love, but what really broke a heart was taking away its dream -- whatever that dream might be
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Anxiety, heartbreak, and tenderness mark the in-between state. It's the kind of place we usually want to avoid. The challenge is to stay in the middle rather than buy into struggle and complaint. The challenge is to let it soften us rather than make us more rigid and afraid.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: The cruelest lies are often told in silence.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Have you ever been hurt and the place tries to heal a bit, and you just pull the scar off of it over and over again.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Love begins with a smile, grows with a kiss, and ends with a teardrop.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: When you give someone your whole heart and he doesn't want it, you cannot take it back. It's gone forever.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: There is a time for departure even when there's no certain place to go.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Nothing ends nicely, that's why it ends.
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.quote: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: What's meant to be will always find a way.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.quote: The great tragedy of life is not that men perish, but that they cease to love.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: It is in the love of one's family only that heartfelt happiness is known.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Grace is heartfelt, tinged with love, a spillover gift of the God who extended undeserved favor toward us.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: You could start a fire with the heat between you two. You're mistaking bitter animosity for heartfelt affection.
quotes.author: Michelle Hodkin

quotes.quote: Courage is the measure of our heartfelt participation with life, with another, with a community, a work, a future.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: The most essential thing in life is to establish an unafraid, heartfelt communication with others.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Feeling good about your life, but not expressing a heartfelt 'thank you,' is like wrapping a gift for someone and never giving it to them.
quotes.author: Chip Conley

quotes.quote: Every love that leads away from His love is in fact a punishment; only a love that leads to His love is a heartfelt and pure love.
quotes.author: Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyya

quotes.quote: The soul's calm sunshine, and the heartfelt joy.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Avoid letting daily cares override your heart-felt intuition.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: The more sincere the soul, the heavier the cross endured.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Sincerity and truth are the basis of every virtue.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Life can become difficult when out of sync with your heart-felt desires.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Sincerity is the highest complement you can pay,
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Never regret anything you have done with a sincere affection; nothing is lost that is born of the heart.
quotes.author: Basil Rathbone

quotes.quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The sincere friends of this world are as ship lights in the stormiest of nights.
quotes.author: Giotto di Bondone

quotes.quote: Sincerity is the indispensable ground of all conscientiousness, and by consequence of all heartfelt religion.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what you believe just so long as you're sincere.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Focus your heart-felt intuition onto things that really matter to you.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Make sure that your heartfelt thanksgiving is more consistent than your nagging needs and your passionate apology fervent than your unhealthy justifications. Be clean and hopeful.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Sincerity gives wings to power.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Most talented with a God given talent for weaving words of heartfelt wonder.
quotes.author: Grange Lady Haig Rutan

quotes.quote: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Great vision communication usually means heartfelt messages are coming from real human beings.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Sincere practice, makes the impossible possible.
quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

quotes.quote: Be sincere; be brief; be seated.
quotes.author: Franklin Roosevelt

quotes.quote: My brain has no heart, and my heart has no brain. That's why when I speak my mind I appear heartless, and when I do what's in my heart I seem thoughtless.
quotes.author: Anthony Bautista

quotes.quote: He lies there with no heart, but heartless is the last thing you'll call him.
quotes.author: Sonali Jain

quotes.quote: Through humor, you can soften some of the worst blows that life delivers. And once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Not all of our heartless plans work as we intend; nor do all of our good intentions. We are where we are, and we can rarely predict where we will go, no matter how firm our beliefs.
quotes.author: Michelle Sagara

quotes.quote: I made a tin man costume with tin foil and furnace parts because I thought it would help me be more heartless.
quotes.author: Marcel Dzama

quotes.quote: Those who are heartless, once cared too much.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Most people who act heartless have a sweet heart. They just act heartless to protect themselves from getting hurt again.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: In life's journey, you will meet all sorts of characters. Always remember, never shed a tear for the heartless, corrupt or insensitive.
quotes.author: Krystal

quotes.quote: Without a mythology, faith is impersonal and heartless.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: It may be true that the law cannot change the heart but it can restrain the heartless.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: People can be so heartless and dirty.
quotes.author: Jim Goad

quotes.quote: An intellectual, heartless man never becomes an inspired man. It is always the heart that speaks in the man of love; it discovers a greater instrument than intellect can give you, the instrument of inspiration.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Heartless retouching should not be the chosen tool to represent women in the beginning of this century.
quotes.author: Peter Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Your mate never talks to you. You live together but don't interact. He has become cold and inconsiderate of your feelings.
quotes.author: Raymond B. Green

quotes.quote: Life without flying unconditionally, life with hindered and heartless ending.
quotes.author: Tamara Stamenkovic

quotes.quote: You know I love you more when you're cold and heartless.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: They call you heartless; but you have a heart and I love you for being ashamed to show it.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Most heartless people have a heart, they'll just do anything to protect their heart even if it means that they have to break yours.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Just when you give up and think the whole world is heartless, you turn around and face someone so wonderful that they give you a reason to Love again, at least one more time.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Adolescence is that time when I think, it can be- it's the cruelest place on Earth. It can really be heartless.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: A little inhumanity does not describe you as heartless, rather, it is a way of telling others that you have a heart that can get angry.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The experiences of the heartless are so limited. It is hate that is blind. Love may miss a flaw here and there, but hate misses beauty everywhere.
quotes.author: Helen McCloy

quotes.quote: Perhaps this is just punishment for those who have been heartless, to understand only when nothing can be undone.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: If you have given up your heart ... you have already lost. A heartless creature is a loveless creature, and a loveless creature is a beast.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: If you can be heartless as the first man who visited the space, then there will be nothing impossibe for you to achieve.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The insatiable need for heartless power and ruthless control is the telltale sign of an uninitiated man - the most irresponsible, incompetent and destructive force on earth.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: There's been an accident,' they said / 'Your servant's cut in half; he's dead.' / 'Indeed,' said Mr. Jones, 'And please, / Send me the half that's got my keys.'
quotes.author: Harry Graham

quotes.quote: Cruelty on most occasions is like the wind, boisterous in itself, and exciting a murmur and bustle in all the things it moves among.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.
quotes.author: Proverbs 12:10

quotes.quote: From all that terror teaches, / From lies of tongue and pen, / From all the easy speeches / That comfort cruel men, / From sale and profanation / Of honour and the sword, / From sleep and from damnation, / Deliver us, good Lord.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: You think this cruel? take it for a rule, / No creature smarts so little as a fool.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: O you hard hearts, you cruel men of Rome, / Knew you, not Pompey?
quotes.author: Julius Ceasar

quotes.quote: Being cruel to be kind is just ordinary cruelty with an excuse made for it...And it is right that it should be more resented, as it is.
quotes.author: Ivy-Compton Burnett

quotes.quote: Excessive bail shall not be required, nor excessive fines imposed, nor cruel and unusual punishment inflicted.
quotes.author: Constitution of the United States

quotes.quote: And most of all would I flee from the cruel madness of love, / The honey of poison-flowers and all the measureless ill.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: To live is to hurt others, and through others, to hurt oneself. Cruel earth! How can we manage not to touch anything? To find what ultimate exile?
quotes.author: Carol A. Dingle

quotes.quote: Though critics may bow to art, and I am its own true lover, / It is not art, but heart, which wins the wide world over. / Though smooth be the heartless prayer, no ear in Heaven will mind it.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Yes, I will take a cheerful tone / And feign to share their heartless glee, / But I would rather weep alone / Than laugh amid their revelry.
quotes.author: Anna Bronte

quotes.quote: My joys each after other, in haste are flying, / And leave me dying for her that scorns my crying. / Oh she from hence departs, my love refraining, / For whom, all heartless alas! I die complaining.
quotes.author: John Wilbye

quotes.quote: Cruel, behold my heavy ending, / See what you wrought by your disdaining. / Causeless I die, love still attending / Your hopeless pity of my complaining. / Suffer those eyes which thus have slain me, / With speed to end their killing power, / So shall you prove how love doth pain me, / And see me die still your.
quotes.author: John Wilbye

quotes.quote: Here is cruel Frederick, see! / A horrid wicked boy was he; / He caught the flies, poor little things, / And then tore off their tiny wings, / He killed the birds, and broke the chairs, / And threw the kitten down the stairs; / And oh! far worse than all beside, / He whipped his Mary, till she cried.
quotes.author: Heinrich Hoffmann

quotes.quote: I must let go each little hand; / I must leave all behind. / Oh! don't be cruel to the motherless darlings; / Don't be unkind!
quotes.author: Henry Clay Work

quotes.quote: I'm not heartless. I appear so because I'm afraid of getting hurt. I'm one of those fragile hearts that once cared too much.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: Never care about people’s feelings towards you.
quotes.author: Jordan Hoechlin

quotes.quote: The day your soul has died is the day you don't care about anyone’s pain unless it builds you up or makes you richer.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The very fact we use the term 'cold-blooded' as a synonym for 'heartless' should tell you something about the innate bias we primates hold against reptiles. Do not judge other species by your own social norms.
quotes.author: Becky Chambers

quotes.quote: Hardship is meant to modify heartless of man to make feel in the flesh as soft being.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: For women to succeed in politics, business, and entrepreneurial ventures they have to battle against a stereotype of being heartless and unfeminine.
quotes.author: Karla Crome

quotes.quote: If mothers are our first teachers, then having a narcissistic one teaches us that human closeness is terrifying, and the world is a heartless, inconsistent place.
quotes.author: Koren Zailckas

quotes.quote: The problem with certainty is that sometimes it can sound cold and heartless, although it is the most compassionate and supportive answer.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: When women are angry at men, they call them heartless. When men are angry at women, they call them crazy. Sometimes it doesn't stop there.
quotes.author: Susan Cheever

quotes.quote: Even the most innocent person, when cornered, is capable of a heartless crime.
quotes.author: Yiyun Li

quotes.quote: Religion is the sigh of the oppressed creature, the heart of a heartless world, and the soul of soulless conditions. It is the opium of the people.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: I'm not heartless. I've just learned how to use my heart less.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: The cold, heartless, and/or antisocial people in the world are usually the ones with the biggest hearts.
quotes.author: Isaiah Harden

quotes.quote: I suppose when you want something badly enough when you lose the thing most precious to you, people just become toys, puppets to move around to achieve your goals.
quotes.author: Sara Wolf

quotes.quote: It is heartwarming to read what you do not often hear. It is touching to realize how nice and sweet you really are, without having to make a special effort--just by being you. Precisely for being you.
quotes.author: Eline Snel

quotes.quote: There is something in the very name Friend that quickens the pulse and warms the heart.
quotes.author: Amy Addingly

quotes.quote: Hurrah, Heigh ho! Let the north winds blow, for love warms the heart with a tender glow.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Chesley

quotes.quote: Tears cleanse the heart, love warms the heart.
quotes.author: Daniella Kessler

quotes.quote: The very thought that a man and a woman are given the gift of love and a lifetime to multiply the good times as well as divide the bad, warms the heart.
quotes.author: M. David Chambers

quotes.quote: When something is heartwarming and triumphant, and not corny or preachy, it's such a powerful thing.
quotes.author: Perfume Genius

quotes.quote: Well, there's nothing more touching than putting a smile on a kid's face when you can.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: It is very touching that you are able to create some kind of impact through a character.
quotes.author: Kiara Advani

quotes.quote: There is nothing so rewarding as to make people realize that they are worthwhile in this world.
quotes.author: Bob Anderson

quotes.quote: Nothing is more rewarding than to take a song, create it out of thin air and then watch it affect people.
quotes.author: Luke Bryan

quotes.quote: It's rewarding to know that a song is doing more than just helping someone to have a nice day: it's actually leaving a deposit in their lives.
quotes.author: Natalie Grant

quotes.quote: The most rewarding aspect of parenting is seeing my children be authentic. The most rewarding thing for me is to see them do anything that they're proud of.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.quote: It's almost heartening to think that the attachment you have can define your perception as much as any other influence.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Ô, Sunlight! The most precious gold to be found on Earth.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: People change more frequently than the seasons do and still we blame the sun for bringing in the heat.
quotes.author: Shweta Tale

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is good to fly close to the flame, see and experience the heat, but then fly away again, to survive, more wise in the art of heat.
quotes.author: Robert Black

quotes.quote: Iteration, like friction, is likely to generate heat instead of progress.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: In the heat of the battle, it's always different than when you go back and look at it on film.
quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

quotes.quote: I'm sure it's the heat! It's all because of the heat! Well, I'll go buy some refreshments. I'm sure that'll calm you down.
quotes.author: Hideaki Sorachi

quotes.quote: It's not natural this heat. Something's not right, like maybe some sort of punishment.
quotes.author: David Anaxagoras

quotes.quote: Heat of the sun burn like fire. Heat of the sun burn like fire.
quotes.author: Andrew Miller

quotes.quote: Warmth, life, color, people.
quotes.author: Ben Barzman

quotes.quote: Well, among humans, it's, uh, meant to express warmth and love.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: The island. Life. Death and decay, that feeds new life. Warmth. Cold. Peace. Violence.
quotes.author: Brian Johnson

quotes.quote: Patience, care, and a little warmth from the sun are our best hope your Majesty.
quotes.author: Jeremy Brock

quotes.quote: The sun! The most glorious sun! I've dreamed of feeling its golden warmth.
quotes.author: Greg Weisman

quotes.quote: Put your arms around me. I need to feel their warmth, to keep the chill of death away.
quotes.author: Dalton Trumbo

quotes.quote: You feel the cold because you touched the stone. But you feel warmth because there is life inside.
quotes.author: Tom Fontana

quotes.quote: What is it about the human touch, holding a loved one close, and feeling their warmth, their heartbeat? I mean this is the army and frequently our loved ones are far away but their warmth doesn't have to be.
quotes.author: Katherine Fugate

quotes.quote: To wide warmth... and all around... soft grass and kind breeze. At least... that is what I've imagined.
quotes.author: Miguel Montalvo

quotes.quote: No man can take my love. It must be given as the sun gives warmth in the gray of dawn.
quotes.author: Burt Kennedy

quotes.quote: In the heat of heat / The heat is so hot / My body takes control / In the heat of heat / The heat gets so hot / My passion overloads
quotes.author: James Harris III

quotes.quote: It's summer / The heat is blazing like the fourth of July / I got the air con on and its blasting on high / So just grab something cool and jump in your ride / Pick up everybody, I'll be waiting outside
quotes.author: Tim James

quotes.quote: Tropical summer - balmy day / Sit around / You haven't much to say / 'Cause the heat is on / The heat is on. / You know you're in the hands of fate
quotes.author: Robert Allan Palmer

quotes.quote: The heat is on. / Tropical summer - balmy day / On the road to Mandalay
quotes.author: Robert Allan Palmer

quotes.quote: It's that heat coming in slow motion / Barbecue yea body keep yea body straight roasting / Light skin hunny's get the sun tan lotion / Dark skin hunny's in the summer no commotion
quotes.author: Will Adams

quotes.quote: Yeah it's that summer heat / You know we 'bout to get right / Hitting you like stomping feet / Please just don't pick up a fight
quotes.author: O.G.B

quotes.quote: The sun is shining all his light, uh / That summer heat
quotes.author: O.G.B

quotes.quote: O wind, rend open the heat, / cut apart the heat, / rend it to tatters.
quotes.author: Hilda Doolittle

quotes.quote: The cows, each with her peaceful cud, / Lie waiting for the heat to pass. / From somewhere on the slope near by / Into the pale depth of the noon
quotes.author: Archibald Lampman

quotes.quote: Heat is the energy input that initiates all atmospheric processes.
quotes.author: Paul E. Lydolph

quotes.quote: In the sloped shadow of my hat / I lean at rest, and drain the heat; / Nay more, I think some blessed power / Hath brought me wandering idly here: / In the full furnace of this hour / My thoughts grow keen and clear.
quotes.author: Archibald Lampman

quotes.quote: Heat waves shimmering / one or two inches / above the dead grass.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: The economic fortunes of farmers completely depend upon heat and moisture conditions during the growing season.
quotes.author: Paul E. Lydolph

quotes.quote: Heat of blood makes young people change their inclinations often, and habit makes old ones keep to theirs a great while.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Heat can never pass from a colder to a warmer body without some other change, connected therewith, occurring at the same time.
quotes.author: Rudolf Clausius

quotes.quote: The supernova sun would be cooler than the fire lighting our desire.
quotes.author: Missy Lyons

quotes.quote: When I feel the heat, I see the light.
quotes.author: Everett Dirksen

quotes.quote: But heat can also be produced by the friction of liquids, in which there could be no question of changes in structure, or of the liberation of latent heat.
quotes.author: Hermann von Helmholtz

quotes.quote: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Coolness and absence of heat and haste indicate fine qualities.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When the water starts boiling it is foolish to turn off the heat.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Heat not a furnace for your foe so hot that it do singe yourself.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Nothing splendid was ever created in cold blood. Heat is required to forge anything. Every great accomplishment is the story of a flaming heart.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: The thing with heat is, no matter how cold you are, no matter how much you need warmth, it always, eventually, becomes too much.
quotes.author: Victoria Aveyard

quotes.quote: He who cannot put his thoughts on ice should not enter into the heat of dispute.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When you can't make them see the light, make them feel the heat.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan
