quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Far in a wild, unknown to public view, From youth to age a reverend hermit grew; The moss his bed, the cave his humble cell, His food the fruits, his drink the crystal well, Remote from man, with God he pass'd the days; Prayer all his business, all his pleasure praise.
quotes.author: Thomas Parnell

quotes.quote: The thoughtful man becomes a hermit in the thoroughfares of the marketplace.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The people who know God wellâ€”mystics, hermits, prayerful people, those who risk everything to find Godâ€”always meet a lover, not a dictator.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.quote: Hermits have no peer pressure.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A hermit is simply a person to whom civilization has failed to adjust itself.
quotes.author: Will Cuppy

quotes.quote: The mind is not a hermit's cell, but a place of hospitality and intercourse.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: The mind can weave itself warmly in the cocoon of its own thoughts, and dwell a hermit anywhere.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: The hermit doesn't sleep at night, in love with the blue of the vacant moon. The cool of the breeze that rustles the trees rustles him too.
quotes.author: ChingAn

quotes.quote: A recluse without books and ink is already in life a dead man.
quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

quotes.quote: Everything can be a trap. A hermit goes to a cave to get out of all worldly attachments and then gets attached to the cave. If we miss the point, then everything becomes a trap.
quotes.author: Baba Hari Das

quotes.quote: You are what you eat. For example, if you eat garlic you're apt to be a hermit.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: The only way to avoid all frightening choices is to leave society and become a hermit, and that is a frightening choice.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: A hermit is one who renounces the world of fragments that he may enjoy the world wholly and without interruption.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: They say that God is everywhere, and yet we always think of Him as somewhat of a recluse.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Consciousness is a born hermit.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: A fine line separates the weary recluse from the fearful hermit. Finer still is the line between hermit and bitter misanthrope.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: A hermit, aware of such unworldly joy, finds truth from scenes of rock walls, sunset glow, mountain caves and clouds. ... A decent person needs to empty his heart for room for newly realized truth as well as to fill his heart at the same time, leaving no room for worldly desires.
quotes.author: Choi Joon-ho

quotes.quote: Nuns fret not at their convent's narrow room; And hermits are contented with their cells.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: A hermit is a deserter from the army of humanity.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Something of the hermit's temper is an essential element in many forms of excellence, since it enables men to resist the lure of popularity, to pursue important work in spite of general indifference or hostility, and arrive at opinions which are opposed to prevalent errors.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Not all of us are called to be hermits, but all of us need enough silence and solitude in our lives to enable the deeper voice of our own self to be heard at least occasionally.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Sometimes the idea of living as a hermit appeals to all of us. No demands, no needs, no pain, no disappointments. But that is because we have been hurt, are worn out.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: If a hermit lives in a state of ecstasy, his lack of comfort becomes the height of comfort. He must relinquish it.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: But I'll tell you what hermits realize. If you go off into a far, far forest and get very quiet, you'll come to understand that you're connected with everything.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: A hero. You want to be one of those rare human beings who make history, rather than merely watch it flow around them like water around a rock.
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.quote: I think a hero is any person really intent on making this a better place for all people.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The hero sees values beyond what's possible. That's the nature of a hero. It kills him, of course, ultimately. But it makes the whole struggle of humanity worthwhile.
quotes.author: John Gardner

quotes.quote: We do not have to become heroes overnight. Just a step at a time, meeting each thing that comes up ... discovering we have the strength to stare it down.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The fame of heroes owes little to the extent of their conquests and all to the success of the tributes paid to them.
quotes.author: Jean Genet

quotes.quote: Nothing is given to man on earth - struggle is built into the nature of life, and conflict is possible - the hero is the man who lets no obstacle prevent him from pursuing the values he has chosen.
quotes.author: Andrew Bernstein

quotes.quote: Real change in society must start from individual initiative.
quotes.author: The Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Heroes are made in the hour of defeat. Success is, therefore, well described as a series of glorious defeats.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The hero is commonly the simplest and obscurest of men.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is braver five minutes longer.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The legacy of heroes is the memory of a great name and the inheritance of a great example.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The ordinary man is involved in action, the hero acts. An immense difference.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: A hero is a man who is afraid to run away.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: The prudent see only the difficulties, the bold only the advantages, of a great enterprise; the hero sees both; diminishes the former and makes the latter preponderate, and so conquers.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: Being a hero is about the shortest lived profession on earth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Heroes are created by popular demand, sometimes out of the scantiest materials.
quotes.author: Gerald W. Johnson

quotes.quote: Heroes are not known by the loftiness of their carriage; the greatest braggarts are generally the merest cowards.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Heroism is not only in the man, but in the occasion.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: I think of a hero as someone who understands the degree of responsibility that comes with his freedom.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The hero is one who kindles a great light in the world, who sets up blazing torches in the dark streets of life for men to see by.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: True heroism is remarkably sober, very undramatic. It is not the urge to surpass all others at whatever cost, but the urge to serve others, at whatever cost.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The world's battlefields have been in the heart chiefly; more heroism has been displayed in the household and the closet, than on the most memorable battlefields in history.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: To have no heroes is to have no aspiration, to live on the momentum of the past, to be thrown back upon routine, sensuality, and the narrow self.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: Show me a hero and I will write you a tragedy.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Not the glittering weapon fights the fight, but rather the hero's heart.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The hero draws inspiration from the virtue of his ancestors.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who rebels or seems to rebel against the facts of existence and seems to conquer them...
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Ultimately a hero is a man who would argue with the gods, and so awakens devils to contest his vision. The more a man can achieve, the more he may be certain that the devil will inhabit a part of his creation.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: One brave deed makes no hero.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: The main thing about being a hero is to know when to die.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: No heroine can create a hero through love of one, but she can give birth to one.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: You cannot be a hero without being a coward.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts; to believe in the heroic makes heroes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Everyone is necessarily the hero of his own life story.
quotes.author: John Barth

quotes.quote: Every hero becomes a bore at last.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our heroes are people and people are flawed. Don't let that taint the thing you love.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: Tell me your heroes and I'll tell you how your life will end up.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: The hero shows us what we ought to be, and we make him a hero because we wish to be what he is.
quotes.author: Richard C. Crepeau

quotes.quote: The hero was distinguished by his achievement; the celebrity by his image or trademark. The hero created himself; the celebrity is created by the media. The hero was a big man; the celebrity is a big name.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: In our world of big names, our true heroes tend to be anonymous. In this life of illusion and quasi-illusion, the person of solid virtues who can be admired for something more substantial than his well-knowness often proves to be the unsung hero: the teacher, the nurse, the mother, the honest cop, the hard worker at lonely, underpaid, unglamorous, unpublicized jobs.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Every act of compassion makes a difference. Be a hero a better world!
quotes.author: Robert Alan Silverstein

quotes.quote: The beauty of the soul shines out when a man bears with composure one heavy mischance after another, not because he does not feel them, but because he is a man of high and heroic temper.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The heroic cannot be the common, nor the common the heroic.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The youth, intoxicated with his admiration of a hero, fails to see, that it is only a projection of his own soul, which he admires.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our admiration is so given to dead martyrs that we have little time for living heroes.
quotes.author: Elbert Green Hubbard

quotes.quote: I gave my life for freedom— this I know: / For those who bade me fight had told me so.
quotes.author: William Norman

quotes.quote: A hero is a man who does what he can.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: It was the nation and the race dwelling all round the globe that had the lion's heart. I had the luck to be called upon to give the roar.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The opportunities for heroism are limited in this kind of world: the most people can do is sometimes not to be as weak as they've been at other times.
quotes.author: Angus Wilson

quotes.quote: History selects its heroes and its villains, and few of us resist participation either at the parade or at the guillotine.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.quote: Heroes are very human, most of them, very easily touched by praise.
quotes.author: Sir Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: Heroism feels and never reasons, and therefore is always right.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The heroic man does not pose; he leaves that for the man who wishes to be thought heroic.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Deeds of heroism are but offered to those who, for many long years, have been heroes in obscurity and silence.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: Heroism does not require spiritual maturity.
quotes.author: Abel Hermant

quotes.quote: The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: Adversity is sometimes hard upon a man; but for one man who can stand prosperity, there are a hundred that will stand adversity.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: All that mankind has done, thought, gained or been: it is lying as in magic preservation in the pages of books.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: The greatest heroes that the world can know, / To women their original must owe.
quotes.author: Mary Collier

quotes.quote: Hero-worship is strongest where there is at least regard for human freedom.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: One murder made a villain, Millions a hero.
quotes.author: Beilby Porteus

quotes.quote: You don't raise heroes, you raise sons. And if you treat them like sons, they'll turn out to be heroes if it's just in your eyes.
quotes.author: Walter M. Schirra, Sr.

quotes.quote: A hero is somebody who voluntarily walks into the unknown.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.quote: A hero is one who knows how to hang on one minute longer.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: A hero is born among a hundred, a wise man is found among a thousand, but an accomplished one might not be found even among a hundred thousand men.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Aspire rather to be a hero than merely appear one.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Great heroes need great sorrows and burdens, or half their greatness goes unnoticed. It is all part of the fairy tale.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: That is why embittered people find heroes and madmen a perennial source of fascination, for they have no fear of life or death. Both heroes and madmen are indifferent to danger and will forge ahead regardless of what other people say.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Heroes don't have the need to be known as heroes, they just do what heroes do because it is right and it must be done.
quotes.author: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.quote: No, what he didn’t like about heroes was that they were usually suicidally gloomy when sober and homicidally insane when drunk.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Real heroes are men who fall and fail and are flawed, but win out in the end because they’ve stayed true to their ideals and beliefs and commitments.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.quote: Friends are the real superheroes. They battle our worst enemies—loneliness, grief, anxiety, depression, fear, and doubt—every time they come around.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Heroes are those who can somehow resist the power of the situation and act out of noble motives, or behave in ways that do not demean others when they easily can.
quotes.author: Philip G. Zimbardo

quotes.quote: It doesn't take a hero to order men into battle. It takes a hero to be one of those men who goes into battle.
quotes.author: H. Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: Your scent is like a drug to me like my own personal brand of heroin.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: He was like chocolate-covered heroin, and I was an addict through and through.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.quote: Yes, you are exactly my brand of heroin.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: Beating heroin is child's play compared to beating your childhood.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Heroin addiction is like driving a car with the steering going out. You eventually resign yourself to the inevitability of what's going to happen.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: The only reason I can't recommend heroin to kids is because the effects wear off.
quotes.author: Artie Lange

quotes.quote: When you're addicted to heroin, there is only one thing you can do go off heroin. But we're not going to throw away these phones, we're not going to throw away our technology.
quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

quotes.quote: You know what they say, sleep is the mother's drug of choice, but like heroin, only the very rich and the very poor can afford it.
quotes.author: Elissa Schappell

quotes.quote: Heroin also makes people feel better, but I wouldn't recommend using heroin.
quotes.author: James Randi

quotes.quote: Heroin gave me wings, but took away the sky.
quotes.author: Drew Gates

quotes.quote: It's like heroin: You do a little and you want a little bit more. Raising prices is the easy way.
quotes.author: James Sinegal

quotes.quote: Anyone taking heroin is thinking about taking heroin more than they're thinking about anything else. That's the general rule about most drugs.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: It is not heroin or cocaine that makes one an addict, it is the need to escape from a harsh reality.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: Alcohol, acid, cocaine, they were just affairs. When I met heroin it was true love.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: The nice thing about being a heroin addict is that you either have no problems or one big one.
quotes.author: Richard Schuldenfrei

quotes.quote: When I pictured heroin, I pictured some crazy crackhead with no shoes under a bridge. You never think that is going to be you. And it never was me. I was never under a bridge, and I always had shoes.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Figure out what you need to do to be the heroine of your own story.
quotes.author: Ava Duvernay

quotes.quote: We are all the heroes and heroines of our own lives. Our love stories are amazingly romantic; our losses and betrayals and disappointments are gigantic in our own minds.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.quote: Heroine: girl who is perfectly charming to live with, in a book.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You don’t need princes to save you. I don’t have a lot of patience for stories in which women are rescued by men.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: You need not go back four thousand years for heroines. The world is filled with them today. They do not belong to any nation, nor to any religion, nor exclusively to any race. Wherever woman is found, they are found.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: My heroines, more often than not, are the ones who are troubled and resistant.
quotes.author: Sylvia Day

quotes.quote: She's the ulimate heroine, strong-willed and independent, intelligent, loyal, but at the same time, she's not flawless, she's not above mistakes, or falling in love.
quotes.author: Tammara Webber

quotes.quote: My heroines are part of me and my heroes are part of what I'd like to know.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: Historically, in my generation, all of my heroes and heroines have had issues and problems. We all do.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: Perfect heroines, like perfect heroes, aren't relatable, and if you can't put yourself in the protagonist's shoes, not only will they not inspire you, but the book will be pretty boring.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: I just don't see myself as the heroine in my own narrative.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.quote: Great battles can make great heroes and heroines.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Turn the page, your heroine is still there, breathe, relax, life is beautiful: you're in a book!
quotes.author: Gabrielle Dubois

quotes.quote: A strong woman builds her world by picking up the broken pieces.
quotes.author: iamsophie

quotes.quote: If she can bite a vulture, she can jump a crack.
quotes.author: Kenneth Oppel

quotes.quote: Romantic heroes and heroines are a bit different from the sort of people we run into every day.
quotes.author: Leigh Michaels

quotes.quote: Heroine: a woman of heroic spirit; the principal female person who figures in a remarkable action.
quotes.author: Mindy McGinnis

quotes.quote: There's no excuse for the young people not knowing who the heroes and heroines are or were.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: The old, defiant chant rose in her mind: If I want, I will learn. If I want, I will fight. If I want, I will live. And I want. And I will. This was going to be fun.
quotes.author: P.C. Hodgell

quotes.quote: Find out what your hero or heroine wants, and when he or she wakes up in the morning, just follow him or her all day.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: It is said that no star is a heroine to her makeup artist.
quotes.author: Richard Corliss

quotes.quote: To be a hero or a heroine, one must give an order to oneself.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: When male authors write love stories, the heroine tends to end up dead.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: She was a predator - a creature of the night who rejoiced in the thrill of the hunt.
quotes.author: Alan Kinross

quotes.quote: When you are the darkest presence in the room there is very little to fear.
quotes.author: A. R. Torre

quotes.quote: Don't let them take away the hero or heroine in you!
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: We like the wrong sorts of girls, they wrote. They are usually the ones worth writing about.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: We heroines don't get good roles.
quotes.author: Hema Malini

quotes.quote: There is this idea that you have to play heroines or women who succeed.
quotes.author: Isabella Rossellini

quotes.quote: I'm not insecure. Give me a good role, and I'll perform even for a multi-starrer with half a dozen other heroines!
quotes.author: Nithya Menen

quotes.quote: The day came when she discovered sex, sensuality, and literature; she said, 'I submit! Let my life be henceforth ruled by poetry. Let me reign as the queen of my dreams until I become nothing less than the heroine of God.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: Fighting is easy. Tranquility is hard.
quotes.author: Tori Eldridge

quotes.quote: I may be in pain, but I am not weak.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: The worst thing one can do is not to try, to be aware of what one wants and not give in to it, to spend years in silent hurt wondering if something could have materialized - never knowing.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Doubt is the vestibule through which all must pass before they can enter into the temple of wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The simple practice of hesitation helps you stop reacting blindly to everything that happens.
quotes.author: Ma Jaya

quotes.quote: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world byÂ hesitation.
quotes.author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.quote: Without doubt, you are recognized for the last role you played.
quotes.author: Roger Moore

quotes.quote: If you hesitate, some bolder hand will stretch out before you and get the prize.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Doubt your doubts before you doubt your beliefs.
quotes.author: Chace Crawford

quotes.quote: To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Never hesitate to ask a lesser person.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Never hesitate to hold out your hand; never hesitate to accept the outstretched hand of another.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: Hesitation will get you killed.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Whenever man begins to doubt himself, he does something so stupid that he is reassured.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: You can tell when something's not moving forward anymore. When the doubts you have about it don't go away.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: When in doubt, have a man come through the door with a gun in his hand.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: NeverÂ hesitateÂ to steal a good idea.
quotes.author: Al Neuharth

quotes.quote: Beyond a doubt truth bears the same relation to falsehood as light to darkness.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Doubt must be no more than vigilance, otherwise it can become dangerous.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: While one personÂ hesitatesÂ because he feels inferior, the other is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
quotes.author: Henry C. Link

quotes.quote: Doubt is the father of invention.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: When you doubt, abstain.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The more you hesitate in a game, the more your chance of getting hit. Your focus isn't there. When you hesitate, usually you're in trouble.
quotes.author: Sidney Crosby

quotes.quote: Modest doubt is called the beacon of the wise.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: He who hesitates is poor.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Second thoughts oftentimes are the very worst of all thoughts.
quotes.author: William Shenstone

quotes.quote: In this world second thoughts, it seems, are best.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Hesitation is the best cure for anger. The first blows of anger are heavy, but if it waits, it will think again.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Hesitation only enlarges, magnifies the fear. Take action promptly. Be decisive.
quotes.author: David J. Schwartz

quotes.quote: Doubt begins only at the last frontiers of what is possible.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
quotes.author: J. M. Barrie

quotes.quote: On the plains of hesitation bleach the bones of countless millions who, at the dawn of decision, sat down to wait, and waiting died.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Doubt is the brother of shame.
quotes.author: Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: The worst part is doubt. When you doubt yourself, which we are taught to do, you get lost.
quotes.author: Kevin Eubanks

quotes.quote: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Doubt is the middle position between knowledge and ignorance. It encompasses cynicism but also genuine questioning.
quotes.author: Vera Farmiga

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Hesitation increases in relation to risk in equal proportion to age.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Doubt, of whatever kind, can be ended by action alone.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Hesitation of any kind is a sign of mental decay in the young, of physical weakness in the old.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Your doubts are generated by fear, and fear is a series of distorted thoughts.
quotes.author: Leandra Medine

quotes.quote: Doubt comes in at the window when inquiry is denied at the door.
quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

quotes.quote: There must be a reason why peopleÂ hesitate; uncertainty is one, no courage another.
quotes.author: Ron De Jonge

quotes.quote: When in doubt, use brute force.
quotes.author: Ken Thompson

quotes.quote: Of all the words of mice and men, the saddest are, "It might have been".
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

quotes.quote: If in doubt, don't. If still in doubt, do what's right.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: You should never hesitate to trade your cow for a handful of magic beans.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: When you start to doubt yourself the real world will eat you alive.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Doubt grows with knowledge.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: He whoÂ hesitatesÂ is sometimes saved.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: It is hidden but always present.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: We are hidden in ourselves, like a truth hidden in isolated facts. When we know that this One in us is One in all, then our truth is revealed.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: There are secret opportunities hidden inside every failure.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: There is nothing so far removed from us to be beyond our reach, or so far hidden that we cannot discover it.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Hidden behind your fears and your failures is the success you seek.
quotes.author: Robert G. Allen

quotes.quote: The best hiding spots are not the most hidden; they're merely the least searched.
quotes.author: Chris Pavone

quotes.quote: What hidden, hoarded longings there are in all of us.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Some people have a hidden richness waiting to be discovered. They don't advertise it, but it's there for those willing to scratch beneath the surface.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: The love hidden within is always greater than the hate displayed without.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The hidden hand of the market will never work without a hidden fist.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.quote: The hidden strength is too deep a secret. But in the end...in the end it is our only ally.
quotes.author: Joanne Greenberg

quotes.quote: Every obstacle is a hidden step on the path to promotion.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The Way is hidden and nameless. Still only the Way nourishes and completes.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: There's hidden sweetness in the stomach's emptiness.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Hidden in the glorious wildness like unmined gold.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: If differences can be hidden, perhaps they aren't differences at all.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: God is hidden inside us and everyone is looking for Him.
quotes.author: Prabhat Ranjan Sarkar

quotes.quote: The future is hidden even from those who make it.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: There are mountains hidden in mountains. There are mountains hidden in hiddenness. This is complete understanding.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: There's no hidden secrets going on in the Federal Reserve
quotes.author: Herman Cain

quotes.quote: The hidden harmony is better than the obvious.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: A hidden connection is stronger than an obvious one.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Find your hidden talents, your hidden potentials, your hidden purposes and convert them into a better business for the benefit of the entire world.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Everything we see hides another thing, we always want to see what is hidden by what we see.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: Hidden paths can't be walked without moving obstacles.
quotes.author: Anthony D. Williams

quotes.quote: Wealth is the hidden side of speed and speed the hidden side of wealth.
quotes.author: Paul Virilio

quotes.quote: Three things cannot long be hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Truth is hidden only to the masses who are not inquisitive.
quotes.author: Topsy Gift

quotes.quote: Hidden knowledge differs little from ignorance.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Problems are hidden opportunities, and constraints can actually boost creativity.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Where the truth remains hidden from the outside, the inside imprisons the hidden.
quotes.author: Chess Desalls

quotes.quote: For every loss, there is a hidden gain. And for every gain, there is a hidden loss.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: You can hide from others, but you can't hide from yourself.
quotes.author: Maite

quotes.quote: The first step towards vice is to shroud innocent actions in mystery, and whoever likes to conceal something sooner or later has reason to conceal it.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques

quotes.quote: Violence can only be concealed by a lie,and the lie can only be maintained by violence.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Conceal a flaw, and the world will imagine the worst.
quotes.author: Marcus Valerius Martial

quotes.quote: Speech was given to conceal thought.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: Most of our faults are more pardonable than the means we use to conceal them.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: To conceal anything from those to whom I am attached, is not in my nature. I can never close my lips where I have opened my heart.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: It is harder to conceal ignorance than to acquire knowledge.
quotes.author: Arnold Henry Glasgow

quotes.quote: It is the false shame of fools to try to conceal wounds that have not healed.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Men use thought only as authority for their injustice, and employ speech only to conceal their thoughts.
quotes.author: Francois Marie Arouet

quotes.quote: The poor man wishes to conceal his poverty, and the richa man his wealth: the former fears lest the be despised, the latter lest he be plundered.
quotes.author: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Anger ventilated often hurries towards forgiveness; anger concealed often hardens into revenge.
quotes.author: Robert Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Distinguished ancestors shed a powerful light on their descendants, and forbid the concealment either of their merits or of their demerits.
quotes.author: Gaius Sallustius Crispus

quotes.quote: The lack of belief is a defect that ought to be concealed when it cannot be overcome.
quotes.author: Lillian Smith

quotes.quote: Providence conceals itself in the details of human affairs, but becomes unveiled in the generalities of history.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: It is often wise to reveal that which cannot be concealed for long.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Love has features which pierce all hearts, he wears a bandage which conceals the faults of those beloved.
quotes.author: Francois Marie Arouet

quotes.quote: Violence can only be concealed by a lie, and the lie can only be maintained by violence.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Isayevich Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Not all things are to be discovered, many are better concealed.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: What a profound significance small things assume when the woman we love conceals them from us.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Vulgarity is only in concealment of truth, or in affectation.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: What they reveal is suggestive, but what they conceal is vital.
quotes.author: Aaron Levenstein

quotes.quote: A woman, especially if she have the misfortune of knowing anything, should conceal it as well as she can.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Good breeding consists in concealing how much we think of ourselves and how little we think of other persons.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The secret of managing is to keep the guys who hate you away from the guys who are undecided.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: If words were invented to conceal thought, newspapers are a great improvement on a bad invention.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: If a man is foolish enough to reveal his thoughts the least he can do is conceal his whereabouts.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: The true use of speech is not so much to express our wants as to conceal them.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: A poker face enables a card player to conceal the kind of hand he has by the kind of face he hasn't.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It is often easier to hide something than to hide the fact that you are hiding something.
quotes.author: G.C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Hiding what you know is sometimes as important as knowing it.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: We each have our hiding places and we each put up with the little quirks of the people we love.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: Talking much about oneself may be a way of hiding oneself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: All your personalities are absolute cover-ups, hiding your individuality.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The power of hiding ourselves from one another is mercifully given, for men are wild beasts, and would devour one another but for this protection.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: All the secrets of the world worth knowing are hiding in plain site.
quotes.author: Robin Sloan

quotes.quote: Inside everybody's hiding something.
quotes.author: Dido Armstrong

quotes.quote: When you're hiding behind a character all the time, as soon as you have to be yourself, you feel kind of terrified.
quotes.author: Sheridan Smith

quotes.quote: Writing always means hiding something in such a way that it then is discovered.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: He who hides himself amongst the shadows deserves to live inside the dark shadows! Meet with the light to deserve the light!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Hiding spending does not reduce spending.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: No one is going to be powerful in their ministry if they are hiding something that they are afraid people will find out at any moment.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: Hiding places there are innumerable, escape is only one, but possibilities of escape, again, are as many as hiding places.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: If you keep hiding your true self, your life becomes like slow death. Once you become free from the lies and the hiding of yourself, then life becomes vibrant again.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: Hiding from your history only shackles you to it. Instead, face it and free yourself.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Hide until everybody goes home. Hide until everybody forgets about you. Hide until everybody dies.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Hiding behind titles to create security is insecurity.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Most of us remain strangers to ourselves, hiding who we are, and ask other strangers, hiding who they are, to love us.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: When you start hiding things away, that's when the darkness creeps up. Sunlight is the best disinfectant.
quotes.author: Steve Kazee

quotes.quote: It's not about hiding your imperfections on a shoot; it's about embracing them and being unapologetic about them.
quotes.author: Erin O'Connor

quotes.quote: Lying, cheating, hiding is the exact opposite of the behavior of a man who's really into you.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: Direct experience is the evasion, or hiding place of those devoid of imagination.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Instead of hiding your loneliness, bring it into the light. Honor it. Treat it. Heal it. You'll find that it returns the favor
quotes.author: Martha N. Beck

quotes.quote: Extraordinary things are always hiding in places people never think to look.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: You can't find peace by hiding from life.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Happiness is the greatest hiding place for despair.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Hiding things is the most foolish thing that annihilates correlation.
quotes.author: Waqas Bin Ehsan

quotes.quote: Hiding, secrets, and not being able to be yourself is one of the worst things ever for a person. It gives you low self-esteem. You never get to reach that peak in your life. You should always be able to be yourself and be proud of yourself.
quotes.author: Grace Jones

quotes.quote: Still hiding and afraid to let go. Waiting for you to find me uncover me and show me the way.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: Hiding out with the enemy brings only temporary relief.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Some stars like to hide behind the whole idea of acting. But really good actors are not hiding at all. They're not afraid to be disliked, to be a little unsavoury
quotes.author: Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

quotes.quote: Because the Beloved wants to know, unseen things become manifest. Hiding is the hidden purpose of creation.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Hiding under the bed doesn't make the worry stop.
quotes.author: Cynthia Voigt

quotes.quote: Language can be a way of hiding your thoughts and preventing communication.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Hiding our true thoughts and feelings is just one example of how we give our power away.
quotes.author: Lauren Mackler

quotes.quote: Man is not what he thinks he is, he is what he hides.
quotes.author: André Malraux

quotes.quote: It is a joy to be hidden, and disaster not to be found.
quotes.author: D. W. Winnicott

quotes.quote: All friends have secrets. We're like three-dimensional shapes on paper; we all have hidden sides. And there's some secrets we don't even reveal to ourselves.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: The goal of using our voice is not just to be noticed, but with humility to gracefully be fully present in relationships. Deferring to another person does not require that we be ignored; allowing that is cowardice. Hiding, a form of dishonesty, prevents true community.
quotes.author: Rosalie De Rosset

quotes.quote: We're all pretty bizarre. Some of us are just better at hiding it, that's all.
quotes.author: John Hughes

quotes.quote: Those that walk with fear will always be too busy hiding.
quotes.author: Michael Dolan

quotes.quote: It gets a lot easier to deal with life's curveballs when you're not hiding under layers of fat.
quotes.author: Ali Vincent

quotes.quote: The best hiding spots are not the most hidden; they're merely the least searched.
quotes.author: Chris Pavone

quotes.quote: Ever since the days of Adam, man has been hiding from God and saying, 'God is hard to find.'
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: The hours trip rapidly away, hiding their dreams in their skirts.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Do not hide like a fly under the tail of a horse.
quotes.author: Albanian Proverb

quotes.quote: Hide not your light under a bushel.
quotes.author: Christian Proverb

quotes.quote: It is no use hiding from a friend what is known to an enemy.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: A person who has been seen has no further need of hiding.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: To hide a passion totally (or even to hide, more simply, its excess) is inconceivable: not because the human subject is too weak, but because passion is in essence made to be seen: the hiding must be seen: I want you to know that I am hiding something from you, that is the active paradox I must resolve: at one and the same time it must be known and not known: I want you to know that I don't want to show my feelings: that is the message I address to the other.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Isn't a silent population dangerous? Where will it hide the burden of its voice?
quotes.author: José Craveirinha

quotes.quote: If you are in hiding, don't light a fire.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: There is no shadow of protection to be had by sheltering behind the slender stockades of visionary speculation, or by hiding behind the wagon-wheels of pacific theories.
quotes.author: Madame Chiang Kai-shek

quotes.quote: I have often been downcast, but never in despair; I regard our hiding as a dangerous adventure, romantic and interesting at the same time.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: What is the main thing in love? to know and to hide. To know about the one you love and to hide that you love. At times the hiding (shame) overpowers the knowing (passion). The passion for the hidden - the passion for the revealed.
quotes.author: Marina Tsvetaeva

quotes.quote: Hiding in bed when you're feeling lousy is like hiding in a foxhole during a battle. You can't possibly win the war from down there, and without your courage, the situation may get even worse for you and your friends.
quotes.author: Bradley Trevor Greive

quotes.quote: Your worst enemy is hiding within yourself, and that enemy is your nafs or false ego.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: My heart in hiding / Stirred for a bird,—the achieve of, the mastery of the thing!
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: A spear openly thrust at you is easy to dodge; an arrow shot from hiding is hard to defend against.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The muddy tide of the Thames, reflecting nothing, and hiding a million unclean secrets within its breast... is just the dismal stream to glide by such a city.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: I got my dog three years ago because I was drunk in a pet store. We had nine cats at the time. The cats started hiding the alcohol after that.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.quote: Stars do not hide from darkness. Roses do not hide from thorns. Diamonds do not hide from pressure.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: I don’t hide from you that I don’t detest the countryside.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Masquerade / Paper faces on parade / Masquerade / Hide your face, so the world will never find you.
quotes.author: The Phantom

quotes.quote: Hiding summer's age no more / No more leaves in summer sky / Turning dark on empty car lots / When summer was my only friend / Say you're back this way again / Winter's one breath away / It's turning cold / Like the hiding sun / Like the hiding sun / Feels like it's just begun / The hiding sun / Like the hiding sun / Waiting for summer sun.
quotes.author: Ray Hedges and Nicholas Bracegirdle

quotes.quote: Have you seen what I saw / The sky came down from afar / Have you been there before / That place where hearts reborn / I'm looking for a place to go / I'm waiting on another / Hiding place for hearts / Hiding place for hearts / I'm looking for a safety zone / I'm waiting on another / Hiding place for hearts.
quotes.author: Duncan Coutts; Jason Pierce; Raine Maida; Steve Mazur

quotes.quote: Hiding in this cage / of visible matter / is the invisible / lifebird / pay attention / to her / she is singing / your song.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: Good to hide, and hear 'em hunt! / Better, to be found, / If one care to, that is, / The Fox fits the Hound— / Good to know, and not tell, / Best, to know and tell, / Can one find the rare Ear / Not too dull—
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: I hide myself within my flower, / That fading from your Vase, / You, unsuspecting, feel for me— / Almost a loneliness.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: High school isn't a very important place. When you're going you think it's a big deal, but when it's over nobody really thinks it was great unless they're beered up.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: High school wasn't a trial by fire or some ordeal that had to be survived. It was all a big joke. You just had to provide the laugh track.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: High school is such a small part of your life. So why change your life for it? Who cares what people think of you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: High school will always be a drama zone. It takes the strongest and smartest to know how to avoid it.
quotes.author: Mia Lugo

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think high school is one long hazing activity: if you are tough enough to survive this, they'll let you become and adult. I hope it's worth it.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: It is hard to convince a high school student that he will encounter a lot of problems more difficult than those of algebra and geometry.
quotes.author: Edgar W. Howe

quotes.quote: High School is like a spork: it's a crappy spoon and a crappy fork, so in the end it's just plain useless.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Most people felt lost after high school. Sometimes I felt like I'd never really been found in the first place.
quotes.author: Lish McBride

quotes.quote: It was only high school after all, definitely one of the most bizarre periods in a person's life. How anyone can come through that time well adjusted on any level is an absolute miracle.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: It's like high school holds two different worlds, revolving around each other an never touching; the haves and the have-nots. I guess it's a good thing. High school is supposed to prepare you for the real world, after all.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: High school is neither a democracy nor a dictatorship - nor, contrary to popular belief, an anarchic state. High school is a divine-right monarchy. And when the queen goes on vacation, things change.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: The only thing I learnt in high school is that people are very violent and territorial.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Hairstyles change, and skirt lengths, and slang, but high school administrations? Never.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: High school is worse than having to swim through multiple piranha filled lakes- and that's before the truckload of homework.
quotes.author: Taylor Gaskins

quotes.quote: It's only kids in high school who are convinced they're never going to change. There's always going to be a pep rally and there's always going to be a spectator bus, somewhere out there in the future.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: ...pretty much everyone hates high school. It's a measure of your humanity, I suspect. If you enjoyed high school, you were probably a psychopath or a cheerleader. Or possibly both. Those things aren't mutually exclusive, you know. I've tried to block out
quotes.author: Jenny Lawson

quotes.quote: You never grow out of high school sadly.
quotes.author: Kate Bosworth

quotes.quote: I think everyone feels lost at times during their high school years.
quotes.author: Linda Cardellini

quotes.quote: High School.Society's bright idea to put all of their aggressive,naive youth into one environment,to torment and emotionally scar each other, for life.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Let's face it. No kid in high school feels as though they fit in.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: High school for me was not all that fun. I think it's a lot more fun after when you realize that high school ends, and everything that's important at that time is sort of not important if people don't like your jeans or whatever. It doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.quote: High school, you don't want to go back and do it over again.
quotes.author: Marguerite Moreau

quotes.quote: I hated high school. I didn't have any friends because I didn't fit in.
quotes.author: Chad Michael Murray

quotes.quote: High school is about finding who you are, because that's more important than trying to be someone else.
quotes.author: Nick Jonas

quotes.quote: Trust me, high school ends, you graduateand get away from all the people you neverwant to see again, it's all good.
quotes.author: Chad Michael Murry

quotes.quote: By the end of high school I was not of course an educated man, but I knew how to try to become one.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: High School: the mouse race to prepare you for the rat race.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In high school you can think you're in love; but I believe you have to know yourself completely before you can truly fall in love and be loved back by someone else.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's a big world out there. Bigger than prom, bigger than high school, and it won't matter if you were the prom queen or the quarterback of the football team or the biggest nerd. Find out who you are and try not to be afraid of it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People say high school is about getting an education and getting into a good college to succeed in life. Well, to me, high school is about making memories and good times that will last forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All of you people, there is a big world out there...bigger than prom, bigger than high school, and it won't matter if you were the prom queen, the quarterback of the football team, or the biggest nerd in school. Find out who you are and try not to be afraid of it.
quotes.author: Josie Geller (Drew Barrymore)

quotes.quote: If all learning is zero to ten, then the most important part of learning is zero to one.
quotes.author: Monty Roberts

quotes.quote: The schools ain't what they used to be and never was.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Students need to know why they are learning, what they are learning.
quotes.author: Dale Lumpa

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: School is a place where children come to watch adults work.
quotes.author: Madeline Hunter

quotes.quote: It is important that you relate to the kids in all areas of their lives. That is one of the reasons why I love coaching in high school. You have a chance to watch the kids grow. When you see the finished product a few years later, you are pleased.
quotes.author: Gordon Wood

quotes.quote: In the high school I went to, they asked a kid to prove the law of gravity, and he threw the teacher out of the window.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I feel like I'm back in high school or something. I can't make heads or tails out of any of this stuff.
quotes.author: Ally Walker

quotes.quote: It is as easy for a man not to have been at school and know nothing as it is for a man to have been at school and know nothing.
quotes.author: Tom Jones

quotes.quote: It is indeed ironic that we spend our school days yearning to graduate and our remaining days waxing nostalgic about our school days.
quotes.author: Isabel Waxman

quotes.quote: Working the rivet line is like being paid to flunk high school the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Ben Hamper

quotes.quote: it doesn't matter whether you're completing middle school, high school, college or grad school, as soon as you put on those hot, uncomfortable robes, and that stupid-looking hat, you are on the cusp of a boundary dividing 'before' and 'after.' the end of an era and the start of a new one.
quotes.author: Michael Pipper

quotes.quote: she did my Spanish homework freshman year / in high school / so I didn't mind her sitting next to me / during my quiet time.
quotes.author: Nat Z. Punx

quotes.quote: When I scrupulously passed high school; passing with exorbitant marks in a plethora of subjects, / The surreal days of childhood; now an evanescent memory of the past, / They asked me the arenas I was going to specialize; trying to decode my aptitude towards life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Remember back in high school / When you couldn't wait / For the very first dance / You lay your homework was the rule.
quotes.author: Edmund Sylvers

quotes.quote: High school is what kind of grows you into the person you are. I have great memories, good and bad, some learning experiences and some that I’ll take with me the rest of my life.
quotes.author: Giancarlo Stanton

quotes.quote: What I remember most about high school are the memories I created with my friends.
quotes.author: J.J. Watt

quotes.quote: Teaching middle school is an adventure not a job.
quotes.author: Angela K. Bennett

quotes.quote: I am always ready to learn although I do not always like being taught.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: School is a building which has four walls with tomorrow inside.
quotes.author: Lon Watters

quotes.quote: I went to a high school reunion a couple years ago and realized that the kids who were the most unusual in high school are the ones who are the most interesting now and the ones who were popular are dull and boring.
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: In high school, I got voted most likely to get voted for something. Even though I was the only one who voted, it still felt terrific being nominated.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: High school wasn't a trial by fire or some ordeal that had to be survived. It was all a big joke. You just had to provide the laugh track.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfield

quotes.quote: High school sucked. It was a universal truth, and whoever said these were supposed to be the best years of your life was probably drunk or delusional.
quotes.author: Karmi Garcia

quotes.quote: High School. Society’s bright idea to put all their aggressive, naive youth into one environment to torment and emotionally scar each other for life.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: I hated high school. I don't trust anybody who looks back on the years from 14 to 18 with any enjoyment. If you liked being a teenager, there’s something wrong with you.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A lot of kids think high school represents the best years of their lives, but others recognize that it's mostly irrelevant bullshit, and that life doesn't even begin until afterward.
quotes.author: Paula Stokes

quotes.quote: This is followed by laughter because we're in high school, which means we're predictable and almost everything is funny, especially if it's someone else's public humiliation.
quotes.author: Jennifer Niven

quotes.quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Create experiences that leave you in awe, for these will be the highlights of your life.
quotes.author: Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: The highlight of my childhood was making my brother laugh so hard that food came out of his nose.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Our differences in beliefs do not truly separate us, or elevate us over others. Rather, they highlight the rich tapestry that is humanity.
quotes.author: George Takei

quotes.quote: We emphasize the transcendent worth of the human person. We insist that the human person must never be treated as an object; he must always be considered the subject. That is the basis for our teaching, the absolute standard.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Highlight reels are about that one person. After a barrage of highlight reels, you get the sense that you can do it without a team. But music thrived the most when groups were involved. People lose sight of that - that community makes the world run.
quotes.author: Questlove

quotes.quote: Sometimes presenting the most ignorant point of view can be the best way to satirize the issue and highlight that ignorance.
quotes.author: Glenn Howerton

quotes.quote: Emphasize the best, and minimize the rest.
quotes.author: Katharine Hamnett

quotes.quote: We emphasize our differences by nationality, race and financially.It's our common humanity that defines us.
quotes.author: Naveen Andrews

quotes.quote: We emphasize that we believe in change because we were born of it, we have lived by it, we prospered and grew great by it. So the status quo has never been our god, and we ask no one else to bow down before it.
quotes.author: Carl T. Rowan

quotes.quote: We emphasized the creativeness that happens at the moment of seeing over the kind that takes place in the dark room.
quotes.author: Minor White

quotes.quote: To emphasize only the beautiful seems to me to be like a mathematical system that only concerns itself with positive numbers.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: If we emphasize the life and works of our greatest contributors . . . people will come to realize that moral courage is bravery of the highest type, and America will be called the "Champion of Peace."
quotes.author: Spark Matsunaga

quotes.quote: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Our times might emphasize equality, which we then mistake for the need for everyone to be the same, but what we really mean by this is the equal chance for people to express their differences, to let a thousand flowers bloom.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Emphasize reconciliation, not resolution. It is unrealistic to expect everyone to agree about everything. Reconciliation focuses on the relationship, while resolution focuses on the problem. When we focus on reconciliation, the problem loses significance and often becomes irrelevant.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Circumstances will never determine your amount of happiness. Circumstances only highlight who you already are.
quotes.author: Dan Miller

quotes.quote: Depending on your figure, you may use clothes and colours to highlight your assets or otherwise. Darker shades always make you look slimmer while bright colours or prints can highlight your figure. Using colours to enhance your look is the easiest and smartest way to play with your figure.
quotes.author: Tena Desae

quotes.quote: Know what you want to emphasize, then do it daily.
quotes.author: Larry Shyatt

quotes.quote: Emphasize small goals when you have a team that isn't going to win a lot of games.
quotes.author: Mike Dunlap

quotes.quote: Destructive Failure: Reveals limitations and weakness, highlights your shortcomings and when not processed correctly, keeps you feeling inadequate and defective. Productive failure: Reveals limitations and weakness, highlights your erroneous thinking and when processed correctly, leads you to better options and keeps you dependent on the Lord.
quotes.author: June Hunt

quotes.quote: Speak the affirmative; emphasize your choice by utter ignoring of all that you reject.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To emphasize the afterlife is to deny life. To concentrate on heaven is to create hell.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: As you emphasize your life, you must localize and define it... you cannot do everything.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: The journey towards oneness emphasizes the opposites and we are caught in their conflict.
quotes.author: Llewellyn Vaughan-Lee

quotes.quote: We sometimes emphasize the danger in a crisis without focusing on the opportunities that are there.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Money is emphasized in Scripture simply because our temptation to love it is inexplicably powerful.
quotes.author: Erwin W. Lutzer

quotes.quote: To emphasize style is to slight content, or to introduce an attitude which is neutral with respect to content.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: If you are going to emphasize certain words in the headline, be sure that they are the words that say something.
quotes.author: John Caples

quotes.quote: Some of us cover to protect our bodies and some of us cover to protect our souls. In both cases, respect their choices.
quotes.author: Anjum Choudhary

quotes.quote: For many, the hijab represents modesty, piety and devotion to God, and I truly respect that. But the hijab should not be used as a means of applying social pressure on people.
quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

quotes.quote: Many sisters complain that people don't want to marry them unless they stop wearing hijab. No man is worth your hijab, and a real man wouldn't request you to take it off in the first place.
quotes.author: Omar Suleiman

quotes.quote: The sun doesn't lose its beauty when covered by the clouds. The same way your beauty doesn't fade when being covered by Hijab.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Hijab is a personal choice. It is personal choice to submit to Allah(God) rather than the fashion of society. To be beautiful to God rather than people.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mgahed

quotes.quote: The ultimate decision [of wearing hijab] must be that of the individual. Western opinions on the hijab or burkas are rather irrelevant. We don't get to decide for Muslim women what does or does not oppress them, no matter how highly we think of ourselves.
quotes.author: Roxane Gay

quotes.quote: Hijab isn't hiding your beauty with tight cloths, Its how you handle your beauty for the sake of God.
quotes.author: Hijab Girls

quotes.quote: Hijab is beautiful, so make it look beautiful, wear it with love, wear it with pride and most of all wear it Right.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best hijab is in the eyes of the beholder.
quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

quotes.quote: To the Muslim woman, the hijab provides a sense of empowerment. It is a personal decision to dress modestly according to the command of a genderless Creator; to assert pride in self, and embrace one's faith openly, with independence and courageous conviction.
quotes.author: Randa Abdel-Fattah

quotes.quote: This Hijab, This mark of Piety, is an act of faith, a symbol for all the world to see.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To all hijabis who are wearing niqab/hijab/abaya in this heat, may Allah shade you on the day that there is no shade but only His shade.
quotes.author: Abida

quotes.quote: Too many people look at it as though it (the hijab) has bizarre powers sewn into its microfibers. Powers that transform Muslim girls into UCOs (Unidentified Covered Objects), which turn Muslim girls from an 'us' to a 'them.
quotes.author: Randa Abdel-Fattah

quotes.quote: The hijab, or sikh turban, or Jewish skullcap are all explicit symbols, but they do not represent a threat or affront to others, and have no bearing on the competence, skills and intelligence of a person.
quotes.author: Randa Abdel-Fattah

quotes.quote: How can hijab be oppressive when in most of countries it requires greater courage to wear it than to remove it yet it is worn?
quotes.author: Mufti Menk

quotes.quote: When it comes to the hijab - why to wear it, whether to wear it, how to wear it there is theology and then there is practice, and there is huge diversity in both.
quotes.author: Randa Abdel-Fattah

quotes.quote: There are irrational fears. If you see a woman wearing a hijab and fear is your first thought, something's really wrong.
quotes.author: Hamza Yusuf

quotes.quote: Hijab includes the way a person walk, talks, looks and thinks. All of it should be done modestly and applies to both men and women.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hijab forces a man to look at a woman with respect rather than as an object.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: That they should draw their veils over their bosoms.
quotes.author: Surah An-Nur

quotes.quote: Our hijab is our Strength and our obedience to Allah.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I wear a hijab. Since September 11, people look at me differently. They prejudge me and I'm always looking over my shoulder.
quotes.author: Asha Mohamed

quotes.quote: But in this age, Hijab has been equated with the backwardness of society and is regarded as a symbol of the servitude of women.
quotes.author: Sayyi Saeed Akhtar Rizvi

quotes.quote: So, we find that whenever any general rule comes in conflict with the rule of Hijab, it is not the Hijab which gives away. It is always the conflicting rule which is sacrificed for the principle of Hijab.
quotes.author: Sayyi Saeed Akhtar Rizvi

quotes.quote: For me, my hijab is my choice, it's my identity, it makes me feel whole.
quotes.author: Linda Sarsour

quotes.quote: The freedom to practice one's religion, symbolic of our obedience to Allah. It means modesty.
quotes.author: Linda Sarsour

quotes.quote: The hijab thus forces men and others to look beyond the external and focus on the internal character of a woman.
quotes.author: Linda Sarsour

quotes.quote: The modesty of the hijab is empowering to women. It desexualizes women. It gives them recognition for who they are and not what they look like.
quotes.author: Linda Sarsour

quotes.quote: For Muslim women who cover, the hijab is located at the nexus of various personal and social identification points, including gender, ethnicity, nationality, religion, and social class.
quotes.author: Geoff Harkness

quotes.quote: The hijab is often viewed through a lens of constraint, but it is more flexible than many critics assume.
quotes.author: Geoff Harkness

quotes.quote: A woman in hijab is like a pearl in her shell.
quotes.author: Fatemeh Sadeghi

quotes.quote: No matter what your physical appearance, when you have kindness in your heart, you're the most beautiful person in the world.
quotes.author: Mufti Menk

quotes.quote: There is a face beneath this mask, but it isn't me. I'm no more that face than I am the muscles beneath it, or the bones beneath that.
quotes.author: Steve Moore

quotes.quote: What do you see when you think of me, / A figure cloaked in mystery / With eyes downcast and hair covered, / An oppressed woman yet to be discovered?
quotes.author: Uzma Jalaluddin

quotes.quote: I dressed the way I did not because I was trying to be a nun, but because it felt good—and because it made me feel less vulnerable in general like I wore a kind of armor every day. It was a personal preference.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: But I was to learn that choosing to wear the hijab is much easier than choosing to take it off. And that lesson was an important reminder of how truly 'free' choice is.
quotes.author: Mona Eltahawy

quotes.quote: I saw a mother who lose his country, city, home and children, but she had hijab between corpses.
quotes.author: Ali Rezavand Zayeri

quotes.quote: Help me understand the mindset of a society that implicitly denies a woman her right to choose her attire if the said attire leans more towards modesty than towards exhibitionism.
quotes.author: Yasmina Diallo

quotes.quote: When I walked out of the house with a hijab on, I felt beautiful in the eyes of Allah. I felt protected, shielded - I just felt somebody was watching over me.
quotes.author: Na'ima B. Robert

quotes.quote: I am the Hijab / That cloth, that fabric / That symbol, that fear / In people's eyes / Why does she wear it?
quotes.author: Aatifa Shereef

quotes.quote: Your body is sacred. You're far more precious than diamonds and pearls, and you should be covered too.
quotes.author: Hana Ali

quotes.quote: Walk away quietly in any direction and taste the freedom of the mountaineer. Camp out among the grasses and gentians of glacial meadows, in craggy garden nooks full of nature's darlings.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of climbers, those who climb because their heart sings when they're in the mountains, and all the rest.
quotes.author: Alex Lowe

quotes.quote: No matter how sophisticated you may be, a large granite mountain cannot be denied—it speaks in silence to the very core of your being.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Set loose, a child would run down the paths, scramble up the rocks, lie on the earth. Grown-ups more often let their minds do the running, scrambling, and lying, but the emotion is shared. It feels good to be here.
quotes.author: David Miller

quotes.quote: If you are seeking creative ideas, go out walking. Angels whisper to a man when he goes for a walk.
quotes.author: Raymond Inmon

quotes.quote: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Mountains have a way of dealing with overconfidence.
quotes.author: Nemann Buhl

quotes.quote: Thousands of tired, nerve-shaken, over-civilized people are beginning to find out that going to the mountains is going home; that wildness is a necessity.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: You need mountains, long staircases don't make good hikers.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: I like being near the top of a mountain. One can't get lost here.
quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

quotes.quote: Mountains are the cathedrals where I practice my religion.
quotes.author: Anatoli Boukreev

quotes.quote: The experienced mountain climber is not intimidated by a mountainhe is inspired by it.
quotes.author: William Artur Ward

quotes.quote: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Mountain hikes instilled in me a life-long urge to get to the top of any inviting summit or peak.
quotes.author: Paul D. Boyer

quotes.quote: Jumping from boulder to boulder and never falling, with a heavy pack, is easier than it sounds; you just can't fall when you get into the rhythm of the dance.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: You never climb the same mountain twice, not even in memory. Memory rebuilds the mountain, changes the weather, retells the jokes, remakes all the moves.
quotes.author: Lito Tejada-Flores

quotes.quote: Mountains are not stadiums where I satisfy my ambition to achieve, they are the cathedrals where I practice my religion.
quotes.author: Anatoli Boukreev

quotes.quote: I walked slowly to enjoy this freedom, and when I came out of the mountains, I saw the sky over the prairie, and I thought that if heaven was real, I hoped it was a place I never had to go, for this earth was greater than any paradise.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Rice

quotes.quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet; This is not done by jostling in the street.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: On a hike, the days pass with the wind, the sun, the stars; movement is powered by a belly full of food and water, not a noxious tankful of fossil fuels. On a hike, you're less a job title and more a human being. A periodic hike not only stretches the limbs but also reminds us: Wow, there's a big old world out there.
quotes.author: Ken Ilgunas

quotes.quote: Climbing is as close as we can come to flying.
quotes.author: Margaret Young

quotes.quote: The higher you climb on the mountain, the harder the wind blows.
quotes.author: Sam Cummings

quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Hiking and happiness go hand in hand or foot in boot.
quotes.author: Diane Spicer

quotes.quote: Me thinks that the moment my legs begin to move, my thoughts begin to flow.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You need special shoes for hiking—and a bit of a special soul as well.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The long distance hiker, a breed set apart, from the likes of the usual pack. He'll shoulder his gear, be hittin' the trail; Long gone, long 'fore he'll be back.
quotes.author: M.J. Eberhart

quotes.quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees. The winds will blow their own freshness into you, and the storms their energy, while cares will drop away from you like the leaves of Autumn.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Trekking means a travelling experience with a thrilling excitement.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Somewhere between the bottom of the climb and the summit is the answer to the mystery why we climb.
quotes.author: Greg Child

quotes.quote: Nobody climbs mountains for scientific reasons. Science is used to raise money for the expeditions, but you really climb for the hell of it.
quotes.author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Mountains are the beginning and the end of all natural scenery.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: It's not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Returning home is the most difficult part of long-distance hiking; You have grown outside the puzzle and your piece no longer fits.
quotes.author: Cindy Ross

quotes.quote: Remember that time spent on a rock climb isn't subtracted from your life span.
quotes.author: Will Niccolls

quotes.quote: When preparing to climb a mountain—pack a light heart.
quotes.author: Dan May

quotes.quote: Hiking is the best workout! You can hike for three hours and not even realize you're working out. And, hiking alone lets me have some time to myself.
quotes.author: Jamie Luner

quotes.quote: Getting to the top is optional. Getting down is mandatory.
quotes.author: Ed Viesturs

quotes.quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Many climbers become writers because of the misconceptions about climbing.
quotes.author: Jonathan Waterman

quotes.quote: After a day's walk everything has twice its usual value.
quotes.author: George Macauley Trevelyan

quotes.quote: The mountains are calling and I must go.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
quotes.author: Rosalia de Castro

quotes.quote: Hiking is just walking where it's okay to pee.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Just walkin', hiking the streets of the sky.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: If it's going hiking then I'm going hiking. To the other places that we never had.
quotes.author: Animal Collective

quotes.quote: I have reached the conclusion while hiking the pike though I try and I try.
quotes.author: Barry Manilow

quotes.quote: Start your hiking mile and stay away.
quotes.author: King Virtue

quotes.quote: I'm looking at the top I'm just eyeing the spot and I just keep climbing I been hiking a lot.
quotes.author: Kēvens

quotes.quote: Hiking in the mountains, romantic rendezvous.
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.quote: Tasting smells and colors, hiking mounts crossing rivers. Humble biped you've come undone.
quotes.author: Stereolab

quotes.quote: Need a hiking trip to get where I live.
quotes.author: Big K.R.I.T.
