quotes.quote: Be easy now, go hiking through the hills in a summer gown Raise the kids, peace within and make our sound.
quotes.author: Empire of the Sun

quotes.quote: Losing all sense of proportion is one of the inevitable consequences of hiking in the mountains for any extended period of time.
quotes.author: John Kaag

quotes.quote: Every good hike brings you eventually back home.
quotes.author: John Gookin

quotes.quote: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until they speak.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Honesty is the key to a relationship. If you can fake that, you're in.
quotes.author: Richard Jeni

quotes.quote: A celebrity is a person who works hard all his life to become well known, then wears dark glasses to avoid being recognized.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: An archaeologist is the best husband any woman can have; the older she gets, the more interested he is in her.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of married men cheat in America. The rest cheat in Europe.
quotes.author: Jackie Mason

quotes.quote: When I die, I want to go peacefully like my grandfather did in his sleep. Not yelling and screaming like the passengers in his car.
quotes.author: Bob Monkhouse

quotes.quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet service to see who they really are.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: My therapist told me the way to achieve true inner peace is to finish what I start. So far I've finished two bags of M&Ms and a chocolate cake. I feel better already.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I never forget a face, but in your case I'll be glad to make an exception.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: I went to a bookstore and asked the saleswoman where the Self Help section was. She said if she told me it would defeat the purpose.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: I learned law so well, the day I graduated I sued the college, won the case, and got my tuition back.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: I'm astounded by people who want to 'know' the universe when it's hard enough to find your way around Chinatown.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Where there's a will, there's a relative.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: Kids, you tried your best and you failed miserably. Lesson is, never try.
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: Children really brighten up a household. They never turn the lights off.
quotes.author: Ralph Bus

quotes.quote: First the doctor told me the good news: I was going to have a disease named after me.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The closest a person ever comes to perfection is when he fills out a job application form.
quotes.author: Stanley Randall

quotes.quote: My kitchen floor is sticky, and I had to do something about it. So finally I went out and bought some slippers.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.quote: I found there was only one way to look thin: hang out with fat people.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Life begins at 40 - but so do fallen arches, rheumatism, faulty eyesight, and the tendency to tell a story to the same person, three or four times.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The worst time to have a heart attack is during a game of charades.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won't expect it back.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.quote: Only one thing is impossible for God: To find any sense in any copyright law on the planet.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: The problem with life is, by the time you can read women like a book, your library card has expired.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: If a woman tells you she's twenty and looks sixteen, she's twelve. If she tells you she's twenty-six and looks twenty-six, she's damn near forty.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: Here's something to think about: How come you never see a headline like 'Psychic Wins Lottery'?
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: A lot of gay men stay in the closet because they are interested in fashion.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: I was asked to name all the presidents. I thought they already had names.
quotes.author: Demitri Martin

quotes.quote: Friendship is like peeing on yourself: everyone can see it, but only you get the warm feeling that it brings.
quotes.author: Robert Bloch

quotes.quote: Before you criticize someone, you should walk a mile in their shoes. That way when you criticize them, you are a mile away from them and you have their shoes.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: USA Today has come out with a new survey. Apparently three out of every four people make up 75 percent of the population.
quotes.author: Dave Letterman

quotes.quote: I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don't know the answer.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Love is grand; divorce is a hundred grand.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When people ask me how many people work here, I say, about a third of them.
quotes.author: Lisa Kennedy Montgomery

quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I wonder if other dogs think poodles are members of a weird religious cult.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: How can you ever be late for anything in London? They have a huge clock right in the middle of the town.
quotes.author: Jimmy Kimmel

quotes.quote: The man who smiles when things go wrong has thought of someone to blame it on.
quotes.author: Robert Bloch

quotes.quote: You should always go to other people's funerals, otherwise, they won't come to yours.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go. Others whenever they go.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Inside me there's a thin person struggling to get out, but I can usually sedate him with four or five cupcakes.
quotes.author: Bob Thaves

quotes.quote: You've got to be very careful if you don't know where you are going, because you might not get there.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The only way to comprehend what mathematicians mean by Infinity is to contemplate the extent of human stupidity.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: There's two theories to arguing with a woman. Neither works.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Before you criticize someone walk a mile in their shoes, that way when you criticize them you're a mile away from them and you have their shoes.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Most women set out to try to change a man, and when they have changed him they do not like him.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: The only time a woman really succeeds in changing a man is when he's a baby.
quotes.author: Natalie Wood

quotes.quote: A man never knows how to say goodbye. A woman never knows when to say it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors, and also to love our enemies; probably because they are generally the same people.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The world is divided into people who do things and people who get the credit.
quotes.author: Dwight Morrow

quotes.quote: The best time to give advice to your children is while they're still young enough to believe you know what you're talking about.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: If a book about failures doesn't sell, is it a success?
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Men are simpler than you imagine my sweet child. But what goes on in the twisted, tortuous minds of women would baffle anyone.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: Girls are like pianos. When they're not upright, they're grand.
quotes.author: Benny Hill

quotes.quote: When you go into court you are putting your fate into the hands of twelve people who weren't smart enough to get out of jury duty.
quotes.author: Norm Crosby

quotes.quote: If you steal from one author it's plagiarism; if you steal from many it's research.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Money can't buy you happiness but it can pay for the plastic surgery.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: A genius is one who can do anything except make a living.
quotes.author: Joey Lauren Adams

quotes.quote: Three may keep a secret, if two of them are dead.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Let every hindrance to joy become the soil out of which joy blossoms.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: Old age is a hindrance to creativity but cannot crush my youthful spirit.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: The greatest hindrance to living is expectancy, which depends upon tomorrow and wastes today.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The consciousness of self is the greatest hindrance to the proper execution of all physical action.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Good cheer is no hindrance to a good life.
quotes.author: Aristippus

quotes.quote: It could be that one of the greatest hindrances to evangelism is the poverty of our own experience.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Help that is not positively necessary is a hindrance to a growing organism.
quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.quote: A monk's extraordinary patience can be a hindrance to desperate decision-making.
quotes.author: Harsha Bhogle

quotes.quote: The man who gives up accomplishes nothing and is only a hindrance. The man who does not give up can move mountains.
quotes.author: Ernest Hello

quotes.quote: One of the greatest hindrances to happiness in the present day is our tendency to standardize our conception of it.
quotes.author: J. E. Buckrose

quotes.quote: The greatest hindrance to growth in faith is comfortable living.
quotes.author: John Carey

quotes.quote: Modesty isn't always a virtue; it can be a hindrance; a careful measure of personal pride builds confidence and ensures success.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: Impatience is a hindrance. As with all things if you attempt to take shortcuts, the final destination will rarely be as good and may even be attainable.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: Anything which is a hindrance to the fight of the soul is a delusion and a snare, even like the body which often does hinder you in the path of salvation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Beware of anger. It is the most difficult to remove of all the hindrances. But it is the alcohol of the body, you know, and the devil of it is that it deadens the perceptions.
quotes.author: Margery Allingham

quotes.quote: Too much attention to health is a hindrance to learning, to invention, and to studies of any kind, for we are always feeling suspicious shootings and swimmings in our heads, and we are prone to blame studies from them.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Religions have become a hindrance, rather than a help, to our shared pursuit of peace and progress. They tend to make us meaner rather than better human beings, less sensitive to the demands of justice, compassion and fellow humanity in our times.
quotes.author: Agnivesh

quotes.quote: The surest hindrance of success is to have too high a standard of refinement in our own minds, or too high an opinion of the judgment of the public. He who is determined not to be satisfied with anything short of perfection will never do anything to please himself or others.
quotes.author: Hazlitt

quotes.quote: There is no greater hindrance to the progress of thought than an attitude of irritated party-spirit.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: A prayerless church member is a hindrance. He is in the body like a rotting bone or a decayed tooth. Before long, since he does not contribute to the benefit of his brethren, he will become a danger and a sorrow to them. Neglect of private prayer is the locust which devours the strength of the church.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Sickness is a hindrance to the body, but not to your ability to choose, unless that is your choice. Lameness is a hindrance to the leg, but not to your ability to choose. Say this to yourself with regard to everything that happens, then you will see such obstacles as hindrances to something else, but not to yourself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: But by far the greatest hindrance and aberration of the human understanding proceeds from the dullness, incompetency, and deceptions of the senses; in that things which strike the sense outweigh things which do not immediately strike it, though they be more important. Hence it is that speculation commonly ceases where sight ceases; insomuch that of things invisible there is little or no observation.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The principal hindrance to the advancement of the kingdom of God is greed. It is the chief obstacle to heaven-sent revival. It seems that when the back of greed is broken, the human spirit soars into regions of unselfishness. I believe that it is safe to say there can be no continuous revival without 'hilarious' giving. And I fear no contradiction: wherever there is 'hilarious' giving there will soon be revival!
quotes.author: O. S. Hawkins

quotes.quote: The greatest impediments to personal change always come from within, not without.
quotes.author: Andy Greenwald

quotes.quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There is no greater impediment to the advancement of knowledge than the ambiguity of words.
quotes.author: Thomas Reid

quotes.quote: Expecting is the greatest impediment to living. In anticipation of tomorrow, it loses today.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: There are no impediments to meditation. The very thought of such obstacles is the greatest impediment.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: Nothing is a greater impediment to being on good terms with others than being ill at ease with yourself.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The biggest impediment to growth is in our minds and not in the world outside, and only constant in the world is change.
quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quotes.quote: The greatest impediments to changes in our traditional roles seem to lie not in the visible world of conscious intent, but in the murky realm of the unconscious mind.
quotes.author: Augustus Y. Napier

quotes.quote: The biggest hindrance to the missionary task is self. Self that refuses to die. Self that refuses to sacrifice. Self that refuses to give. Self that refuses to go.
quotes.author: Thomas Hale

quotes.quote: Thoughts are impediments to seeing your deepest nature. Don't give rise to any thought, and discover who you are. That ocean of eternal peace is you. What is the difficulty that we suffer from? It is that we seek peace elsewhere and do not experience that we are peace incarnate itself.
quotes.author: H. W. L. Poonja

quotes.quote: The major impediment to experiencing the sacred depths of ordinary moments is the speed and distraction of contemporary life that moves to the imperatives of the global economic order.In addition, we increasingly live in a virtual world in which our reality is filtered through media and information technology.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: All we are asked to bear we can bear. That is a law of the spiritual life. The only hindrance to the working of this law, as of all benign laws, is fear.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Goudge

quotes.quote: The hindrances to being psychic are a general dullness that develops from living in the material world, and being a material girl.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: By embracing your mother wound as your yoga, you transform what has been a hindrance in your life into a teacher of the heart.
quotes.author: Phillip Moffitt

quotes.quote: Difficulties and obstacles are God's challenges to faith. When hindrances confront us in the path of duty, we are to recognize them as vessels for faith to fill with the fullness and all-sufficiency of Jesus.
quotes.author: A. B. Simpson

quotes.quote: Conscription is an impediment to achieving the forces Australia needs. It is an alibi for failing to give proper conditions to regular soldiers. We will abolish conscription forthwith. By abolishing it, Australia will achieve a better army, a better-paid army – and a better, united society.
quotes.author: Gough Whitlam

quotes.quote: Hindsight is common and bland as boiled potatoes.
quotes.author: Maureen Howard

quotes.quote: Hindsight provides new eyes.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Hindsight is a beautiful thing, mage. The past is for the memory, the present is for the mind.
quotes.author: Ben Galley

quotes.quote: Hindsight's a wonderful thing. If we all had it there would be no history to write about.
quotes.author: Kate Atkinson

quotes.quote: Hindsight is always twenty-twenty.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: Hindsight is notably cleverer than foresight.
quotes.author: Chester W. Nimitz

quotes.quote: How you look at it is pretty much how you'll see it.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Of all the forms of wisdom, hindsight is by general consent the least merciful, the most unforgiving.
quotes.author: John Fletcher

quotes.quote: Hindsight is wonderful. It's always very easy to second guess after the fact.
quotes.author: Helen Reddy

quotes.quote: The benefit of hindsight is we only really talk about those things that did work out.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: Hindsight is of little value in the decision-making process. It distorts our memory for events that occurred at the time of the decision so that the actual consequence seems to have been a "foregone conclusion." Thus, it may be difficult to learn from our mistakes.
quotes.author: Diane F. Halpern

quotes.quote: Hindsight must surely be the most useless function of the human brain, torturing yourself over the unalterable past.
quotes.author: Peter F. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Hindsight, usually looked down upon, is probably as valuable as foresight, since it does include a few facts.
quotes.author: Grace Paley

quotes.quote: Hindsight is not only clearer than perception-in-the-moment but also unfair to those who actually lived through the moment.
quotes.author: Edwin S. Shneidman

quotes.quote: Hindsight is an exact science.
quotes.author: Guy Bellamy

quotes.quote: Hindsight bias makes surprises vanish.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Before, you are wise; after, you are wise. In between you are otherwise.
quotes.author: David Zindell

quotes.quote: Yes there are times when you regret your decisions but we all have to make them without the power of hindsight.
quotes.author: Roland Gift

quotes.quote: Hindsight is gained through experience.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Hindsight is not necessarily the best guide to understanding what really happened. The past is often as distorted by hindsight as it is clarified by it.
quotes.author: Amos Elon

quotes.quote: In hindsight everything is much clearer.
quotes.author: Bart Cummings

quotes.quote: Hindsight is illuminating but not always what we want to see.
quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

quotes.quote: To fulfill your vision, you must have hindsight, insight and foresight.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Hindsight is always easier than the dreadful moment of decision.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Hindsight is a double-edged sword. Too much of it and the past seems inevitable, With too little hindsight, a panoramic perspective is impossible.
quotes.author: Lance B. Kurke

quotes.quote: Hindsight can be merciless. People of any given era often look back in time and wonder how their predecessors could have been so dimwitted.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.quote: The inevitable effect of a biographer's hindsight is to belittle the subject's foresight.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: Hindsight is a wonderful thing.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.quote: If hindsight of some women was as good as their foresight, they wouldn't be wearing slacks.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hindsight is good, foresight is better; but second sight is best of all.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Hindsight plays tricks on our minds.
quotes.author: Jeremy Siegel

quotes.quote: Hinduism insists on the brotherhood of not only all mankind but of all that lives.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Hinduism has become a conservative religion and, therefore, a mighty force because of the swadeshi spirit underlying it.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The essence of Hinduism is the same essence of all true religions: Bhakti or pure love for God and genuine compassion for all beings.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: Hinduism is wholly free from the strange obsession of some faiths that the acceptance of a particular religious metaphysics is necessary for salvation, and non-acceptance thereof is a heinous sin meriting eternal punishment in hell.
quotes.author: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan

quotes.quote: No religion makes more use of color than Hinduism, with its blue-skinned gods and peony-lipped goddesses, and even the spring festival of Holi is focused on color: Boys squirt arcs of dyed water on passersby or dump powder, all violently hued, on their marks.
quotes.author: Hanya Yanagihara

quotes.quote: Hinduism is a relentless pursuit of Truth. Truth is God and if today it has become moribund, inactive, irresponsive to growth, it is because we are fatigued; and as soon as the fatigue is over, Hinduism will burst upon the world with a brilliance perhaps unknown before.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A spirtually illumined soul lives in the world, yet is never contaminated by it.
quotes.author: Bhaskarananda

quotes.quote: Hinduism at its best has spoken the only relevant truth about the way to self-realization in the full sense of the word.
quotes.author: Count Hermann Keyserling

quotes.quote: Hinduism is not just a faith. It is the union of reason and intuition that can not be defined but is only to be experienced. Evil and error are not ultimate. There is no Hell, for that means there is a place where God is not, and there are sins which exceed his love.
quotes.author: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan

quotes.quote: Hinduism's basic tenet is that many roads exist by which men have pursued and still pursue their quest for the truth and that none has universal validity.
quotes.author: Kenneth Scott Latourette

quotes.quote: Hinduism is synonymous with humanism. That is its essence and its great liberating quality.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Hinduism, we inherited from our ancestors and its protection is our ultimate religion.
quotes.author: Tanmaya Guru

quotes.quote: Hinduism dies if untouchability lives, and untouchability has to die if Hinduism is to live.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Hinduism has sinned in giving sanction to untouchability.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The essence of Hinduism is that the path may be different, but the goal is the same.
quotes.author: Manmohan Singh

quotes.quote: You are what you believe in. You become that which you believe you can become.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Hinduism loses its right to make a universal appeal if it closes its temples to Harijans.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Affirm divine calmness and peace, and send out only thoughts of love and goodwill if you want to live in peace and harmony. Never get angry, for anger poisons your system.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Hinduism with its message of ahimsa is to me the most glorious religion in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: India is the meeting place of the religions and among these Hinduism alone is by itself a vast and complex thing, not so much a religion as a great diversified and yet subtly unified mass of spiritual thought, realization and aspiration.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: The greatest contentment comes from devotion alone and not from it's rewards, therefore one who has this devotion seeks nothing else.
quotes.author: Lord Krishna

quotes.quote: The three essentials of Hinduism are belief in God, in the Vedas as revelation, in the doctrine of Karma and transmigration.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The awakened sages call a person wise when all his undertakings are free from anxiety about results.
quotes.author: Lord Krishna

quotes.quote: Hinduism has an enormous capacity to absorb from outside influences and accept it in a peaceful and steady manner without perturbing the system.
quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quotes.quote: Here an attempt is made to explain suffering: the outcaste of traditional Hinduism is held to deserve his fetched fate; it is a punishment for the wrongs he did in a previous life.
quotes.author: Walter Kaufmann

quotes.quote: He alone sees truly who sees the Lord the same in every creature...seeing the same Lord everywhere, he does not harm himself or others.
quotes.author: Lord Krishna

quotes.quote: Feel nothing, know nothing, do nothing, have nothing, give up all to God, and say utterly, 'Thy will be done.' We only dream this bondage. Wake up and let it go.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: In Hinduism, conscience, reason and independent thinking have no scope for development.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: Our soul intuition is a faculty of God. He has no mouth, yet.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The ultimate goal of human life is to transcend culture and personality to the unconditioned pure being. But the means to do this is through our culture and way of life.
quotes.author: David Frawley

quotes.quote: The central fact of Hinduism is cow protection.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Every day you should sit quietly and affirm, with deep conviction.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The great secret of true success, of true happiness, is this: the man or woman who asks for no return, the perfectly unselfish person, is the most successful.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Having faith in God and Surrendering to him is the way to be free.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hinduism comes closest to being a nature religion. Rivers, rocks, trees, plants, animals, and birds all play their part, both in mythology and everyday worship. This harmony is most evident in remote places like this, and I hope it does not lose its unique character in the ruthless urban advance.
quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

quotes.quote: Brahman is the ultimate reality; it is simultaneously Saguna and Nirguna; divisions are due to ignorance. Mind and intellect can never catch hold of it; they have only one option and that is to merge with it.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Foreigners are sending messages to the planets. We are sending rice and cereals to our dead fore-father through the Brahmins. It is a wise deed?
quotes.author: Periyar E.V. Ramasamy

quotes.quote: Hinduism is not a religion: it's just a way of life thousands of Rishis have written about. It is such a democratic religion where everybody has a freedom to think, write or say whatever they want. We have no opposition to any other philosophy coming into us.
quotes.author: Sir Charles Norton Edgecumbe Eliot

quotes.quote: At this supremely dangerous moment in human history, the only way of salvation is the ancient Hindu way.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: But it is a truism for Hindus. The spirit of mutual good-will, esteem and veritable love which is the traditional spirit of the religions of Indian family. This is one of India's gift to the world.
quotes.author: Dr. Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: Hinduism must be studied not as a fixed body of doctrine but as a developing tradition that has changed considerably throughout the centuries and which is still changing in the creative direction, everything in India makes sense in the light of the changing process.
quotes.author: Thomas Berry

quotes.quote: In Hinduism, Shiva is a deity who represents transformation. Through destruction and restoration, Shiva reminds us that endings are beginnings, and that our world is constantly undergoing a cycle of birth, death and rebirth.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: What I found particularly fascinating and satisfying about the Hindu tradition was its spirit of inclusiveness. In Sanatan Dharma, or what is commonly called Hinduism, I discovered the basic truths of all religions in a way that the oneness of God and religion is comprehensively understood.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: India is the mother of religion. In her are combined science and religion in perfect harmony, and that is the Hindu religion, and it is India that shall be again the spiritual mother of the world.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.quote: That which we call the Hindu religion is really the Eternal religion because it embraces all others.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: Hindu religion does not consist in struggles and attempts to believe a certain doctrine or dogma, but in realizing not in believing, but in being and becoming.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Hinduism is so elastic and subtle that the most profound Methodist and crudest Idolator are equally at home with it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Plainly, contemporary Western science's description of an astronomical universe of such vast magnitude that distances must be measured in terms as abstract as light-years is not new to Hinduism whose wise men, millennia ago, came up with the term kalpa to signify the inconceivable duration of the period elapsing between the beginning and end of a world system.
quotes.author: Nancy Wilson Ross

quotes.quote: But I would like to believe Hinduism is too valuable for humanity, and sacred Indian books contain too much precious and unique knowledge that it will not sink in oblivion.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Zinovyev

quotes.quote: Make no mistake, without Hinduism, India has no future. Hinduism is the soil in to which India's roots are stuck and torn out of that she will inevitably wither as a tree torn out from its place. And if Hindus do not maintain Hinduism who shall save it? India alone can save India and India and Hinduism are one.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.quote: The reader is nowhere raised into and sustained in a bigger, purer or rarer region of thought than in the Bhagavad-Gita. The Gita's sanity and sublimity have impressed the minds of even soldiers and merchants.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Modern exponents of Hinduism should make it explicit that such statements as 'All religions are true' are made only on their own authority, and do not represent the orthodox Hindu tradition.
quotes.author: K.S. Murty

quotes.quote: A holy trinity of Hinduism, the Trim rti or triple form, was evolved, of Brahm the creator, Visnu the preserver, and Siva the destroyer... Early western students of Hinduism were impressed by the parallel between the Hindu trinity and that of Christianity. In fact the parallel is not very close, and the Hindu trinity, unlike the Holy Trinity of Christianity, never really 'caught on'. All Hindu trinitarianism tended to favour one god of the three.
quotes.author: A.L. Basham

quotes.quote: For reforms of Hinduism and for its real protection, removal of untouchability is the greatest thing... Removal of untouchability is... a spiritual process.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Hinduism rules out indulgences and multiplication of wants, as these hamper one's growth to the ultimate identity with the Universal Self.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Hinduism is not an exclusive religion. In it, there is room for the worship of all the prophets of the world. It is not a missionary religion in the ordinary sense of the term. ... Hinduism tells everyone to worship God according to his own faith or dharma, and so it lives at peace with all religions.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: He sounds mean, doesn't he? But really, Shiva is a compassionate god, because in Hinduism, the destroyer of life is also the bringer of life. So what Shiva destroys, he renews and restores.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurthi

quotes.quote: In Hindu philosophy the way to God is to free yourself of possessions, and the passions that inflame anger and jealousy. Bapu has always struggled to find the way to God.
quotes.author: Kasturba Gandhi

quotes.quote: Here, in this mystical India, the deities hover and swarm / Like the wild bees heard in the treetops, or the gusts of a gathering storm; / In the air men hear their voices, their feet on the rocks are seen, / Yet we all say, “Whence is the message, and what may the wonders mean?”
quotes.author: Alfred Comyn Lyall

quotes.quote: Being a Hindu does not mean having a particular belief system. It is only recently and due to external influences that this geographical and cultural identity has attempted to transform itself into a religious identity called Hinduism. Hindu was never an “ism”, and the attempt to organize it as a religion is still not successful because the Hindu way of life which is referred to as Sanatana Dharma or universal law is all-inclusive in nature and does not exclude anything. The Hindu way of life is not an organized belief system but a science of salvation.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: I will take an earnest person over a hip person every day, because hip is short-term, earnest is long-term.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Hip - Someone who knows the score. Someone who understands 'jive talk.' Someone who is 'with it.' The expression is not subject to definition because, if you don't 'dig' what it means, no one can ever tell you.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: But it's hard to be hip over thirty when everyone else is nineteen, when the last dance we learned was the Lindy, and the last we heard, girls who looked like Barbara Streisand were trying to do something about it.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: Rituals are important. Nowadays it's hip not to be married. I'm not interested in being hip.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I've never been cool, but I've felt cool. I've been in the cool place, but I wasn't really cool - I was trying to pass for hip or cool. It's the awkwardness that's nice.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: I'm 48 now and whatever I get music-wise, I get from my kids and that's it. I don't think I'll ever be hip again!
quotes.author: Brad Pit

quotes.quote: You don't decide you're hip. It just happens that way.
quotes.author: Cannonball Adderley

quotes.quote: I don't know what makes someone hip. The goal is artist achievement and the best work we can do with no limitation.
quotes.author: Rick Rubin

quotes.quote: I had to overcome the name Rock. If I'd been as hip then as I am now, I would have never consented to be named Rock.
quotes.author: Rock Hudson

quotes.quote: The most important thing to a lot of people, is to belong to something that's hip or whatever. To be a part of something that's not society, just a clique.
quotes.author: Ric Ocasek

quotes.quote: I think if you're too concerned with being cool or hip or liked, you can't really make good TV because sincerity and coolness are opposites.
quotes.author: Michael Schur

quotes.quote: When people meet me, many times they're very surprised because they expect someone who is kind of wacky with seven piercings and very hip and cool and New York City, and I'm not.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: My parents are so cool, so chill, super hip. They know what's up.
quotes.author: Becky G

quotes.quote: I have a nice following in Boston. The Boston crowd is very hip.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: Everyone's hip to the fact that we all do things to accentuate our looks - and it's much more accepted.
quotes.author: Kyan Douglas

quotes.quote: Our mission for younger people is to do our best to make exercise cool, hip - the thing to do.
quotes.author: Bruce Jenner

quotes.quote: Hip is the sophistication of the wise primitive in a giant jungle.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: A lot of my fans are young and hip and enjoy my pop album and know the lyrics to those songs as well, which is a real compliment to me.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.quote: I really just like acting. I'm not always aware of what is hip and what is popular and what is zeitgeist.
quotes.author: Kevin McKidd

quotes.quote: This politically hip, health-conscious city right by the mountains has everything.
quotes.author: Keith Bellows

quotes.quote: [But another challenge for hip hotels is overcoming the short shelf life of any trend.] Being hip is catching the right vibe and the right wave at the right time, and then making sure you stay ahead of changing tastes, ... If you're hip today in 2005, then how do you stay hip in 2007?
quotes.author: Henry Harteveldt

quotes.quote: There is not enough high intellect to be catered to and when most people think of Hiphop they think of low intellect.
quotes.author: Slick Rick

quotes.quote: As hard as it is, as ghetto as it is, hip-hop is pop music. It's the sound of music getting out of the ghetto, while rock is looking for a ghetto.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is ever changing but you'll always have the pack. And you'll always have those people who are separated from the pack.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Hip-Hop isn't just music, it is also a spiritual movement of the blacks! You can't just call Hip-Hop a trend!
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: Hip-hop has always been chronologically misunderstood. Too many times, people are hearing the story from the second floor. Nobody's heard the story from the basement. If hip-hop was a cake, all I can tell you is the eggs, the flour, the sugar, the vanilla - the ingredient years.
quotes.author: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is supposed to uplift and create, to educate people on a larger level and to make a change.
quotes.author: Doug E. Fresh

quotes.quote: If Hip Hop has the ability to corrupt young minds, it also has the ability to uplift them.
quotes.author: KRS-One

quotes.quote: Politics is work. Hiphop is music. The idea that hiphop, because it makes the body feel good to move to it and it makes the soul feel good to hear out angry young black men, can be transmuted into changing the world is narcotic but nonsensical. Wherever hiphop is ever "going," we can be sure it will not be in a constructive direction, anymore than fashions in the color of cars. And it shouldn't "concern" us in the least.
quotes.author: John H. McWhorter

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is universal now, it's all commercial now. It's like a circle full of circus clowns up in the circuit now.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: If blues culture had developed under the conditions of oppressive, forced labor, hip-hop culture would arise from the conditions of no work. When the sound of automobiles replaced the sound of jackhammers on the length of the Cross-Bronx Expressway, the fuel was in place for the Bronx to burn.
quotes.author: Jeff Chang

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is a perfect mix between poetry and boxing.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: Hip-hop can be a very powerful weapon to help expand young people's political and social consciousness. But just as with any weapon, if you don't know how to use it, if you don't know where to point it or what you're using it for, you can end up shooting yourself in the foot or killing your sisters and brothers.
quotes.author: Assata Shakur

quotes.quote: Hip-hop reflects the truth, and the problem is that hip-hop exposes a lot of the negative truth that society tries to conceal. It's a platform where we could offer information, but it's also an escape.
quotes.author: Busta Rhymes

quotes.quote: Your best work involves timing. If someone wrote the best hip hop song of all time in the Middle Ages, he had bad timing.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: The beautiful thing about hip-hop is it's like an audio collage. You can take any form of music and do it in a hip-hop way and it'll be a hip-hop song. That's the only music you can do that with.
quotes.author: Talib Kweli

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is a beautiful culture. It's inspirational, because it's a culture of survivors. You can create beauty out of nothingness.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.quote: Hiphop has remained in an infantile stage and has not been allowed to grow.
quotes.author: Slick Rick

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is an instant gratification, winners and losers circle, and often those who are losing give up after three or four, five years.
quotes.author: Questlove

quotes.quote: Which is the other reason hip-hop is controversial: People don't bother trying to get it. The problem isn't in the rap or the rapper or the culture. The problem is that so many people don't even know how to listen to the music.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is so much about character and caricature that people just see you as a character. Very rarely are you flesh and bone to people.
quotes.author: Questlove

quotes.quote: Hip hop is kinda funny because the further you get into it the more at risk you are.
quotes.author: Mic Geronimo

quotes.quote: The thing about hip-hop today is it's smart, it's insightful. The way they can communicate a complex message in a very short space is remarkable.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Rap is rhythm and poetry. Hip-hop is storytelling and poetry as well.
quotes.author: Ajay Naidu

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is the people. What the people are moving toward is what hip-hop is. I think people are moving toward a freer way of thinking. Openness.
quotes.author: Erykah Badu

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is a reflection of your surroundings and an instrument of change.
quotes.author: Laura Goode

quotes.quote: Hip Hop was supposed to be this new thing that had no boundaries and was so different to everyday music. As long as it has soul to it, hip hop can live on.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: There is genuine Hip Hop; a message that connects, rocks a crowd, and motivates a people and then there is what is left... instead of Hip Hop we have Hip replacement.
quotes.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.quote: While the patriarchal boys in hip-hop crew may talk about keeping it real, there has been no musical culture with black men at the forefront of its creation that has been steeped in the politics of fantasy and denial as the more popular strands of hip-hop.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is such a disposable art form from a business standpoint. It never treats its artists as art; it never treats its product as art.
quotes.author: Questlove

quotes.quote: Hip-hop gave a generation a common ground that didn't require either race to lose anything; everyone gained.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: The thing about hip-hop is that it's from the underground, ideas from the underbelly, from people who have mostly been locked out, who have not been recognized.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: My business is to enjoy and have fun. And why not, if in the end everything will end, right?
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: Their nineteen-sixties with the flowers in the guns and their summers of love, as if all we'd had was winter, all we'd had was rations. Just very good at keeping quiet, is what we were. We had to be. It was the way. Them with their jet-age.
quotes.author: Ali Smith

quotes.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: If someone thinks that love and peace is a cliche that must have been left behind in the '60s, that's his problem. Love and peace are eternal.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughful, committed individuals can change the world, indeed it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Meade

quotes.quote: I try to be really hippie about things. I'm uptight in all the ways that are really important, but the things my husband and family can benefit from my uptightness, I'm completely lacking.
quotes.author: Amanda Peet

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Revolution is not something fixed in ideology, nor is it something fashioned to a particular decade. It is a perpetual process embedded in the human spirit.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: Their common denominator of humanism could not be reconciled with the Biblical view of man's depravity after the Fall and his need of salvation. Too late, many ministers began to see that hippie non-conformity with, and rejection of, the world was hardly the same as that high spiritual quest advocated by the Apostle Paul.
quotes.author: Bob Larson

quotes.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Time you enjoy wasting, was is wasted time.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there would be peace.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams, Live the life you've always imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
quotes.author: James Arthur Baldwin

quotes.quote: All we are saying is give peace a chance.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Down through all of eternity the crying of humanity, tis' then when the hurdy gurdy man comes singing songs of love.
quotes.author: Donovan

quotes.quote: The hippies wanted peace and love. We wanted Ferraris, blondes and switchblades.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.quote: To get the hippie out of certain characters is probably the most difficult thing for me. I was not a hippie by choice but by birth.
quotes.author: Melissa Leo

quotes.quote: And those who were seen dancing were through to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is a secret hippie within me.
quotes.author: Phillip Lim

quotes.quote: We all got up to dance. Oh, but we never got the chance!
quotes.author: Don McLean

quotes.quote: Peace is not the destination. Peace is the way.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You become hippie when you realize how to be happy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm a little bit of a hippie at heart, so I always wear things that are comfortable and flowing.
quotes.author: Carly Rae Jepsen

quotes.quote: We all sang the songs of peace.
quotes.author: Melanie Safka

quotes.quote: I'm just an old hippie. You know, peace and love.
quotes.author: Sherman Hemsley

quotes.quote: There was a band playing in my head, and I felt like getting high.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: I hate the word 'hippy'. I hate a lot of people, and hippies don't do that!
quotes.author: Shannon Hoon

quotes.quote: I love the title of 'hippy' because it means someone who is thinking cosmic and futuristic.
quotes.author: Peter Max

quotes.quote: For me, hipsterism is for one to appropriate the codes of a social class or another milieu that wasn't theirs originally, in order to define their personality through something different and unique. Which is why a lot of hipsters live downtown, and they're dressed as farmers. Then you have the Oscar Wilde hipster: the dandy.
quotes.author: Xavier Dolan

quotes.quote: Hipsters. We all know one. They're those fun, little, arrogant people who let the ideal of 'anti-consumerism,' combined with a hatred for all things normal, dictate their every action.
quotes.author: Steven Crowder

quotes.quote: Zeus looked like a really buff, really angry hippie.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: A hippie is someone who looks like Tarzan, walks like Jane and smells like Cheetah.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: God knows I am not too hippy. Perhaps because I am too much around the hip and I fear fads for, like anybody else, I like something that tends to last.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Give a hippie too much money and anything can happen.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: All hippies around now just represent complete apathy.
quotes.author: Joe Strummer

quotes.quote: I grew up counterculture. I'm essentially a hippie, and I'm essentially a folkie.
quotes.author: Steve Earle

quotes.quote: Looking back, there is nothing wrong with that peace, love and equality that the hippies espoused. In many ways, we have regressed because they were into organic food, back to nature, make love not war, be good to all men, share and share alike - which is what many are talking about now.
quotes.author: Imelda Staunton

quotes.quote: It’s funny how the hippies and the punks tried to get rid of the conservatives, but they always seem to get the upper hand in the end.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: Unless you're in an early seventies-era Eagles cover band, a founding member of a religious cult, or sleeping under a bridge in Seattle, lose the beard and get a haircut. Power doesn't have time for any form of hirsute hipster self-expression.
quotes.author: Ari Gold

quotes.quote: Perot, the crew-cut, buttoned-down, uber-patriotic, navy veteran bankrolling a former hippie [Steve Jobs] who still preferred to go barefoot, was a vegetarian, and didn't believe in using deodorant.
quotes.author: Brent Schlender

quotes.quote: In adolescence particularly there are strong pressures toward introversion on the one hand, and rigid conformity to group action on the other. Both of these, as we saw in the hippie movement of a few years ago, tend to make a fetish of inarticulateness.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: For many people the hippie movement is something to drop into and out of.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: A few years ago it was they who led the cult of doing one's own thing, but now they are turning increasingly to communes and social settlements, rather like the Utopian projects of the nineteenth century.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: I can't tell you how much bullshit I've been through because I will openly say that I smoke weed. People look at it like it's this crazy, hippie, fucked-up things to do. And it's not!
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.quote: What kind of hippie am I? Man, I'm a business hippie. I understand the concept of supply and demand.
quotes.author: Dov Tiefenbach

quotes.quote: I started to laugh hysterically at just about everything that was said, and with a real side splitting kind of laugh which I hadn't laughed in a long time!
quotes.author: D. Christopher Totten

quotes.quote: Katrina was a tipping point for millions of Americans. A top insurance executive at Lloyd's of London said just the other week that if we don't act now to prevent this looming catastrophe, 'we will face extinction.' You know—just a typical, long-haired hippie at Lloyd's of London.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: The hippie movement politicized my generation. When it ended, we all started looking back at our own history, looking, in my case, for motives of rebellion.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: If you tell me hippies and yippies are going to be able to do the job of helping America, I'll tell you this: they can't run a bus; they can't serve in a government office; they can't run a lathe in a factory. All they can do is lay down in the park and sleep or kick policemen.
quotes.author: Spiro Agnew

quotes.quote: I saw the best minds of my generation destroyed by madness, starving hysterical naked, dragging themselves through the negro streets at dawn looking for an angry fix, angelheaded hipsters burning for the ancient heavenly connection to the starry dynamo in the machinery of the night.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: If you take the game of life seriously, if you take your nervous system seriously, if you take your sense organs seriously, if you take the energy process seriously, you must turn on, tune in and drop out.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: So there was a new breed of adventurers, urban adventurers who drifted out at night looking for action with a black man's code to fit their acts. The hipster had absorbed the existentialist synapses of the Negro, and for practical purpose could be considered a white Negro.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: There's nothing sadder than an old hipster.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: The moon doesn't consider one phase better than another; she just glows, equally stunning at each turn. Why should we be any different?
quotes.author: Cristen Rodgers

quotes.quote: She dances to the songs in her head, speaks with the rhythm of her heart, and loves from the depths of her soul.
quotes.author: Dean Jackson

quotes.quote: I’m passionate about animals and I hunt too. It’s like I save and I kill. I’m a walking, talking contradiction. I’m all about preserving the environment but I’m racing cars on the weekend. I tell everyone I’m a gun-loving hippy.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.quote: Her messy hair is a visible attribute of her stubborn spirit. As she shakes it free, she smiles knowing wild is her favorite color.
quotes.author: J. Iron Word

quotes.quote: Never go with a hippy to a second location.
quotes.author: Jack Donaghy

quotes.quote: No, it's horses. Hippies don't eat grass.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Nearly everyone in the hippie community smokes marijuana, whether they call it pot, grass, hemp, gauge, joint or Mary Jane. The marijuana is the basic background for the shared drug experience.
quotes.author: Narrator

quotes.quote: Hippies, they're all, like, peace and love, but underneath they're Nazis. It's the lack of meat.
quotes.author: Zeb

quotes.quote: Metro City park. Hangout of hippies, old folks and old folky hippies who play folk.
quotes.author: Inspector Gadget

quotes.quote: He's an old hippie / And he don't know what to do / Should he hang on to the old / Should he grab on to the new / He's an old hippie / This new life is just a bust / He ain't trying to change nobody / He's just trying real hard to adjust.
quotes.author: David M. Bellamy

quotes.quote: I want to be a hippie and I want to get stoned. / I want to be a wonder way guy to leave home.
quotes.author: Clifford Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The world is ready for a mystic revolution, a discovery of the God in each of us.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: They won't give peace a chance, that's just a dream some of us had.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: It all depends on how we look at things, and not how they are in themselves.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Down through all of eternity the crying of humanity, tis' then when the hurdy gurdy man comes singing songs of love.
quotes.author: Donovan

quotes.quote: If someone thinks that love and peace is a cliche that must have been left behind in the '60s, that's his problem. Love and peace are eternal.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: If you smile at me I will understand because that is something everyone, everywhere does in the same language.
quotes.author: Jefferson Airplane

quotes.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: When you've seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: There can't be any large-scale revolution until there's a personal revolution, on an individual level. It's got to happen inside first.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: There was a band playing in my head, and I felt like getting high.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: A modern revolutionary group heads for the television station.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it's time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You don't need a weatherman to know which way the wind blows.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I took the road less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The hippies wanted peace and love. We wanted Ferraris, blondes and switchblades.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.quote: I'm the one who's gonna die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: I've been smiling lately, dreaming about the world as one. And I believe it could be someday it's going to come.
quotes.author: Cat Stevens

quotes.quote: Our actions and states of mind matter, because we are so deeply interconnected with one another.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: All things old become new again. In my youth the athletes had crew cuts and the hippies had long hair. Now the athletes have long hair and the hippies are bald.
quotes.author: Harley King

quotes.quote: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Time you enjoy wasting, was is wasted time.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Like a true Nature's child, we were born, born to be wild.
quotes.author: Steppenwolf

quotes.quote: Purple Haze all in my brain, lately things don't seem the same. Actin' funny but I don't know why. â€˜Scuse me while I kiss the sky.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: The first duty of a revolutionary is to get away with it.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there would be peace.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: In a gentle way you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Ghandi

quotes.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: In reality punk people are usually the gentlest, kindest folks you'll ever know. They're like hippies, only they wear way more black.
quotes.author: Kate Rockland

quotes.quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughful, committed individuals can change the world, indeed it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Meade

quotes.quote: Your mind is like a parachute, it doesn't work unless it's open.
quotes.author: Jordan Maxwell

quotes.quote: I wanna say hello to all the ex-hippies tonight. I've never been a hippie myself but I'm an honorary hippie.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Get up, stand up, Stand up for your rights. Get up, stand up, Don't give up the fight.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: You're going to have to change the priorities of your life, if you love this planet.
quotes.author: Dr. Helen Caldicott

quotes.quote: You can have the best strategy and the best building in the world, but if you don't have the hearts and minds of the people who work with you, none of it comes to life.
quotes.author: Renee West

quotes.quote: Often the best solution to a management problem is the right person.
quotes.author: Edwin Booz

quotes.quote: If you pick the right people and give them the opportunity to spread their wings and put compensation as a carrier behind it, you almost don't have to manage them.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: A great person attracts great people and knows how to hold them together.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Hiring people is an art, not a science, and resumes can't tell you whether someone will fit into a company's culture.
quotes.author: Howard Schulz

quotes.quote: Hiring should always be part of your long-term strategy, not a quick fix to an immediate problem.
quotes.author: Steven J. Bowen

quotes.quote: Never hire someone who knows less than you do about what he's hired to do.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: We focus on two things when hiring. First, find the best people you can in the world. And second, let them do their work. Just get out of their way.
quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.quote: If you pay peanuts, you get monkeys.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Hiring people is like making friends. Pick good ones, and they'll enrich your life. Make bad choices, and they'll bring you down.
quotes.author: Jason Fried

quotes.quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for the love of it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Hiring the wrong people is the fastest way to undermine a sustainable business.
quotes.author: Kevin J. Donaldson

quotes.quote: A company should limit its growth based on its ability to attract enough of the right people.
quotes.author: Jim Collins

quotes.quote: If each of us hires people who are smaller than we are, we shall become a company of dwarfs. But if each of us hires people who are bigger than we are, we shall become a company of giants.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Always treat your employees exactly as you want them to treat your best customers.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Don't hire anyone you wouldn't want to run into in the hallway at three in the morning.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: Great vision without great people is irrelevant.
quotes.author: Jim Collins

quotes.quote: People are not your most important asset. The right people are.
quotes.author: Jim Collins

quotes.quote: If you make a hiring mistake, make the change quickly. Don't ignore problems. Don't assume it will get better.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: You can't teach employees to smile. They have to smile before you hire them.
quotes.author: Arte Nathan

quotes.quote: The moment you feel the need to tightly manage someone, you have made a hiring mistake. The best people don't need to be managed. Guided, taught, led--yes. But not tightly managed
quotes.author: Jim Collins

quotes.quote: Recruiting should never be outsourced. Everyone at your company should be different in the same way.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: The key for us, number one, has always been hiring very smart people.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Hiring the right people takes time, the right questions and a healthy dose of curiosity.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: When hiring key employees, there are only two qualities to look for: judgement and taste. Almost everything else can be bought by the yard.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Time spent on hiring is time well spent.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: If you think hiring professionals is expensive, try hiring amateurs
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Those who don't know history are destined to repeat it.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: History is the version of past events that people have decided to agree upon.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Study history, study history. In history lies all the secrets of statecraft.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: History never looks like history when you are living through it.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: History is not a burden on the memory but an illumination of the soul.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: History is a relentless master. It has no present, only the past rushing into the future. To try to hold fast is to be swept aside.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: History is a gallery of pictures in which there are few originals and many copies.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: Human history becomes more and more a race between education and catastrophe.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: History is the sum total of things that could have been avoided.
quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

quotes.quote: History is a cyclic poem written by time upon the memories of man.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: History is a pack of lies about events that never happened told by people who weren't there.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: You have to look at history as an evolution of society.
quotes.author: Jean Chretien

quotes.quote: History is indeed little more than the register of the crimes, follies, and misfortunes of mankind.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: History doesn't repeat itself, but it does rhyme.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you want to understand today, you have to search yesterday.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: History is a novel for which the people is the author.
quotes.author: Alfred de Vigny

quotes.quote: History: gossip well told.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: History is filled with the sound of silken slippers going downstairs and wooden shoes coming up.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: History is man's best guess as to what the past would look like if everything had happened in chronological order.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: History does not unfold: it piles up.
quotes.author: Robert M. Adams

quotes.quote: History, as long as it continues to happen, is always another chance.
quotes.author: R. Jackson Wilson

quotes.quote: History is a guide to navigation in perilous times. History is who we are and why we are the way we are.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.quote: History, despite its wrenching pain, cannot be unlived, but if faced with courage, need not be lived again.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: History isn't about dates and places and wars. It's about the people who fill the spaces between them.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Never doubt that you can change history. You already have.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: A generation which ignores history has no past - and no future.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Sometimes history takes things into its own hands.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: History repeats itself, and that's one of the things that's wrong with history.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: The history of the past is but one long struggle upward to equality.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: We are not makers of history. We are made by history.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: A history in which every particular incident may be true may on the whole be false.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: Every true history must force us to remember that the past was once as real as the present and as uncertain as the future.
quotes.author: George Macaulay Trevelyan

quotes.quote: History is the discipline closest to life; and life is rarely free of contradictions.
quotes.author: Karl J. Weintraub

quotes.quote: History is like a bloodstain that keeps on showing on the wall no matter how many new owners take possession, no matter how many times we paint over it.
quotes.author: Peter Carey

quotes.quote: We cannot escape history.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Our ignorance of history causes us to slander our own times.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: The game of history is usually played by the best and the worst over the heads of the majority in the middle.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: History books that contain no lies are extremely dull.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: History is the interpretation of the significance that the past has for us.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: History does not merely touch on language, but takes place in it.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: If history were taught in the form of stories, it would never be forgotten.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Anybody can make history; only a great man can write it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: History is the record of an encounter between character and circumstances.
quotes.author: Donald Creighton

quotes.quote: History does nothing; it does not possess immense riches, it does not fight battles. It is men, real, living, who do all this.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: History is the only laboratory we have in which to test the consequences of thought.
quotes.author: Etienne Gilson

quotes.quote: Our history is not our destiny.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: If you want the present to be different from the past, study the past.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: That men do not learn very much from the lessons of history is the most important of all the lessons of history.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: History will have to record that the greatest tragedy of this period of social transition was not the strident clamor of the bad people, but the appalling silence of the good people.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: History is a vast early warning system.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Neither a wise man nor a brave man lies down on the tracks of history to wait for the train of the future to run over him.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: The disadvantage of men not knowing the past is that they do not know the present.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The only thing new in the world is the history you don't know.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: You don't change the course of history by turning the faces of portraits to the wall.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: A nation that forgets its past can function no better than an individual with amnesia.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.quote: Whoso neglects learning in his youth, loses the past and is dead for the future.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: History is indeed the witness of the times, the light of truth.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: History is merely a list of surprises. It can only prepare us to be surprised yet again.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: History is the study of lies, anyway, because no witness ever recalls events with total accuracy, not even eyewitnesses.
quotes.author: Pickard

quotes.quote: To know the truth of history is to realize its ultimate myth and its inevitable ambiguity.
quotes.author: Roy Basler

quotes.quote: History never repeats itself. Man always does.
quotes.author: History never repeats itself. Man always does.

quotes.quote: We learn from history that we do not learn from history.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: History is the essence of innumerable biographies.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: That is the supreme value of history. The study of it is the best guarantee against repeating it.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: History is Philosophy teaching by example.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: The past does not repeat itself, but it rhymes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: History is the action and reaction of these two, nature and thought.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We study history in order to intervene in the course of history.
quotes.author: Adolf von Harnack

quotes.quote: For history is to the nation as memory is to the individual.
quotes.author: Arthur M. Schlesinger

quotes.quote: Since the dawn of history, mankind has honoured and respected brave and honest people.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of history to produce a little literature.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: History is a pageant and not a philosophy.
quotes.author: Augustine BIRRELL

quotes.quote: History, that excitable and unreliable old lady.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: The history of every country begins in the heart of a man or a woman.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: History is no more than memories refined.
quotes.author: Peter Charles Newman

quotes.quote: In history, a great volume is unrolled for our instruction, drawing the materials of future wisdom from the past errors and infirmities of mankind.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: History, like a vast river, propels logs, vegetation, rafts, and debris; it is full of live and dead things, some destined for resurrection; it mingles many waters and holds in solution invisible substances stolen from distant soils.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: History has to be rewritten because history is the selection of those threads of causes or antecedents that we are interested in.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: History is a symphony of echoes heard and unheard. It is a poem with events as verses.
quotes.author: Charles Angoff

quotes.quote: History must not be written with bias, and both sides must be given, even if there is only one side.
quotes.author: John Betjeman

quotes.quote: History only exists, in the final analysis, for God.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: History is full of the dead weight of things which have escaped the control of the mind, yet drive man on with a blind force.
quotes.author: F. M. Powicke

quotes.quote: Once you hit rock bottom, that's where you perfectly stand; That's your chance of restarting, but restarting the right way.
quotes.author: Justin Kanayurak

quotes.quote: When you decide to hit rock bottom, humiliation is part of the deal.
quotes.author: Guillaume Musso

quotes.quote: I think this is what we all want to hear: that we are not alone in hitting the bottom, and that it is possible to come out of that place courageous, beautiful, and strong.
quotes.author: Anna White

quotes.quote: There would be no cloud-nine days without rock-bottom moments left below.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: And so rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: I hit rock bottom, but thank God my bottom wasn't death.
quotes.author: Stevie Ray Vaughan

quotes.quote: I don't believe in rock bottom. Rock bottom is like a fishing term.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.quote: Rock bottom is good solid ground, and a dead end street is just a place to turn around.
quotes.author: Buddy Buie

quotes.quote: hitting rock bottom doesn't' mean you have to stay there.
quotes.author: Michelle Parsons

quotes.quote: Your breakdown is a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Andrea Benito

quotes.quote: You can't truly appreciate the top if you've never hit rock bottom.
quotes.author: Vanna B.

quotes.quote: As I grow older, much older, I will experience many things, and I will hit rock bottom again and again. Again and again I will suffer; again and again I will get back on my feet. I will not be defeated. I won't let my spirit be destroyed.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: And the best part about rock bottom is that you can only go up from there.
quotes.author: Quinn Loftis

quotes.quote: You may think you've hit rock bottom in your life but guess what there's more crud underneath those rocks.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Rock bottom demands we pay a price for the ride back to the top.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: The only good thing about hitting rock bottom is that it can't get any worse.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The first casualty of hitting rock bottom is vanity.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: God may allow us at times to hit rock bottom, to show us He's the rock-at the bottom.
quotes.author: Kirk Franklin

quotes.quote: People say you have to hit rock bottom, and, I can tell you, almost dying is as rock bottom as it gets.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.quote: When you hit rock bottom, you have nowhere to go but up.
quotes.author: Pattie Mallette

quotes.quote: Just when you think you've hit rock bottom, you realize you're standing on another trapdoor.
quotes.author: Marisha Pessl
