quotes.quote: When you feel like you've had it up to here, and you're mad enough to scream, but you're sad enough to tear, that's rock bottom.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: To hit bottom is to fall from grace.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: There are times when we must sink to the bottom of our misery to understand truth, just as we must descend to the bottom of a well to see the stars in broad daylight.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Hitting bottom and hitting it hard was the worst thing that ever happened to me and the best thing that ever happened to me.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: I'm always on the go. I love doing things until I hit rock bottom. Then I need my 12 hours of sleep, and I'm on the go again.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.quote: I think you sometimes have to go hit rock bottom before you can grow and rebuild as a person.
quotes.author: Paul Dano

quotes.quote: You slam the bottom and either walk away or suck it up and get through it.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Reece

quotes.quote: Rock bottom for some people is death. Some people never learn from their mistakes. They don't learn from other people's mistakes.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: I'm satisfied to go in at the bottom - that's the best way to learn what things are all about.
quotes.author: Cesar Romero

quotes.quote: Everyone hits bottom their own way.
quotes.author: Eileen Brennan

quotes.quote: Some of my lowest points were the most exciting opportunities to push through to be a better person.
quotes.author: Demi Moore

quotes.quote: It was the lowest point of my life. I just kept thinking, 'What have I done to deserve this?' I didn't see the point in living.
quotes.author: Alesha Dixon

quotes.quote: We had reached rock bottom. We didn't want to go bankrupt -- we just thought this was the best way out.
quotes.author: Bobby Foster

quotes.quote: I think you need to hit rock bottom before you make a decision [about] what you're going to do in the future.
quotes.author: Courtney Love

quotes.quote: But I was empty inside. I was spiritually at rock-bottom.
quotes.author: Jonathan Byrd

quotes.quote: It was rock bottom. It couldn't get any worse than that.
quotes.author: Martin Biron

quotes.quote: Many have to hit rock bottom before they want to make any changes. We show them they're not alone, and we offer them the chance to realize they can make those changes.
quotes.author: Susan Hicks

quotes.quote: It sounds to me like he's hit rock bottom and he's asking to be disciplined.
quotes.author: Tony Banks

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to get knocked down lower than you've ever been, to stand up taller than you than you ever were.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: This is what they call "hitting rock bottom," and they call it that because it rocks.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.quote: At my lowest I was making nothing, of course.
quotes.author: Teri Hatcher

quotes.quote: When you're knocked on your back and you life's a flop, When you're down on the bottom and there's nothing else but to shout to the top!
quotes.author: Paul Weller

quotes.quote: Sober alkies are often asked: When did you hit rock bottom but a more informed question might be: How many times did you hit rock bottom
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: The hitting rock bottom theory is all very well. But it is probably possible to intervene earlier.
quotes.author: Michael Appel

quotes.quote: Hit the bottom and get back up; or hit the bottle and stay down.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Do not despise the bottom rungs in the ascent to greatness.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: At bottom God is nothing more than an exalted father.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The view from rock bottom is often the reason, the inspiration, for getting back up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For a salesman, there is no rock bottom to the life. He don’t put a bolt to a nut, he don’t tell you the law or give you medicine He’s a man way out there in the blue, riding on a smile and a shoeshine. And when they start not smiling back — that’s an earthquake... A salesman is got to dream, boy. It comes with the territory.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: The methods by which men have met and conquered trouble, or been slain by it, are the same in every age. Some have floated on the sea, and trouble carried them on its surface as the sea carries cork. Some have sunk at once to the bottom as foundering ships sink. Some have run away from their own thoughts. Some have coiled themselves up into a stoical indifference. Some have braved the trouble, and defied it. Some have carried it as a tree does a wound, until by new wood it can overgrow and cover the old rash.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: My rock bottom went so deep I‘m pretty sure it was hell. I spent a decade climbing out of it. My hands blistered. My feet swelled. My mind said I can't take it anymore. I told my mind you better get yourself together. We came here for joy. And we are going to feel all of it.
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: I just kept digging until I got to the bottom — and there were the basement people.
quotes.author: Robert W. Ford Sr.

quotes.quote: I found bottom and then I bounced.
quotes.author: Robert W. Ford Sr.

quotes.quote: There are stages and stages of grieving and they come and go, inconstant. But after a while, even though the dips and swells continue to appear, there seems to seep into the life of the griever a confidence, hard-won, that underlies all the swirls and tides of life's ongoing struggles and joys. A sense that we have hit rock bottom and come slowly back, and that, though we will have further trials and doubts (and we will!), there is a level of stability and confidence which, even in dark hours, we will know is there and will not let us drop through the bottom of the sea.
quotes.author: Martha Whitmore Hickman

quotes.quote: There is no joy like the joy of those who have hit bottom and survived.
quotes.author: Joan Larkin

quotes.quote: Strong feelings, even suffering, are part of the process of finding and liberating our true selves. The awakening of our spirits includes moments of intensity and turmoil, darkness and loss. For us to be willing to undergo such fundamental change as redefining our sexuality or facing a problem of addiction, we may first have had to 'hit bottom.'
quotes.author: Joan Larkin

quotes.quote: And I know, knew for sure, with an absolute certainty, that this is rock bottom, this what the worst possible thing feels like. It is not some grand, wretched emotional breakdown. It is, in fact, so very mundane:…Rock Bottom is an inability to cope with the commonplace that is so extreme it makes even the grandest and loveliest things unbearable…Rock bottom is feeling that the only thing that matters in all of life is the one bad moment…Rock bottom is everything out of focus. It’s a failure of vision, a failure to see the world how it is, to see the good in what it is, and only to wonder why the hell things look the way they do and not—and not some other way.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: When this ultimate crisis comes... when there is no way out - that is the very moment when we explode from within and the totally other emerges: the sudden surfacing of a strength, a security of unknown origin, welling up from beyond reason, rational expectation, and hope.
quotes.author: Émile Durkheim

quotes.quote: No one needs to hit rock bottom to change. And yet so many people do, only because most of us are unskilled in communicating with ourselves.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: Sometimes we need to be knocked down in a place so dark that we have no choice but to trust our heart to illuminate the way.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: Rock bottom is the bedrock from which every good thing was ever built.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Rock bottom had turned out to be more greasy and hairy than rocky.
quotes.author: Mandy Ashcraft

quotes.quote: I spent so much time at 'rock bottom' that I was charged rent for staying there.
quotes.author: D.C. Hyden

quotes.quote: I didn't know that rock bottom had a basement.
quotes.author: Isabel Bradford

quotes.quote: Today, it's like there's rock bottom 50 feet of crap then me.
quotes.author: Rachel Green

quotes.quote: Just when I think you've hit rock bottom, you start digging a tunnel.
quotes.author: Phyllis Thorne

quotes.quote: Every time I think I've hit rock bottom, someone hands me a shovel.
quotes.author: Garfield

quotes.quote: Lucky for you... you're here for rock-bottom. You absolute horror of a human being.
quotes.author: Simon Bishop

quotes.quote: Oh my queen; you know you've hit rock-bottom when even drag is a drag.
quotes.author: Prior

quotes.quote: He hit rock bottom, and then you dug a hole even deeper than that and pushed him in it.
quotes.author: Max Lewis

quotes.quote: You know, sometimes I think to myself: At least it can't get any worse. But it can! It can get worse! As long as you can say you hit rock bottom, you haven't.
quotes.author: Holden

quotes.quote: That's rock bottom, when this life makes you mad enough to kill / That's rock bottom, when you want something bad enough to steal / That's rock bottom, when you feel like you've had it up to here / 'Cause you mad enough to scream but you're sad enough to tear
quotes.author: Jeff Bass; Mark Bass; Marshall Mathers

quotes.quote: Rock bottom's never felt so near before / And if pain is God's megaphone, it's loud and clear
quotes.author: Stephen Clark; Dick Lee

quotes.quote: Oh, we're on the right side of rock bottom / And I hope that we keep falling / We're on the good side of bad karma / 'Cause we keep on coming back for more
quotes.author: Julia Michaels; Justin Tranter; Mattias Per Larsson; Robin Lennart Fredriksson

quotes.quote: We're on the right side of rock bottom / Into you, I just keep crawling / You're the best kind of bad something / 'Cause we keep on coming back for more
quotes.author: Julia Michaels; Justin Tranter; Mattias Per Larsson; Robin Lennart Fredriksson

quotes.quote: All or nada / Through Hell and high water / Gotta do what I gotta / I’ma get high till I hit rock bottom
quotes.author: Sunny Levine; Yeshe Perl

quotes.quote: When you hit rock bottom / You've got two ways to go / Straight up / And sideways / I have seen my share of hard times / And I'm letting you know / Straight up / Is my way
quotes.author: Walter Jacobs

quotes.quote: Anyway, rock bottom / Is good solid ground / And a dead end street / Is just a place to turn around
quotes.author: Walter Jacobs

quotes.quote: I have experienc'd / The worst, the World can wreak on me--the worst / That can make Life indifferent, yet disturb / With whisper'd Discontents the dying prayer--
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Thy wings swoop darkening round my soul, Despair! / And on my brain thy shadow seems to brood / And hem me round with stifling solitude, / With chasms of vacuous bloom which are thy lair.
quotes.author: Mathilde Blind

quotes.quote: No light of human joy, no song or prayer, / Breaks ever on this chaos, all imbrued / With heart's-blood trickling from the multitude / Of sweet hopes slain, or agonising there.
quotes.author: Mathilde Blind

quotes.quote: This scene, like my own life,' I said, 'is one / Where many glooms abide; / Toned by its fortune to a deadly dun-- / Lightless on every side.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Such hope, as is the sick despair of good, / Such fear, as is the certainty of ill, / Such doubt, as is pale Expectation’s food / Turned while she tastes to poison, when the will / Is powerless, and the spirit...
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: If you weren’t there for me at rock bottom, you don’t deserve me on my mountain tops.
quotes.author: Madi Harmer

quotes.quote: Rock bottom will teach you lessons the mountain tops never will.
quotes.author: Trayce Janae

quotes.quote: I figured it out but once again I'm late / It's the same old story on a different day / And I'm willing to change I just don't know how / But I hit rock bottom so I'll start right now
quotes.author: Berry Krikken; Sebastiaan Weerman

quotes.quote: Nothing says hitting rock bottom like microwaving leftover french fries.
quotes.author: The Spicy Disaster Mama

quotes.quote: I was asked recently how I got through my rock bottom, my answer: Immerse yourself into helping others! Kindness and sacrifice without expecting a thing in return was huge for me!
quotes.author: Sean Salisbury

quotes.quote: When you hit rock bottom it’s wild to see who is there to pick you up and who will watch you struggle from afar.
quotes.author: Sky Hirsch

quotes.quote: Rock bottom isn't always what makes you change your life.
quotes.author: Dax Shepard

quotes.quote: A hobby a day keeps the doldrums away.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: A hobby is only fun if you don't have time to do it.
quotes.author: Leo Beenhakker

quotes.quote: A hobby is the result of a distorted view of things. It is putting a planet in the place of a sun.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: The cultivation of a hobby and new forms of interest is a policy of first importance to a public man.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The finest thing about a hobby is that you can't do any pretending about it. You either like it or you don't.
quotes.author: Dorothy Draper

quotes.quote: A hobby is, of course, an abomination, as are all consuming interests and passions that do not lead directly to large, personal gain.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The most expensive hobby a rich man could have is a boat, and the second most expensive hobby he could have is a very old house.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: Hobbies are a contradiction; they take work and turn it into leisure, and take leisure and turn it into work.
quotes.author: Steven M. Gelber

quotes.quote: Hobbies take place in the cellar and smell of airplane glue.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: The worst of all hobbies are those that people think they can get money at. They shoot their money down like corn out of a sack then.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Hobbies are apt to run away with us, you know; it doesn't do to be run away with. We must keep the reins.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A hobby is a happy medium between a passion and a monomania.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Hobbies are for people that don't like what they're doing.
quotes.author: Stefan Sagmeister

quotes.quote: Hobbies are great distractions from the worries and troubles that plague daily living.
quotes.author: Bill Malone

quotes.quote: A hobby is labor disguising itself as leisure. It is extremely destructive to the boundaries of private life.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: Make thy recreation servant to thy business, lest thou become a slave to thy recreation.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: Recreation and diversion are as necessary to our well-being as the more serious pursuits of life.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: Recreation is nothing but a change of work-an occupation for the hands by those who live by their brains, or for the brains by those who live by their hands.
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: Recreation is intended to the mind as whetting is to the scythe, to sharpen the edge of it, which otherwise would grow dull and blunt,--as good no scythe as no edge.
quotes.author: Joseph Hall

quotes.quote: Hobbies are for wimps who don't have the guts to follow their passion.
quotes.author: Valerie Thomas

quotes.quote: When your hobbies get in the way of your work - that's OK; but when your hobbies get in the way of themselves... well.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Hobbies of any kind are boring except to people who have the same hobby. This is also true of religion, although you will not find me saying so in print.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Hobbies are for pleasure, but rituals keep you going.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: But a hobby, like a habit, makes you forget about important things in life.
quotes.author: Margo Kaufman

quotes.quote: Using your talent, hobby or profession in a way that makes you contribute with something good to this world is truly the way to go.
quotes.author: Simon Zingerman

quotes.quote: Beware the hobby that eats.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: No hobby should either seek or need rational justification. To wish to do it is reason enough. To find reasons why it is useful or beneficial converts it at once from an avocation into an industry.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: As soon as you take your hobby and make it into your profession, it sort of kills it as a hobby.
quotes.author: John Knoll

quotes.quote: Hobbies are both a mystery and a delight. They're a mystery because many people with hobbies don't always share them with others. They're a delight because of the pure joy they provide to the hobbyist, making hours pass like minutes!
quotes.author: Willet Ryder

quotes.quote: The best pastimes for a true enjoyer of leisure who has to stay at home . . .: reading by the fireside. . . . Listening to music.
quotes.author: Salvador De Madariaga

quotes.quote: To me, the avocation of a teacher has something elevating and exciting. While surrounded by the young, one may always be doing good.
quotes.author: Dorothea Dix

quotes.quote: To find recreation in amusement is not happiness.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Recreation is not the highest kind of enjoyment, but in its time and place is quite as proper as prayer.
quotes.author: Samuel I. Prime

quotes.quote: The most potent recreational activity is when we sit back and exercise our minds with great and exciting books.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: As for hobbies, people with stimulating hobbies suffer from the most noxious of despairs since they are tranquilized in their despair.
quotes.author: Walker Percy

quotes.quote: Find three hobbies you love: One to make you money, one to keep you in shape and one to be creative.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A hobby is hard work you wouldn't do for a living.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: RECREATION, n. A particular kind of dejection to relieve a general fatigue.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Hockey's a funny game. You have to prove yourself every shift, every game. It's not up to anybody else. You have to take pride in yourself.
quotes.author: Paul Coffey

quotes.quote: Hockey is the original extreme sport.
quotes.author: Tom Ward

quotes.quote: Hockey is a tough game.
quotes.author: Bobby Orr

quotes.quote: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Hockey is a man's game. The team with the most real men wins.
quotes.author: Brian Burk

quotes.quote: Hockey is the only job I know where you get paid to have a nap on the day of the game.
quotes.author: Chico Resch

quotes.quote: Hockey is like a disease, you can't really shake it.
quotes.author: Ken Wregget

quotes.quote: Every day is a great day for hockey.
quotes.author: Mario Lemeiux

quotes.quote: Hockey is murder on ice.
quotes.author: Jim Murray

quotes.quote: Hockey players have fire in their heartsand ice in their veins.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All hockey players are bilingual. They know English and profanity.
quotes.author: Gordie Howe

quotes.quote: You can't get big in hockey. You need to be pliable... they've even taken fighting out of the game, so there's no more of those big huge guys who just fight.
quotes.author: Brett Hull

quotes.quote: Hockey would be a great game? if played in the mud.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: The three important elements of hockey are: forecheck, backcheck and pay check.
quotes.author: Gil Perreault

quotes.quote: Ice hockey is a form of disorderly conduct in which the score is kept.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Hockey is a unique sport in the sense that you need each and every guy helping each other and pulling in the same direction to be successful.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Ninety percent of hockey is mental and the other half is physical.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Hockey players are like mules. They have no fear of punishment and no hope of reward.
quotes.author: Emory Jones

quotes.quote: You're not really a hockey player until you've lost a few teeth.
quotes.author: Bill Gadsb

quotes.quote: Hockey is a tough, physical game, and it always should be.
quotes.author: Mario Lemieux

quotes.quote: I liked hockey, and I still like hockey.
quotes.author: Kevin Smith

quotes.quote: If you don't know how to play hockey, learn. If you quit, get back out there.
quotes.author: David Walton

quotes.quote: It is never too late to set another hockey goal or to dream a new hockey dream.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Believe you can achieve your hockey goals and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: You only reach the hockey goals you aim at. Therefore, you might as well aim at reaching your ultimate hockey goals.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Hockey Goals Are Hockey Dreams With Deadlines.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Hockey Goals Are Attained Not By Strength But By Perseverance.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Hockey's the only place where a guy can go nowadays and watch two white guys fight.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Hockey players wear numbers because you can't always identify the body with dental records.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A puck is a hard rubber disc that hockey players strike when they can't hit one another.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: Nothing in this world compares to the comfort and security of having someone just hold your hand.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: I could conquer the world with one hand as long as your'e holding the other.
quotes.author: Lauren Alaina

quotes.quote: You hold her hand and she holds yours, and that's a very good sign that she's your tootsey wootsey in the good old sumer time.
quotes.author: Ron Shields

quotes.quote: Sometimes, reaching out and taking someone's hand is the beginning of a journey. At other times, it is allowing another to take yours.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That's why it's a comfort to go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Emily Kimbrough

quotes.quote: Holding hands is a promise to one another that, for just a moment, the two of you don't have to face the world alone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Holding her hand in public is just another way of saying you're proud to have her.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Listen to 'the sound of one hand clapping' the next tome you see a couple united in wisdom and love walking hand in hand.
quotes.author: Ellen and Charles Birx

quotes.quote: And he understands. He understands why people hold hands: he'd always thought it was about possessiveness, saying This is mine. But it's about maintaining contact. It is about speaking without words. It is about I want you with me and don't go.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Relationship is not just holding hands while you understand each other. It's also having lots of misunderstandings and still not leaving each other's hands.
quotes.author: Ryan Ferreras

quotes.quote: We hold hands as we walk through town. If anybody notices, nobody cares. I know we all like to think of the heart as the center of the body but at this moment, every conscious part of me is in the hand that he holds. It is through that hand, that feeling, that I experience everything else.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: So hold my hand tight. Hold my hand with confidence. For this love can last forever. For this love we shall share together.
quotes.author: Shelby Dawson

quotes.quote: Once I had her hand, I never wanted to let go of her.
quotes.author: Ottilie Weber

quotes.quote: Nothing, I learned, brings you into the present quite like holding hands. The past seemed irrelevant; the future, unnecessary.
quotes.author: Catherine Lowell

quotes.quote: I will remember the feel of his hand around mine for the rest of my life.
quotes.author: Meg Leder

quotes.quote: Only take someone's hand in a certain way, even look into their eyes in a certain way, and the world is changed forever.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: They were not holding hands, but their shadows were.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Today I promise to hold your hand, cradle your heart, and lead you down a path of all that is good and true in this world.
quotes.author: Lori Eberhardy

quotes.quote: You may hold my hand for a while, but you hold my heart forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Just to hold my hand will make me think you love me as much as I love you.
quotes.author: Leigh-Ann Beckett

quotes.quote: I am a strong person but every now and then I need someone to hold my hand and tell me everything will be alright.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Hold my hand. Don't let go.
quotes.author: Jenny Downham

quotes.quote: And it is still true, no matter how old you are, when you go out into the world it is best to hold hands and stick together.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: We always hold hands. If I let go, she shops.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Hold my hand and I'll take you there, somehow, someday, somewhere.
quotes.author: West Side Story

quotes.quote: The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree, but still hold hands.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's something so real about holding hands, some kind of complex simplicity, saying so much by doing so little. I love it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The lovers, appearing happy, walk, holding hands. Though it appears everything is perfect, only they know the truth.
quotes.author: Ayumi Hamasaki

quotes.quote: Hold Hands, Not Grudges
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your hand fits in mine like it's just made for me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Hold a true friend with both your hands.
quotes.author: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.quote: I can tell if two people are in love by how they hold each other's hands, and how thick their sanitation gloves are.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: If you are holding hands with others, you can't hold a gun!
quotes.author: Allan Rufus

quotes.quote: Hold my hand and never let it go...for my love for you will be foreverand it will last even the infinite of time..
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Hold my hand tight and everything will be alright.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you hold my hand I'm reminded that I'm not alone in this world, that somebody loves me, and that I have a best friend.
quotes.author: Darlene Schacht

quotes.quote: Renew the pledge of brotherhood round the fire. Renew the pledge of sisterhood round the fire. Hold hands in a circle and each make the sacred vow and pledge.
quotes.author: Phil Cousineau

quotes.quote: Holding hands, the lovers, I imagined, dangled their feet over the edge,rapt in beauty.
quotes.author: Phil Cousineau

quotes.quote: We are all falling. This hand's falling,too--all have this falling-sickness none withstands. And yet there's one whose gently-holding hands this universal falling can't fall through.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: They sounded like truth but he rejected them. Comfort can come too easily: he thought, those hands will never hold my fall.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Holding hands at midnight / 'Neath a starry sky / Nice work if you can get it / ANd you can get it if you try.
quotes.author: Iya Gershwin

quotes.quote: The dance called tha Sardana, young men and women in a circle holding hands high, prancing with sedate vigor to music with a panpipe flavour.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Hold hands each time you cross the street / Hold hands on the bus if you don't have a seat / Hold hands when you say goodbye / And also when you're jumping high.
quotes.author: Sara Varon

quotes.quote: Whoever you are, holding me now in hand, / Without one thing, all will be useless,/ I give you fair warning, before you attempt me further, /I am not what you supposed, but far different.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: When first I loved, in the long ago, / And held your hand as I told you so-- / Pressed and caressed it and gave it a kiss / And said 'I could die for a hand like this!
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: But her hands are still the woman, the large, strong hands / Heavier than mine, yet like leverets caught in steel / When I hold them; my still soul understands / Their dumb confession of what her sort must feel.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: We look back in / To the ruins where we played / At least we were together / Holding hands / Flying through the sky.
quotes.author: Richard Melville

quotes.quote: Cause our hearts are holding hands across the miles / Even though we're lonely we can smile / Cause I know you're my woman / And I know you're my man / We're far apart but our hearts are holding hands.
quotes.author: Bill Anderson

quotes.quote: I remember we were in the park / Holding hands and you said to me / I'm the only thing you need / And I would make your life complete.
quotes.author: Antwan Patton

quotes.quote: And I'll be by your side wherever you fall / In the dead of night whenever you call / And please don't fight these hands that are holding you / My hands are holding you.
quotes.author: Philip Larue

quotes.quote: I saw you (and him) walking in the rain / You were holding hands and I'll never be the same.
quotes.author: Kerri Chandler

quotes.quote: In marriage, the love language of physical touch includes everything from putting a hand in your mate's shoulder as you walk by, touching his or her leg when you're driving together, and holding hands while you're walking to kissing, embracing and sexual intercourse.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: His hand lay across my stomach as he slept soundly. I entwined my fingers with his and breathed through the warmth that seeped through my chest. Such a simple, sweet thing to do, yet holding hands in bed was incredibly intimate.
quotes.author: N.R. Walker

quotes.quote: She said nothing with her voice and everything with her caring touch.
quotes.author: Dave Cenker

quotes.quote: I've sent you roses many times. I've held your hand in mine.
quotes.author: Richard L. Ratliff

quotes.quote: She closed her eyes, and I closed mine, and even though we weren't holding hands, it felt like we were. Because what we had, we knew.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.quote: Holding hands in love is underrated, while sex is overrated. Don't you think so?
quotes.author: Kiran Joshi

quotes.quote: Gold authenticity can only be tested under maximum fire. The same holds true with regard to manhood.
quotes.author: Moutasem Algharati

quotes.quote: Why is it that, as a culture, we are more comfortable seeing two men holding guns than holding hands.
quotes.author: Ernest Gaines

quotes.quote: The success of a holiday depends on what you find for yourself on the spot, not what you bring with you.
quotes.author: Ellis Peters

quotes.quote: Sharing the holiday with other people, and feeling that you're giving of yourself, gets you past all the commercialism.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.quote: After all, the best part of a holiday is perhaps not so much to be resting yourself, as to see all the other fellows busy working.
quotes.author: Kenneth Grahame

quotes.quote: If you have a work instead of a job, every day is holiday.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A holiday cocktail party is where some stranger will learn more about you in an hour than your spouse has learned in a lifetime.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: A holiday is when you celebrate something that's all finished upâ€¦
quotes.author: Abraham Polonsky

quotes.quote: Take vacations. Go as many places as you can. You can always make money. You can't always make memories.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Blessed is the season which engages the whole world in a conspiracy of love.
quotes.author: Hamilton Wright Mabie

quotes.quote: A vacation should be just long enough that your boss misses you, and not long enough for him to discover how well he can get along without you.
quotes.author: Jacob Braude

quotes.quote: Holidays - any holiday - are such a great opportunity to focus on bringing the family together.
quotes.author: Lidia Bastianich

quotes.quote: To many people holidays are not voyages of discovery, but a ritual of reassurance.
quotes.author: Phillip Adams

quotes.quote: A good holiday is one spent among people whose notions of time are vaguer than yours.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.quote: A holiday isn't a holiday, without plenty of freedom and fun.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Vacation: Two weeks on the sunny sands - and the rest of the year on the financial rocks.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Every man who possibly can should force himself to a holiday of a full month in a year, whether he feels like taking it or not.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A perpetual holiday is a good working definition of hell.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Holidays bring out the best in family dysfunction.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There's something about a holiday that isn't all about how much money you spend.
quotes.author: Hilarie Burton

quotes.quote: The holiest of holidays are those kept by ourselves in silence and apart; The secret anniversaries of the heart.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and receipts for all major purchases.
quotes.author: Bridger Winegar

quotes.quote: Enjoy your time off from telling everyone on earth how much you need time off.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The holiday season is a perfect time to reflect on our blessings and seek out ways to make life better for those around us.
quotes.author: Terri Marshall

quotes.quote: A vacation is like love - anticipated with pleasure, experienced with discomfort, and remembered with nostalgia.
quotes.author: Jan Phillips

quotes.quote: A vacation is what you take when you can no longer take what you've been taking.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: The best part about holiday parties is the alcohol. You have a couple of drinks and you tell your coworkers and your superiors what you really think about them. And then the fun begins.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: No man needs a vacation so much as the man who has just had one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Having a holiday weekend without a family member felt like putting on a sweater that had an extra arm.
quotes.author: Pamela Ribon

quotes.quote: It isn't how much time you spend somewhere that makes it memorable: it's how you spend the time.
quotes.author: David Brenne

quotes.quote: A vacation is having nothing to do and all day to do it in.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: A good vacation is over when you begin to yearn for your work.
quotes.author: Morris Fishbein

quotes.quote: It is the day after the holiday when a holiday is most needed.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The man who looks half dead should take a holiday, or has.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: After the Christmas holidays most of us are way behind on our bills, but way ahead on our calories.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: How wonderful holidays would be if there wasn't the day after.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Memorial Day is a day set aside to decorate old graves of soldiers and to dig new ones for reckless drivers.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is an emotional holiday. People travel thousands of miles to be with people they only see once a year. And then discover once a year is way too often.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: I considered atheism, but there weren't enough holidays.
quotes.author: Ulyssses Press

quotes.quote: In the old days, it was not called the Holiday Season. Christians called it 'Christmas' and went to church. Jews called it 'Hanukkah' and went to synagogue. The atheists went to parties and drank.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: People passing each other on the street would say would say 'Merry Christmas!' or 'Happy Hanukkah!' or to the atheists 'Look out for the wall!'.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Christmas is a bridge. We need bridges as the river of time flows past. Today's Christmas should mean creating happy hours for tomorrow and reliving those of yesterday.
quotes.author: Gladys Taber

quotes.quote: It is, indeed, the season of regenerated feeling, the season for kindling, not merely the fire of hospitality in the hall, but the genial flame of charity in the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: When we recall Christmas past, we usually find the simplest things - not the great occasions give off the greatest glow of happiness.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: I wrapped my Christmas presents early this year, but I used the wrong paper. See, the paper I used said 'Happy Birthday' on it.
quotes.author: Team Golfwell

quotes.quote: My mom and dad always tried to make Christmas special for us. We were poor, but it's funny because we had no idea.
quotes.author: Johnny Mathis

quotes.quote: This holiday season, no matter what your religion is, please take a moment to reflect on why it's better than all the other ones.
quotes.author: Guy Endore Kaiser

quotes.quote: Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Holidays are an expensive trial of strength. The only satisfaction comes from survival.
quotes.author: Jonathan Miller

quotes.quote: The Joy of brightening other lives, bearing each others’ burdens, easing each other’s loads and supplanting empty hearts and lives with generous gifts becomes for us the magic of the holidays.
quotes.author: W.C. Jones

quotes.quote: Create peace and joy while releasing holiday grief and loneliness.
quotes.author: Carolyn Flynn

quotes.quote: Winter is the time for comfort, for good food and warmth, for the touch of a friendly hand and for a talk beside the fire: it is the time for home.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Winter, a lingering season, is a time to gather golden moments, embark upon a sentimental journey, and enjoy every idle hour.
quotes.author: John Boswell

quotes.quote: We usually remember to celebrate a birthday. a holiday or a special anniversary. But we frequently forget that everyday is special and a time to celebrate.
quotes.author: Steve Rizzo

quotes.quote: Never worry about the size of your Christmas tree. In the eyes of children, they are all 30 feet tall.
quotes.author: Larry Wilde

quotes.quote: For I remember it is Easter morn, And life and love and peace are all new born.
quotes.author: Alice Freeman Palmer

quotes.quote: We live and die, Christ died and lived.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: Those have a short Lent, who owe money to be paid at Easter.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Once more to new creation Awake, and death gainsay, For death is swallowed up of life, And Christ is risen today!
quotes.author: George Newell Lovejoy

quotes.quote: Let the resurrection joy life us from loneliness and weakness and despair to strength and beauty and happiness.
quotes.author: Floyd Tomkins

quotes.quote: Christmas is the gentlest, loveliest festival of the revolving year, and yet, for all that, when it speaks, its voice has strong authority.
quotes.author: W.J. Cameron

quotes.quote: The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other.
quotes.author: Burton Hillis

quotes.quote: Holiness requires continual effort on our part and continual nourishing and strengthening by the Spirit.
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: When Jesus comes to live in our hearts, the seed of holiness is planted.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Holiness of life is not the privilege of a chosen few - it is the obligation, the call, and the will of God for every Christian.
quotes.author: Mother Angelica

quotes.quote: True holiness isn’t cold and deadening – it’s warm and inviting. It’s irresistible. Those who think otherwise have never seen it, but only its caricatures.
quotes.author: Nanvy Leigh DeMoss

quotes.quote: Holiness does not consist in doing extraordinary things. It consists in accepting, with a smile, what Jesus sends us. It consists in accepting and following the will of God.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Holiness, as taught in the Scriptures, is not based upon knowledge on our part. Rather, it is based upon the resurrected Christ in-dwelling us and changing us into His likeness.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: Holiness consists simply in doing God's will, and being just what God wants us to be.
quotes.author: St. Therese de Lisieux

quotes.quote: It is not because angels are holier than men or devils that makes them angels, but because they do not expect holiness from one another, but from God only.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Holiness is the strength of the soul. It comes by faith and through obedience to God's laws and ordinances. God then purifies the heart by faith, and the heart becomes purged from that which is profane and unworthy.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: The desert has its holiness of silence, the crowd its holiness of conversation.
quotes.author: Walter Elliott

quotes.quote: Holiness is found in how we treat others, not in how we contemplate the cosmos. As our experiences in marriages, families, and friendship teach us, it takes relationships to provide the friction that wears down our rough edges and sanctifies us.
quotes.author: Terryl Givens

quotes.quote: Sin contaminates our lives. Holiness purifies our lives.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Faith refers to Christ. Holiness depends on faith. Heaven depends on holiness.
quotes.author: Alexander Maclaren

quotes.quote: Without holiness on earth we shall never be prepared to enjoy heaven. Heaven is a holy place. The Lord of heaven is holy Being. The angels are holy creatures. Holiness is written on everything in heaven. How shall we ever be at home and happy in heaven if we die unholy?
quotes.author: J.C. Ryle

quotes.quote: Holiness of heart and life. This is not the perfection of the human nature, but the holiness of the divine nature dwelling within.
quotes.author: A.B. Simpson

quotes.quote: Holiness is an unselfing of ourselves.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Faber

quotes.quote: Holiness is not a merit by which we can attain communion with God, but a gift of Christ, which enables us to cling to him, and to follow him.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Only when we understand the holiness of God will we understand the depth of our sin.
quotes.author: Billy Garaham

quotes.quote: Remember that holiness is not the way to Christ, but Christ is the way to holiness.
quotes.author: James H. Aughey

quotes.quote: Heaven does not make holiness, but holiness makes heaven; because if you do not give yourself in sympathy to goodness, goodness cannot give itself in influence to you.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Holiness is nothing less than conformity to the character of God
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: Hollywood is a place where they'll pay you a thousand dollars for a kiss and fifty cents for your soul.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: In Hollywood if you don't have a shrink, people think you're crazy.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Most of the successful people in Hollywood are failures as human beings.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: What's the difference between Hollywood characters and my characters? Mine are real.
quotes.author: Spike Lee

quotes.quote: The classy gangster is a Hollywood invention.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: The impact of the black audience is expressing itself. They look to films to be more expressive of their needs, their lives. Hollywood has gotten that message - finally.
quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

quotes.quote: You can think of Hollywood as high school. TV actors are freshmen, comedy actors are maybe juniors, and dramatic actors - they're the cool seniors.
quotes.author: Owen Wilson

quotes.quote: In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Hollywood has a way of making everything seem like an overnight success.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: Romantic comedies seem to take over where the fairytales of childhood left off, feeding our dreams of a soulmate; though, sadly, the Hollywood endings prove quite elusive in the real world.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: Behind the phony tinsel of Hollywood lies the real tinsel.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Hollywood is where they shoot too many pictures and not enough actors.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Hollywood hasn't changed. It is the most racist, anti-Indian institution in the world.
quotes.author: Russell Means

quotes.quote: In Hollywood a girl's virtue is much less important than her hairdo.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: The ladder of success in Hollywood is usually a press agent, actor, director, producer, leading man; and you are a star if you sleep with each of them in that order. Crude, but true.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Hollywood, what a place it is! It is so far away from the rest of the world, so narrow. No one thinks of anything but motion pictures or talks of anything else.
quotes.author: Dolores Del Rio

quotes.quote: It is no surprise that animation is Hollywood's most successful and innovative genre.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: Hollywood likes to put actors in boxes, and it likes to put Asian actors in really small boxes.
quotes.author: Sandra Oh

quotes.quote: In Hollywood, the rainbow hits the ground for composers.
quotes.author: Hoagy Carmichael

quotes.quote: Hollywood is a strange place if you're in trouble. Everybody thinks it's contagious.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Certainly the attrition rate of Hollywood couples looms large.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: If only those who dream about Hollywood knew how difficult it all is.
quotes.author: Greta Garbo

quotes.quote: In Hollywood, no one knows anything.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: Hollywood is an extraordinary kind of temporary place.
quotes.author: John Schlesinger

quotes.quote: Liberals in Hollywood can't stand when Americans resonate to conservatives on television.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: Like Hollywood movies, MTV and blue jeans, fast food has become one of America's major cultural exports.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.quote: In Hollywood the woods are full of people that learned to write but evidently can't read. If they could read their stuff, they'd stop writing. Will Rogers
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: In Hollywood you can see things at night that are fast enough to be in the Olympics in the day time.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A holy man is a mighty weapon in the hands of God.
quotes.author: Robert Murray M'Cheyne

quotes.quote: Holy persons draw to themselves all that is earthly.
quotes.author: Hildegard of Bingen

quotes.quote: For everything that lives is holy, life delights in life.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The more holy a man becomes, the more conscious he is of unholiness.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: As you learn to love the company of the holy, your heart will become pure.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: The Holy Bible is the Spirit of God exposed to humanity in the Language of Heaven.
quotes.author: Felix Wantang

quotes.quote: The gift of the Holy Ghost is as important to man as sunshine and water are to plants.
quotes.author: LeGrand Richards

quotes.quote: If you want to be holy, be kind.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: There is nothing Holy about hatred.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Every man is as holy as he really wants to be.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: For life is holy and every moment is precious.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: The Holy Scriptures are our letters from home.
quotes.author: St. Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Holy living is essential preparation for prayer.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: If you would be holy, you must live close to Jesus.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The holy spirit of the Spring Is working silently.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Holy joy will be oil to the wheels of our obedience.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Holy living consists in doing God's work with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The Holy Rosary is the storehouse of countless blessings.
quotes.author: Alanus de Rupe

quotes.quote: A holy God is both just and merciful. He is never unjust.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit empowers us to achieve our God-given goals.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Even the merest gesture is holy if it is filled with faith.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Holy service in constant fellowship with God is heaven below.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Worship begins in holy expectancy, it ends in holy obedience.
quotes.author: Richard J. Foster

quotes.quote: As the more holy we are upon earth the more happy we must be.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Things that are holy are revealed only to men who are holy.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit has a way of His own to say much in few words.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Only the holy spirit, the spirit of the lord, can transform us.
quotes.author: Joseph Prince

quotes.quote: Holy Purity is granted by God when it is asked for with humility.
quotes.author: Josemaria Escriva

quotes.quote: Holy communion is to feel one with the One in all beings and creations.
quotes.author: Shankarananda

quotes.quote: If you want to be holy then you must give time to God and not just intend to.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: There's only one proof of the Holy Ghost in your life and that's a holy life.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: The Holy Scriptures lead us to God and open the path to the knowledge of God.
quotes.author: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is faithful to empower you to carry out your witness of Jesus.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: Holy Writ was intended to teach men how to go to Heaven not how the heavens go.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is the bond by which Christ efficaciously unites us to himself.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: From the holy scriptures, heaven-sent lift will be found for heaven-sent duties.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: The Holy Ghost will warn us of danger, and it will inspire us to help others in need.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: The divine moment is holy.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Life is holy endured faith.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A holy spirit lives within you.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is God the evangelist.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: Our holy lives must win a new world's crown.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Holy Communion is the shortest and safest way to heaven.
quotes.author: Pope Pius X

quotes.quote: Holy meditation helps to burn out all mental impurities.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: We forgot we have Holy Body not less than our Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Abraham Isaac Kook

quotes.quote: Those who operate through the Holy Spirit are more equipped to resist temptation.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit, thank God, often enables people to forgive even though they are not sure how they did it.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit, not the pope, is the vicar of Christ on earth.
quotes.author: Adoniram Judson Gordon

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is the bond by which Christ efficaciously unites us to himself.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit wants to convert the words of Scripture into transformed personalities.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit speaks many languages; among them the languages of art in all its forms.
quotes.author: Frank Griswold

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is a healing spirit. When the Holy Spirit is present, anything is possible.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: When we have the Holy Spirit we have all that is needed to be all that God desires us to be.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit accompanies God's Word to bring revelation of Christ, resulting in transformation.
quotes.author: Bob Hoskins

quotes.quote: The same Holy Spirit who implants faith within a life implants the boldness to verbalize that faith.
quotes.author: Alistair Begg

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit was not sent so we can have bless ups in our churches but so the world can be changed.
quotes.author: Mike Pilavachi

quotes.quote: Only the Holy Spirit can give you the power to not think about yourself, to set you free from yourself.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: When the Holy Spirit takes over your life, He'll drive every sickness out of your body; He'll make right everything that was wrong.
quotes.author: Chris Oyakhilome

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit has his own personality .He therefore moves in at will when we least expect it, and sometimes when we are least deserving of it.
quotes.author: R. T. Kendall

quotes.quote: The power of the Holy Spirit cannot be successfully duplicated. If a person is supernaturally changed and given a love for God's glory, God did it.
quotes.author: R.T. Kendall

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is just as truly in us when He makes no sign as when the fountains of joy are overflowing, or the waters of peace are softly refreshing our weary and troubled heart.
quotes.author: A. B. Simpson

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit gives liberty to the Christian, direction to the worker, discernment to the teacher, power to the Word, and fruit to faithful service. He reveals the things of Christ.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit has a sanctifying influence. The influence of the Holy Spirit tends towards sanctification, purity and holiness. Expect to live a life of greater purity, sanctification and holiness when under the sweet influence of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Dag Heward-Mills

quotes.quote: You can have knowledge, and you can be meticulous in your preparation; but without the unction of the Holy Spirit you will have no power, and your preaching will not be effective.
quotes.author: David Lloyd-Jones

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is no skeptic. He has written neither doubt nor mere opinion into our hearts, but rather solid assurances, which are more sure and solid than all experience and even life itself.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is the immediate source of all holiness. He is entirely sincere, and perfect in love. He is generous. He is pure in heart, free from selfishness, and never swerves from the path of duty. He is deep like a fountain. He sends forth his virtues in due season. He speaks, and men believe him; he acts, and men are gladdened by him. He possesses all heavenly virtues. He is one with Heaven.
quotes.author: Griffith John

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit empowers us to achieve our God-given goals.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit has a way of His own to say much in few words.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Only the holy spirit, the spirit of the lord, can transform us.
quotes.author: Joseph Prince

quotes.quote: It certainly must help us if we recognize that it is the presence of the Holy Spirit which creates a unity which we can never create.
quotes.author: Roland Allen

quotes.quote: The presence of the Holy Spirit is the keystone of all our hopes.
quotes.author: John Nelson Darby

quotes.quote: Those who operate through the Holy Spirit are more equipped to resist temptation.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: Only the Holy Spirit can comfort a person in the depths of grief.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit will always point people to the finish work of Jesus.
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit never draws attention to Himself. He always points to and reveals Jesus.
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: It is the Holy Spirit who inspired the Bible. It is the Holy Spirit who illumines the Bible.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit can cast out the evil spirit of the fear of man. He can make the coward brave.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit's main ministry is not to give thrills but to create in us Christlike character.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: It is superstitious to equate our feelings and inclinations with the leading of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: If the Holy Spirit guides us, He will do it according to the Scriptures and never contrary to them.
quotes.author: George Muller

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is profoundly committed to restoring the first commandment to first place in our lives.
quotes.author: Bob Sorge

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit truly transforms us. With our cooperation, he also wants to transform the world we live in.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit's motivation is always the same thing -to charge the word with heaven's own electric power.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is the most perfect gift of the Father to men, and yet He is the one gift which the Father gives most easily.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit illuminates the minds of people, makes us yearn for God, and takes spiritual truth and makes it understandable to us.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit would lead us to think much upon our own sins . It is a dangerous thing for us to dwell upon the imperfections of others.
quotes.author: Ichabod Spencer

quotes.quote: When the depths are upheld by the Holy Spirit, then the reaction is Christian.
quotes.author: E. Stanley Jones

quotes.quote: If you have the Holy Spirit and let Him take charge of your life, it doesn't matter what your situation is, He'll turn it around for your good.
quotes.author: Chris Oyakhilome

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit cannot conquer the world with unbelief, nor can He save the world with a worldly Church. He calls for a crusade, a campaign, and an adventure of saving passion. For this enterprise He wants a separated, sanctified and sacrificial people.
quotes.author: Samuel Chadwick

quotes.quote: O Holy Spirit, descend plentifully into my heart. Enlighten the dark corners of this neglected dwelling and scatter there Thy cheerful beams.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: If we rely on the Holy Spirit, we shall find that our prayers become more and more inarticulate; and when they are inarticulate, reverence grows deeper and deeper.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: The gifts of the Holy Spirit are testimony, faith, knowledge, wisdom, revelations, miracles, healing, and charity, to name but a few.
quotes.author: D. Todd Christofferson

quotes.quote: When you educate without the Holy Spirit, you only get a clever devil.
quotes.author: Adrian Rogers

quotes.quote: The Holy Spirit is God the evangelist.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: A holy spirit lives within you.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: By the power of the Holy Spirit, we can do what needs to be done.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: What is home? My favorite definition is "a safe place," a place where one is free from attack, a place where one experiences secure relationships and affirmation. It's a place where people share and understand each other.
quotes.author: Gladys Hunt

quotes.quote: The ache for home lives in all of us. The safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Home isn't where you're from, it's where you find light when all grows dark.
quotes.author: Pierce Brown

quotes.quote: Home is people. Not a place. If you go back there after the people are gone, then all you can see is what is not there any more.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Home's where you go when you run out of homes.
quotes.author: John le Carré

quotes.quote: Perhaps home is not a place but simply an irrevocable condition.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Home wasn't a set house, or a single town on a map. It was wherever the people who loved you were, whenever you were together. Not a place, but a moment, and then another, building on each other like bricks to create a solid shelter that you take with you for your entire life, wherever you may go.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Home is the nicest word there is.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: A home filled with nothing but yourself. It's heavy, that lightness. It's crushing, that emptiness.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Well, sometimes home is a person.
quotes.author: Beth Revis

quotes.quote: Home isn't a place, its a feeling.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: The home only fulfills its true purpose when it is God controlled.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: The most important work you and I will ever do will be within the walls of our own homes.
quotes.author: Harold B. Lee

quotes.quote: A good home must be made, not bought.
quotes.author: Joyce Maynard

quotes.quote: My home is not a place, it is people.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Home is not where you live but where they understand you.
quotes.author: Christian Morgenstern

quotes.quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Peace - that was the other name for home.
quotes.author: Kathleen Norris

quotes.quote: Home is any four walls that enclose the right person.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Home is where there's one to love us
quotes.author: Charles Swain

quotes.quote: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A comfortable house is a great source of happiness. It ranks immediately after health and a good conscience.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: A hundred men may make an encampment, but it takes a woman to make a home.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Charity begins at home, and justice begins next door.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The home is the center and circumference, the start and the finish, of most of our lives.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: The most important things in your home are people.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: Home is a place you grow up wanting to leave, and grow old wanting to get back to.
quotes.author: John Ed Pearce

quotes.quote: Home is a shelter from storms - all sorts of storms.
quotes.author: William J. Bennett

quotes.quote: He is the happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Home is where you can say anything you please, because nobody pays any attention to you anyway.
quotes.author: Joe Moore

quotes.quote: Home interprets heaven. Home is heaven for beginners.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quotes.quote: Home is one's birthplace, ratified by memory.
quotes.author: Henry Anatole Grunwald

quotes.quote: The home is the chief school of human virtues.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: Run a home like you would a small business and treat it with the same seriousness.
quotes.author: Anthea Turner

quotes.quote: Home sweet home. This is the place to find happiness. If one doesn't find it here, one doesn't find it anywhere.
quotes.author: M. K. Soni

quotes.quote: A home without books is a body without soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A house is made with walls and beams. A home is made with love and dreams.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Home - a place where the small are great, and the great are small.
quotes.author: Charles M. Crowe

quotes.quote: There is no place more delightful than one's own fireside.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do, but how much love we put in that action.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Home is the most popular, and will be the most enduring of all earthly establishments.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: The worst thing about work in the house or home is that whatever you do is destroyed, laid waste or eaten within twenty four hours.
quotes.author: Lady Kasluck

quotes.quote: Home is where the heart is.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: If you want a golden rule that will fit everything, this is it: Have nothing in your houses that you do not know to be useful or believe to be beautiful.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: The house a woman creates is a Utopia. She can't help it -- can't help trying to interest her nearest and dearest not in happiness itself but in the search for it.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Bricks and mortar make a house, but the laughter of children makes a home.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Mid pleasures and palaces though we may roam, Be it ever so humble, there's no place like home.
quotes.author: John Howard Payne

quotes.quote: I think that when you invite people to your home, you invite them to yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: One can say of language that it is potentially the only human home, the only dwelling place that cannot be hostile to man.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Home wasn't built in a day.
quotes.author: Jane Sherwood Ace

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the home you have, knowing that at this moment, all you have is all you need.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: A man's home is his wife's castle.
quotes.author: Alexander Chase

quotes.quote: The home should be the treasure chest of living.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.quote: The home is not the one tame place in the world of adventure. It is the one wild place in the world of rules and set tasks.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Home -- that blessed word, which opens to the human heart the most perfect glimpse of Heaven, and helps to carry it thither, as on an angel's wings.
quotes.author: Lydia Maria Child

quotes.quote: We shape our dwellings, and afterwards our dwellings shape us.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When I go home, its an easy way to be grounded. You learn to realize what truly matters.
quotes.author: Tony Stewart

quotes.quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: When we are young and restless to be free, home is the place from which we long to escape. But if there is still a home intact when trouble arises and life becomes a battlefield, home is the place to which we yearn to return.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The world is not a permanent home, it is only a temporary dwelling.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Our lives speak loudly to those around us, especially the children in our home.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Home was a refuge for me, a place I could truly relax.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: My home is in heaven. I'm just passing through this world.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: There's no place like home - after the other places close.
quotes.author: Joe Laurie Jr.

quotes.quote: Thoughts of home and all its loved ones to the soldier's heart would come.
quotes.author: Frances Ellen Watkins Harper

quotes.quote: Home, home, sweet, sweet home! There's no place like home, oh, there's no place like home!
quotes.author: John Howard Payne

quotes.quote: There was nothing as pricelessly humanitarian; as home; sweet home.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Home along, home along, to the place where I would be!
quotes.author: Cicely Fox Smith

quotes.quote: Let the others rant an' roam. When they git away from home.
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: To light the poorest home; hearts warmer grow.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Nobody's home to offer a cup of coffee, nobody's home to say goodbye.
quotes.author: Sonia Walker

quotes.quote: A home that was envisioned to withstand the storms of the world is found flooded from within.
quotes.author: Gregory Cicio

quotes.quote: Now, returned home after so many thousands of miles of road and ocean, all the hulls sailed in,
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Home is not where you live but where they understand you.
quotes.author: Christian Morgenstern

quotes.quote: After you leave home, you may find yourself feeling homesick, even if you have a new home that has nicer wallpaper and a more efficient dishwasher than the home in which you grew up.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Home is where the heart can laugh without shyness. Home is where the heart's tears can dry at their own pace.
quotes.author: VERNON BAKER

quotes.quote: Where we love is home, home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: The light is what guides you home, the warmth is what keeps you there.
quotes.author: Ellie Rodriguez

quotes.quote: If Home is where the heart is then may your Home be blessed . . .
quotes.author: John McLeod

quotes.quote: Home sweet home. This is the place to find happiness. If one doesn't find it here, one doesn't find it anywhere.
quotes.author: M. K. Soni

quotes.quote: Home is the most popular, and will be the most enduring of all earthly establishments.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: The sun at home warms better than the sun elsewhere.
quotes.author: Albania Proverb

quotes.quote: The home is the center and circumference, the start and the finish, of most of our lives.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: You can never go home again, but the truth is you can never leave home, so it's all right.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Home is a shelter from storms-all sorts of storms.
quotes.author: William J. Bennett

quotes.quote: Home is where the heart is.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: Home, the spot of earth supremely blest, A dearer, sweeter spot than all the rest.
quotes.author: Robert Montgomery

quotes.quote: Peace — that was the other name for home.
quotes.author: Kathleen Norris

quotes.quote: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Home is where we should feel secure and comfortable.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I do not understand how anyone can live without one small place of enchantment to turn to.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: A man's home is his castle.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Home is where there's one to love us.
quotes.author: Charles Swain

quotes.quote: Home the blessed word, which opens to the human heart the most perfect glimpse of Heaven, and helps to carry it thither, as on an angel's wings
quotes.author: Lyda M. Child

quotes.quote: No matter under what circumstances you leave it, home does not cease to be home. No matter how you lived there-well or poorly.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: If you know you're going home, the journey is never too hard.
quotes.author: Angela Wood

quotes.quote: Good food and a warm kitchen are what make a house a home.
quotes.author: RACHAEL RAY

quotes.quote: A house is made of walls and beams; a home is built with love and dreams.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People usually are the happiest at home.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Home is a place inside made of unconditional love, comfort, and deep connection.
quotes.author: Heather Zschock

quotes.quote: A little girl, asked where her home was, replied, 'Where Mother is'.
quotes.author: Keith L. Brooks

quotes.quote: Some, going the way, don't leave home. Others who left home, don't show up on the way at all.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: Some people live 'location independent', making the entire world their home-they'll park for a while in one neck of the woods then when the wanderlust itch needs scratching, they'll pack up again and move to a new spot.
quotes.author: Tsh Oxenreider

quotes.quote: When I travel, I'm at home in the world, so long as I'm with the people I love most.
quotes.author: Tsh Oxenreider

quotes.quote: At the beginning of the last century, the home of a reasonably well-off family of four contained a set of objects comprising no more than 150-200 items, including crockery and clothing.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: The home of a comparable family today might contain 2500 to 3000 objects, including electric appliances and items used in the pursuance of hobbies but not such items as books, records, and tapes.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: Our stability as a people, and out greatness as a nation depend almost entirely on our home life, which is indeed the backbone of our existence.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: With the hurry and scurry and strenuous endeavour of modern life, the home has to take its rightful place, namely, where it is possible to rest and recuperate.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: We are not naturally a race of restaurant habitués, and out achievements are largely born of the home.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: More and more is labour-saving becoming an absolute necessity in the modern home.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: Of late years electricity in the home has been developed has been developed into almost undreamed of possibilities, and the resultant luxurious living conserves our energies for the real battles of life.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: Electric heating of the home has, of course, been employed for some years, but there is a great revolution in the stoves and radiators of the past.
quotes.author: Paul Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: Residents like you make our community a wonderful place to call home.
quotes.author: Lisa Solomon

quotes.quote: A new home is a wonderful place to unpack old memories and make new ones.
quotes.author: Lisa Solomon

quotes.quote: Owning a home is a keystone of wealth both financial and affluence.
quotes.author: Lisa Solomon

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: Winter is the time for comfort, for good food and warmth, for the touch of a friendly hand and for a talk beside the fire: it is the time for home.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Home's where you go when you run out of homes.
quotes.author: John le Carré

quotes.quote: We leave something of ourselves behind when we leave a place, we stay there, even though we go away. And there are things in us that we can find again only by going back there.
quotes.author: Pascal Mercier

quotes.quote: Home is people. Not a place. If you go back there after the people are gone, then all you can see is what is not there any more.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: Perhaps home is not a place but simply an irrevocable condition.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: It was good to walk into a library again; it smelled like home.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kostova

quotes.quote: Home wasn't a set house, or a single town on a map. It was wherever the people who loved you were, whenever you were together. Not a place, but a moment, and then another, building on each other like bricks to create a solid shelter that you take with you for your entire life, wherever you may go.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Home isn't where you're from, it's where you find light when all grows dark.
quotes.author: Pierce Brown

quotes.quote: How often have I lain beneath rain on a strange roof, thinking of home.
quotes.author: William C. Faulkner

quotes.quote: Nature is not a place to visit. It is home.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.quote: The ache for home lives in all of us. The safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I used to dream about escaping my ordinary life, but my life was never ordinary. I had simply failed to notice how extraordinary it was. Likewise, I never imagined that home might be something I would miss.
quotes.author: Ransom Riggs

quotes.quote: One never reaches home,' she said. 'But where paths that have an affinity for each other intersect, the whole world looks like home, for a time.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: If I ever go looking for my heart's desire again, I won't look any further than my own back yard. Because if it isn't there, I never really lost it to begin with.
quotes.author: Noel Langley

quotes.quote: What is home? My favorite definition is "a safe place," a place where one is free from attack, a place where one experiences secure relationships and affirmation. It's a place where people share and understand each other. Its relationships are nurturing.
