quotes.quote: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don’t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote:
There is a saying in Tibetan, 'Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.'
No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote:
It is often in the darkest
skies that we see the
brightest stars.
quotes.author: Richard Evans

quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon, even if you fail, you'll land among the stars
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: Remember, Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The road that is built in hope is more pleasant to the traveler than the road built in despair, even though they both lead to the same destination.
quotes.author: Marion Zimmer Bradley

quotes.quote: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: We need never be hopeless because we can never be irreparably broken.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Hope is one of the greatest gifts,God gave to man / And it is never to be found in a can.
quotes.author: faenellaith

quotes.quote: Where bright prismatic colours shew / How gems of heavenly radiance glow / Just like Hope.
quotes.author: Charlotte Smith

quotes.quote: Hope is a tattered flag and a dream of time / Hope is a heartspun word, the rainbow, the shadblow in white.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Hope was but a timid friend / She sat without the grated den / Watching how my fate would tend / Even as selfish-hearted men.
quotes.author: Emily Jane Brontë

quotes.quote: Hope, whose whisper would have given / Balm to all my frenzied pain / Stretched her wings, and soared to heaven / Went, and ne'er returned again!
quotes.author: Emily Jane Brontë

quotes.quote: At the threshold of life hope leads us in / Hope plays round the mirthful boy / Though the best of its charms may with youth begin / Yet for age it reserves its toy.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote:
If hope grew on a bush / And joy grew on a tree / What a nosegay for the plucking
There would be!
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Hope bursts all radiant on the sight / Her words the troubled bosom sooth.
quotes.author: James Beattie

quotes.quote:
Hope for the best / But expect the worst
So you won't get let down so much / When good things don't happen.
quotes.author: The Best

quotes.quote: Hope. It is the only thing stronger than fear. A little hope is effective. A lot of hope is dangerous. A spark is fine, as long as it's contained.
quotes.author: Gary Ross

quotes.quote: There can be miracles, when you believe Though hope is frail, it's hard to kill. Who knows what miracles you can achieve. When you believe, somehow you will You will when you believe.
quotes.author: Philip LaZebnik

quotes.quote: Hope is what gets you out of bed in the morning when it's the day of prom and you haven't been asked.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: I think a man only needs one thing in life. He just needs someone to love. If you can't give him that, then give him something to hope for. And if you can't give him that, just give him something to do.
quotes.author: Lukas Heller

quotes.quote: Even in the darkest soul, there's always hope. People want to believe in something greater, and it may be easier to hate, but it's stronger to love.
quotes.author: Jerry Siegel

quotes.quote: For soon everything will be changing / In a single glance / Where it all enchants / And every hope is worth saving.
quotes.author: Paul O'Neill

quotes.quote: Here's a hope that those bright eyes will shine / Lovingly, longingly soon into mine!
quotes.author: Dorothy Donnelly

quotes.quote: Here's a hope that those soft arms will twine / Tenderly, trustingly soon around mine!
quotes.author: Dorothy Donnelly

quotes.quote: The thrill of hope / The weary world rejoices / For yonder breaks a new and glorious morn.
quotes.author: Adolph Adam

quotes.quote:
O God our help in ages past / Our hope for years to come / Our shelter from the stormy blast
And our eternal home.
quotes.author: Tommy Walker

quotes.quote: Your greatness is measured by your horizons.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: In expanding the field of knowledge we but increase the horizon of ignorance.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: The horizon leans forward, offering you space to place new steps of change.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The perception of the horizon is an earthbound event; all horizons disappear in space, and we are left shorn of the sweet roots that have held us to the earth, challenged to imagine what is truly present just before us, a unified and seemingly limitless universe.
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.quote: Make each day a new horizon.
quotes.author: Christopher McCandless

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the horizon and your nose to the wind.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: You are the one who can stretch your own horizon.
quotes.author: Edgar Magnin

quotes.quote: Our horizon is the creation of a noble society to which, like the medieval builder of those glorious cathedrals, you will have added your conception, your artful piece of stone.
quotes.author: Adrienne Clarkson

quotes.quote: With creative people, truly new horizons open up.
quotes.author: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau

quotes.quote: We all live under the same sky, but we don't all have the same horizon.
quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

quotes.quote: No matter how far a person can go the horizon is still way beyond.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: The horizon is an imaginary line that recedes as you approach it.
quotes.author: Ginnifer Goodwin

quotes.quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: The horizon changes but the sun does not.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: The health of the eye seems to demand a horizon. We are never tired, so long as we can see far enough.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The cloud never comes from the quarter of the horizon from which we watch for it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
quotes.author: Christopher McCandless

quotes.quote: When our inner vision opens, our horizons expand.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Never look down to test the ground before taking your next step; only he who keeps his eye fixed on the far horizon will find the right road.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: A person can grow only as much as his horizon allows.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: A horizon is nothing save the limit of our sight.
quotes.author: Rossiter W. Raymond

quotes.quote: No matter how far a person can go the horizon is still way beyond you.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: The wideness of the horizon has to be inside us, cannot be anywhere but inside us, otherwise what we speak about is geographic distances.
quotes.author: Ella Maillart

quotes.quote: Life rarely presents fully finished photographs. An image evolves, often from a single strand of visual interest a distant horizon, a moment of light, a held expression.
quotes.author: Sam Abell

quotes.quote: The grave, where sets the orb of being, sets To rise, ascend, and culminate above Eternity's horizon evermore.
quotes.author: Abraham Coles

quotes.quote: Sometimes nature guards her secrets with the unbreakable grip of physical law. Sometimes the true nature of reality beckons from just beyond the horizon.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.quote: One of the most tragic things I know about human nature is that all of us tend to put off living. We are all dreaming of some magical rose garden over the horizon instead of enjoying the roses that are blooming outside our windows today.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: You must learn day by day, year by year to broaden your horizon. The more things you love, the more you are interested in, the more you enjoy, the more you are indignant about, the more you have left when anything happens.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: There are none happy in the world but beings who enjoy freely a vast horizon.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A dream is the bearer of a new possibility, the enlarged horizon, the great hope.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: When we look up, it widens our horizons. we see what a little speck we are in the universe, so insignificant, and we all take ourselves so seriously, but in the sky, there are no boundaries. No differences of caste or religion or race.
quotes.author: Julia Gregson

quotes.quote: Our brightest dreams and our greatest fears are just over the horizon.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: Perfection is like chasing the horizon. Keep moving.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: A warrior cannot lower his head - otherwise he loses sight of the horizon of his dreams.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Look to the horizon, spread your wings, and fly.
quotes.author: Tom Reilly

quotes.quote: Leaders keep their eyes on the horizon, not just on the bottom line.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: The manager has his eye on the bottom line; the leader has his eye on the horizon.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: Do not be in a hurry to succeed. What would you have to live for afterwards? Better make the horizon your goal; it will always be ahead of you.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Your reward will be the widening of the horizon as you climb. And if you achieve that reward you will ask no other.
quotes.author: Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin

quotes.quote: As soon as sacrifice becomes a duty and necessity to mankind. I see no limit to the horizon which opens before him.
quotes.author: Ernest Renan

quotes.quote: To control your hormones is to control your life.
quotes.author: Barry Sears

quotes.quote: A pure heart and mind only takes you so far - sooner or later the hormones have their say, too.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: If men went through menopause, we'd know everything about it, but we still don't even know if we should be taking hormones.
quotes.author: Joycelyn Elders

quotes.quote: Hormones were as potent as whiskey, and twice as sneaky.
quotes.author: Linda Howard

quotes.quote: The hormonal interplay inside a woman’s head creates her reality. Her hormones tell her day to day what’s important. They mold her desires and values.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: That connection between hormones and mood is so important to get a handle on, and it's also really important when you're considering taking medication.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.quote: When dogs and humans make eye contact, that actually releases what's known as the love hormone, oxytocin, in both the dog and the human.
quotes.author: Brian Hare

quotes.quote: Stud males might be emotional, temperamental, and developmentally stunted, at the mercy of their androgens, but that didn't make them incapable of generosity, friendship, cleverness, or creativity.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bear

quotes.quote: Girls are so in their head about their body image. It doesn't matter how confident you are - it's hormones!
quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

quotes.quote: They love to go up. Let them climb, their stress hormones go down.
quotes.author: JoGayle Howard

quotes.quote: Love is indeed, at root, the product of the firings of neurons and release of hormones.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: Hormones are very powerful things. We are helpless in their wake.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.quote: When you're in your twenties, your brain hasn't even finished baking, and your hormones are giving you all kinds of direction of which ways to go.
quotes.author: Nancy Wilson

quotes.quote: As a teenager, you have so much energy and hormones and you feel powerless in your life.
quotes.author: Patricia Arquette

quotes.quote: Vampires and teens have a lot in common. Teens have surging hormones, vampires have surging blood lust. Teenagers think they're immortal.
quotes.author: P. C. Cast

quotes.quote: I think when you start messing with your own hormones, it's crazy-making.
quotes.author: Rebecca Romijn

quotes.quote: The more you worry, the more you throw off the delicate balance of hormones required for health.
quotes.author: Andrew J. Bernstein

quotes.quote: You cannot control the primitive urges and hormones that drive your eating behavior.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.quote: Try and stay away from dairy - especially if you're a woman! It's really hard on your hormones.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.quote: I can be a bit grumpy. I'm full of angst, and hormones.
quotes.author: Nicholas Hoult

quotes.quote: The sudden surge of hormones at teenage age will continue to play an important part in the life of young people.
quotes.author: Oche Otorkpa

quotes.quote: With Free, we were teenagers, and, ummm, there was a lot of raging hormones.
quotes.author: Paul Rodgers

quotes.quote: Courtship is driven by hormones; marriage is sustained by humility and self-sacrifice.
quotes.author: Ron Brackin

quotes.quote: What we like about women is sensuality, wildness, hormones. Women who make a song and dance about their intuition.
quotes.author: Yasmina Reza

quotes.quote: There are horrors beyond life’s edge that we do not suspect, and once in a while man’s evil prying calls them just within our range.
quotes.author: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: There is no terror in the bang, only in the anticipation of it.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The shortest horror story: The last man on Earth sat alone in a room. There was a knock on the door.
quotes.author: Frederic Brown

quotes.quote: Horror is the natural reaction to the last 5,000 years of history.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: It is a mistake to fancy that horror is associated inextricably with darkness, silence, and solitude.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: When you look fear in the face, you are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.'
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No new horror can be more terrible than the daily torture of the commonplace.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Life is absolutely horrific, leading up to absolute horror.
quotes.author: Meg Rosoff

quotes.quote: Death holds no horrors. It is simply the ultimate horror of life.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: There is a mystery about this which stimulates the imagination; where there is no imagination there is no horror.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: From even the greatest of horrors irony is seldom absent.
quotes.author: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: The greatest horrors of our world are committed by people who are totally sincere.
quotes.author: John Mortimer

quotes.quote: Horror was rooted in sympathy . . . in understanding what it would be like to suffer the worst.
quotes.author: Joe Hill

quotes.quote: Horror in your country is something you take a dose of to remind yourself that you are not suffering from it.
quotes.author: Chris Cleave

quotes.quote: The charm of horror only tempts the strong.
quotes.author: Jean Lorrain

quotes.quote: Horror is the removal of masks.
quotes.author: Robert Bloch

quotes.quote: Broad daylight does not encourage the apprehension of horror.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown
quotes.author: H.P Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Horror is beyond the reach of psychology.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: People want to be disturbed when they go see a horror movie.
quotes.author: Eli Roth

quotes.quote: Danger doesn’t lurk at every corner. It’s just hanging out, waiting for fear and horror to show up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Horror movies don't exist unless you go and see them, and people always will.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: The basis of all true cosmic horror is violation of the order of nature, and the profoundest violations are always the least concrete and describable.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: A horse loves freedom, and the weariest old work horse will roll on the ground or break into a lumbering gallop when he is turned loose into the open.
quotes.author: Gerald Raferty

quotes.quote: It's always been and always will be the same in the world.The horse does the work and the coachman is tipped.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is nothing so good for the inside of a man as the outside of a horse.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: A horse is the projection of peoples dreams about themselves, strong, powerful, beautiful. And it has the capability of giving us escape from our mundane existence.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: If you're lucky enough to draw a good horse, you still have to ride him, then the next ones.
quotes.author: Chris LeDoux

quotes.quote: Most horses don't walk backwards voluntarily, because what they can't see doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: If you fall off a horse, you get back up. I am not a quitter.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: When your horse follows you without being asked, when he rubs his head on yours, and when you look at him and feel a tingle down your spine, you know you are loved.
quotes.author: John Lyons

quotes.quote: Horse riding is so much more then just horse riding, its so much harder then most people think.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote:
The essential joy of being with horses is that it brings us in contact
with the rare elements of grace, beauty, spirit and freedom.
quotes.author: Sharon Ralls Lemon

quotes.quote: There is no secret so close as that between a rider and his horse.
quotes.author: R.S. Surtees

quotes.quote: The horse, with beauty unsurpassed, strength immeasurable and grace unlike any other, still remains humble enough to carry a man upon his back.
quotes.author: Amber Senti

quotes.quote: Whoever said a horse was dumb, was dumb.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A man on a horse is spiritually, as well as physically, bigger then a man on foot.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: A horse never runs so fast as when he has other horses to catch up and outpace.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The earth would be nothing without the people, but the man would be nothing without the horse.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good horse should be seldom spurred.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: I have seen things so beautiful they have brought tears to my eyes. Yet none of them can match the gracefulness and beauty of a horse running free.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's a lot like nuts and bolts, if the rider's nuts, the horse bolts!
quotes.author: Nicholas Evans

quotes.quote: To ride a horse is to ride the sky.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I can always tell which is the front end of a horse, but beyond that my art is not above the ordinary.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you spend all day on horseback, and you hop off, you walk around like you still have a horse between your legs. And it affects your shoulders. They fall.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: People on horses look better than they are. People in cars look worse than they are.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: Slippery-smooth rhythmic motion, absolute single-minded purpose, motion for the pleasure of motion itself. It was terrible it its beauty, the flight of the horse.
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.quote: The only time some people work like a horse is when the boss rides them.
quotes.author: Gabriel Heatter

quotes.quote: Horseback riding is the only sport where your equipment can decide not to cooperate with you. Feeling down? Saddle up.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In riding a horse we borrow freedom.
quotes.author: Helen Thomson

quotes.quote: Anybody who finds it easy to make money on the horses is probably in the dog food business.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: It's the aspirin of horseback riding, it cures everything.
quotes.author: Nuno Oliveira

quotes.quote: No hour of life is wasted that is spent in the saddle.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A horse can lend its rider the speed and strength he or she lacks - but the rider who is wise remembers it is no more than a loan.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: A horse which stops dead just before a jump and thus propels its rider into a graceful arc provides a splendid excuse for general merriment.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.quote: Equestrian art is the perfect understanding and harmony between horse and rider.
quotes.author: Nuno Oliveira

quotes.quote: Equestrian art is the perfect understanding and harmony between horse and rider.
quotes.author: Nuno Oliveira

quotes.quote: When you are on a great horse, you have the best seat you will ever have.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: In riding a horse, we borrow freedom.
quotes.author: Helen Thompson Woolley

quotes.quote: No one can teach riding so well as a horse.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Don't be the rider who gallops all night and never sees the horse that is beneath him.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A good trainer can hear a horse speak to him. A great trainer can hear him whisper.
quotes.author: Monty Roberts

quotes.quote: I have heard that one can conquer the empire on horseback, but one cannot govern it on horseback.
quotes.author: Kublai Khan

quotes.quote: A woman never looks better than on horseback.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: If you fall asleep on horseback, the horse will stop by the rock. Art is a car. Kitsch is a horse.
quotes.author: Odd Nerdrum

quotes.quote: A man in a passion, rides a mad horse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It takes a good deal of physical courage to ride a horse. This, however, I have. I get it at about forty cents a flask, and take it as required.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: Riding a horse is not a gentle hobby, to be picked up and laid down like a game of solitaire. It is a grand passion. It seizes a person whole and once it has done so, he will have to accept that his life will be radically changed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Speak your mind, but ride a fast horse.
quotes.author: Texas Bix Bender

quotes.quote: The ass will carry his load, but not a double load. Ride not a free horse to death.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: There is something about riding down the street on a prancing horse that makes you feel like something, even when you ain't a thing.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The horse thinks one thing and he that rides him another.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: A good rider on a good horse is as much above himself and others as the world can make him.
quotes.author: Edward Herbert

quotes.quote: No ride is ever the last one. No horse is ever the last one you will have. Somehow there will always be other horses, other places to ride them.
quotes.author: Monica Dickens

quotes.quote: A man must ride alternately on the horses of his private and his public nature.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A bad ride is much better than a good walk.
quotes.author: J. Peter Grace

quotes.quote: A horse is worth more than riches.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Good people get cheated, just as good horses get ridden.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A man on a horse is spiritually as well as physically bigger than a man on foot.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: When you are on a great horse, you have the best seat you will ever have.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It is the difficult horses that have the most to give you.
quotes.author: Lendon Gray

quotes.quote: Horses change lives. They give our young people confidence and self-esteem. They provide peace and tranquility to troubled souls- they give us hope.
quotes.author: Toni Robinson

quotes.quote: A horse is the projection of peoples' dreams about themselves--strong, powerful, beautiful--and it has the capability of giving us escape from our mundane existence.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: In riding a horse, we borrow freedom.
quotes.author: Helen Thompson

quotes.quote: A horse gallops with his lungs,Perseveres with his heart,And wins with his character.
quotes.author: Tesio

quotes.quote: Horses lend us the wings we lack.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: To ride on a horse is to fly without wings.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A pony is a childhood dream. A horse is an adulthood treasure.
quotes.author: Rebecca Carroll

quotes.quote: There is something about the outside of a horse that is good for the inside of a man.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There is no secret so close as that between a rider and his horse.
quotes.author: R.S. Surtees

quotes.quote: Ride the horse in the direction it's going.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: Horses are predictably unpredictable.
quotes.author: Loretta Gage

quotes.quote: The horse is God's gift to mankind.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Whoever said a horse was dumb, was dumb.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The horse, with beauty unsurpassed, strength immeasurable and grace unlike any other, still remains humble enough to carry a man upon his back.
quotes.author: Amber Senti

quotes.quote: A horse is a thing of beauty... none will tire of looking at him as long as he displays himself in his splendor.
quotes.author: Xenophon

quotes.quote: Horses have hoofs to carry them over frost and snow; hair, to protect them from wind and cold. They eat grass and drink water, and fling up their heels.... Such is the real nature of horses.
quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

quotes.quote: The wildest colts make the best horses.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: A horse doesn't care how much you know until he knows how much you care.
quotes.author: Pat Parelli

quotes.quote: Horse sense is the thing a horse has which keeps it from betting on people.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: The horse is a mirror to your soul and sometimes you might not like what you see in the mirror.
quotes.author: Buck Brannaman

quotes.quote: Horses make a landscape look beautiful.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The essential joy of being with horses is that it brings us in contact with the rare elements of grace, beauty, spirit and fire.
quotes.author: Shannon Ralls Lemon

quotes.quote: Amazing horsesTruest Majestic BeautyRunning wild and free.
quotes.author: Jessie Host

quotes.quote: The horse knows. If you know, he knows. He also knows if you don't know.
quotes.author: Ray Hunt

quotes.quote: Horses are incredibly forgiving. They fill in places we're not capable of filling ourselves.
quotes.author: Uck Brannaman

quotes.quote: There used to be horses in that barn. At least, that's what my Grandfather says. We're probably the only horse farm in Lexington, Kentucky, that doesn't have one horse. Not one.
quotes.author: John Gatins

quotes.quote: She wasn't just some race horse. She was 'our' horse.
quotes.author: John Gatins

quotes.quote: A horse is practical - a horse has got sense - a horse is an animal.
quotes.author: Darryl F. Zanuck

quotes.quote: I think he was running the horse to check its wind. I think he thought he was buying the horse.
quotes.author: Norman Jolley

quotes.quote: Any horse has a chance in a race.
quotes.author: Laird Doyle

quotes.quote: A horse will run so far, so fast, for so long, and then it will lie down on ya.
quotes.author: Alan Sharp

quotes.quote: The army don't take very kindly to sergeants shooting their horses.
quotes.author: Alan Sharp

quotes.quote: You make fun of horses, and all you'll be riding is a pogo stick.
quotes.author: Lou Derman

quotes.quote: Everybody's allowed to bet on horses.
quotes.author: Melville Shavelson

quotes.quote: This is a new kind a bank - with horses.
quotes.author: Melville Shavelson

quotes.quote: In the future, we don't need horses. We have motorized carriages called automobiles.
quotes.author: Robert Zemeckis

quotes.quote: Give me your name, Horse-master, and I shall give you mine.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: A man can't shoot good when his horse is jumping, and a horse will not step on a man.
quotes.author: Leigh Brackett

quotes.quote: Horsemen have always been susceptible to one great foible, and that is the belief that the categories and terms and concepts they apply to their art are ones their horses hold, too.
quotes.author: Stephen Budiansky

quotes.quote: In order for your horse to be truly healthy, she needs to be happy too.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: The way horses see the world is an important key to providing them with an environment that will make them happy.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: Movement is another requirement of the horse, and is also left over from the days when all horses were wild.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: Horses frighten easily because of their long evolution as prey animals.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: A social creature who become stressed and lonely when kept on their own, horses thrive on companionship.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: A happy horse is less likely to injure itself and is less likely to be subject to infection and dis-ease.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: Emotional stress affects the immune system, so happy horses are usually much more resistant.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: Like us, horses respond to other things in their environment and life, for example, other aggresive horses or animals, noises, solitude, etc.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: Luckily those in tune with their horses can often 'read' them and understand how they feel and why they are feeling that way.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: With a little patience, care and understanding you can help your horses to be happy, calm. willing to communicate, work with you, be open and trusting of you at all times.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: Galloping down leafy trails, jumping over fences, and winning ribbons at shows--these are the activities that make owning a horse lots of fun.
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: Owning a horse or a pony is a big responsibility. Your horse relies on you to look after him properly.
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: Most horses need several years of training before they become quite and reliable.
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: Some of the best horses are mixed breeds because they tend to be hardier than pure bread horses, have fewer health problems, and are often quieter than their registered cousins.
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: Both sexes can make excellent horses for young riders, although some mares can be moody and sensitive when they are 'in season' (ready to mate).
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: True horsemanship is an art form and a challenge taken on by many individuals drawn to this amazing animal called the horse.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: I think that of all nature's gifts few are a precious as the horse.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: Great horses also are made and not born.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: Every horse is different, and what works with one doesnt necessarily work on another.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: Horses likes to be outside.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: Most horses would prefer to stay in the paddock grazing and enjoying the company of other horses than to do anything a human can offer.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: The best way to catch a horse is not to try to. Approach the horse openly. It will see you, no matter how sneaky you are.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: A clever horse will learn to snatch bites of hay out of your hand or dart into the bucket and grab a mouthful before retreating out of range.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: All horses are different and reactions to being caught can vary greatly.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: To catch a horse, don't try to catch it.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: Horses are exciting pets. They love to graze and gallop. A horse can take you for a ride!
quotes.author: Colleen Dolphin

quotes.quote: Horses live in stables when they are not outside.
quotes.author: Colleen Dolphin

quotes.quote: Many cultures drink horse milk, and their hair is used to make violin bows and stuffing for mattresses.
quotes.author: Patricia J. Wynne

quotes.quote: Before the steam engine was invented, horses were the fastest form of transportation on land.
quotes.author: Patricia J. Wynne

quotes.quote: One of the world's most important domesticated animals, the horse has acted both a helper and a companion to humans for thousands of years.
quotes.author: Patricia J. Wynne

quotes.quote: Horses has been used by messengers to deliver valuable documents and helped armies to win important battles.
quotes.author: Patricia J. Wynne

quotes.quote: Care and affection is not a business where you give and you get. It is a beautiful feeling for someone where you like to give, even if you don't get.
quotes.author: annonynus

quotes.quote: Health care providers, saving lives daily in our emergency rooms, live with federal mandates.
quotes.author: Barbara Ann Radnofsky

quotes.quote: There is something so settled and stodgy about turning a great romance into next of kin on an emergency room form, and something so soothing and special, too.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Hospice is such a tremendous thing. Patients seem to reach an inner peace.
quotes.author: Harmon Killebrew

quotes.quote: The care of human life and happiness, and not their destruction, is the first and only object of good government.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Endings matter, not just for the person but, perhaps even more, for the ones left behind.
quotes.author: Atul Gawande

quotes.quote: Life’s challenges are not supposed to paralyze you they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quotes.quote: People struggle to see it's not about whether she's going to die palliative care isn't just a place you go to slowly slip away. More people live and leave than die on our wards. It is about being comfortable for the duration of something necessary and painful. Making bad times easier.
quotes.author: Beth O'Leary

quotes.quote: The closest thing to being cared for is to care for someone else.
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: Nurses are there when the last breath is taken and nurses are there when the first breath is taken. Although it is more enjoyable to celebrate the birth, it is just as important to comfort in death.
quotes.author: Christine Bell

quotes.quote: You matter because you are you, and you matter until the last moment of your life. We will do all we can not only to help you die peacefully, but also to live until you die.
quotes.author: Cicely Saunders

quotes.quote: Hospice means end of life care. The admission ticket is a diagnosis from a doctor that you have six months or less to live.
quotes.author: Eleanor Clift

quotes.quote: I think of death as some delightful journey that I shall take when all my tasks are done.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Caring about others, running the risk of feeling, and leaving an impact on people, brings happiness.
quotes.author: Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: When does life start? When does it end? Who makes these decisions? Every day, in hospitals and homes and hospices people are struggling with those profound issues.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: What? Corpus. Body. Corpse. Good idea the Latin. Stupefies them first. Hospice for the dying. They don't seem to chew it; only swallow it down.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: One person caring about another represents life's greatest value.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: At another time, or in another case, it might have excited my ridicule. But into what quackeries will not people rush for a last chance, where all accustomed means have failed, and the life of a beloved object is at stake?
quotes.author: Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu

quotes.quote: Sexual health is as achievable and reasonable a goal for patients in palliative care and hospice care as pain relief, but few hospice and palliative care professionals include sexual health within their assessment and plan of care. Given that sexuality is a central aspect of being human, sexual health should be part of the assessment and plan for every patient receiving palliative care and hospice care.
quotes.author: Kimberly D. Acquaviva

quotes.quote: No matter what you've done for yourself or for humanity, if you can't look back on having given love and attention to your own family, what have you really accomplished?
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: As a well spent day brings happy sleep, so life well used brings happy death.
quotes.author: Leonardo DaVinci

quotes.quote: I wonder if my first breath was as soul stirring to my mother as her last breath was to me.
quotes.author: Lisa Goich-Andreadis

quotes.quote: Never believe that a few caring people can't change the world. For, indeed, that's all who ever have.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: I am here to die. Pardon me but you are here to live until you die. There is a significant difference.
quotes.author: Rachel Joyce

quotes.quote: If we listen and observe carefully the dying can teach us important things that we need to learn in preparing for the end of our own life's journey.
quotes.author: Robert L. Wise

quotes.quote: Care is a state in which something does matter; it is the source of human tenderness.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Have no regrets. The elderly usually don't have regrets for what we did, but rather for things we did not do. The only people who fear death are those with regrets.
quotes.author: Sandra Helene Straub

quotes.quote: When the heart weeps for what it has lost, the soul laughs for what it has found.
quotes.author: Sufi aphorism

quotes.quote: Death the last voyage, the longest and the best.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Hospitals are only an intermediate stage of civilization, never intended at all even to take in the whole sick population.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: The hospital industry to this day works its tail off to do the right thing.
quotes.author: Rick Scott

quotes.quote: The hospital that feeds you refined sugar, white bread, canned soup, bouillon cubes, and frozen vegetables should be closed by the health department as a menace to the public health.
quotes.author: David Reuben

quotes.quote: Hospital life--with its byzantine array of moving parts layered atop the unpredictable rhythms of illness is a permanent state of flux.
quotes.author: Danielle Ofri

quotes.quote: A hospital alone shows what war is.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: In a hospital they throw you out into the street before you are half cured, but in a nursing home they don't let you out till you are dead.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Getting out of the hospital is a lot like resigning from a book club. You're not out of it until the computer says you're out of it.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Hospitals are great places, and you can learn from them, but you don't necessarily need to go in anytime you get the sniffles. And maybe you shouldn't treat pregnancy as a disease.
quotes.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

quotes.quote: Healing in a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: The hospital bulked darkly in the darkness.
quotes.author: William T. Vollmann

quotes.quote: In a hospital, half of the patients get better food than at home.
quotes.author: Gerhard Kocher

quotes.quote: A hospital should also have a recovery room adjoining the cashier's office.
quotes.author: Francis Owalsh

quotes.quote: The most frequent lie in a hospital: it won't hurt.
quotes.author: Gerhard Kocher

quotes.quote: In the feeding of hospital patients, more attention should be given to providing tasty and attractive meals, and less to the nutritive quality of the food.
quotes.author: Frederick J. Stare

quotes.quote: Hospitals. The only place where the word â€œPositiveâ€ means a bad thing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: How many desolate creatures on the earth have learnt the simple dues of fellowship and social comfort, in a hospital.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: This life is a hospital in which every patient is possessed with a desire to change his bed.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A hospital may spend several million dollars separating a pair of conjoined twins even though that separation is likely to leave them worse off.
quotes.author: Alice Dreger

quotes.quote: This hospital, like every other, is a hole in the universe through which holiness issues in blasts. It blows both ways, in and out of time.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: Nurses may not be angels, but they are the next best thing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Great hospitals do two things. They look after patients, and they teach young doctors. We look after clients, and we teach young advertising people.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Strength and strength's will are the supreme ethic. All else are dreams from hospital beds, the sly, crawling goodness of sneaking souls.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A hospital is no place to be sick.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Hospitals are a little like the beach. The next wave comes in, and the footprints of your pain and suffering, your delivery and recovery, are obliterated.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Hospitals must provide emergency treatment to all who walk through the door, regardless of their citizenship status or ability to pay.
quotes.author: Gary Miller

quotes.quote: The hospital room was as cold as dead skin, the hallway crowded with lost souls and reeking of illness.
quotes.author: Raquel Cepeda

quotes.quote: In hospital, people should be able to have time to themselves.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.quote: Hospitals are about healing.
quotes.author: Irwin Redlener

quotes.quote: A hospital is a good place to set various dilemmas.
quotes.author: Aminatta Forna

quotes.quote: Too often, hospital staff are incented by management to get work done without worrying about care, and clinicians are too often not even trained to think about care.
quotes.author: Dave deBronkart

quotes.quote: The hospital is the antechamber to the tomb.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Cure sometimes, treat often, comfort always.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: And it's hard to hate someone once you understand them.
quotes.author: Lucy Christopher

quotes.quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: One kind word can warm three winter months.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: They may forget your name, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You treat a disease, you win, you lose. You treat a person, I guarantee you, you’ll win, no matter what the outcome.
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: Nurses: one of the few blessings of being ill.
quotes.author: Sara Moss-Wolfe

quotes.quote: After all we are merely the servants of the public, in spite of our M.D.’s and our hospital appointments.
quotes.author: Sir Henry Howarth Bashford

quotes.quote: After two days in the hospital, I took a turn for the nurse.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: America is a constipated nation.... If you pass small stools, you have to have large hospitals.
quotes.author: Denis Burkitt

quotes.quote: First need in the reform of hospital management? That’s easy! The death of all dietitians, and the resurrection of a French chef.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: If a patient is poor he is committed to a public hospital as a 'psychotic.' If he can afford a sanitarium, the diagnosis is 'neurasthenia.' If he is wealthy enough to be in his own home under the constant watch of nurses and physicians, he is simply 'an indisposed eccentric.
quotes.author: Pierre(-Marie-Félix) Janet

quotes.quote: In the sick room, ten cents’ worth of human understanding equals ten dollars' worth of medical science.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: The hospital is the only proper College in which to rear a true disciple of Aesculapius.
quotes.author: John Abernethy

quotes.quote: The sooner patients can be removed from the depressing influence of general hospital life the more rapid their convalescence.
quotes.author: Charles Mayo

quotes.quote: The trained nurse has given nursing the human, or shall we say, the divine touch, and made the hospital desirable for patients with serious ailments regardless of their home advantages.
quotes.author: Charles Mayo

quotes.quote: The power of community to create health is far greater than any physician, clinic or hospital.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.quote: A trip to the hospital is always a descent into the macabre. I have never trusted a place with shiny floors.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Hospitals, like airports and supermarkets, only pretend to be open nights and weekends.
quotes.author: Molly Haskell

quotes.quote: We go by the major vote, and if the majority are insane, the sane must go to the hospital.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Even top caliber hospitals cannot escape medical mistakes that sometimes result in irreparable damage to patients.
quotes.author: Carl Levin

quotes.quote: When a nation is over-reliant on one or two commodities like oil or precious minerals, corrupt government ministers and their dodgy associates hoard profits and taxes instead of properly allocating them to schools and hospitals.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: We need to bridge the gap between the medical libraries and the hospital rooms; take the information out there already, add to it, focus it, harness it - and bring it to the patient who was just diagnosed today.
quotes.author: Bruce Vento

quotes.quote: In hospitals there is no time off for good behavior.
quotes.author: Josephine Tey

quotes.quote: A church is a hospital for sinners, not a museum for saints.
quotes.author: Pauline Phillips

quotes.quote: Going to hospital is rather like going to an alien planet.
quotes.author: Quentin Blake

quotes.quote: Peace is an awareness of reserves from beyond ourselves, so that our power is not so much in us as through us. Peace is the gift, not of volitional struggle, but of spiritual hospitality.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Mighty proud I am that I am able to have a spare bed for my friends.
quotes.author: Samuel Pepys

quotes.quote: Each one of you is responsible for hospitality.
quotes.author: Alice DeSouza

quotes.quote: True hospitality is welcoming the stranger on her own terms. This kind of hospitality can only be offered by those who've found the center of their lives in their own hearts.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Hospitality is the key to new ideas, new friends, new possibilities. What we take into our lives changes us. Without new people and new ideas, we are imprisoned inside ourselves.
quotes.author: Joan D Chittister

quotes.quote: A life of hospitality begins in worship, with a recognition of God's grace and generosity. Hospitality is not first a duty and responsibility; it is first a response of love and gratitude for God's love and welcome to us.
quotes.author: Christine Pohl

quotes.quote: Hospitality is present when something happens for you. It is absent when something happens to you. Those two simple prepositions for and to express it all.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: Hospitality is the practice of God's welcome by reaching across difference to participate in God's actions bringing justice and healing to our world in crisis.
quotes.author: Letty M. Russell

quotes.quote: Hospitality is almost impossible to teach. It's all about hiring the right people.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: In the cherry blossom's shade there's no such thing as a stranger.
quotes.author: Kobayashi Issa

quotes.quote: A soul of hospitality and a heart of humanity is a house of love, peace, freedom, liberty and justice.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Hospitality is simply love on the loose.
quotes.author: Joan D Chittister

quotes.quote: True hospitality consists of giving the best of yourself to your guests.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Hospitality sitting with gladness.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Our full humanity is contingent on our hospitality; we can be complete only when we are giving something away; when we sit at the table and pass the peas to the person next to us we see that person in a whole new way.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.quote: Hospitality knows no gender or race.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: Hospitality means primarily the creation of free space where the stranger can enter and become a friend instead of an enemy. Hospitality is not to change people, but to offer them space where change can take place. It is not to bring men and women over to our side, but to offer freedom not disturbed by dividing lines.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: Hospitality means we take people into the space that is our lives and our minds and our hearts and our work and our efforts. Hospitality is the way we come out of ourselves. It is the first step towards dismantling the barriers of the world. Hospitality is the way we turn a prejudiced world around, one heart at a time.
quotes.author: Joan D. Chittister

quotes.quote: Hospitality should have no other nature than love.
quotes.author: Henrietta Mears

quotes.quote: Hospitality sometimes degenerates into profuseness, and ends in madness and folly.
quotes.author: Francis Atterbury

quotes.quote: Hospitality still survives among foreigners, although it is buried under false pride among the poorest Americans.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: True hospitality is a delicate balance of warmth and form.
quotes.author: Sheila Ostrander

quotes.quote: When hospitality becomes an art it loses its very soul.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: Hospitality exists when you believe that the other person is on your side.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: I believe that hospitality is central to the heart and ministry of Jesus and that to the extent we fail to extend this hospitality to gay people, the church will fail to walk in the way of Jesus.
quotes.author: Wendy Vanderwal-Gritter

quotes.quote: Dreams are guests who ensoul our lives if we have hospitality for them.
quotes.author: Jeannine Parvati Baker

quotes.quote: You're extending hospitality, and hospitality is a big part of how politics works.
quotes.author: Kurt Meyer

quotes.quote: The word hospitality in the new testament comes from two greek words. The first word means love and the second word means strangers. Its a word that means love of strangers.
quotes.author: Nancy Leigh Demoss

quotes.quote: The hospitality of the wigwam is only limited by the institution of war.
quotes.author: Charles Alexander Eastman

quotes.quote: The hospitality in this country is as warm as the weather.
quotes.author: Pen Densham

quotes.quote: We should be hospitable to the stranger, not because we owe it to him, but because we would want to be accepted if we were stranger.
quotes.author: Routlegde

quotes.quote: Has English hospitality changed so much that a friend of mine's not welcome?
quotes.author: Pen Densham

quotes.quote: My honored guests. Be welcome within my walls and at my table. I extend to you my hospitality and my protection in the light of the Seven.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Your reputation for hospitality is fast becoming legend.
quotes.author: David Benioff

quotes.quote: Prince? What prince? What son of a king would accept a man's hospitality, eat his food, drink his wine, embrace him in friendship, and then steal his wife in the middle of the night?
quotes.author: David Benioff

quotes.quote: People are gonna drink! You know that, I know that, we all know that, and all I do is act on that. And all this talk of bootlegging - what is bootlegging? On a boat, it's bootlegging. On Lake Shore Drive, it's hospitality. I'm a businessman!
quotes.author: Oscar Fraley

quotes.quote: Here me own flesh and blood seeks me out with nothing but brotherly love in his heart, to offer me the hospitality of his home and hearth, and I treat him like a Dublin dustman.
quotes.author: Donald P. Bellisario

quotes.quote: Knocked once / Tried to tell them I'd been there / Door slammed! / Hospitality's thin there / Wonder / Just what's going on in there.
quotes.author: Bob Davie

quotes.quote: To some men the only symbol of hospitality is a corkscrew.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The Bible teaches us that our homes should be hospitable and that those who come in and out of our homes should sense the presence of Christ.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The happiest Christian homes I know are those given to hospitality, where neighbors feel at home, where young people are welcome, where the elderly are respected, where children are loved.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Hospitality guests are by definition dislocated. They're not eating at home, not sleeping at home-they're away.
quotes.author: Micah Solomon

quotes.quote: The heart of hospitality, for me, is the ability to focus completely and totally on one person, even if only for a matter of seconds, yet long enough that you've got a clear connection, a channel between the two of you.
quotes.author: Micah Solomon

quotes.quote: Hospitality is the ability to focus so intently on a guest that the rest of the world ceases to exist.
quotes.author: Micah Solomon

quotes.quote: In hospitality, you have to develop the discipline of momentarily blotting out the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Micah Solomon

quotes.quote: If we did it for our first guest, we'll find a way to keep doing it for our millionth, without rushing or cutting corners.
quotes.author: Micah Solomon

quotes.quote: Food without hospitality is a medicine.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: We live among strangers, among whom we are strangers ourselves. In such a world, strangers cannot be confined or kept at bay. Strangers must be lived with.
quotes.author: Roy C Wood

quotes.quote: The laws of hospitality deal firstly with strangers how to manage their entry into our inner sanctum, how to protect them from our own automatic reaction, which is to fear and exclude the unknown.
quotes.author: Roy C Wood

quotes.quote: Today in rich countries, hospitality means, above all entertaining friends or acquaintances in one's home.
quotes.author: Roy C Wood

quotes.quote: Hospitality could mean opening one's house to a total stranger, giving a meal to anyone who chose to come.
quotes.author: Roy C Wood

quotes.quote: Hospitality sometimes mean allowing a stranger to stay the night, indeed imploring them to stay, although one knew nothing about them.
quotes.author: Roy C Wood

quotes.quote: Clearly, hospitality and service are not descriptions of a business, so much as they re innate qualities and special attributes and that a person possesses. You cannot buy them.
quotes.author: Cornell University

quotes.quote: You cannot invent them. Hospitality comes from inside of human being.
quotes.author: Cornell University

quotes.quote: True hospitality is marked by an open response to the dignity of each and every person. Henri Nouwen has described it as receiving the stranger on his own terms, and asserts that it can be offered only by those who 'have found the center of their lives in their own hearts.'
quotes.author: Kathleen Norris

quotes.quote: It was hospitality, an exchange of gifts, that had brought this about; the dancers' giving themselves all week in teaching and performing, and my feeding them as they needed to be fed.
quotes.author: Kathleen Norris

quotes.quote: Hospitality is of primary importance in the desert.
quotes.author: Kathleen Norris

quotes.quote: If hospitality is heavily qualitative, then service is more quantitative.
quotes.author: Cornell University

quotes.quote: Looking at those descriptions of hospitality, we see innate qualities that are emotional and that deal more with feelings.
quotes.author: Cornell University

quotes.quote: Hospitality is the valued way in which we treat our guests. Hospitality is all about the small details that turn a guest's ordinary visit into an extraordinary stay.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Blau

quotes.quote: Hospitality comes from that plus intuition of the gut and emotions from the heart.
quotes.author: Ted Teng

quotes.quote: Hospitality: Graciousness. Service: Respect
quotes.author: Randy Morton

quotes.quote: Hospitality is showing others you are on this side. I builds relationship, has a warm feeling, offers flexibility, understanding and comes from the heart.
quotes.author: Chick Evans

quotes.quote: Service defines what we do and hospitality personalizes how we do it. Success results from the integration of service and hospitality.
quotes.author: Chick Evans

quotes.quote: I believe that hospitality and service are one and the same... both provide an umbrella for treating people first of all with dignity and then giving them an experience that exceeds their expectations.
quotes.author: David Hanlon

quotes.quote: Hospitality and service are two sides of the coin. One is incomplete without the other. Hospitality and service can achieve the desired results only when it is done with your heart.
quotes.author: Mohan Nair

quotes.quote: Hospitality is the smell of my food; service is the taste of my food.
quotes.author: Hamed Suleiman

quotes.quote: Great service can be scripted and measured; true hospitality is innate, unselfish, and forever memorable.
quotes.author: Marc Bruno

quotes.quote: Understanding the distinction between service and hospitality has been at the foundation of our success. Service is the technical delivery of a product--or how well you do your job. Hospitality is how the delivery of that product makes is recipient feel--or who you are while you do your job.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: Service is a monologue-we decide how we want to do things and set our own standards for service. Hospitality, on the other hand, is a dialogue. To be on a guest's side requires listening to that person with every sense, and following up with a thoughtful, gracious, appropriate response.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: Hospitality doesn't mean entertaining people. Hospitality is about serving others.
quotes.author: Tony Merida

quotes.quote: Entertaining is often shallow and superficial; hospitality is about depth and authenticity.
quotes.author: Tony Merida

quotes.quote: Hospitality is what we extend to outsiders, strangers, and those in physical and spiritual need.
quotes.author: Tony Merida

quotes.quote: Hospitality is a culturally appropriate way to do faithful evangelism, and a practical way to do ordinary mercy and justice.
quotes.author: Tony Merida

quotes.quote: Do not neglect to show hospitality to strangers, for by doing that some have entertained angels without knowing it.
quotes.author: Heb 13:1-2

quotes.quote: Hospitality is culture itself and not simply one ethic amongst others.
quotes.author: Derrida 2001: 17

quotes.quote: Hospitality is a way of practicing the eschatological future by welcoming the stranger to our table as honored guests.
quotes.author: Alan Roxburgh

quotes.quote: Hospitality forces us to confront the ways our lives are driven by agendas and demands that push away relational encounters with others.
quotes.author: Alan Roxburgh

quotes.quote: By exploring hospitality holistically--that is, by looking at the ways we receive others into a physical, mental, spiritual environment of freedom--we expand our awareness of its importance, and hereby, the challenges of creating an atmosphere that graciously invites others to enter.
quotes.author: Leslie A. Hay

quotes.quote: A hot air balloon requires a great deal of fuel to keep it aloft, so that you can't fly it even for one day. A gas balloon, which usually uses helium, has the problem that the helium cools at night when the sun is not on it, and you have to throw ballast overboard to keep it from going to the surface.
quotes.author: Steve Fossett

quotes.quote: What light is to the eyes , what air is to the lungs, what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Hot air balloons are terrific to shoot from, although they have become very expensive, as has most lodging and food in the Napa Valley.
quotes.author: Peter Menzel

quotes.quote: The balloon seems to stand still in the air while the earth flies past underneath.
quotes.author: Alberto Santos Dumont

quotes.quote: Nobody can be uncheered with a balloon.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: To propel a dirigible balloon through the air is like pushing a candle through a brick wall.
quotes.author: Alberto Santos-Dumont

quotes.quote: The man who goes up in a balloon does not feel as though he were ascending; he only sees the earth sinking deeper below him.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: She was afraid of heights, but she was much more afraid of never flying.
quotes.author: Atticus

quotes.quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.quote: I decided to fly through the air and live in the sunlight and enjoy life as much as I could.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: I love the feeling of the fresh air on my face and the wind blowing through my hair.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: Little things seem nothing, but they give peace, like those meadow flowers which individually seem odorless but all together perfume the air.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The soul, light as a feather, fluid as water, innocent as a child, responds to every moment of grace like a floating balloon.
quotes.author: Jean-Pierre de Caussade

quotes.quote: My dream date is a tall, dark, handsome, blue eyed man with a bubble butt who will whisk me away to Paris in a hot air balloon to wine me, dine me and.
quotes.author: Karen McDougal

quotes.quote: Imagination is to love what gas is to the balloon that which raises it from earth.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: We should all have personal hot air balloons and drift serenely through the clouds.
quotes.author: Rhys Bowen

quotes.quote: If you're embarking around the world in a hot-air balloon, don't forget the toilet paper.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The balloons only have one life and the only way of finding out whether they work is to attempt to fly around the world.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The jet stream is a very strong force and pushing a balloon into it is like pushing up against a brick wall, but once we got into it, we found that, remarkably, the balloon went whatever speed the wind went.
quotes.author: Sir Richard Branson

quotes.quote: A man should have duties outside of himself; without them, he is a mere balloon, inflated with thin egotism and drifting nowhere.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: The weird thing about serious acting is I've always done impressions of people, all my life, and I did the thing called a balloon debate. The idea is there's a hot air balloon traveling across the Atlantic and it's going down and you have to give a speech as to why you should stay in the balloon.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: Let your dreams take flight.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I knew when I met you, an adventure was going to happen.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: Noblest of all dogs is the hot-dog; it feeds the hand that bites it.
quotes.author: Dr. Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: If I'm out of town and I'm in a situation where I have to be creative, it has to be hot dogs because that's my comfort food.
quotes.author: Ester Dean

quotes.quote: A hot dog at the game beats roast beef at the Ritz.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: No man can hope to be elected in his state without being photographed eating a hot dog at Nathan's Famous.
quotes.author: Nelson Rockefeller

quotes.quote: If you're the only hot dog stand in town, your hot dogs don't have to be good.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: A hot dog with an interesting person is an amazing meal.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: I basically love anything that comes in a hot dog bun... except hot dogs.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: The use of an iconic food in an act of violence against an iconic golfer like Tiger Woods is reprehensible -- and a violation of hot dog etiquette. Some might call the thrower a 'wiener,' but we'd say that's too high a compliment. Hot dogs are meant to be enjoyed -- not weaponized.
quotes.author: Janet Riley

quotes.quote: They say hot dogs can kill you. How do you know it's not the bun?
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: My favorite meat is hot dog, by the way. That is my favorite meat.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: Is the chemical aftertaste the reason why people eat hot dogs, or is it some kind of bonus?
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: In my house, a hot dog is a dog that's really hot.
quotes.author: Tilda Swinton

quotes.quote: I don't think there's anything wrong with a hot dog or other convenience foods, as long as they're balanced with fresh vegetables. It's hard to ignore 95 percent of the grocery store.
quotes.author: Tyler Florence

quotes.quote: You know what I love best about baseball? The pine tar, the resin, the grass, the dirt - and that's just in the hot-dogs.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: Some people wanted champagne and caviar when they should have had beer and hot dogs.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Barbecue is to North Carolina as the hot dog is to New York.
quotes.author: Fiona Barton

quotes.quote: I'd rather get a hot dog or a doughnut than write a song.
quotes.author: John Prine

quotes.quote: Our brain, our body, craves fat. We cannot help it. That's why a kid will eat a hot dog quicker than a piece of broccoli.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.quote: When your kids LOVE sushi and hotdogs, you get creative.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: If any of the socialist chiefs had tried to earn his living by selling hot dogs, he would have learned something about the sovereignty of the consumers.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: If you have the right to call me a hot dog why do I not have the right to call you a stale 3-day old hamburger?
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: People have been manipulating food ever since they realized cooking a whole animal was difficult. Cows don't come in hot dog form.
quotes.author: Wylie Dufresne

quotes.quote: No matter how nice a hotel is, it's not home.
quotes.author: Bill Kreutzmann

quotes.quote: I rarely stay in hotels because I have friends all over the world.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.quote: Hotel life is about the same in every latitude.
quotes.author: Fanny Fern

quotes.quote: Chilling out on the bed in your hotel room watching television, while wearing your own pajamas, is sometimes the best part of a vacation.
quotes.author: Laura Marano

quotes.quote: A spa hotel? It's like a normal hotel, only in reception there's a picture of a pebble.
quotes.author: Rhod Gilbert

quotes.quote: All good hotels tend to lead people to do things they wouldn't necessarily do at home.
quotes.author: Andre Balazs

quotes.quote: Of course great hotels have always been social ideas, flawless mirrors to the particular societies they service.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Super-luxury hotels are being built in outer space. The new type of heaven is being offered to humans.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: It is expensive to live in hotels, even cheap ones - more expensive than renting.
quotes.author: Alexander Chee

quotes.quote: When you come to a hotel room, you want it to be grand, functional and beautiful. But you don't want things that are not useful. Sometimes you go to hotels and there are all these frames and pictures of people you don't know, and you end up hiding everything in the drawer, and then housekeeping come and put it out again.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: The strange thing about hotel rooms is that they look familiar and seem familiar and have many of the accoutrements that seem domestic and familiar, but they are really weird, alien and anonymous places.
quotes.author: Moby

quotes.quote: When you get into a hotel room, you lock the door, and you know there is a secrecy, there is a luxury, there is fantasy. There is comfort. There is reassurance.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: The great advantage of a hotel is that it is a refuge from home life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A hotel is a hotel all the world over, a place essentially vulgar, commonplace, venal, the travesty of a human home.
quotes.author: Margaret Oliphant

quotes.quote: An old small hotel is much more valuable than a seven-star hotel because the former has a spirit and a literary posture!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The smell of the carpet in a hotel room is the same everywhere.
quotes.author: Linda Ronstadt

quotes.quote: The loneliest place to be is a hotel room in a big city in early evening.
quotes.author: Willa Gibbs

quotes.quote: Hotel rooms inhabit a separate moral universe.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: AÂ hotelÂ isn't like a home, but it's better than being a house guest.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: I love hotels to which, at 4 a.m., you can bring along a midget, a bear, and four ladies, drag them to your room and no one cares about it at all.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: What we need are individuals and families who feel a responsibility to help build and to help run the hotel. When that happens the hotel becomes a home.
quotes.author: George Yeo

quotes.quote: And we cannot make a hotel a home by preventing the guests from leaving.
quotes.author: George Yeo

quotes.quote: When Singaporeans in their little platoons struggle to make life a little better for themselves and for their fellow countrymen, they develop the affections and traditions which make our hotel a home.
quotes.author: George Yeo

quotes.quote: The problem is how to make Singapore more than just a nice hotel to stay in, how to make it a home worth living and caring for.
quotes.author: George Yeo

quotes.quote: The human mind should be like a food hotel— open the year round.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phillips

quotes.quote: This 'going into Europe' will not turn out to be a thrilling mutual exchange supposed. It is more like nine middle-aged couples with failing marriages meeting in a darkened bedroom in a Brussels hotel for a Group Grope.
quotes.author: E.P. Thompson

quotes.quote: A hotel is just a place to lay your head.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: If the time difference is great, book your hotel room for the previous night so you can have it available when you arrive.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: Be aware that hotel thieves often converse with a person on the elevator, then get off on the same floor, wait until you open your door, then barge into your room.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: Justice is open to everyone in the same way as the Ritz Hotel.
quotes.author: Judge Sturgess

quotes.quote: An operation that provides accommodation and ancillary services to people away from home.
quotes.author: Peter Jones

quotes.quote: Two Jacksons or / Four sawbucks / Upfront—$40. / No credit cards, no I.D.; / Beyond, beneath, / Battered neon lights / The Blues Hotel / Weathered time’s ravages / Struck cords of commerce as / Hookers dispense advice / Like ATM machines— / Service for a price.
quotes.author: Sterling Warner

quotes.quote: Welcome to the Hotel California / Such a lovely place (such a lovely place) / Such a lovely face / Plenty of room at the Hotel California / Any time of year (any time of year) / You can find it here.
quotes.author: Glen Lewis Frey

quotes.quote: As the hotel is a meeting place of social elites, all the grace and etiquette associated with good society comes into play.
quotes.author: S.Andrews

quotes.quote: I stayed in a really old hotel last night. They sent me a wake-up letter.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: There was a girl knocking on my hotel room door all night! Finally, I let her out.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Train people well enough so they can leave, treat them well enough so they don't want to.
quotes.author: Sir Richard Branson

quotes.quote: A hotel should relieve travelers of their insecurity and loneliness. It should make them feel warm and cozy.
quotes.author: Bill Kimpton

quotes.quote: Here I am, in a lovely hotel room, with my own bathroom. I have never experienced such an incredible luxury.
quotes.author: Ellen Emerson White

quotes.quote: A hotel room all to myself is my idea of a good time.
quotes.author: Cheslea Handler

quotes.quote: People think being famous is so glamorous, but half the time you're in a strange hotel room living out of a suitcase.
quotes.author: Ja Rule

quotes.quote: Everybody is corrupted by hotel rooms. You can't help it. It's the only place in the world where you walk in and the first thing you do is steal everything before you take your coat off.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: People should be allowed to do whatever they want in the privacy of their own home or their own hotel room.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: I just love to go home, no matter where I am, the most luxurious hotel suite in the world, I love to go home.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: Interesting things come your way but as you get older, your lifestyle changes. I don't want to travel; I don't want to be in a hotel room away from my family.
quotes.author: Gary Oldman

quotes.quote: I want you to think of your life as an hourglass. You know there are thousands of grains of sand in the top of the hourglass; and they all pass slowly and evenly through the narrow neck in the middle. Nothing you or I could do would make more than one grain of sand pass through this narrow neck without impairing the hourglass. You and I and everyone else are like this hourglass.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Life's like an hourglass glued to the table.
quotes.author: Anna Nalick

quotes.quote: All the best sands of my life are somehow getting into the wrong end of the hourglass. If I could only reverse it! Were it in my power to do so would I?
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: Every so often, we all gaze into the abyss. It's a depressing fact of life that eventually the clock expires; eventually the sand in the hourglass runs out. It's the leaving behind of everything that matters to us that hurts the most.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: It took me as long as I had known him to get rid of all of his words. Like turning an hourglass over.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: A physician can sometimes parry the scythe of death, but has no power over the sand in the hourglass.
quotes.author: Hester Lynch Piozzi

quotes.quote: Maybe happiness was an hourglass already running out, the grains tipping, sifting past each other. Maybe it was a state of mind.
quotes.author: Paula McLain

quotes.quote: As we hypnotically watch the steadily diminishing reserve of sand in life's hourglass, the instincts of a miser surface. Life is now savored, sipped as with a fine 19th Century French wine.
quotes.author: Joe L. Wheeler

quotes.quote: To the true teacher, time's hour-glass should still run gold-dust.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: We take a handful of sand from the endless landscape of awareness around us and call that handful of sand the world.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: The more sand has escaped from the hourglass of our life, the clearer we should see through it.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The sand in the hourglass runs from one compartment to the other, marking the passage of moments with something constant and tangible.If you watch the flowing sand, you might see time itself riding the granules.Contrary to popular opinion, time is not an old white-haired man, but a laughing child.And time sings.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Our lives are but specks of dust falling through the fingers of time. Like sands of the hourglass, so are the days of our lives.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: We all have hourglass figures; your sand just settles in different places.
quotes.author: Octavia Spencer

quotes.quote: Death is just the moment that your hourglass runs out of sand. That's it. It happens to everyone eventually. All any of us gets to decide is where the sand falls.
quotes.author: Ryan Winfield

quotes.quote: Hour-glasses remind us, not only of how time flies, but at the same time of the dust into which we shall one day decay.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: We have a definite but unknown quantity of experience at our disposal. As soon as the hourglass is turned, the sand will begin to run out and once it starts, it cannot stop until it's all gone.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
