quotes.author: F.W. Peabody

quotes.quote: Orange is red brought nearer to humanity by yellow.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I believe God touched the lives of each and every person who made a quote that guides humanity toward Heaven.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: The superior man is satisfied and composed; the mean man is always full of distress.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If a man hasn't found something that he will die for, he isn't fir to live.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Not in time, place or circumstance, but in man lies success.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Among men some are jewels and some are pebbles.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Man is a tool-making animal.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Man without sense is like a blind man with a looking glass.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Treat humanity as an end and not as a means to reach an end.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Reading makes a full man, meditation a profound man, disclosure a clear man.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Only on paper has humanity yet achieved glory, beauty, truth, knowledge, virtue, and abiding love.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Do not identify the enemies of your privilege with the enemies of humanity.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: The urge to save humanity is almost always only a false-face for the urge to rule it.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Under the clouds of war, it is humanity hanging on a cross of iron.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Passion is universal humanity. Without it religion, history, romance and art would be useless.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Be the reason someone smiles. Be the reason someone feels loved and believes in the goodness in people.
quotes.author: Roy Bennet

quotes.quote: We have to allow ourselves to be loved by the people who really loves us, the people who really matter.
quotes.author: Everbooks Editorial

quotes.quote: I guess that's just part of loving people: You have to give things up. Sometimes you even have to give them up.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The humanitarian situation on the ground is deteriorating rapidly despite the ongoing diplomatic efforts.
quotes.author: Sadako Ogata

quotes.quote: The destiny of world civilization depends upon providing a decent standard of living for all mankind.
quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

quotes.quote: It's a great humanitarian injustice. Their families are here and they've been here. It's long past time for them to be reunited.
quotes.author: Jeff Cohen

quotes.quote: Being a humanitarian, supporting animal rights activists, human rights activists, it's all the same.
quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

quotes.quote: Humanitarian missions are little different from any other public enterprise, diplomacy included, which is susceptible of misinterpretation by the public, hence ultimately of failure.
quotes.author: Alvin Adams

quotes.quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: To say that on a daily basis you can make a difference, well, you can. One act of kindness a day can do it.
quotes.author: Betty Williams

quotes.quote: Humanitarianism is the expression of stupidity and cowardice.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: There is no joy equal to that of being able to work for all humanity and doing what you're doing well.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The humanitarian thing is to try to do all we can for these people.
quotes.author: Tim Horton

quotes.quote: A humanitarian is always a hypocrite.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The most wonderful study of mankind is man. Relieving human suffering and diffusing universal knowledge is humanitarian.
quotes.author: Daniel D Palmer

quotes.quote: You have to separate the humanitarian impulse from the record of aid itself. We all want to help. Many people would say that it's the moral impulse of the rich to help the poor, but the record of aid has been terrible.
quotes.author: George Ayittey

quotes.quote: The humanitarian lays stress almost solely upon breadth of knowledge and sympathy.
quotes.author: Irving Babbitt

quotes.quote: Humanitarianism consists in never sacrificing a human being to a purpose.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The humanitarian would, of course, have us meddle in foreign affairs as part of his program of world service.
quotes.author: Irving Babbitt

quotes.quote: Humanitarian appeals always help. They penetrate deeper than political tradeoffs.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Liberals love to strike generous, humanitarian poses with other people's lives.
quotes.author: Ann Coulter

quotes.quote: The humanitarian in theory is the terrorist in action.
quotes.author: Isabel Paterson

quotes.quote: Our humanitarian efforts are being destroyed on the ground.
quotes.author: Radhia Achouri

quotes.quote: Humanitarian Logistics is about mobilization and movement of resources for disaster preparedness, disaster response and disaster recovery.
quotes.author: Victor Manan Nyambala

quotes.quote: The humanitarian is a treasure hunter seeking gems of remedy and appreciation.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Humanitarian convictions are the linchpins of our salvation, and these an artist must champion.
quotes.author: Eric Maisel

quotes.quote: When we live in a world that is very unjust, you have to be a dissident.
quotes.author: Nawal El Saadawi

quotes.quote: Humanitarian issues must bring together all people who act in good faith trying to alleviate the suffering of people in dire need especially women, children and the elderly.
quotes.author: Sergei Lavrov

quotes.quote: A humanitarian seldom makes a good lover. For a lover's world revolves around their lover, while a humanitarian's world revolves around the world.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: There is a humanitarian impulse that one aspires to and there are days when one doesn't do it very well.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.quote: Everyone needs to be valued. Everyone has the potential to give something back.
quotes.author: Diana

quotes.quote: Humanitarian agencies cannot be left alone. We need political backing and financial backing.
quotes.author: Sadako Ogata

quotes.quote: Failed or failing states may touch off internal conflict, destabilize a region or create a humanitarian crisis.
quotes.author: William S. Cohen

quotes.quote: Humans must deal with the sources of terrorism, altering society through the democratic rule of global law. This process will not occur, however, unless we choose to fulfill human needs, enforce human rights, and affirm world law.
quotes.author: Gary Davis

quotes.quote: Every man of humane convictions must decide on the protest that best suits his convictions, but we must all protest.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: On humanitarian intervention in general, I guess my view is not unlike the view that was attributed to Gandhi, accurately or not when he was supposedly asked what he thought about western civilization. He is supposed to have said that he thought it would be a good idea. Similarly, humanitarian intervention would be a good idea, in principle.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: It's true that many say that they object to the idea of 'human nature,' but it's not clear what that is supposed to mean. Are we different from ants?
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: But it is quite rare to find a humanitarian who is indifferent to animals and surprisingly common to find that those who belittle animal rights are the same ones who find the pain of humans easy to bear.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Just as you discover that stupidity and cruelty are the same everywhere, you find that the essential elements of humanism are the same everywhere, too.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Humanism has many crimes for which to apologize. But it can apologize for them, and also correct them, in its own terms and without having to shake or challenge the basis of any unalterable system of belief.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Those who are being enjoined to remember their humanity are being urged to remember quite a lot.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Yet any time you and I question the schemes of the do-gooders, we're denounced as being opposed to their humanitarian goals. it seems impossible to legitimately debate their solutions with the assumption that all of us share the desire to help the less fortunate.
quotes.author: Ronald Raegan

quotes.quote: I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I'm a human being, first and foremost, and as such I'm for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: He that gives his heart will not deny his money.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: O! Yes; Be it any culture or even the most oblivious of dialect; the color of blood running in everybody's veins was a poignant scarlet; so c'mon mates lets relinquish baseless discrimination forever, and immortally bond ourselves; in the everlastingly priceless HUMANITARIAN SECT.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Life’s most persistent and urgent question is, ‘What are you doing for others?
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Since the world has existed, there has been injustice. But it is one world, the more so as it becomes smaller, more accessible. There is just no question that there is more obligation that those who have should give to those who have nothing.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: You cannot lift the society by living on a pedestal, you must come down amidst the people.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Make it a habit to feed at least one hungry person in your neighborhood every day, and there won't be any need for soup kitchens in the world.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Do not sit and wait for a savior to come, be the savior for the people in despair.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Yes, it is love that will save our world and our civilization, love, even for enemies.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: If every child grows up watching their parents lend a hand to those in need, all suffering will fade within a century.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Humanity is and must remain unconditional in the face of political, financial, and personal gain.
quotes.author: Aysha Taryam

quotes.quote: You can take the humanitarian out of the society, but you can't take society out of the humanitarian.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Art to me is a humanitarian act and I believe that there is a responsibility that art should somehow be able to affect mankind, to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Jeff Koons

quotes.quote: Isn't that why we're put on this earth to begin with, to make it a better place? It's not a religious quest; it's a humanitarian one.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: The true measure of the justice of a system is the amount of protection it guarantees to the weakest.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Today, no walls can separate humanitarian or human rights crises in one part of the world from national security crises in another. What begins with the failure to uphold the dignity of one life all too often ends with a calamity for entire nations.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: A crust in comfort is better than a feast in fear.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: A day is lost if one has not laughed.
quotes.author: French (on the conduct of life)

quotes.quote: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
quotes.author: James Ray

quotes.quote: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A good spouse and health is a person's best wealth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A man's house is his castle.
quotes.author: Sir Edward Coke

quotes.quote: A place for everything and everything in its place.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: A smile is a window in your face to show your heart is at home.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A trouble shared is a trouble halved.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All of us, the great and the little have need of each other.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Any port in a storm.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As the day lengthens, the cold strengthens.
quotes.author: E. Pellham

quotes.quote: As the spokes of a wheel are attached to the hub, so all things are attached to life.
quotes.author: Sanskrit (on life and living)

quotes.quote: Bread, oil, Salt and Heart
quotes.author: Albanian

quotes.quote: Bury the hatchet beneath the root of the tree.
quotes.author: Native American Saying (on war and peace)

quotes.quote: Character building begins in infancy and continues until death.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Cold hands, warm heart.
quotes.author: V.S. Lean

quotes.quote: Content makes poor men rich; discontent makes rich men poor.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Curses like chickens, come home to roost.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: Do unto others as you would have others do unto you.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Don't bypass a town where there's a friend.
quotes.author: Malagasy (on journeys)

quotes.quote: Don't let the grass grow on the path of friendship.
quotes.author: Blackfoot (Native American) (on friendship)

quotes.quote: Eat coconuts while you have teeth.
quotes.author: Singhalese (on youth and age)

quotes.quote: Every day of your life is a page of your history.
quotes.author: Arabic (on life and living)

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to live long but no one wants to be called old.
quotes.author: Icelandic (on youth and age)

quotes.quote: Fact is stranger than fiction.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For every bow there is an arrow. (For everyone there is someone.)
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Glass, china and reputation are easily crack'd and never well mended.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Good memories are our second chance at happiness.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: Great oaks from little acorns grow.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: He lives long who lives well.
quotes.author: J. Wilson

quotes.quote: He that would govern others, first should be the master of himself.
quotes.author: Phillip Massinger

quotes.quote: Hold fast to the words of your ancestors.
quotes.author: Maori (on proverbs)

quotes.quote: Honor is better than honors.
quotes.author: Flemish (on the conduct of life)

quotes.quote: In time we hate that which we often fear.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Industry pays debts, despair encreases them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It takes all kinds to make a world go round.
quotes.author: T. Shelton

quotes.quote: Kind words are short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you; cry and you cry alone.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Laugh every day; it's like inner jogging.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Laughter is the best medicine.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life has its little ups and downs.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is one big experiment.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is short and full of blisters.
quotes.author: African-American (on life and living)

quotes.quote: Life is the greatest bargain; we get it for nothing.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on life and living)

quotes.quote: Life is too short to waste.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Make a meal and contention will cease.
quotes.author: Hebrew (on the human comedy)

quotes.quote: May the outward and inward man be at one.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: No one is good at everything but everyone is good at something.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing goes on forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Observe all men; thyself most.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: One hand washes the other.
quotes.author: Epicharmus

quotes.quote: People are architects of their own fortune.
quotes.author: Spanish (on fortune)

quotes.quote: Praise the young and they will blossom.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Small children give you a headache, big children a heartache.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: Spring is in the air.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Take life as it comes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The arrogance of age must submit to be taught by youth.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The best things in life are free.
quotes.author: B.G. DeSilva

quotes.quote: The company makes the feast.
quotes.author: J. Warton

quotes.quote: The discontented man finds no easy chair.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The easiest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it in your pocket.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The man who makes no mistakes does not usually make anything.
quotes.author: Edward John Phelps

quotes.quote: The memories of youth make for long, long thoughts.
quotes.author: Lapp (on youth and age)

quotes.quote: The mind is willing, but the flesh is weak.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: The old one who is loved, is winter with flowers.
quotes.author: German (on youth and age)

quotes.quote: The person sins, then blames Satan for it.
quotes.author: Afghan (on the human comedy)

quotes.quote: The stargazer's toe is often stubbed.
quotes.author: Russian (on the human comedy)

quotes.quote: The worst prison is a closed heart.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Vices are their own punishment.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: We'll never know the worth of water 'till the well goes dry.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: When the apple is ripe it will fall.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: When the tiger kills, the jackel profits.
quotes.author: Afghan (on business)

quotes.quote: Where is there a tree not shaken by the wind.
quotes.author: Armenian (on basic truths)

quotes.quote: While the cat's away, the mice will play.
quotes.author: James Ray

quotes.quote: Who are a little wise, the best fools be.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: You cannot carve rotten wood.
quotes.author: Chinese

quotes.quote: You can't teach an old dog new tricks.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can't win them all.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You may delay but time will not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Your success and happiness lie in you...resolve to keep happy and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Relations between the sexes are so complicated that the only way you can tell if members of the set are going together as if they are married. Then, almost certainly, they are not.
quotes.author: Cleveland Armory

quotes.quote: Most of the trouble in this world has been caused by folks who can't mind their own business, because they have no business of their own to mind, any more than a smallpox virus has.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Wherever humanity has made that hardest of all starts and lifted itself out of mere brutality is a sacred spot.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: All humanity is one undivided and indivisible family, and each one of us is responsible for the misdeeds of all the others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Man is not on the earth solely for his own happiness. He is there to realize great things for humanity.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Humanity is just a work in progress.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: It is best to do things systematically, since we are only human, and disorder is our worst enemy.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: I am a human, and whatever concerns humanity is of interest to me.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: I know of no great souls except those who have rendered great services to the human race.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Our humanity was a poor thing but for the divinity that stirs within us.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Humanity is a miracle with a purpose.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Only love enables humanity to grow because love engenders life and it is the only form of energy that lasts forever.	Only love enables humanity to grow because love engenders life and it is the only form of energy that lasts forever.
quotes.author: Michael Quoist

quotes.quote: After all, there is but one race—humanity.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: It will be generally found that those who sneer habitually at human nature and affect to despise it are among its worst and least pleasant samples.
quotes.author: Dickens

quotes.quote: Human nature is not so much depraved as to hinder us from respecting goodness in others, though we ourselves want it. We love truth too well to resist the charms of sincerity.
quotes.author: Steele

quotes.quote: As there are many beasts and some devil in man, so there is some angel and some God in him. The beast and devil may be conquered but in this life never wholly destroyed.
quotes.author: Coleridge

quotes.quote: Humanity is a duty made known and enjoined by revelation, and ever keeping pace with the progress of Christianity.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Humanity is the spirit of the supreme being on earth, and that humanity is standing amidst ruins, hiding its nakedness behind tattered rags, shedding tears upon hollow cheeks, and calling for its children with pitiful voice.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Humanity only begins for man with self-surrender.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can fly only by embracing one another.
quotes.author: Luciano De Crescenzo

quotes.quote: So long as we live among men, let us cherish humanity.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: We must all learn to be guests of each other.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: Humanity is so adaptable, my mother would say. Truly amazing, what people can get used to as long as there are a few compensations.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Humanity has the most amazing capacity for self-deception matched only by its ingenuity when trying to destroy itself.
quotes.author: Ben Aaronovitch

quotes.quote: Out of the crooked timber of humanity, no straight thing can ever be made.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: When humanity is love and blood of all red. / Oh what nice coloured of that matches with bedsheet. / Love is so, heart to soulful treat.
quotes.author: Dr. Saroj Khumar

quotes.quote: If you judge people you have no time to love them.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Kindness is the best form of humanity.
quotes.author: Doris Lee

quotes.quote: Humiliation is the beginning of sanctification.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Avoiding humiliation is the core of tragedy and comedy.
quotes.author: John Guare

quotes.quote: The greatest humiliation in life, is to work hard on something from which you expect great appreciation, and then fail to get it.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: Rather than swallowing our pride and simply asking what we do not know, we choose to fill in the blanks ourselves and later become humbled. Wisdom was often, in its youth, proven foolish, and ones humiliated were meant to become wise.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: As a rule the person found out in a betrayal of love holds, all the same, the superior position of the two. It is the betrayed one who is humiliated.
quotes.author: Ada Leverson

quotes.quote: When a man mourns for someone who has played him false, it is not for love of her, but for his own humiliation at not having deserved her trust.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Every situation of justice is an occasion where someone is being humiliated and they want to restore their dignity.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: If a group of people feels that it has been humiliated and that its honour has been trampled underfoot, it will want to express its identity and this expression of an identity will take different shapes and forms.
quotes.author: Abdolkarim Soroush

quotes.quote: When you feel humiliated or things like that, you either use it as fuel to change or you get covered by it.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: He who is greedy is disgraced; he who discloses his hardship will always be humiliated; he who has no control over his tongue will often have to face discomfort.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: The basis of shame is not some personal mistake of ours, but the ignominy, the humiliation we feel that we must be what we are without any choice in the matter, and that this humiliation is seen by everyone.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: People really do like seeing their best friends humiliated; a large part of the friendship is based on humiliation; and that is an old truth,well known to all intelligent people.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: There is only one certain test of the virtue and that is humiliation. The acceptance of humiliation alone shows the depth and reality of our humility.
quotes.author: Nivard Kinsella

quotes.quote: Personal humiliation was painful. Humiliation of one's family was much worse. Humiliation of one's social status was agony to bear. But humiliation of one's nation was the most excruciating of human miseries.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: It is not the pain and the wounds that are the worst. The worst is the humiliation.
quotes.author: Pascal Mercier

quotes.quote: Humiliation sets armies marching, empires falling, breaks hearts and minds and souls.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: Many of those who are humiliated are not humble. Some react to humiliation with anger, others with patience, and others with freedom. The first are culpable, the next harmless, the last just.
quotes.author: Bernard of Clairvaux

quotes.quote: Humiliation scars deeper than the lash.
quotes.author: Tobsha Learner

quotes.quote: The moment our dignity is undermined, we get up in arms and want to see our dignity restored especially if we are humiliated.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Not knowing humiliation, you are ignorant of what it is to arrive at the last stage of yourself.
quotes.author: E M Cioran

quotes.quote: There is nobody more dangerous than one who has been humiliated, even when you humiliate him rightly.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: If you knew the true value of yourself, you will never allow yourself to be humiliated by committing sins.
quotes.author: Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyya

quotes.quote: You cannot really shame a man who sincerely does not care what others think of him.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: We all get humiliated at some point or another during our lives. the trick is not to let it make you resentful or defeatist.
quotes.author: Jane Stanton Hitchcock

quotes.quote: There is no humiliation worse than the consciousness of a wasted life. It stains the spirit, forestalls hope, and destroys any motive for action or change.
quotes.author: Peter Ackroyd

quotes.quote: To those who despair of everything reason cannot provide a faith, but only passion, and in this case it must be the same passion that lay at the root of the despair, namely humiliation and hatred.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The truth is, laughter always sounds more perfect than weeping. Laughter flows in a violent riff and is effortlessly melodic. Weeping is often fought, choked, half strangled, or surrendered to with humiliation.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Abuse and neglect negate love. Care and affirmation, the opposite of abuse and humiliation, are the foundation of love. No one can rightfully claim to be loving when behaving abusively.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: The humiliation of the North is complete and overwhelming.
quotes.author: Benjamin F. Wade

quotes.quote: The theme is the theme of humiliation, which is the square root of sin, as opposed to the freedom from humiliation, and love, which is the square root of wonderful
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: Torture is torture and humiliation is humiliation only when you choose to suffer.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Your position never gives you the right to command. It only imposes on you the duty of so living your life that others can receive your orders without being humiliated.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: To experience brokenness and humiliation all you have to do is lead.
quotes.author: Dan B. Allender

quotes.quote: Honesty is grounded in humility and indeed in humiliation, and in admitting exactly where we are powerless.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: I swore never to be silent whenever and wherever human beings endure suffering and humiliation.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Letters are above all useful as a means of expressing the ideal self; and no other method of communication is quite so good for this purpose. In letters we can reform without practice, beg without humiliation, snip and shape embarrassing experiences to the measure of our own desires.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hardwick

quotes.quote: I appeal to you as a soldier to spare me the humiliation of seeing my regiment march to meet the enemy and I not share its dangers.
quotes.author: George Armstrong Custer

quotes.quote: One man's transparency is another's humiliation
quotes.author: Gerry Adams

quotes.quote: A professional politician is a professionally dishonorable man. In order to get anywhere near high office he has to make so many compromises and submit to so many humiliations that he becomes indistinguishable from a streetwalker.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: He was so excessively polite that Wallander suspected he has endured many humiliations in his life.
quotes.author: Henning Mankell

quotes.quote: Success is whatever humiliation everyone has agreed to compete for.
quotes.author: James Richardson

quotes.quote: Pride attaches undue importance to the superiority of one's status in the eyes of others; and shame is fear of humiliation at one's inferior status in the estimation of others. When one sets one's heart on being highly esteemed, and achieves such rating, then he or she is automatically involved in fear of losing status.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: It has always been a mystery to me how men can feel themselves honoured by the humiliation of their fellow beings.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is a very personal price to public humiliation, and the growth of the Internet has jacked up that price.
quotes.author: Monica Lewinsky

quotes.quote: We learn humility through accepting humiliations cheerfully.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Courage is clearly a readiness to risk self-humiliation.
quotes.author: Nigel Dennis

quotes.quote: There is no humiliation more abusive than hunger.
quotes.author: Pranab Mukherjee

quotes.quote: The only way into truth is through one's own annihilation; through dwelling a long time in a state of extreme and total humiliation.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: You will find that you survive humiliation. And that's an experience of incalculable value.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Every attempt to make war easy and safe will result in humiliation and disaster.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.quote: A soft answer turneth away wrath.
quotes.author: Bible (Proverbs 15:1)

quotes.quote: Be gracious in defeat.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Ghandi

quotes.quote: Better to give than to receive.
quotes.author: Bible (Acts 20:35)

quotes.quote: Better yourself before others.
quotes.author: Darren Bateman

quotes.quote: Chickens don't praise their own soup.
quotes.author: Martinican (on flattery and praise)

quotes.quote: Choose to be forgiven.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cut your coat according to your cloth.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: E'er you remark another's sin, bid your own conscience look within.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Falling is easier than rising.
quotes.author: Irish (on fame)

quotes.quote: Good things come in small packages.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It is as cheap sitting as it is standing.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: It's not what you say; it's how you say it.
quotes.author: American mothers (thanks to J. Martin)

quotes.quote: Kind words conquer.
quotes.author: Tamil (Asian Indian)(on courtesy and respect)

quotes.quote: Less is more.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Let pride go afore, shame will follow after.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: People who live in glass houses shouldn't throw stones.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Self conceit may lead to self destruction.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Self praise is no recommendation.
quotes.author: Romanian (on flattery and praise)

quotes.quote: Silence is golden.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Silence is the hardest argument to refute.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Tell me what you are conceited about, and I'll tell you what you lack.
quotes.author: Argentinian saying, thanks to Diego Paternostro for the translation.

quotes.quote: Your own rags are better than another's gown.
quotes.author: Hausa (West African)(on self-reliance)

quotes.quote: There is no respect for others without humility in one's self.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: It is unwise to be too sure of one's own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Who is more humble? The scientist who looks at the universe with an open mind and accepts whatever the universe has to teach us, or somebody who says everything in this book must be considered the literal truth and never mind the fallibility of all the human beings involved?
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Stay hungry, stay young, stay foolish, stay curious, and above all, stay humble because just when you think you got all the answers, is the moment when some bitter twist of fate in the universe will remind you that you very much don't.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: He who sacrifices a whole offering shall be rewarded for a whole offering; he who offers a burnt-offering shall have the reward of a burnt-offering; but he who offers humility to God and man shall be rewarded with a reward as if he had offered all the sacrifices in the world.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: True humility is not an abject, groveling, self-despising spirit; it is but a right estimate of ourselves as God sees us.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: If thou desire the love of God and man, be humble; for the proud heart, as it loves none but itself, so it is believed of none but by itself; the voice of humility is God's music, and the silence of humility is God's rhetoric. Humility enforces where neither virtue nor strength can prevail nor reason.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: Humility does not mean thinking less of yourself than of other people, nor does it mean having a low opinion of your own gifts. It means freedom from thinking about yourself at all.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Pride makes us artificial and humility makes us real.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Humility is throwing oneself away in complete concentration on something or someone else.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Humility is freedom from your own driven ego.
quotes.author: Martha Kilpatrick

quotes.quote: Don't imagine that if you meet a really humble man he will be what most people call 'humble' nowadays: he won't be a sort of greasy, smarmy person, who's always telling you that, of course, he's nobody. Probably all you'll think about him is that he seemed a cheerful, intelligent chap who took a real interest in what you said to him. If you do dislike him, it will be because you feel a bit envious of anyone who seems to enjoy life so easily. He won't be thinking about himself at all. If anyone would like to acquire humility, I can, I think, tell him the first step. The first step is to realize that one is proud. And a biggish step, too. At least, nothing whatever can be done before it. If you think you're not conceited, it means you are very conceited indeed.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Selflessness is humility. Humility and freedom go hand in hand. Only a humble person can be free.
quotes.author: Jeff Wilson

quotes.quote: The first test of a truly great man is his humility. By humility I don't mean doubt of his powers or hesitation in speaking his opinion, but merely an understanding of the relationship of what he can say and what he can do.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A vulgar mind is proud in prosperity and humble in adversity. A noble mind is humble in prosperity and proud in adversity.
quotes.author: Ruckett

quotes.quote: Humility is no substitute for a good personality.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: When we become aware of our humility, we've lost it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Those who are believed to be most abject and humble are usually most ambitious and envious.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Pride juggles with her toppling towers, They strike the sun and cease. But the firm feet of humility, They grip the ground like trees.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Humility is often merely feigned submissiveness assumed in order to subject others, an artifice of pride which stoops to conquer, and although pride has a thousand ways of transforming itself it is never so well disguised and able to take people in as when masquerading as humility.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Humility provides everyone, even him who despairs in solitude, with the strongest relationship to his fellow man, and this immediately, though, of course, only in the case of complete and permanent humility.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: When stepped on, the worm curls up. That is a clever thing to do. Thus it reduces its chances of being stepped on again. In the language of morality: humility.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Humility, like the darkness, reveals the heavenly lights.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Humility is the most difficult of all virtues to achieve; nothing dies harder than the desire to think well of self.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Nothing is more deceitful than the appearance of humility. It is often only carelessness of opinion, and sometimes an indirect boast.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
quotes.author: Rev. James Wood

quotes.quote: Humility disarms envy and strikes it dead.
quotes.author: Rev. James Wood

quotes.quote: Humility is a virtue all preach, none practice, and yet everybody is content to hear.
quotes.author: Rev. James Wood

quotes.quote: Humility is to the fear of sin.
quotes.author: Rev. James Wood

quotes.quote: Humility proceedeth worthiness.
quotes.author: Rev. James Wood

quotes.quote: True humility does good and is silent.
quotes.author: James Ellis

quotes.quote: Humility is the solid foundation of all virtues.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Humility is the hallmark of wisdom.
quotes.author: J. Collier

quotes.quote: Humility is better than pride.
quotes.author: C. Hodge

quotes.quote: Humility is a Christian grace.
quotes.author: G. Magridge

quotes.quote: Humility before God is man's true glory.
quotes.author: Charles the Great

quotes.quote: Humility, like darkness, reveals the heavenly lights.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: Humility is a beautiful centre, from which every other virtue radiates.
quotes.author: Lady Mountcashel

quotes.quote: Where there is humility, there is peace.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Humility is a slow tide, which, springing from God, will bears us to heaven.
quotes.author: Downey

quotes.quote: Humility is the Christian's greater honor, and the higher men climb, the farther they are from heaven.
quotes.author: H. F. Burder

quotes.quote: Humility in man consists not in denying any gift that is in him, but a just valuation of it, rather thinking too meanly than to highly.
quotes.author: J. Ray

quotes.quote: Humility is not a poverty of spirit, nor as lavish compliance with the wills of others, it is merely a consciousness of our own insufficiency.
quotes.author: J. A. James

quotes.quote: Humility is the first lesson we learn from reflection.
quotes.author: Zimmerman

quotes.quote: Humility is a fair and fragrant flower, in its appearance modest, in its situation low and hidden.
quotes.author: Caspipini

quotes.quote: Humility leads to the highest distinction because it leads to self-improvement.
quotes.author: Sir B. Brodie

quotes.quote: Humility is not a weak and timid quality, it must be carefully distinguished from a grovelling spirit.
quotes.author: E. H. Chapin

quotes.quote: The only true independence is in humility.
quotes.author: W. Allston

quotes.quote: If pain doesn't lead to humility, you have wasted your suffering.
quotes.author: Nishant Baxi

quotes.quote: Shine your soul with the same egoless humility as the rainbow and no matter where you go in this world or the next.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Humility its ground on the side of the truth and not on the side of falsehood.
quotes.author: William Bernard

quotes.quote: Where true humility exists, it seldom fails to discern its existence in another.
quotes.author: William Bernard

quotes.quote: Humility expelling the canker of pride and can head the wounded will.
quotes.author: William Bernard

quotes.quote: True humility never was, never is, and never can be without charity.
quotes.author: William Bernard

quotes.quote: There's a humorous side to every situation. The challenge is to find it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: A clever, imaginative, humorous request can open closed doors and closed minds.
quotes.author: Percy Ross

quotes.quote: The humorous look of children is perhaps the most endearing of all the bonds that hold the Cosmos together.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: An emotional man may possess no humor, but a humorous man usually has deep pockets of emotion, sometimes tucked away or forgotten.
quotes.author: Constance Rourke

quotes.quote: There are many humorous things in the world; among them, the white man's notion that he is less savage than the other savages.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: As long as you can savor the humorous aspect of misery and misfortune, you can overcome anything.
quotes.author: John Candy

quotes.quote: The humorous man recognizes that absolute purity, absolute justice, absolute logic and perfection are beyond human achievement and that men have been able to live happily for thousands of years in a state of genial frailty.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: The humorous story is told gravely; the teller does his best to conceal the fact that he even dimly suspects that there is anything funny about it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Be amusing: never tell unkind stories; above all, never tell long ones.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Never say a humorous thing to a man who does not possess humor. He will always use it in evidence against you.
quotes.author: Herbert Beerbohm Tree

quotes.quote: The profoundly humorous writers are humorous because they are responsive to the hopeless, uncouth, concatenations of life.
quotes.author: V. S. Pritchett

quotes.quote: I can see the humorous side of things and enjoy the fun when it comes; but look where I will, there seems to me always more sadness than joy in life.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: You live but once; you might as well be amusing.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: There are amusing people who do not interest, and interesting people who do not amuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Hunger is sharper than the sword.
quotes.author: Francis Beaumont and John Fletcher

quotes.quote: Hunger is the handmaid of genius.
quotes.author: Hunger is the handmaid of genius

quotes.quote: Hunger is the best sauce in the world.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quotes.quote: Hunger knows no friend but its feeder.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa of Calcutta

quotes.quote: Hunger is the best seasoning for meat.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Hunger steals the memory.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: To hunger for use and to go unused is the worst hunger of all.
quotes.author: Lyndon Baines Johnson

quotes.quote: Hunger is the teacher of the arts, and the bestower of invention.
quotes.author: Aulus Persius Flaccus

quotes.quote: Hunger does not breed reform; it breeds madness, and all the ugly distempers that make an ordered life impossible.
quotes.author: Thomas Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Hunger is the mother of impatience and anger.
quotes.author: Johann Georg von Zimmermann

quotes.quote: If you want to eliminate hunger, everybody has to be involved.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: When we work to end childhood hunger, we are giving our love to kids who need it so much they will never ask for it.
quotes.author: Beau Bridges

quotes.quote: Hunger makes a thief of any man.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: The war against hunger is truly mankind's war of liberation.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Where there is hunger there is no hope. There is only desolation and pain. Hunger nurtures violence and fanaticism. A world where people starve will never be safe
quotes.author: Luiz Lula da Silva

quotes.quote: When a poor person dies of hunger, it has not happened because God did not take care of him or her. It has happened because neither you nor I wanted to give that person what he or she needed.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Hunger of choice is a painful luxury; hunger of necessity is terrifying torture.
quotes.author: Mike Mullin

quotes.quote: We have a hunger of the mind which asks for knowledge of all around us, and the more we gain, the more is our desire; the more we see, the more we are capable of seeing.
quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

quotes.quote: Hunger is the best pickle.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Hunger is insolent, and will be fed.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: Can people who hunger so desperately for what other people have ever have enough?
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The only remedy against hunger is reasonable birth control.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: Take the feeling of hunger out of your gut, and you're no longer a champion.
quotes.author: Burt Lancaster

quotes.quote: Make hunger thy sauce, as a medicine for health.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

quotes.quote: The hunger to win must not die... The appetite has to remain big.
quotes.author: Kapil Dev

quotes.quote: The hunger for facile wisdom is the root of all false philosophy.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: There is a spiritual hunger in the world today - and it cannot be satisfied by better cars on longer credit terms.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.quote: Hunger eats through stone walls.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: This hunger for profits causes great misery for the people.
quotes.author: Walter Ulbricht

quotes.quote: Hunger also changes the world - when eating can't be a habit, then neither can seeing.
quotes.author: Maxine Hong Kingston

quotes.quote: Hunger for gold is made greater as more gold is acquired.
quotes.author: Prudentius

quotes.quote: Hunger's a great spur.
quotes.author: Robert Carlyle

quotes.quote: I find hunger more interesting than accomplishment.
quotes.author: Simon Van Booy

quotes.quote: I've always had a hunger for realizing myself through my career.
quotes.author: Holland Taylor

quotes.quote: To hunger is to be alive and to hope.
quotes.author: Crescent Dragonwagon

quotes.quote: Undoubtedly the desire for food has been, and still is, one of the main causes of great political events.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Where there is Hunger, Law is not regarded; and where Law is not regarded, there will be Hunger.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The real cause of hunger is the powerlessness of the poor to gain access to the resources they need to feed themselves
quotes.author: Frances Moore Lappe

quotes.quote: Can you still want something you already have? Absolutely. Everyday.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: There's something to be said for hunger: at least it lets you know you're still alive.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Hunger quashes man's will to help his fellow man.
quotes.author: Kang Chol Hwan

quotes.quote: Bean could see the hunger in their eyes. Not the regular hunger, for food, but the real hunger, the deep hunger, for family, for love, for belonging.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Real hunger is when one man regards another man as something to eat.
quotes.author: Tadeusz Borowski

quotes.quote: Hunger: One of the few cravings that cannot be appeased with another solution.
quotes.author: Irwin Van Grove

quotes.quote: Hunger is not only the best cook, but also the best physician.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is hunger for ordinary bread, and there is hunger for love, for kindness, for thoughtfulness; and this is the great poverty that makes people suffer so much.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A hungry man is not a free man.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.quote: An empty stomach is not a good political adviser
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I have seen firsthand that agricultural science has enormous potential to increase the yields of small farmers and lift them out of hunger and poverty.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: If we can conquer space, we can conquer childhood hunger.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: There are genuinely sufficient resources in the world to ensure that no one, nowhere, at no time, should go hungry.
quotes.author: ED ASNER

quotes.quote: The day that hunger is eradicated from the earth there will be the greatest spiritual explosion the world has ever known. Humanity cannot imagine the joy that will burst into the world.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: When you share your last crust of bread with a beggar, you mustn't behave as if you were throwing a bone to a dog. You must give humbly, and thank him for allowing you to have a part in his hunger.
quotes.author: Giovannino Guareschi

quotes.quote: The propaganda of communism possesses a language which every people can understand. Its elements are simply hunger, envy, death.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: When I give food to the poor, they call me a saint. When I ask why the poor have no food, they call me a communist.
quotes.author: Hélder Câmara

quotes.quote: Most grievous of all deaths it is to die of hunger.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: We know that a peaceful world cannot long exist, one-third rich and two-thirds hungry.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Poor nations are hungry, and rich nations are proud and pride and hunger will ever be at variance.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Hunger is actually the worst weapon of mass destruction. It claims millions of victims each year.
quotes.author: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

quotes.quote: Hunger is the handmaid of genius.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Child hunger and child obesity are really just two sides of the same coin. Both rob our children of the energy, the strength and the stamina they need to succeed in school and in life. And that, in turn, robs our country of so much of their promise.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: There’s enough on this planet for everyone’s needs but not for everyone’s greed.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Make us worthy Lord to serve our fellow men throughout the world who live and die in poverty and hunger. Give them through our hands this day their daily bread and by our understanding love, give peace and joy.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: Food is the moral right of all who are born into this world.
quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

quotes.quote: A hungry man can't see right or wrong. He just sees food.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: There is no humiliation more abusive than hunger.
quotes.author: Pranab Mukherjee

quotes.quote: It is an eternal obligation toward the human being not to let him suffer from hunger when one has a chance of coming to his assistance.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: The best seasoning for food is hunger for drink, thirst.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: As long as you can find yourself, you’ll never starve.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Hunger is a powerful incentive to introspection.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Hunger, revenge, to sleep are petty foes, But only death the jealous eyes can close.
quotes.author: William Wycherley

quotes.quote: The best way to avoid a hangover is to stay drunk.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: A hangover is the wrath of grapes.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: The hangover became a part of the day as well allowed-for as the Spanish siesta.
quotes.author: F Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: If a man sits down to think, he is immediately asked if he has a headache.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you get hammered till the small hours you feel pretty good in the morning, but really it's just because you're still a bit drunk. That old hangover is just toying with you, working out when to bite.
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of hangover: in one you feel ill and incapable, in the other you feel ill and lucid.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Talking to a drunk person was like talking to an extremely happy, severely brain-damaged three-year-old.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: If any suffering was fruitless it was the agony of a hangover; what he suffered now could not expiate suffering of any other kind.
quotes.author: Kenzaburo Oe

quotes.quote: If the headache would only precede the intoxication, alcoholism would be a virtue.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Might let him take it home and slaughter that he got friends for all of my friends they ain't leaving 'till we say when and we gon' hangover the next day.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: With a hangover and with fear, it is difficult to put a helmet on your head.
quotes.author: Tim O'Brien

quotes.quote: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.quote: The Hangover was lightening in a bottle. We're aware of that. It went through the roof all over the world.
quotes.author: Todd Phillips

quotes.quote: Being hungover is like winning the lottery, only they pay you in regret.
quotes.author: Ryan North

quotes.quote: The hangover was brutal but he didn't mind. It told him he had been somewhere else, some place good.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: A real hangover is nothing to try out family remedies on. The only cure for a real hangover is death.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: One of the curious effects of a bad hangover is that you think you're wrong whether you are or not. Not wrong in particulars, but wrong in general, wrong about everything.
quotes.author: Jim Harrison

quotes.quote: A hangover is just your body reminding you that you're an idiot.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Theres nothing like taking two flights when you have a horrible hangover. Its bad when people can see actual alcohol seeping out of your disgusting pores.
quotes.author: Ike Barinholtz

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Happiness is, waking up without a hangover.
quotes.author: Robert Black

quotes.quote: My head is pounding. Like the worst hangover ever.
quotes.author: Heather Morris

quotes.quote: If getting drunk was how people forgot they were mortal, then hangovers were how they remembered.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Some people spend the day in complaining of a headache, and the night in drinking the wine that gives it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Headaches are for sloths as hangovers for drunks.
quotes.author: Ahmed Mostafa

quotes.quote: For a bad hangover take the juice of two quarts of whisky.
quotes.author: Eddie Condon

quotes.quote: Grease is the only cure for a hangover.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, the hangover may prove to be proportional to the binge.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: You come home, and you party. But after that, you get a hangover. Everything about that is negative.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: The plan was to drink until the pain is over, But what's worse, the pain or the hangover?
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: Hangover is when some of you is sober enough to realize how drunk the rest of you is.
quotes.author: Shaughnessy Bishop-Stall

quotes.quote: Just as the quality and quantity of the spirits consumed may dictate the physical aspects of your hangover, the spirit in which you consumed the spirits will often decide the metaphysical.
quotes.author: Shaughnessy Bishop-Stall

quotes.quote: Half a hangover merely wrecks the night before as well as the morning after.
quotes.author: Clement Freud

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a perennially fascinating topic of study for researchers in a variety of different fields. Its intoxicating effects on the mind have long been linked in popular culture with relativity and have been explored at length by by scholars of literature and the arts.
quotes.author: Jonanthon Shears

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the most commonly abused drug.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcoholism is that burning desire like being addicted to nicotine.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcohol is made very tempting by the powerful advertising and media hype. These are tool used for recruiting novices and sustaining the habits in veterans.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Others also use alcohol/drugs to fill the emptiness they feel inside or to get 'high'.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcohol is what is served at most functions, weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, traditional festivities, sporting events.
quotes.author: Charles Agyin-Asare

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a simple chemical, but its effects on the body are extraordinarily complex and highly individual.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: The stronger a drink is--that is, the more alcohol it contains--the greater the amount of alcohol that will get into your bloodstream.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a legal drug and therefore afforded special status.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: Alcohol isn't really a drug, the thinking goes, because it won't hurt you unless you overindulge.
quotes.author: Katherine Ketcham

quotes.quote: The dictionary defines a hangover as 'the after effects of excessive indulgence in alcoholic drink.'
quotes.author: Nic van Oudtshoorn

quotes.quote: Alcohol can cause many types of accidents. It may also at times lead to violent behavior or contribute to the risk of suicide.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Alcohol is also a drug addiction - a fact which multiplies the significance of its inherently negative potential.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a stupid molecule which is clever in its ability to play mood music on complex brain systems, but it is an addictive drug with a far from innocent profile.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Alcohol is fun, the wine of the Eucharist, a profitable and taxable commodity, but a drug among drugs and highly ambiguous in its costs and benefits.
quotes.author: Griffith Edwards

quotes.quote: Among young people. Drinking is for getting drunk. And many go on to become alcoholics.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is not a new vice, Its ravages have always been a scourge on the human race.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Thousands are killed and injured every year by teenagers driving too fast or under the influence of drugs and drink.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Do not seek solace in alcohol. Alcohol obscures good judgement and leaves you unable to think clearly.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: What began as an apparently harmless pastime has ended up as a frightening, overpowering addiction or obsession.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Not all chemicals are bad. Without chemicals such as hydrogen and oxygen, for example, there would be no way to make water, a vital ingredient for beer.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Without a question, the greatest invention in the history of mankind is beer. Oh, I grant you that the wheel was also a fine invention, but the wheel does not go nearly as well with pizza.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Man being reasonable must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: I think a man ought to get drunk at least twice a year, just on principle, so he won't let himself get snotty about it.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Drink because you are happy, but never because you are miserable.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Always remember that I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: My rule of life prescribed as an absolutely sacred rite smoking cigars and also the drinking of alcohol before, after and, if need be, during all meals and in the intervals between them.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The water was not fit to drink. To make it palatable, we had to add whisky. By diligent effort, I learnt to like it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Beverages that contain more congeners, such as whiskey, brandy and red wine are more likely to cause hangover symptoms.
quotes.author: epubli

quotes.quote: Vitamin C can not only cure hangover, it can also sober up a dead drunk, an Australian doctor has found.
quotes.author: Nic van Oudtshoorn

quotes.quote: Come morning you are going to feel guilty about hanging one on.
quotes.author: Nic van Oudtshoorn

quotes.quote: Hangover is nothing more than the showing of a person's guilt complex for getting drunk in the first place.
quotes.author: Nic van Oudtshoorn

quotes.quote: If you feel so sick you're afraid you're going to die, you're suffering a pretty ordinary hangover.
quotes.author: Nic van Oudtshoorn

quotes.quote: A hangover as the after effects of excessive indulgence in alcoholic drink.
quotes.author: Nic van Oudtshoorn

quotes.quote: A hangover is the wrath of grapes.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Research shown that beverages which contain pure alcohol such as gin or vodka, cause fewer hangover effects.
quotes.author: epubli

quotes.quote: Two heads are better than one, unless you have a hangover.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: No one gets a hangover from other people's drinking.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Drinking doesn't cause hangovers; stopping drinking causes hangovers.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: Depression and hangovers really do go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Raymond Grady

quotes.quote: I'll drink as long as I have a hangover and I'll have a hangover as long as I drink. It's a vicious circle.
quotes.author: Frances Goodrich

quotes.quote: I'll tell you the secret to avoid hangovers. Don't stop drinking.
quotes.author: Glen A. Larson

quotes.quote: If you act drunk long enough, you get a REAL hangover.
quotes.author: Larry Gelbart

quotes.quote: I didn't want to get dehydrated. That's what gives you a hangover.
quotes.author: Henry De Vere Stacpoole

quotes.quote: A hangover slows a man down. Forces him to take stock. It begins like a lion and ends like a lullaby. Can't fight the hangover, old son. It's like growing old. Can't fight it.
quotes.author: Matthew Graham

quotes.quote: If I stop drinking all at once, I'm afraid the cumulative hangover will kill me.
quotes.author: Adam Reed

quotes.quote: Alcoholic hangovers are much easier to cure. Emotional benders are the tough ones.
quotes.author: Charles MacArthur

quotes.quote: People are hungry for what's happening right now in the world.
quotes.author: Kevin Systrom

quotes.quote: Hungry men have no respect for law, authority or human life.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: A hungry people listens not to reason, not cares for justice, nor is bent by any prayers.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Hungry man, reach for the book: it is a weapon.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Hungry people cannot be good at learning or producing anything, except perhaps violence.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Rice is great if you're really hungry and want to eat two thousand of something.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: When hope is hungry, everything feeds it.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Eat only when you are hungry. Drink only when you're thirsty. Sleep only when you're tired. Screw only when you're horny.
quotes.author: Al Neuharth

quotes.quote: A hungry man is an angry one.
quotes.author: Buchi Emecheta

quotes.quote: A hungry man can't see right or wrong. He just sees food.
quotes.author: Pearl S Buck

quotes.quote: People are hungry for messages of hope and life.
quotes.author: Morgan Brittany

quotes.quote: A hungry stomach cannot hear.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: Even the rich are hungry for love, for being cared for, for being wanted, for having someone to call their own.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: We are hungry for things that have touched human hands.
quotes.author: Faith Popcorn

quotes.quote: To a hungry person, every bitter food is sweet. When the preferable is not available, the available becomes preferable!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: A hungry stomach rarely despises common food.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Some people prefer eating dessert to the main course. These people have never been really hungry.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish. Never let go of your appetite to go after new ideas, new experiences, and new adventures.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you want to eat when you're not hungry, you're hungry for something else.
quotes.author: Geneen Roth

quotes.quote: Only a stomach that rarely feels hungry scorns common things.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Living on hope is like being hungry all the time.
quotes.author: Faith Sullivan

quotes.quote: If you're hungry enough even poison tastes good.
quotes.author: Billy Coffey

quotes.quote: Being hungry is like being in love: if you don't know, you're probably not.
quotes.author: Geneen Roth

quotes.quote: People are not hungry just for bread, they are hungry for love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Nobody wants to kiss when they are hungry.
quotes.author: DOROTHY DIX

quotes.quote: You're hungry for the infinite and the infinite is hungry for you.
quotes.author: Rob Brezsny

quotes.quote: The hungry feeling and the lonely feeling merged until it was hard to tell them apart.
quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

quotes.quote: Young players are more hungry because they have not achieved what some of the older players have.
quotes.author: Caroline Wozniacki

quotes.quote: We are all hungry and thirsty for concrete images. Abstract art will have been good for one thing: to restore its exact virginity to figurative art.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: People are hungry because they're eating empty foods. Mine are full, and so am i.
quotes.author: Ricky Williams

quotes.quote: People don't speak of hunger when they know what it is to be hungry.
quotes.author: Vicki Baum

quotes.quote: If my children were hungry I should think I would steal to feed them.
quotes.author: Ian Smith

quotes.quote: Wait until you are hungry to say something, until there is an aching in you to speak.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: It was not that she expected anything expensive; it was that he needed to give her something as much as he needed to eat when he was hungry.
quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

quotes.quote: People are hungry for stories of faith. People are hungry for hope.
quotes.author: Roma Downey

quotes.quote: In all of nature, there is no sound more pleasing than that of a hungry animal at its feed. Unless you are the food.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Humans are the only hunters who kill when not hungry
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.quote: Children are the most learning-hungry beings in the world.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: As long as one human being is hungry, the entire human race is hungry.
quotes.author: R Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Stay hungry, stay healthy, be a gentleman, believe strongly in yourself and go beyond limitations.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: If I were hungry and friendless today, I would rather take my chances with a saloon-keeper than with the average preacher.
quotes.author: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.quote: Eat every meal as if it's your last; when the last one comes, you probably won't be very hungry.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: A hungry wolf at all the herd will run, In hopes, through many, to make sure of one.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: When hungry, eat your rice; when tired, close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me, but wise men will know what I mean.
quotes.author: Linji Yixuan

quotes.quote: For us hunting wasn't a sport. It was a way to be intimate with nature
quotes.author: Ted Kerasote

quotes.quote: Hunting has opened the earth to me and let me sense the rhythms and hierarchies of nature.
quotes.author: Charles Fergus

quotes.quote: When I was twelve, I went hunting with my father and we shot a bird. He was laying there and something struck me. Why do we call this fun to kill this creature who was as happy as I was when I woke up this morning.
quotes.author: Marv Levy

quotes.quote: The No. 1 rule in duck hunting is to go where the ducks are.
quotes.author: Jase Robertson

quotes.quote: The perils of duck hunting are great - especially for the duck.
quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

quotes.quote: A bad day hunting still beats a good day working.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you need more than 10 rounds to hunt, and some argue they hunt with that many rounds, you shouldn't be hunting. If you can't get the deer in 3 shots, you shouldn't be hunting. You are an embarrassment.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: Hunting is not a sport. In a sport, both sides should know they're in the game.
quotes.author: Paul Rodriguez

quotes.quote: When a man wants to murder a tiger he calls it sport; when a tiger wants to murder him he calls it ferocity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Hunting is not a proper employment for a thinking man.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: There is a passion for hunting something deeply implanted in the human breast.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: It's rarely talked about, but hunting for sport is just about as vile as we humans get.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: To hunt successfully, you must know your ground, your pack and your quarry.
quotes.author: K.J. Parker

quotes.quote: In hunting on cultivated grounds, the huntsman must abstain from injuring the fruits of the season, and must leave springs and streams undisturbed; for to interfere with these is contrary to propriety and morality.
quotes.author: Xenophon

quotes.quote: Hunting is a relic of the barbarism that once thirsted for human blood, but is now content with the blood of animals.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: It sounds like more of -- instead of hunting -- a wildlife kill. That takes a lot of the sport out of it.
quotes.author: Brett Hall

quotes.quote: Deer hunting would be fine sport, if only the deer had guns.
quotes.author: W S Gilbert

quotes.quote: If the hunter comes back with mushrooms, don't ask him how his hunt was.
quotes.author: Ghanaian Proverb

quotes.quote: Hunting: the least honorable form of war on the weak.
quotes.author: Paul Richard

quotes.quote: Wild animals never kill for sport. Man is the only one to whom the torture and death of his fellow creatures is amusing in itself.
quotes.author: James A. Froude

quotes.quote: We ought to ban hunting, I suggest, if there isn't a purpose other than sport and fun. That should be against the law. It's time now.
quotes.author: Cass Sunstein

quotes.quote: Hunting is now to most of us a game, whose relish seems based upon some mystic remembrance, in the blood, of ancient days when to hunter as well as hunted it was a matter of life and death.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: Whether hunting is right or wrong, a spiritual experience, or an outlet for the killer instinct, one thing it is not is a sport. Sport is when individuals or teams compete against each other under equal circumstances to determine who is better at a given
quotes.author: R. Lerner

quotes.quote: Without hunting there would be no conservation, without conservation there would be no wildlife.
quotes.author: Rob Keck

quotes.quote: There are those who say the kill doesn't matter. They are fools or liars. I can laugh at misses, pass up an easy shot when there is a reason, and come home skunked but happy. All of that doesn't matter. The kill matters. And the manner of the kill matters
quotes.author: Robert Elman

quotes.quote: Some people ask why men go hunting. They must be the kind of people who seldom get far from highways. What do they know of the tryst a hunting man keeps with the wind and the trees and the sky? Hunting? The means are greater than the end, and every ? hunt
quotes.author: Gordon Macquarrie

quotes.quote: When the last deer disappears into the morning mist,When the last elk vanishes from the hills,When the last buffalo falls on the plains,I will hunt mice for I am a hunter and I must have my freedom.
quotes.author: Chief Joseph

quotes.quote: The emotions that good hunters need to cultivate are love and service more than courage. The sentiments of the hunt then become translated into art.
quotes.author: James Swan

quotes.quote: One does not hunt in order to kill; on the contrary, one kills in order to have hunted?If one were to present the sportsman with the death of the animal as a gift he would refuse it. What he is after is having to win it, to conquer the surly brute through
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: No matter what happens, whether you succeed or not, if you stand up and do it right and pay attention, hunting will always give you what you need. It may not be what you were looking for, but it will absolutely be important enough to justify whatever you
quotes.author: Jacob Bowers

quotes.quote: Hunting and fishing are the second and third oldest professions, yet bonefishing is the only sport that I know of, except perhaps swordfishing, that combines hunting and fishing.
quotes.author: Stanley M. Babson

quotes.quote: The only reason I ever played golf in the first place was so I could afford to hunt and fish.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: You don't go deer hunting with a .22 rifle; fish enough and some day you're going to hook a trophy—and maybe land it, if you have the right equipment.
quotes.author: A.K.Best

quotes.quote: Which of these is the wisest and happiest—he who labors without ceasing and only obtains, with great trouble, enough to live on, or he who rests in comfort and finds all that he needs in the pleasure of hunting and fishing?
quotes.author: Micmac Chief
