quotes.quote: Strike ye our land with curved horns! Now with cries bending our bodies, breathe fire upon us; now with feet trampling the earth, let your hoofs thunder over us! The buffalo I've taken and I lift up my voice; strike ye our land with curved horns!
quotes.author: Sioux Buffalo Chant

quotes.quote: We cannot but pity the boy who has never fired a gun; he is no more humane, while his education has been sadly neglected.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I have carried out my official duties as long and as faithfully as I can, and for the rest I have lived in such fashion as seemed most agreeable to me... convinced that a good day's shooting is second in point of pleasure to nothing else on earth.
quotes.author: Lord Warwick

quotes.quote: Of the strength and ferocity of the animal [grizzly bear] the Indians had given us dreadful accounts. They never attack him except in parties of six or eight persons, and even then are often defeated with a loss of one or more of their party.
quotes.author: Meriwether Lewis and William Clark

quotes.quote: The pleasure of the sportsman in the chase is measured by the intelligence of the game and its capacity to elude pursuit and in the labor involved in the capture. It is a contest with sharp wits where satisfaction is mingled with admiration for the object overcome.
quotes.author: John Dean Caton

quotes.quote: What of the hunting, hunter bold? / —Brother, the watch has long and cold. / What of the quarry ye went to kill? / —Brother, he crops in the jungle still. / Where is the power that made your pride? / —Brother, it ebbs from my flank and side. / Where is the haste that ye hurry by? / —Brother, I go to my lair to die.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The caribou feeds the wolf, but it is the wolf who keeps the caribou strong.
quotes.author: Keewatin Eskimo Saying

quotes.quote: I can truthfully say I know of no other recreation that will do so much toward keeping a woman in good health and perfect figure than a few hours spent occasionally at trap shooting.
quotes.author: Annie Oakley

quotes.quote: Having prepared from the skin an apt resemblance of the living bird, they [Cherokee hunters] follow the turkey trails or hunts till they discover a flock, when they secrete themselves behind a log in such a manner to elude discovery, partially displaying their decoy and imitating the gobbling noise of the cock.
quotes.author: Albert Hazen Wright

quotes.quote: It has always seemed to me that any man is a better man for being a hunter. This sport confers a certain constant alertness, and develops a certain ruggedness of character that, in these days of too much civilization, is refreshing; moreover, it allies us to the pioneer past. In a deep sense, this great land of ours was won for us by hunters.
quotes.author: Archibald Rutledge

quotes.quote: Wilderness is the raw material out of which man has hammered the artifact called civilization.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: As all hunters, the people of the Americas relied on the skills of stalking, tracking and trapping to get close to their quarry, so the range and power of the weapon were not so important as the craft of hunting.
quotes.author: Robert Hardy

quotes.quote: Until you have courted bluebills in the snow, you have not tasted the purer delights of waterfowling.
quotes.author: Gordon Macquarrie

quotes.quote: In the joy of hunting is intimately woven the love of the great outdoors. The beauty of woods, valleys, mountains, and skies feeds the soul of the sportsman where the quest of game only whets his appetite.
quotes.author: Dr. Saxton Pope

quotes.quote: At first glance the tree seemed alive with frantic squirrels. There appeared to be forty or fifty of them leaping and darting from branch to branch until the whole tree had become one green maelstrom of mad leaves.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: I'm bully!
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Although you may be out for game, the killing of game should be only incidental, and you should be able calmly to enjoy the beautiful scenery, the ever-changing lights on the hills and forests and the game itself.
quotes.author: Elmer Keith

quotes.quote: The Old Duck Hunters are extremely partial to the bitter last days, those stormy days when the wild, free things of duck shooting are abroad in the very wind with the storm.
quotes.author: Gordon Macquarrie

quotes.quote: The placing of the bullet is everything.
quotes.author: Col. Townsend Whelen

quotes.quote: In matters like hunting and fishing and falconry, mentors are priceless. They teach you nuance, and detail, and what is really important.
quotes.author: Charles Fergus

quotes.quote: No, I'm not a good shot, but I shoot often.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To the trapper-naturalist... the howl of the wolf... inspires [a] challenge to his own skill as a hunter and trapper.
quotes.author: H. McCracken and H. Van Cleve

quotes.quote: The color of your clothes is not so important as many hunters appear to think, for the background of Alaskan hills in late autumn is a crazy-quilt of every violent color from blood red to flame yellow—and anyway, it is motion rather than form or color which catches sheep's eyes.
quotes.author: Russell Annabel

quotes.quote: The successful bird hunter must be knowledgeable about many things but in the end it comes down to this: He must know his birds, his dogs, and his guns.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Norman

quotes.quote: To my mind there is a peculiar fascination in hunting the mule-deer. By the time hunting season has arrived the buck is no longer the slinking beast of the thicket, but a bold and yet wary dweller in the uplands.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: For the wild animal there is no such thing as a gentle decline in peaceful old age. Its life is spent at the front, in line of battle, and as soon as its powers begin to wane in the least, its enemies become too strong for it; it falls.
quotes.author: Ernest Thompson Seton

quotes.quote: Outsiders call us sadists or masochists; sometimes both. Others—mostly ourselves—describe our activities in romantic, even heroic, terms. We take ourselves very seriously and tend to forget that much of duck and goose hunting is fun and sometimes ridiculous.
quotes.author: George Reiger

quotes.quote: Turkeys can be killed by chance, but when they are killed consistently, it is not due to chance.
quotes.author: John McDaniel

quotes.quote: I suppose it may seem like a strange sort of lullaby to some, but I have never heard sweeter music than the muffled report of duck guns on a distant marsh, and I know that others share my feeling.
quotes.author: Burton Spiller

quotes.quote: If you have to be crazy to hunt ducks, I do not wish to be sane.
quotes.author: Robert Ruark

quotes.quote: Half a mile north of the pasture fence, his eye caught movement in the eastern sky. Slowly he lowered into a kneeling position. remembering what his dad had told him: "Sudden moves are always seen, but slow moves you might get away with."
quotes.author: Charles L. Cadieux

quotes.quote: Any good shot will have his days when he is right and the birds come easy.
quotes.author: Ray P. Holland

quotes.quote: Dog-harried turkeys will make angels weep.
quotes.author: Tom Kelly

quotes.quote: Such is the depth of this [turkey] mystique, and so thick is the veil before the truth, that before the creature can even be approached with a modicum of reason and logic, it becomes necessary to peel away the layers of legend—much as one peels the skin from around an onion.
quotes.author: Tom Kelly

quotes.quote: The bird hunting a locust is unaware of the hawk hunting him.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: There is no hunting but with old hounds.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: A hunter boasts about the game he bought.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Good hunters track narrowly.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Many a shot goes into the heather.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Slaughter no more than you can well salt.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: The bleating of the lamb excites the tiger.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: The dusky night rides down the sky, / And ushers in the morn; / The hounds all join in glorious cry, / The huntsman winds his horn: / And a-hunting we will go.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: The sport of kings; / Image of war, without its guilt.
quotes.author: William Somerville

quotes.quote: It is very strange, and very melancholy, that the paucity of human pleasures should persuade us ever to call hunting one of them.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The english country gentleman galloping after a fox—the unspeakable in full pursuit of the uneatable.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: A sportsman is a man who, every now and then, simply has to get out and kill something. Not that he's cruel. He wouldn't hurt a fly. It's not big enough.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: You're either changing your life or you're not. No waiting for this or that or better weather or other hurdles. Hurdles are the change.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Every great and deep difficulty bears in itself its own solution. It forces us to change our thinking in order to find it.
quotes.author: Neils Bohr

quotes.quote: God doesn't hand you an easy life because you will grow in it. He hands you a dream with hurdles, obstacles, setbacks, battles and challenges because he knows the real you is at the finishing line.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The biggest hurdle is figuring out who your friends are. Your real friends.
quotes.author: Eleanor Mondale

quotes.quote: No difficulty can discourage, no obstacle dismay, no trouble dishearten the man who has acquired the art of being alive. Difficulties are but dares of fate, obstacles but hurdles to try his skill, troubles but bitter tonics to give him strength; and he rises higher and looms greater after each encounter with adversity.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Each handicap is like a hurdle in a steeplechase, and when you ride up to it, if you throw your heart over, the horse will go along, too.
quotes.author: Lawrence Bixby

quotes.quote: Life's problems wouldn't be called "hurdles" if there wasn't a way to get over them.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Your biggest hurdle isn't your opponent, it is yourself.
quotes.author: Brandon Todd

quotes.quote: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Take heart again; put your dismal fears away. One day, who knows? Even these hardships will be grand things to look back on.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at it destination full of hope.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It cannot be too often repeated that it is not helps, but obstacles, not facilities, but difficulties that make men.
quotes.author: William Matthews

quotes.quote: The chief obstacle to the progress of the human race is the human race.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Storms make the oak grow deeper roots.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Most obstacles are imaginary; the rest are only temporary.
quotes.author: Scott Sorrell

quotes.quote: Obstacles are like wild animals. They are cowards but they will bluff you if they can. If they see you are afraid of them... they are liable to spring upon you; but if you look them squarely in the eye, they will slink out of sight.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: There are hurdles, there are handicaps, hardships you have to face in life, but you hope for a great future.
quotes.author: Anil Kapoor

quotes.quote: When faced with a hurdle then give it all you've got to jump over it because it can't be done in two stages.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Persistence is recognizing that there are challenges and hurdles to be crossed before life's visions are realized.
quotes.author: Joycelyn Dankwa

quotes.quote: Each day is a special gift from God, and while life may not always be fair, you must never allow the pains, hurdles, and handicaps of the moment to poison your attitude and plans for yourself and your future.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Conquering any difficulty always gives one a secret joy, for it means pushing back a boundary-line and adding to one's liberty.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: We are the hurdles we leap to be ourselves.
quotes.author: Michael McClure

quotes.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The obstacle is the path.
quotes.author: Zen Proverb

quotes.quote: Most obstacles melt away when we make up our minds to walk boldly through them.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Many a wretch has rid on a hurdle who has done less mischief than utterers of forged tales, coiners of scandal, and clippers of reputation.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Success is determined not by whether or not you face obstacles, but by your reaction to them. And if you look at these obstacles as a containing fence, they become your excuse for failure. If you look at them as a hurdle, each one strengthens you for the
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: Where the loser saw barriers, the winner saw hurdles.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Into each life some rain must fall, some days be dark and dreary.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: There are two ways to pass a hurdle: leaping over or plowing through... There needs to be a monster truck option.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: There are two types of hurdles. Difficulty and Challenge. What we face, depends on whether or not we love what we do.
quotes.author: Vignesh S

quotes.quote: If you're not ready to fall, you're not ready to hurdle.
quotes.author: Tonie Campbell

quotes.quote: Fear is a hurdle that stops the expression.
quotes.author: Andy Lindley

quotes.quote: If you can transcend from the dark rut of disempowered thinking to the bright light of an empowered agreement with reality, you will see opportunities not barriers. You will see the finish line, not the hurdles.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Keep calm when things don't go according to your expectations! Beautiful things always meet friction!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: HURRICANE, n. An atmospheric demonstration once very common but now generally abandoned for the tornado and cyclone. The hurricane is still in popular use in the West Indies and is preferred by certain old-fashioned sea-captains.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The hurricane does not uproot grasses, which are pliant and bow low before it on every side. It is only the lofty trees that it attacks.
quotes.author: Panchatantra

quotes.quote: Hurricanes have killed more people worldwide in the last 50 years than any other natural cataclysm.
quotes.author: Kerry Emanuel

quotes.quote: The more violent the storm, the quicker it passes.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: No one can prevent hurricanes, but prosperous communities are much better able to withstand them than poor ones.
quotes.author: Robert Zubrin

quotes.quote: If any event teaches you how to perform on no sleep, it's a hurricane.
quotes.author: David Muir

quotes.quote: Hurricanes are dangerous things, and they're no fun to go through. And if you come out of it in one piece and your house comes out of in one piece, it's no fun living with no electricity for a day or a week, a month, whatever it is. And I speak, unfortunately, from personal experience on that matter.
quotes.author: Bernard Goldberg

quotes.quote: Two things Florida can teach the other 49 states: how to make a good margarita and how to deal with the aftermath of a hurricane.
quotes.author: Tom Feeney

quotes.quote: Laughter, is like a hurricane, once it reaches a certain point, it becomes self-feeding, self-supporting. You laugh not because the jokes are funny but because your own condition is funny.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The hurricane complicates things in that what would have been purely a business decision becomes a decision of the heart.
quotes.author: Henry Cisneros

quotes.quote: Even in the middle of a hurricane, the bottom of the sea is calm. As the storm rages and the winds howl, the deep waters sway in gentle rhythm, a light movement of fish and plant life. Below there is no storm.
quotes.author: Wayne Muller

quotes.quote: A drop in the ocean has no fear of a hurricane.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: The first rule of hurricane coverage is that every broadcast must begin with palm trees bending in the wind.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.quote: In reality, you don't ever change the hurricane. You just learn how to stay out of its path.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Not everything that happens in your life has to hit you like a hurricane.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: Thought and beauty, like a hurricane or waves, should not know conventional, delimited forms.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: You are like a hurricane, there's calm in your eyes, and I'm getting blown away.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: After a hurricane, comes a rainbow.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: Hurricane season brings a humbling reminder that, despite our technologies, most of nature remains unpredictable.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: The only two good words that can be said for a hurricane are that it gives sufficient warning of its approach, and that it blows from one point of the compass at a time.
quotes.author: Gertrude Atherton

quotes.quote: If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm.
quotes.author: Frank Lane

quotes.quote: In the center of a hurricane there is absolute peace and quiet. There is no safer place than in the center of the will of God.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Beneath the greatest love lies a hurricane of hate.
quotes.author: Phil Ochs

quotes.quote: Life is a hurricane, and we board up to save what we can and bow low to the earth to crouch in that small space above the dirt where the wind will not reach. We honor anniversaries of deaths by cleaning graves and sitting next to them before fires, sharing food with those who will not eat again. We raise children and tell them other things about who they can be and what they are worth: to us, everything. We love each other fiercely, while we live and after we die. We survive; we are savages.
quotes.author: Jesmyn Ward

quotes.quote: Anyone who says they're not afraid at the time of a hurricane is either a fool or a liar, or a little bit of both.
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: There's been a lot of really great intensive research into earthquakes, but we can't predict an earthquake down to the day. We can't predict where a hurricane is going to be a month in advance.
quotes.author: Carrie Nugent

quotes.quote: You can dance in a hurricane, but only if you're standing in the eye.
quotes.author: Brandi Carlile

quotes.quote: Global warming creates volatility. I feel it when I'm flying. The storms are more volatile. We are paying the price in more hurricanes and tornadoes.
quotes.author: Debbie Stabenow

quotes.quote: If you're going to love someone or something then don't be a slow leaking faucet, be a hurricane.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The hurricane eye represents the center of the hurricane and is, remarkably, calm.
quotes.author: John I. Blackwood

quotes.quote: If a hurricane strikes your home and then, in a short period of time, the skies turn blue and the sun comes out, you are probably sitting within the hurricane's eye.
quotes.author: John I. Blackwood

quotes.quote: The area immediately surrounding the eye of the hurricane is known as the eyewall.
quotes.author: John I. Blackwood

quotes.quote: The most violent wind and rain are generally found within the eye wall area, in a circle, all the way around the eye of the hurricane.
quotes.author: John I. Blackwood

quotes.quote: A hurricane watch is issued when there is a threat of hurricane conditions within 24-36 hours.
quotes.author: John I. Blackwood

quotes.quote: Hurricanes are a natural part of Earth's weather cycle. Certain weather conditions must exist for hurricanes to occur.
quotes.author: Jean Allen

quotes.quote: Strong winds are not the only aspect of hurricanes that can cause destruction of property and loss of life. Serious flooding also often occurs when a hurricane strikes.
quotes.author: Don Nardo

quotes.quote: The stronger the hurricane, the bigger the surge.
quotes.author: Steven M. Banka

quotes.quote: Hurricanes are the most powerful storms on Earth.
quotes.author: Louise Spilsbury

quotes.quote: Hurricanes usually cause most damage around coasts, but big hurricanes can sometimes reach far in land.
quotes.author: Louise Spilsbury

quotes.quote: Hurricanes cause great destruction when they move onto land. They can blow down buildings, pull up trees, and throw cars and boats around like toys.
quotes.author: Louise Spilsbury

quotes.quote: Heavy rains and storm surges can cause floods, when land that is normally dry is covered in water. Hurricanes killed many people.
quotes.author: Louise Spilsbury

quotes.quote: The ferocious experience of the hurricane was so far outside the normal boundaries of routine occurrences that many people believe things happened that clearly didn't, or were exaggerations of the real events.
quotes.author: Cherie Burns

quotes.quote: A hurricane is less like one huge disaster than it is he sum of a thousand smaller tragedies.
quotes.author: Cherie Burns

quotes.quote: Many people fear the winds of a hurricane, but most deaths are caused by flooding and the after effects of the storm.
quotes.author: Anne Rooney

quotes.quote: People caught in a hurricane may be whisked up into the air and smashed against trees or buildings or collide with other objects carried by the wind.
quotes.author: Anne Rooney

quotes.quote: Hurricanes are often accompanied by floods from the sea, from the rivers bursting their banks, and from torrential rain. Floods can lead to deadly mud slides and landslides that bury people alive.
quotes.author: Anne Rooney

quotes.quote: Many people lose not only their homes but their family members and friends when a catastrophic hurricane strikes. For them, life will never be the same again.
quotes.author: Anne Rooney

quotes.quote: When something scary happens, many people run away in fear. When that scary event is a dangerous hurricane, most people would agree that getting away as quickly as possible and running for cover is the smartest plan.
quotes.author: Pam Dase

quotes.quote: The hurricanes have been getting bigger and bigger. And they usually give them names that don't really inspire fear.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Strangely enough, the thought of being in a hurricane was somehow comforting and familiar. I guess that's because every time I leap, I feel that strange, unseen forces hurl me wherever they want to, and there is nothing I can do to stop them.
quotes.author: Donald P. Bellisario

quotes.quote: People, look around you / It’s a hurricane / Everybody tryin to run and hide
quotes.author: Charles Bradley

quotes.quote: It’s a hurricane (hurricane) / Can you feel it? / All over the southern state / It’s a hurricane / Can everybody see? / Wake up! / Look after this world
quotes.author: Charles Bradley

quotes.quote: Like thunder and lightning go in the one / Together we make the perfect storm / You're like the wind, I'm like the rain / Together we both make hurricanes
quotes.author: Daniel John O'Donoghue

quotes.quote: Just like a hurricane, just like a hurricane / The way you break everything that comes in your way / Just like a hurricane, Just like a hurricane / The way you broke my heart and now I'm left with the pain / After the hurricane
quotes.author: Mikkel Eriksen

quotes.quote: Now my life is shattered, and I'm left to pick up the pieces / And find a new beginning and put it back together again / After the hurricane, the hurricane
quotes.author: Mikkel Eriksen

quotes.quote: I feel like goin' surfing in a hurricane / I feel like makin' love in the pouring rain / I ain't afraid of dying / I don't need to explain / I feel like goin' surfing in a hurricane
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Let me not turn away / From happiness or pain / Just not to run away / In my heart and in my head / Let me face / Hurricanes
quotes.author: Dido Armstrong

quotes.quote: Oh what are we going to do / I never did a thing to you / Time peaceful as a hurricane eye / Peaceful as a hurricane eye
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: Yo, talk about paying the ultimate price / Hurricane been incarcerated all of his life / Started out at like twelve / Trapped in a belly of hell
quotes.author: Lonnie Rashid Lynn

quotes.quote: I can't even explain the pain / Imagine if your life was like a hurricane, a hurricane / Forever, imagine your locked down forever and ever, ever / Could you hold it together?
quotes.author: Lonnie Rashid Lynn

quotes.quote: An Atlantic hurricane begins as a thunderstorm off the west coast of Africa and then becomes a tropical depression.
quotes.author: Jay Hawkins

quotes.quote: The most destructive hurricanes strike the southeastern coast of the United States, Central America, and the Caribbean.
quotes.author: Jay Hawkins

quotes.quote: When a hurricane, cyclone, or typhoon reaches land, it causes destruction along the coast and continues its path inland.
quotes.author: Jay Hawkins

quotes.quote: Hurricanes can smash buildings apart and hurl trees and cars into the air.
quotes.author: Jay Hawkins

quotes.quote: A hurricane is a furious, spiraling tropical storm that roars in from the ocean and lashes the coast, causing terrible damage.
quotes.author: Jay Hawkins

quotes.quote: No one can know exactly when a hurricane will happen or how it'll behave.
quotes.author: Joanne Mattern

quotes.quote: It is important to listen to meteorologists and take action if a hurricane is heading toward you.
quotes.author: Joanne Mattern

quotes.quote: Today, meteorologists give people important information when a hurricane is on the way.
quotes.author: Joanne Mattern

quotes.quote: A hurricane's storm surge is a huge wave of water occurs when the ocean's water level rises during a hurricane.
quotes.author: Jean Allen

quotes.quote: To be rejected by someone doesn't mean you should also reject yourself or that you should think of yourself as a lesser person. It doesn't mean that nobody will ever love you anymore. Remember that only ONE person has rejected you at the moment, and it only hurt so much because to you, that person's opinion symbolized the opinion of the whole world, of God.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Soriano

quotes.quote: Love those who hurt you the most, because they are probably the ones closest to you.They, too, are on a path, and just like you they are learning to walk before they can fly. Imagine of everybody you hurt in life turned their backs on you? You would be playing a hell of a lot of solitaire. Love them no matter what.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: The pain started years ago, but I'd lived with it for so long at that point that I'd accepted it as an inevitable part of me.
quotes.author: Ashley D. Wallis

quotes.quote: That's the funny thing about old hurts- they just wait for new heartache to come along and then show up, just as sharp and horrible as the first day you woke up with the world changed all around you.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: There are some hurts that you never completely get over. And you think that time will diminish their presence and to a degree it does, but it still hurts because well, hurt hurts.
quotes.author: Bernajoy Vaal

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only logical thing to do when someone you love hurts you, is to disconnect, eject, proceed and Move on.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: The worst feeling is not being lonely. It's when someone makes you feel special, then suddenly leaves you and you have to pretend you don't mind at all.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: We are slow to believe that which if believed would hurt our feelings.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: I always find the worst lies are told in relationships - I learned to never lie about your happiness in order to save someone's feelings from being hurt.
quotes.author: Kirsten Prout

quotes.quote: When being in a relationship hurts you, leave. Don't stay and keep drowning because love isn't suppose to be painful.
quotes.author: Mielya Saladdin

quotes.quote: No one wants to be hurt or played, but you have to go through a few losers before you find someone worth keeping.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: A gentleman is one who never hurts anyone's feelings unintentionally.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It hurts when people walk into your life and make you happy and then walk out and leave you hurting.
quotes.author: Adrian Rayshawn

quotes.quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark ofweakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than tenthousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelminggrief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: When you're dreaming with a broken heart, the waking up is the hardest part. You roll outta bed and down on your knees and for a moment you can hardly breathe.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Walking on rocks, hurts. Walking on glass, cuts. Walking on hot coals, burns. Walking on someones heart, kills.
quotes.author: Francisco Garcia

quotes.quote: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him/her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I have lost and loved and won and cried myself to the person I am today.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: My mind screams 'let go!' but my heart doesn't want to admit defeat and let these feeling show..
quotes.author: Nicole Hill

quotes.quote: I pay no attention whatever to anybody's praise or blame. I simply follow my own feelings.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can be touched by God, but not healed. Often when this happens, he is using your pain for a greater purpose.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: This is not Tolstoy. I don't want to know what critics and professors think of what I'm writing. It might hurt my feelings.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: ..For He does not enjoy hurting people or causing them sorrow..
quotes.author: Lamentations 3:31:33

quotes.quote: But if I speak, my pain is not relieved, and if I refrain from speaking- how much of it goes away?
quotes.author: JOB 16:6

quotes.quote: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
quotes.author: Psalm 34:18

quotes.quote: Do not let your hearts be troubled.
quotes.author: John 14

quotes.quote: Hurt no living thing:Ladybird, nor butterfly,Nor moth with dusty wing,
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: We must resist the temptation to take refuge in hurt feelings and raging resentment as we grapple with how our children live, or choose to leave us, or even how we handle our recognition of their betrayals and disaffections.
quotes.author: Michael Eric Dyson

quotes.quote: The ability to forgive heals old wounds and liberates us from past burdens. By releasing the emotional debts of others, forgiveness clears the way for love, peace, and understanding to enter into our lives. It enables us to transcend negative feelings of hurt and vengeance that hold us back and prevent us from focusing on our real purpose.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: Love means exposing yourself to the pains of being hurt, deeply hurt by someone you trust.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: If you know what hurts yourself you know what hurts others.
quotes.author: Malagasy Wisdom

quotes.quote: It is always important to be honest and straightforward about emotions. Even if it might hurt feelings. Say it with love, do not be callous, but be honest so that no further missteps can occur, as well as providing an opportunity of choice.
quotes.author: Jonathan Levy

quotes.quote: Sometimes Yahweh allows our feelings to be hurt, to ensure that our purpose is birthed, that we understood our worth and we get back to work.
quotes.author: Rae Holliday

quotes.quote: It doesn't hurt my feelings when I get vilified by fundamentalist. I've actually made comedy out of it. I've made light of that.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core strength within you that survives all the hurt.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: Too many of us stay walled in because we are afraid of being hurt. We are afraid to care too much; for fear that the other person does not care as much or not at all.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life's way of reacting to a crushed heart is to wrap tough sinews of flesh around it and promise we'll never let ourselves get hurt again. But in keeping love from going out, we keep love from coming in. We risk becoming captives in our own self-made fortresses.
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: I have found the paradox that if I love until it hurts, then there is no hurt, but only more love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Love deeply and passionately. You might get hurt, but it's the only way to live life completely.
quotes.author: H.Jackson Brown JR.

quotes.quote: Everyone has hurt feelings sometimes, and people do different things to feel better. Sometimes talking to a trusted friend is helpful, or we might share our feelings with a teacher or parent. It also helps when we make an extra effort to be sure we don't hurt the feelings of others.
quotes.author: Molly Bang

quotes.quote: Feeling hurt or wounded is an everyday kind of experience. It happens in simple human interactions as often as in moments of relationship crisis.
quotes.author: Bogna Szymkiewicz

quotes.quote: Our feelings are hurt when someone attacks or ignores our inner reality.
quotes.author: Bogna Szymkiewicz

quotes.quote: It seems that the root of a hurt feeling lies in the idea that the other person has not noticed some important aspect of our existence or has excluded us from an important relationship or group.
quotes.author: Bogna Szymkiewicz

quotes.quote: That hurt feelings arise from the effective component of the sociometer, the psychological system that monitors the quality of our relationship with other people.
quotes.author: Leary

quotes.quote: When you have been hurt, it is natural to want to cry. Your sadness may seem so big, and worried feelings so great, that you think things will never get better.
quotes.author: Wendy Deaton M.A.

quotes.quote: It hurts to breathe. My heart is not broken, it is shattered. One moment you were the cause of my happiness, now you are the cause of the deepest pain I have ever felt.
quotes.author: Jasmine Macias

quotes.quote: That's the funny thing about old hurts- they just wait for new heartache to come along and then show up, just as sharp and horrible as the first day you woke up with the world changed all around you.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: Only a person carrying the pain deep down to his heart knows the weight of it.
quotes.author: Jyoti Patel

quotes.quote: I love you. Is not enough to make up for the pain that never heals and starts again at the slightest word.
quotes.author: James Hilton

quotes.quote: I smile for all people, even if you have wronged me. I'm afraid that I will darken you with my corrupt words I hurt you more than you hurt me.
quotes.author: Yahi Abderraouf

quotes.quote: When someone tells you that you have done something that has hurt them, you don't get to decide that you didn't.
quotes.author: Karon Waddell

quotes.quote: We do not leave those whom we truly love. We only break the hearts of those whom we can tolerate their hurts and can move away from their pain.
quotes.author: Maha Klaid

quotes.quote: The love of husband and wife is the force that welds society together.
quotes.author: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: A husband and wife may disagree on many things but they must absolutely agree on this: to never, ever give up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A man should not compete with his wife in talk but in silence.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Most wives think of their husbands as bumbling braggarts with whom they happen to be in love.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: The husband who doesn't tell his wife everything probably reasons that what she doesn't know won't hurt him.
quotes.author: Leo J. Burke

quotes.quote: The man who loves his wife above all else on earth gains the freedom and power to pursue other noble, but lesser, loves.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: A woman who takes her husband about with her everywhere is like a cat that goes on playing with a mouse long after she's killed it.
quotes.author: Saki

quotes.quote: The closer a husband and wife get to God, the closer they get to each other. The farther away they get from God, the farther they get from each other.
quotes.author: Jim Bob Duggar

quotes.quote: Husbands, when your wife is asking you questions, it's not to interrogate you; it's to connect with you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only time a wife listens to her husband is when he's asleep.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.quote: A woman worries about the future until she gets a husband. A man never worries about the future until he gets a wife.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Husbands, love your wives well! Your children are noticing how you treat her. You are teaching your sons how they should treat women, and you are teaching your daughters what they should expect from men.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: A man's wife has more power over him than the state has.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: An excellent wife is the crown of her husband.
quotes.author: Proverbs 12:4

quotes.quote: God designed husbands and wives to complete each other, not to compete with each other.
quotes.author: Jimmy Evans

quotes.quote: An excellent wife who can find? She is far more precious than jewels. The heart of her husband trusts in her, and he will have no lack of gain.
quotes.author: Proverbs 31:10-11

quotes.quote: Many marriages would be better if the husband and the wife clearly understood that they are on the same side.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A good husband wipes her tears, but a great husband listens to the story of why she's crying.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: They are not said to be husband and wife, who merely sit together. Rather they alone are called husband and wife, who have one soul in two bodies.
quotes.author: Guru Amar Das

quotes.quote: Let husband and wife never speak to one another in loud tones,unless the house is on fire.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: There is no association richer than the companionship of husband and wife.
quotes.author: Gordon B Hinckley

quotes.quote: Never advise a man against his wife or a wife against his husband. When they come together again you will be the archenemy. When they separate, the fault will all be yours.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: The husband who wants a happy marriage should learn to keep his mouth shut and his checkbook open.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: In a husband there is only a man; in a married woman there is a man, a father, and mother, and a woman.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Husbands and wives are equal partners. They have different but complementary responsibilities.
quotes.author: Quentin L. Cook

quotes.quote: The husband and wife are one, and that one is the husband.
quotes.author: William Blackstone

quotes.quote: When a husband brings his wife flowers for no reason, there's a reason.
quotes.author: Molly McGee

quotes.quote: There is no such cozy combination as man and wife.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: A dress that zips up the back will bring a husband and wife together.
quotes.author: James H. Boren

quotes.quote: Whenever a husband and wife begin to discuss their marriage they are giving evidence at a coroner's inquest.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: When a wife has a good husband, it is easily seen on her face.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Husbands and wives quarrel a lot more than anyone thinks, and it's oftener about little things than big ones...
quotes.author: Patricia Wentworth

quotes.quote: All things that both a husband and wife really want are to be forgiven a little, encouraged a little and loved a little.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dont ever stop dating your wife and don't ever stop flirting with your husband.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Husband is the HEAD of the family and wife is the NECK that turns the head around!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As a wife, I choose to honor my husband not because I am weak, but because I am strong.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When a husband puts his wife first, above everyone and everything except God, it gives his wife the sense of security and honor that every wife hungers for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Husbands and wives, have fun with each other. I'm convinced it makes all the difference in the world.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Formal courtesy between husband and wife is even more important than it is between strangers.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: To hold a husband, the wife should have understanding instead of beauty.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: But if he loves you, he will profess it, he will provide for you, and he will protect you. If he really loves you, the ultimate profession is, 'This is my wife.'
quotes.author: Steve Harvey

quotes.quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: By all means marry; if you get a good wife, you’ll become happy; if you get a bad one, you’ll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The great marriages are partnerships. It can’t be a great marriage without being a partnership.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.quote: In terms of my marriage, you know, falling in love with my husband was by far the best thing that’s ever happened to me.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: A great marriage is not when the ‘perfect couple’ comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
quotes.author: Dave Meurer

quotes.quote: A good marriage is one which allows for change and growth in the individuals and in the way they express their love.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Marriage is not about age; it’s about finding the right person.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.quote: I have a best friend as a husband, and he is my number one supporter. He’s a family man, and he’s always giving back to God. That is what makes him a beautiful man. We’re not perfect by any means, but that makes us beautiful as well. We’re not afraid to say we’re not perfect. We have our disagreements, but that comes along with marriage.
quotes.author: Tamera Mowry

quotes.quote: So it’s not gonna be easy. It’s going to be really hard; we’re gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me… everyday.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is not weakness. It is strong. Only the sacrament of marriage can contain it.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don’t find very often, then that is what love is all about.
quotes.author: Bruce Forsyth

quotes.quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It’s a choice you make – not just on your wedding day, but over and over again – and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Through devotion, your family cares become more peaceful, mutual love between husband and wife becomes more sincere, the service we owe to the prince more faithful, and our work, no matter what it is, becomes more pleasant and agreeable.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: I regard the rights of men and women equal. In Love's fair realm, husband and wife are king and queen, sceptered and crowned alike, and seated on the self-same throne.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Love is never easy. It never is. And I'm not just talking about girl and guy, girlfriend, boyfriend, husband and wife. I'm talking about family, friends - all of that.
quotes.author: LeToya Luckett

quotes.quote: No one can understand how close a marriage actually is. You just don't know: with a husband and wife, they have a special connection.
quotes.author: Omarosa Manigault Newman

quotes.quote: A wife who discomforts you with truth is better than a mistress who massages you with lies.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Husband and wife relationship should be like water and color, not like rain and rainbow
quotes.author: Dr.P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quotes.quote: The husband who knows how to make his wife smile is indeed the best husband in the world…
quotes.author: Nandita Saini

quotes.quote: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends.
quotes.author: Bhim Rao Ambedkar

quotes.quote: If we women were particular about men's characters, we should never get married at all.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The real reason a husband and wife always fight is because they always focus on the ugliness in each other and have forgotten to focus on the beauties that attracted them at first.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Being a husband or a wife, is already a huge responsibility to shoulder, without adding in the expectations.
quotes.author: Norhafsah Hamid

quotes.quote: Brothers, brothers, boyfriend and girlfriend, husband and wife. You all have this really strong bond between you.
quotes.author: Michael Jacobs

quotes.quote: The thing to remember is that in marriage the husband and wife are one - and the husband is the one.
quotes.author: Helen Deutsch

quotes.quote: There are four sacred bonds in this life: A parent and child, a husband and wife, a priest and confessor... and manager-talent.
quotes.author: Mitch Glazer

quotes.quote: A husband and wife should be together for life.
quotes.author: Danny Miller

quotes.quote: I've always believed that it's rather nice for a husband and wife to keep in touch with each other.
quotes.author: Casey Robinson

quotes.quote: When things go wrong between a husband and wife, the wife is always just as much to blame as the husband.
quotes.author: Walter Reisch

quotes.quote: Husband and wife, if you like; vows of love, exchanged before God. You two were married long ago, and you will be married forevermore.
quotes.author: Michael Green

quotes.quote: I'll just have to make you my wife. A husband and wife must share everything.
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti

quotes.quote: If ever two were one, then surely we. / If ever man were lov'd by wife, then thee. / If ever wife was happy in a man, / Compare with me, ye women, if you can.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: And I really didn't think as to whether or not she thought about me; as for me she was the most immortally passionate girl on this unbridled Universe; whose every unconquerable heartbeat drew me more closer and closer to her divinely form; and without even me and her realizing the slightest; made us forever and ever and ever as 'Husband & Wife'.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: We'll be together, / Husband and wife, / Now and forever, / The rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Barry Gibb

quotes.quote: A home and a family / A husband, a wife / And to life each day is a way of life
quotes.author: Jackie Barnett

quotes.quote: I promise to love you and do my best for you / I need you to help me to find my strength / Walk with me all through my life / My lover my husband my wife / Share this journey with me / Write this story with me
quotes.author: Elvin Ross

quotes.quote: I can see you / On your wedding day / With the one you love / To share the way / A life ahead of you / Youth left behind / Go out and make yourself / Some memories
quotes.author: Elvin Ross

quotes.quote: You may find comfort in your husband or your wife / When your mother is gone.
quotes.author: Traditional

quotes.quote: You shall not commit adultery. / Do be pure in heart and mind. / Love your husband or wife, keep your heart clean.
quotes.author: Dana Dirksen

quotes.quote: Bless this day / Pinnacle of life / Husband joined to wife / The heart leaps up to behold / This golden day
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: We stood at the altar, repeating our vows for life / For better or worse, forever a husband and wife / Love's not always easy and dreams don't all come true / Why'd you lose your faith in me, I never gave up on you
quotes.author: Toby Keith

quotes.quote: A man and a woman are meant for each other / Are meant for each other as husband and wife / From this moment forward, I promise to love thee/ I promise to love thee the rest of my life
quotes.author: Harvey Schmidt

quotes.quote: Knew the time was right, to be husband and wife / Us both dressed alike in the purest white / Such a beautiful gown, friends and family around / ignore the cold feet now, time to take these vows
quotes.author: Sean Garret

quotes.quote: Marriage is also, ideally, a relationship in which people feel safe being themselves, it might seem to make sense to train couples to practice this sort of unconditional understanding.
quotes.author: John Gottman

quotes.quote: A married woman is concerned about the affairs of this world--how she can please her husband.
quotes.author: 1 Corinthians 7:34

quotes.quote: God created you and your husband to be different so you would complement and bring health to each other should give you an incentive to meet his need for praise and admiration.
quotes.author: Darien B. Cooper

quotes.quote: The secret is not being the 'right' husband or wife--it's being the right husband or wife, at the right time, in your particular marriage.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: As our marriage and our family grew, my relationship with my wife grew as well.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Many women focus so much on trying to get their husband to change that they fail to see the areas in which they need to evolve.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Strong marriages are built on the loving things people in the present, not on the memories of the things they did in the past.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Focus on continually changing and growing in order to make sure you are someone your spouse would still choose today.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Successful couples don't escape difficult times; they change and adapt, forging a stronger relationship.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Being in love isn't enough. Staying in love happens when you and your spouse work out how to embrace change, solve problems, and treat each other when the going gets tough.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Incorporating an effective system of checks and balances is the best way for couples to get a clear sense of their progress.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Love and the ability to change go hand and hand in making a marriage that nourishes and inspires not only the couple, but all who know them.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: No part of her life should be outside of her relationship to her husband and outside of subordination to him.
quotes.author: Edward D. Andrews

quotes.quote: This subordination of wife to husband has a practical aspect in that it creates a greater effectiveness in their working together as one.
quotes.author: Edward D. Andrews

quotes.quote: Married couple should have an understanding of their spouse suffering from inherent sin, imperfection, and human weakness, so as to make allowances for falling short. Just how bad is it?
quotes.author: Edward D. Andrews

quotes.quote: Every husband must love his wife as himself and every wife must respect her husband.
quotes.author: Joanne Cleave

quotes.quote: The husband should fulfill his marital duty to his wife, and likewise the wife to her husband.
quotes.author: Joanne Cleave

quotes.quote: A woman is bound to her husband as long as he lives.
quotes.author: Joanne Cleave

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as a 'perfect marriage' or a 'perfect spouse'. Come on, get real! Marriage is a flawed institution. if you but into that theory.
quotes.author: Shobha Dé

quotes.quote: I believe what a husband needs from wife is not a woman who just keeps trying harder to figure out marriage. Instead, a husband needs a woman who loves God, abides Christ, and follows Him all the days of her life.
quotes.author: Ashley Davis Bush

quotes.quote: The key to a great marriage is the quality of the habits you share together. Healthy, positive habits create and extraordinarily happy marriage.
quotes.author: Ashley Davis Bush

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: Happy marriages begin when we marry the ones we love, and they blossom when we love the ones we marry.
quotes.author: Tom Mullen

quotes.quote: It is not lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: What counts in making a happy marriage is not so much how compatible you are, but how you deal with incompatibility.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.quote: There is nothing nobler or more admirable than when two people who see eye to eye, keep house as man and wife, confounding their enemies and delighting their friends.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: After marriage, husband and wife become two sides of a coin; they just can't face each other, but still they stay together.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: I had some words with my wife, and she had some paragraphs with me.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
quotes.author: Alec Baldwin

quotes.quote: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: If husband and wife wake up with a commitment to worship and serve, they will be delighted in their marriage.
quotes.author: Ryan Frederick

quotes.quote: Too many husbands and wives enter into marriage with the idea that their spouse exists for one purpose: to make them happy.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Marriage is not a reform school..Instead of you reforming (your spouse), (he or she) will instead influenced you.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: When a husband and wife are concerned only about their own individual desires, the stage is set for conflict.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The perfect marriage is a uniting of three persons--a man and a woman and God. That is what makes marriage holy.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
quotes.author: John Florio

quotes.quote: The husband who decides to surprise his wife is often very much surprised himself.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The best way to get husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they are too old to do it.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: The husband who wants a happy marriage should learn to keep his mouth shut and his checkbook open.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: To catch a husband is an art; to hold him is a job.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Husbands are like fires - they go out when they're left unattended.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: A good husband is never the first to go to sleep at night or the last to awake in the morning.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A husband is what is left of a lover, after the nerve has been extracted.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A husband is a guy who tells you when you've got on too much lipstick and helps you with your girdle when your hips stick.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: The husbands of very beautiful women belong to the criminal classes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Being a husband is a whole-time job. That is why so many husbands fail. They cannot give their entire attention to it.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: The divine right of husbands, like the divine right of kings, may, it is hoped, in this enlightened age, be contested without danger.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: Being a good husband is like being a good stand-up comic - you need ten years before you can even call yourself a beginner.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: One good husband is worth two good wives, for the scarcer things are, the more they are valued.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A husband is very much like a house or a horse.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: The majority of husbands remind me of an orangutan trying to play the violin.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Being a husband is for me as big a priority as being a father.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.quote: The ideal husband understands every word his wife doesn't say.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: The way to hold a husband is to keep him a little jealous; the way to lose him is to keep him a little more jealous.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Husbands are chiefly good as lovers when they are betraying their wives.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: If your husband is cheating on you, it doesn't mean that you need to get prettier -- it means he's a scumbag.
quotes.author: Jessica Valenti

quotes.quote: All husbands are alike, but they have different faces so you can tell them apart.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: A retired husband is often a wife's full-time job.
quotes.author: Ella Harris

quotes.quote: Your husband is lazy if coffee doesn't keep him awake - even when it's hot and being spilled on him.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Husbands, love your wives well! Your children are noticing how you treat her. You are teaching your sons how they should treat women, and you are teaching your daughters what they should expect from men.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: A key to keeping your husband is getting him to miss you. That keeps a marriage fresh.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: The husband - by primitive instinct partly, certainly by ancient tradition - regards himself as the active partner in matters of love and his own pleasure as legitimately the prime motive for activity.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: It turns out that a husband who does the laundry, it's very romantic when you're older. And it's hard to believe when you're younger. But it's absolutely true.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: The activity of being a husband, a father - those are roles, too, but underneath them is the spiritual center that connects us all, and that's what's most important.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.quote: Handsome husbands often make a wife's heart ache.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Do not put such unlimited power into the hands of husbands. Remember all men would be tyrants if they could.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: The faults of husbands are often caused by the excess virtues of their wives.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: The calmest husbands make the stormiest wives.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.quote: The only good husbands stay bachelors: They're too considerate to get married.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: American husbands are the best in the world; no other husbands are so generous to their wives, or can be so easily divorced.
quotes.author: Elinor Glyn

quotes.quote: Husbands never become good; they merely become proficient.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Husband is like toupe, both used to cover up.
quotes.author: Charlie Chan

quotes.quote: Italian husbands, in order to buy their wives a fur, spend more than all their European collegues.
quotes.author: Indro Montanelli

quotes.quote: Husbands shouldn't be the last to know. Husbands should never know!
quotes.author: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.quote: There is so little difference between husbands you might as well keep the first.
quotes.author: Adela Rogers St. Johns

quotes.quote: Husbands are awkward things to deal with; even keeping them in hot water will not make them tender.
quotes.author: Mary Lorraine Buckley

quotes.quote: There are few husbands whom the wife cannot win in the long run, by patience and love.
quotes.author: Marguerite de Valois

quotes.quote: I think there's something degrading about having a husband for a rival. It's humiliating if you fail and commonplace if you succeed.
quotes.author: Christopher Hampton

quotes.quote: A husband without faults is a dangerous observer.
quotes.author: George Savile

quotes.quote: A husband is what's left of a sweetheart after the nerve has been killed.
quotes.author: Lou Costello

quotes.quote: Watching your husband become a father is really sexy and wonderful.
quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

quotes.quote: The average husband enjoys the total effect of his home but is usually unable to contribute any of the details of work and organisation that make it enjoyable.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: A jealous husband doesn't doubt his wife, but himself.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: I've learned that you know your husband still loves you when there are two brownies left and he takes the smaller one.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: An easy-going husband is the one indispensable comfort of life.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: I played the game one way. I gave it everything I had. It doesn't take any ability to hustle.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.quote: My hustle is nonstop. I never stop hustling.
quotes.author: Young Jeezy

quotes.quote: You gotta run more than your mouth to escape the treadmill of mediocrity. A true hustler jogs during the day, and sleepwalks at night.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Hustle beats talent, when talent doesn't hustle.
quotes.author: Ross Simmonds

quotes.quote: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Lift up the weak; inspire the ignorant. Rescue the failures; encourage the deprived! Live to give. Don't only hustle for survival. Go, and settle for revival!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I want the peace in knowing that is wasn't for lack of hustling that I missed a target for my dream. I want to know that the one thing in my control was under control.
quotes.author: Jon Acuff

quotes.quote: Quit hating and trying to be like the next man. Get on your own grind and be better than the next man, whether you gotta hustle, work a job, or whatever just do you.
quotes.author: Surgeo Bell

quotes.quote: Mine's a pretty simple strategy: there's not a lot of talent here, but there's a lot of hustle. I have to be in every place I can, and be busy.
quotes.author: Ryan Seacrest

quotes.quote: My entire life can be summed up in four words: I hustled. I conquered.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm living everyday like a hustle. Another drug to juggle. Another day, another struggle.
quotes.author: Notorious BIG

quotes.quote: There's a lot of females that hustle, just like men hustle.
quotes.author: Fetty Wap

quotes.quote: Focused. I'm a hustler. And my hustle is trying to figure out the best ways to do what I like without having to do much else.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.quote: Greatness only comes before hustle in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Ross Simmonds

quotes.quote: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The best kinds of people in your life aren't those who gather to celebrate your success, but those who gather to help your hustle.
quotes.author: Usman Ismaheel

quotes.quote: Hustle isn't just working on the things you like. It means doing the things you don't enjoy so you can do the things you love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The dream is free, the hustle is sold separately.
quotes.author: Chelsea Rowe

quotes.quote: Having the positive belief that it will all be O.K. just means that you hustle and make it work because failure is not even an option in your own mind.
quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

quotes.quote: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: The hustle brings the dollar. The experience brings the knowledge. The persistence brings success.
quotes.author: Ross Simmonds

quotes.quote: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Contrary to popular opinion, the hustle is not a dance step â€“ it's an old business procedure.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: I'm from where your hustle determines your salary.
quotes.author: Rick Ross

quotes.quote: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle and giving 110 percent all the time.
quotes.author: Don Zimmer

quotes.quote: I'm sharp. What the street taught me how to do is how to hustle. How to make something out of nothing.
quotes.author: Pitbull

quotes.quote: You either walk inside your story and own it or you stand outside your story and hustle for your worthiness.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Some hustle for respect. Some hustle for love. Others hustle for truth. We all hustle to survive.
quotes.author: Jay Cole Swahili

quotes.quote: Hustle until you no longer need to introduce yourself
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Good things happen to those who hustle.
quotes.author: Chuck Noll

quotes.quote: Unnecessary hustle is one of the American follies. We hustle at both work and play and consequently enjoy neither to the utmost.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: It's a terrible shame if you're born the brightest guy in your class. If you're not, then you have to hustle—and that's good.
quotes.author: Hal Prince

quotes.quote: The present age, for all its cosmopolitan hustle, is curiously suburban in spirit.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: Like the irresponsible black water bugs on summer ponds, the people in the cities crawl in circle and hustle about idiotically, without aim or purpose.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: No matter how many errors you make, no matter how many times you strike out, keep hustling. That way, you'll at least look like a ballplayer.
quotes.author: Tony Kubek

quotes.quote: If you play an aggressive, hustling game, it forces your opponents into errors.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: In the hustle and bustle of modern life, we often forget to take the time to be still, to the point where it is often uncomfortable and alien to us.
quotes.author: Aaron Fisher

quotes.quote: She's truly an amazing person who deserves all she has because none of it was given to her—it was all hustled with class.
quotes.author: Rufus Troy Alexander

quotes.quote: You need to hustle. When you want something, hustle for it.
quotes.author: Martisha Glover

quotes.quote: Here, where HANSARD's pages rustle, / Three a show of rush and bustle, / But there's ne'er a chance to hustle; / You must shirk.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: Soon we'll leave the Snares behind, blusterous and strong / Up'll come the Westerlies and hustle her along: / Running like a driven deer through the thundering gales, / Racing under royals for the January Sales!
quotes.author: Cicely Fox Smith

quotes.quote: Though we work and toil and hustle in our life of haste and bustle, / All that makes our life worth living comes unstriven for and free; / Man may weary and importune, but the fickle goddess Fortune / Deals him out his pain or pleasure, careless what his worth maybe.
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: How would the cave ever realize that it was entrenched / with divinely peace; unless and until it witnessed the / rambunctiously boisterous hustle-bustle of the city; the / unruly mobs of different tribes fighting spuriously for blood; /in the name of God?
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: The States are full of mush and pie / And houses twenty stories high, / Saw-mills and millionaires and bustle; / The people there 'have got to hustle.'
quotes.author: Thomas William Hodgson Crosland

quotes.quote: I love the cheery bustle / Of children round the house, / The tidy maids a-hustle, / The chatter of my spouse; / The laughter and the singing, / The joy on every face: / With frequent laughter ringing, / O, Home's a happy place!
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Don't stay in bed unless you can make money in bed.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Some succeed because they are destined to, but most succeed because they are determined to.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: You can't have a million-dollar dream with a minimum-wage work ethic.
quotes.author: Stephen C.Hogan

quotes.quote: Those at the top of the mountain didn't fall there.
quotes.author: Marcus Washling

quotes.quote: You can't begin and then stop. If you begin, you must keep on beginning: that's the truth. No rest for the wicked.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of going slowly. Be afraid only of standing still.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Nothing worth doing ever, ever, ever came easy.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: When you don’t forget you were once a scrappy kid from Scranton and you hustle until your family is set when you're gone. HUSTLE, like no one, is awake. Day or night. Sunrise—sunset. Hustle quietly, when the lights are on and when the lights are off.
quotes.author: Jill Telford

quotes.quote: I don't make excuses. I hustle.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Maybe the cure for any burnout is to work harder.
quotes.author: Phil Knight

quotes.quote: The fastest way to get what you actually want in your life is to drop the false belief that you must continue to wait in order to have it.⁣
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: All the so-called 'secrets of success' will not work unless you do.
quotes.author: Jaymin Shah

quotes.quote: People who are going to be successful know it’s gonna happen. And those people tend to hustle until it does happen.
quotes.author: Retta

quotes.quote: Take a leap of faith on your dreams, not for me and not for the society, just for yourself.
quotes.author: Vinay Garg

quotes.quote: Got dreams in my mind that got me hustling all the time.
quotes.author: Osama Al-Hasan

quotes.quote: Rules governing defecation, hygiene, and pollution exist in every culture at every period in history. It may in fact be the foundation of civilization: What is toilet training if not the first attempt to turn a child into an acceptable member of society?
quotes.author: Rose George

quotes.quote: Man does not live by soap alone; and hygiene, or even health, is not much good unless you can take a healthy view of it or, better still, feel a healthy indifference to it.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: There has to be some kind of personal hygiene bar that a person needs to clear in order for a relationship to be successful.
quotes.author: Mallory Ortberg

quotes.quote: All mental hygiene is based on the core practice of doing nothing. Most of us are good at wasting time, staring at the wall while telling ourselves we should be working. We call this doing nothing, but our brains are furiously active. We think constantly, and our thinking is often rife with distress.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Since the invention of the flush toilet and the vacuum carpet cleaner, the modern man seems to judge a man's moral standards by his cleanliness, and thinks a dog the more highly civilized for having a weekly bath and a winter wrapper round his belly.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Bath twice a day to be really clean, once a day to be passably clean, once a week to avoid being a public menace.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Cutting out bad habits is far more effective than cutting out organs.
quotes.author: Herbert M. Shelton

quotes.quote: Hygiene is two thirds of health.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: One realizes how we take water for granted and how important it is to have it in order to stay alive. Beyond the drinking of it, let's not forget the hygiene.
quotes.author: Kim Basinger

quotes.quote: Nine-tenths of our sickness can be prevented by right thinking plus right hygiene -- nine-tenths of it!
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: The social kiss is an exchange of insincerity between two combatants on the field of social advancement. It places hygiene before affection and condescension before all else.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hygiene is the corruption of medicine by morality. It is impossible to find a hygienist who does not debase his theory of the healthful with a theory of the virtuous. The true aim of medicine is not to make men virtuous; it is to safeguard and rescue them from the consequences of their vices.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Irony is the hygiene of the mind.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.quote: All despotisms should be considered problems of mental hygiene, and all support of censorship should be considered as problems of abnormal psychology.
quotes.author: Theodore Schroeder

quotes.quote: We must realise that cognitive hygiene is as important subject as oral hygiene for healthy and happy existence.
quotes.author: Aditya Ajmera

quotes.quote: Although we take it for granted, sanitation is a physical measure that has probably done more to increase human life span than any kind of drug or surgery.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Health and disease are the same thingâ€”vital action intended to preserve, maintain, and protect the body. There is no more reason for treating disease than there is for treating health.
quotes.author: Herbert M. Shelton

quotes.quote: The denunciation of the young is a necessary part of the hygiene of older people, and greatly assists the circulation of the blood.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Good hygiene enhanced sound well-being.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Compassion suits our physical condition, whereas anger, fear and distrust are harmful to our well-being. Therefore, just as we learn the importance of physical hygiene to physical health, to ensure healthy minds, we need to learn some kind of emotional hygiene.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Since the Middle Ages progress in hygiene has been characterized by the conquest of stink.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Logic is the hygiene the mathematician practices to keep his ideas healthy and strong.
quotes.author: Hermann Weyl

quotes.quote: A genuine smile comes from the heart, but a healthy smile needs good dental care.
quotes.author: Wayne Chirisa

quotes.quote: Nothing inspires cleanliness more than an unexpected guest.
quotes.author: Radhika Mundra

quotes.quote: Hygiene sometimes just isn't a priority with some people. So my public health message is basically this â€” bathe.
quotes.author: Cristina Pasa

quotes.quote: In order to protect the physical hygiene and mental health of the living, we usually bury the dead.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: What health is to the body, even that is honesty to the soul. Develop your spirit that it may gain strength to control the body and follow the natural laws of nutrition and hygiene.
quotes.author: Kemetic Wisdom

quotes.quote: To complete your daily mental hygiene, observe any part of you that is upset or anxious, and offer that part of yourself the following simple wishes: 'May you be well. May you be happy. May you be free from suffering.' Repeat this until you actually mean it.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Keep your own house and its surroundings pure and clean. This hygiene will keep you healthy and benefit your worldly life.
quotes.author: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Ya know what I do almost every day? I wash. Personal hygiene is part of the package with me.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Good grooming and hygiene are essential. It's never too early to start being concerned about your appearance - first impressions are everything.
quotes.author: Robert Parish

quotes.quote: As we know, menstrual hygiene is an issue women have been facing over the years. It's great that the initiative to provide low-cost sanitary napkins has been undertaken. It is an empowering step for many women.
quotes.author: Radhika Apte
